query: I want to make a warm dish containing oysters

options.5b9441298f: Seasoned salted crackers shaped like oysters
options.00310c3462: Creamy clam chowder made with whole milk and baby clams
options.8635ea3d3c: Tomato mussel soup containing dry white wine
options.52b83497d8: Warm vegetable soup containing tomatoes, peas, corn, carrots, and potatoes

08cb462fdf.ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons flour, 3 cups milk, 1 cup cream, 1 12 teaspoons salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon onion, grated, 1 quart oyster,
08cb462fdf.instructions:
1- Melt butter, stir in flour and blend well.
2- Add milk slowly, stirring constantly; add cream, salt, pepper and grated onion.
3- Keep warm over low heat.
4- Bring oysters to a boil in their own liquor; add to milk stock and heat about 5 minutes or until edges of the oysters curl.
5- Serve immediately.

5b9441298f.ingredients: 23 cup vegetable oil, 1 package ranch dressing mix, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon dill weed, 1 bag oyster crackers,
5b9441298f.instructions:
1- Stir together oil, dressing mix and spices in a saucepan and heat until warm.
2- Drizzle over crackers and stir with a wooden spoon until well coated.
3- Refrigerate overnight before serving.
4- Store in covered container in refrigerater.

00310c3462.ingredients: 6 slices bacon, chopped, 1 12 large onions, chopped, 2 large potatoes, peeled,cut into 1/2 inch pieces, 1 large red bell pepper, chopped, 3 (10 ounce) cans baby clams, drained,liquid reserved, 2 cups whole milk (do not use skim or 0%), 12 cup bottled clam juice, 2 (15 ounce) cans cream-style corn, 3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme or 1 tablespoon dried thyme, crumbled,
00310c3462.instructions:
1- Cook chopped bacon in large saucepan over medium heat until fat is rendered and bacon begins to brown; add onions and saute until tender, about 10 minutes; add potatoes and bell pepper and saute 1 minute; add reserved liquid from canned clams, milk and bottled clam juice; simmer chowder, uncovered, until vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes.
2- add corn and clams to chowder; simmer until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes; mix in thyme; season to taste with salt and pepper.

8635ea3d3c.ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 cup each finely diced onions, carrots and celery, 2 cloves minced garlic, 2 pounds large mussels, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 2 cups canned Italian plum tomatoes, chopped, juices reserved, Chiffonade of basil, Salt and pepper,
8635ea3d3c.instructions:
1- Heat olive oil in a large enameled casserole.
2- Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic.
3- Cover and simmer, stirring on occasion, for 10 minutes or until really tender.
4- Add the white wine and reduce by half.
5- Add the tomatoes and their juices and simmer for 20 minutes to mellow the flavor.
6- Add the mussels, cover the casserole and cook over high heat until they open.
7- Discard unopened mussels.
8- Spoon mussels and their liquid in deep bowls and garnish with basil.
9- Could also serve over pasta or rice or with a potato salad.

52b83497d8.ingredients: 6 big carrots, 5 small potatoes, 350 grams frozen peas, 300 grams sweet corn, 500 grams crushed tomatoes, 2 clove garlic, 1 yellow onion, 1 pinch sugar, 1 curry powder, salt, pepper, parsley, smoked paprika, basil, rosemary, cayenne pepper, 1 stock cube, 1 bay leaf,
52b83497d8.instructions:
1- Wash, peel and roughly chop carrots, onions, garlic and potatoes
2- Heat oil in a big pot over medium high heat.
3- Saute onion and carrots until fragrant
4- Next, add garlic, the bay leaf and potatoes.
5- Saute for a minute or so before adding enough water to submerge vegetables.
6- Bring to a boil
7- Cover with a lid and let simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring every now and then
8- Then, add crushed tomatoes, peas, corn and seasoning.
9- Simmer, covered, until potatoes and carrots are fork tender
10- Serve warm with a splash of tabasco

0021f570a7.ingredients: 20 oysters, shucked, with liquor strained and reserved, 12 artichoke bottoms (canned, drained), 14 cup unsalted butter, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 12 cup dry white wine, 4 cups chicken broth, 12 cup heavy cream, 34 cup finely chopped celery, 1 pinch minced fresh thyme leave, salt, fresh ground pepper, 3 green onions, very finely chopped,
0021f570a7.instructions:
1- Coarsely chop artichoke bottoms and set aside.
2- Melt butter in medium saucepan and whisk in flour.
3- Cook for 1 minute over very low heat, stirring occasionally.
4- Add white wine, chicken broth, heavy cream, celery, thymeleaves, salt and pepper, and stir.
5- Simmer for 20 minutes.
6- Remove saucepan from heat.
7- Add chopped artichokes, oyster liquor, and 8 oysters.
8- Allow soup to cool for 5 minutes.
9- Puree soup in blender until fairly smooth, but with some texture remaining.
10- This may be done ahead of time.
11- When ready to serve, bring soup to boil and add the chopped scallions.
12- Boil for 30 seconds, then add remaining 12 oysters and cook just until their edges curl.
13- Serve immediately.

query: What are recipes for fish, but not baked in the oven?

options.3536b10328: Salmon fillets grilled in a pan with herbs and spices
options.6adb5c39a1: Baked halibut fish fillets with Worcestershire sauce
options.0921b8c26f: Breaded fish fillets baked with parmesan cheese in the oven
options.29b171ab32: Cheesy chicken breast halves skillet-cooked with pasta sauce
options.6b86ecbde2: Fish fillets baked with breaded mixture

correctness_explanation.relevant triple: (user, medical condition, very high blood fat)

3536b10328.ingredients: 8 ounces, weight Salmon Fillet, Skin On, 2 pinches Kosher Salt, 2 pinches Black Pepper, Freshly Ground, 1 pinch Herbes De Provence, 2 Tablespoons Butter, Melted, 1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice, Freshly Squeezed,
3536b10328.instructions:
1- Pre-heat a non-stick grill pan to medium-high heat.
2- 1.
3- Remove pin bones, then rinse and dry salmon.
4- 2.
5- Lightly season flesh side with salt, pepper and Herbs de Provence.
6- 3.
7- Place salmon skin side down on grill pan, cook for about 5 to 7 minutes.
8- 4.
9- Carefully flip salmon to flesh side down and cook for 3 to 5 minutes before rotating 45 degrees and cooking for another 3 to 5 minutes (to create grill marks on the salmon).
10- 5.
11- During the last few minutes of cooking, melt the butter along with the lemon juice.
12- 6.
13- Remove the salmon from the pan and plate, skin side down.
14- 7.
15- Pour butter/lemon mixture over salmon and serve.

6adb5c39a1.ingredients: 1 lb halibut fillets or 1 lb sole fillet, 12 cup butter, melted, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 14 cup minced onion, 1 12 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon dried parsley,
6adb5c39a1.instructions:
1- Place fish fillets in a 13x9 inch baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray.
2- In a small bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients.
3- Pour mixture over fish fillets.
4- Bake, uncovered, in a 350 degree oven for 30 minutes.

0921b8c26f.ingredients: 1 12 lbs fish fillets, I use halibut or 1 12 lbs cod, 12 cup milk, 1 12 cups crushed potato chips, 14 cup grated parmesan cheese, 14 teaspoon thyme, 2 tablespoons dry breadcrumbs, 3 tablespoons butter, melted,
0921b8c26f.instructions:
1- Put milk in a shallow bowl.
2- Combine potato chips, parmesan, and thyme in another shallow dish.
3- Dip fish in milk, then coat with potato chip mixture.
4- Sprinkle a greased baking dish with the bread crumbs.
5- Put fish over crumbs; drizzle with butter.
6- Bake, uncovered at 500* for 12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.

29b171ab32.ingredients: 14 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 12 cups prego traditional pasta sauce, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 12 lbs boneless skinless chicken breast halves (4-6), 1 12 cups shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese (6 oz),
29b171ab32.instructions:
1- Stir 3 tablespoons Parmesan cheese into pasta sauce.
2- Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3- Add chicken.
4- Cook 10 min or until brown.
5- Pour sauce mixture over chicken.
6- Cover and cook on medium heat 10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink.
7- Top with mozzarella and remaining Parmesan.
8- Let stand 5 minutes or until cheese melts.

6b86ecbde2.ingredients: 1 12 lbs fish fillets (680 grams), 12 teaspoon sweet basil, 12 teaspoon salt, 1 ounce butter, melted (28 grams), 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 cup soft breadcrumbs, 1 cup cheese, grated, 1 teaspoon parsley, chopped, 2 tablespoons tomato sauce,
6b86ecbde2.instructions:
1- Place fish into a lightly geased baking dish.
2- Combine the breadcrumbs, cheese, basil, salt and parsley.
3- Stir together tomato sauce, lemon juice and melted butter.
4- Mix the crumb mixture into the melted butter mixture and spread evenly over the fish.
5- Cover with tinfoil and bake at 379 F (180 C ) for 30 minutes.

002f7a6b9c.ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) salmon fillets or 1 12 lbs salmon fillets, rinsed and patted dry, 4 teaspoons melted salted butter (for best flavor, do not substitute), 2 cups alder wood chips (or apple wood chips if you can't find the alder),
002f7a6b9c.instructions:
1- In a bowl, cover wood chips with water.
2- Ignite charcoal (25 per side for 22" Webber Grill) for indirect cooking.
3- Let coals burn down until completely covered with gray ash.
4- Using a double thickness of heavy-duty foil, make a boat big enough to hold the fish.
5- Poke holes in the bottom of the foil so barbeque flavors can penetrate bottom of the fish.
6- Lay salmon on foil, flesh side up.
7- Drizzle filet (s) with melted butter, using all of it.
8- When coals are ready, scatter drained wood chips on top of them.
9- Place salmon on grill.
10- Cover barbeque; close top dampers halfway, leave bottom dampers open.
11- Cook for 20-25 minutes, until fish is done to your liking.

query: I would like a shrimp recipe and I'm trying to eat a balanced diet

options.00a39a8659: Shrimp roasted with vegetables in a zesty Italian dressing
options.4dafcc5cf8: Shrimp balls made with pork fat deep fried in oil
options.18846ac2fa: Breaded shrimp with whole milk and creole seasoning deep fried in hot oil
options.a3fd84d744: Cucumber sauce with fat-free yogurt and reduced-fat mayonnaise
options.8ee91cce2e: Healthy napa cabbage and green onion coleslaw containing peanuts
options.003a2f19b2: Shrimp Roulade with Tequila Lime Relish

00a39a8659.ingredients: 1 lb. large shrimp (21 to 30 count), peeled, deveined Safeway 1 lb For $8.99 thru 02/09, 3 cups assorted cut-up vegetables (peppers, mushrooms, onions and/or zucchini), cut into 2-inch pieces, 3/4 cup Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing, 2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro, 2 tsp. grated lime zest, 1/2 tsp. chili powder,
00a39a8659.instructions:
1- Place shrimp and vegetables in glass baking dish.
2- Mix dressing, cilantro, lime peel and chili powder until well blended.
3- Pour over shrimp mixture.
4- Bake at 350F for 20 min.
5- or until shrimp turn pink and vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring after 10 min.

4dafcc5cf8.ingredients: 1 slice fresh white bread, 2 tbsp. cool chicken stock, 1 pound raw shrimp, 2 ounce. fresh pork fat, 4 water chestnuts, finely minced, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon finely minced fresh ginger, 1 egg yolk, 1 egg white, 3 c. oil,
4dafcc5cf8.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Trim crust from bread and tear bread into small pcs.
3- Place in bowl and sprinkle with stock or possibly water.
4- 2.
5- Shell and devein shrimp.
6- Wash and pat dry.
7- Chop shrimp and pork fat together till they form a smooth paste.
8- 3.
9- Combine bread, shrimp mix, water chestnuts, salt, ginger and egg yolk and mix thoroughly.
10- Beat egg white to a froth with fork and stir into shrimp mix.
11- 4.
12- Have shrimp mix, a bowl of cool water, a baking pan lined with double thickness of paper towels and oil within easy reach.
13- To cook: Preheat oven to lowest setting.
14- Pour 3 c. oil into 12 inch wok or possibly large deep fryer and heat till haze forms above it or possibly it reaches 350 degrees on thermometer.
15- Take a handful of the shrimp mix and squeeze fingers into a fist, forcing the mix up between thumb and forefinger.
16- When it forms balls about the size of a walnut, use a spoon to scopp off the ball and drop it into the warm oil.
17- Repeat till you have made 6 to 8 balls, dipping the spoon into the cool water to prevent sticking.
18- Turn the balls with a slotted spoon to keep them apart as they fry.
19- They should become golden brown in 2 to 3 min.
20- Transfer balls to paper lined baking dish to drain and keep hot in the oven while frying the rest.
21- Transfer balls to heated platter and serve.

18846ac2fa.ingredients: 1 tablespoon salt, 2 tablespoons granulated garlic, 4 teaspoons granulated onion, 14 cup paprika, 1 12 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons cayenne pepper, 2 teaspoons white pepper, 12 teaspoon dried thyme, 12 teaspoon dried oregano, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons creole seasoning, 1 12 teaspoons salt, 1 tablespoon black pepper, 2 cups whole milk, 2 lbs peeled deveined shrimp, 6 cups peanut oil or 6 cups vegetable oil, enough to fill a skillet 2 inches deep,
18846ac2fa.instructions:
1- Mix all ingredients for the creole seasoning together and store any extra in an air tight container.
2- Combine all the ingredients for the frying flour in a bowl and set aside.
3- Place milk in a separate bowl.
4- Heat oil to 355 degrees F. Working with a few shrimp at a time , dredge in the flour, dip in milk, then dredge through flour again.
5- Gently drop in hot oil and fry until golden brown, about 3 to 4 minutes.
6- Work in batches and drain on paper towels.
7- Serve immediately.

a3fd84d744.ingredients: 1 cup cucumber (not peeled), 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 12 cup plain fat-free yogurt, 14 cup low-fat mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon onion powder,
a3fd84d744.instructions:
1- Mix all ingredients together.
2- Cover and chill, serve cold with seafood.

8ee91cce2e.ingredients: 4 cups thinly sliced Napa cabbage (from about 1/2 large head), 1/2 cup thinly sliced green onions, 3 tablespoons rice vinegar, 2 tablespoons peanut oil, 1 tablespoon minced peeled fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 tablespoon chopped toasted peanuts,
8ee91cce2e.instructions:
1- Combine cabbage and green onions in large bowl.
2- Add vinegar, peanut oil, ginger, sesame oil, and sugar and toss to blend.
3- Season to taste with salt and pepper.
4- Sprinkle with peanuts and serve.

003a2f19b2.ingredients: 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives, 1/2 cup cream cheese, softened, 1 cup fresh spinach leaves, washed and blanched, 8 shrimp (15 count or larger), peeled and deveined, 1/2 cup cornstarch, 1 red bell pepper (roasted with the skin, seeds, and ribs removed, sliced and julienned), 2 tablespoons flour seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 egg whites, beaten until frothy, 1 cup fresh white bread crumbs, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 limes, peeled and cut into sections, 2 ounces Tequila, preferably Cuervo Gold, 1 small white onion, diced, 2 tablespoons hot pepper jelly, 2 tablespoons white wine, 1 tablespoon sherry or Champagne vinegar, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 teaspoon toasted cumin seeds,
003a2f19b2.instructions:
1- For the Shrimp Roulade: Blend the fresh herbs into the cheese.
2- Blanch the spinach leaves for 2 minutes in boiling water and let cool.
3- Butterfly the shrimp (split them down the center, cutting almost but not completely through) and open them flat to resemble a butterfly shape.
4- Dip the shrimp in cornstarch between 2 sheets of plastic wrap and pound the shrimp to a 1/16-inch thickness.
5- Place 1 spinach leaf on each shrimp.
6- Pipe a 2-inch strip of cream cheese from head to tail down the center of the spinach.
7- Arrange a strip of bell pepper along one side of the cream cheese.
8- Roll the flattened shrimp and refrigerate.
9- A few minutes before serving time, dredge the shrimp rolls lightly in the seasoned flour, then in the egg whites, and then in the bread crumbs.
10- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a nonstick ovenproof frying pan, heat the olive oil until hot.
11- Brown the breaded shrimp rolls until golden brown.
12- Transfer the pan to the oven and bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
13- Slice on the diagonal.
14- Serve with the Tequila-Lime Relish.
15- For the Tequila Lime Relish: Mix all the ingredients and let stand for 1 hour.
16- For garnish, use carrot peels and chives.

query: Can I have a shrimp pasta recipe for someone with low spice tolerance?

options.3c9d5c4033: Shrimp and vegetables with spaghetti noodles
options.7ef0e55927: Sweet and spicy shrimp skewers containing fresh jalapenos and chili powder
options.9a47c3c5fa: Spaghetti noodles and shrimp containing red pepper flakes
options.8395b85324: Creamy rotini pasta containing spinach and parmesan cheese
options.4b696ed55a: Whole-wheat pasta with chicken and pesto sauce

3c9d5c4033.ingredients: 1 bunch of fresh broccoli, chopped, 1 large red pepper, chopped, 1 medium onion, 1/2 lb (.2 kg) to 1 lb (.5 kg). cooked frozen shrimp, 1/4 cup (60 ml) of vegetable oil, adding capfulls more when needed, 1 lb (.5 kg). cooked spaghetti, salt, pepper, garlic powder and paprika, to taste,
3c9d5c4033.instructions:
1- Heat pan on med-hi and add oil.
2- In separate pot, boil up water for the pasta.
3- While pan is heating, chop up all vegetables, sized to your liking.
4- Add vegetables and seaonings if you'd like.
5- After the vegetables are nearly brown add shrimp to warm (if you are cooking fresh shrimp start that when you add the vegetables).
6- When the vegetables are tinted brown then they are done.
7- Mix the cooked vegetables with the strained, cooked pasta and enjoy!!
8- !

7ef0e55927.ingredients: 10 raw tiger shrimp, shelled and deveined, 2 limes, juice of, 12 fresh jalapeno, seeded and finely chopped, 2 garlic cloves, through a garlic press, 13 cup extra virgin olive oil, 4 Splenda sugar substitute, 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch pepper, 1 pinch chili powder,
7ef0e55927.instructions:
1- In a medium bowl, juice 2 limes, seed and finely mince 1/2 jalapeno and add to lime juice, add pressed garlic, 4 packets of Splenda, salt, pepper, chili powder and oil.
2- Whisk until Splenda is dissolved.
3- Shell and rinse tiger shrimp, drop into bowl, mix so every shrimp is coated and then lightly press all shrimp into the marinade.
4- cover tightly and refrigerate for 15-20 minutes.
5- Preheat grill and slide 5 shrimp on 2 soaked bamboo skewers or metal skewers, grill on medium for 3 minutes on each side until bright pink.
6- serve immediately.

9a47c3c5fa.ingredients: 1 pound Raw Shrimp, Peeled, 4 whole Garlic Cloves, Minced, 2 Tablespoons Chives, Chopped, 2 teaspoons Rosemary Needles, Chopped, 2 teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes, 1/4 cups Olive Oil, Kosher Salt, 1 cup White Wine, 1 pound Spaghetti Noodles, 1/2 cups Panko Bread Crumbs,
9a47c3c5fa.instructions:
1- 1) Rinse and drain the shrimp.
2- 2) In a small bowl, combine the garlic, chives, rosemary and red pepper flakes in a medium bowl.
3- 3) Add the olive oil and a sprinkle of Kosher salt.
4- 4) Add the white wine.
5- 5) Add the shrimp to the marinade and toss to coat.
6- Set the shrimp aside.
7- 6) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
8- 7) Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
9- 8) Pour the panko crumbs on a sheet pan and toast in the oven at 350 degrees until the crumbs are golden brown, about 5-10 minutes (watch carefully!)
10- When done, remove them from the oven and set aside.
11- 9) Add the spaghetti to the boiling water and cook the pasta according to the manufacturers directions.
12- 10) When the pasta has about 6 minutes left, heat a large saute pan over high heat.
13- 11) Add the shrimp and all of the marinade to the pan and cook the shrimp and sauce over high heat, continually stirring until all of the shrimp are barely pink on both sides about 5 minutes.
14- 12) When the pasta is done, drain it.
15- Toss the pasta with the shrimp and sauce.
16- Season to taste with kosher salt.
17- 13) Serve on a plate with spaghetti, shrimp and toasted breadcrumbs sprinkled over the top of the dish.

8395b85324.ingredients: 2- 1/2 cups Uncooked Rotini Or Any Other Small Pasta, 3 Tablespoons Butter, 2 cups Milk, 1 package 10-oz Package Frozen Chopped Spinach, Thawed And Partially Squeezed Dry, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 18 teaspoons Black Pepper, 18 teaspoons Garlic Powder, 2 Tablespoons Ranch Dressing Mix, 2 cups Shredded Cheese (Swiss And Cheddar Work Well), 1/2 cups Bread Crumbs, 1 cup Plain Yogurt Or Sour Cream, 13 cups Parmesan Cheese,
8395b85324.instructions:
1- Cook pasta for a slightly shorter time than package directions, so the pasta still as a little bite.
2- Set aside.
3- Meanwhile, combine the next eight ingredients (butter, milk, spinach, salt, pepper, garlic powder, ranch dressing, shredded cheese) in a large saute or saucepan.
4- Heat until the cheese is melted and mixture begins to bubble and thicken.
5- Reduce heat to low and add bread crumbs, yogurt, and cooked pasta.
6- Cook until the pasta has soaked up some of the liquid.
7- Mixture will be a little soupy.
8- Turn the broiler in your oven on high.
9- If the pan youre using is oven-safe, simply sprinkle Parmesan over the pasta and place the entire pan onto the top rack of the oven.
10- Otherwise, transfer the pasta to an oven-safe baking dish, sprinkle with Parmesan, and place in the oven (top rack).
11- Broil for 4-5 minutes or until cheese has begun to brown a little and mixture looks a little less soupy.
12- As the pasta cools, it will thicken even more.
13- Serve immediately.
14- Makes about 4-5 servings.
15- Note: if you dont want to use ranch dressing mix, use a couple of teaspoons (not tablespoons) of any low-sodium seasoning blend.

4b696ed55a.ingredients: 2 cups cooked chopped chicken, 4 cups raw kale, 4 cups raw spinach, 4 ounces parmesan cheese, 14 cup chopped walnuts, 14 cup olive oil, 12 cup garlic scape, 8 ounces whole wheat pasta,
4b696ed55a.instructions:
1- Place parmesan, kale, spinach, walnuts, garlic scapes and olive oil in food processor - process til smooth.
2- Cook whole wheat pasta in boiling water.
3- Drain- reserving 1/4 c pasta water.
4- Place chicken in pan pasta was cooked in - allow to warm slightly.
5- Mix pasta, pasta water and 1/2 pesto in with chicken.
6- Enjoy!
7- Note - garlic scapes are the curly tops garlic plants sprout early spring.
8- Use minced garlic to taste if not available.

0275657c5c.ingredients: 1/2 pounds Spaghetti Noodles, 1/2 sticks Butter, 2 Tablespoons Minced Garlic, 2 cups Shrimp, Precooked And Frozen, Or Fresh, 1 whole Roma Tomato, 1 Tablespoon Fresh Parsley, Chopped, 1 teaspoon Garlic Salt, 1 pinch Red Pepper Flakes, 2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil,
0275657c5c.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
3- 2.
4- While the spaghetti is cooking, place a large skillet over medium heat.
5- Melt butter, add garlic and shrimp (with the tails removed).
6- Cook for 3-5 minutes.
7- 3.
8- Chop tomato into small chunks and set aside.
9- 4.
10- After pasta is cooked, drain and add it into skillet with the shrimp.
11- Using tongs, toss together parsley, garlic salt, red pepper flakes and olive oil.
12- Toss again, coating noodles.
13- 5.
14- Add garlic shrimp pasta to a large serving bowl and add in chopped tomato.
15- Serve and enjoy.

query: I want to make a paella but I'm short on time

options.16b9c1be6b: Brown rice paella containing mussels and Spanish chorizo that cooks fast
options.2f7716e5fe: Southern USA style pasta made with shrimp and scallops
options.8af42175eb: Shrimp, scallops, brown rice, and vegetables with Jarlsberg cheese
options.748551dcca: Paella made with Spanish rice mix, vegetables, and chicken sausage in a slow-cooker
options.013a00b8b3: Quick guacamole made with avocados, salsa, and lime juice

16b9c1be6b.ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 6 ounces Spanish chorizo, thinly sliced, 2 (3.5-ounce) packages boil-in-bag brown rice (such as Uncle Ben's), 3/8 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon hot smoked paprika, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 (14.5-ounce) can no-salt-added diced tomatoes, undrained, 1 1/2 cups frozen shelled edamame, 2 dozen mussels, scrubbed and debearded,
16b9c1be6b.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Heat a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
3- Add oil to pan; swirl to coat.
4- Add chorizo to pan; saute 1 minute or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
5- Remove rice from bags.
6- Add rice to pan; saute 1 minute, stirring frequently.
7- Stir in salt, paprika, and pepper; saute 30 seconds.
8- Add 1 1/2 cups water and tomatoes; bring to a boil.
9- Cover, reduce heat to medium, and simmer 10 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is almost absorbed.2.
10- Stir in edamame.
11- Nestle mussels into rice mixture.
12- Cover and cook 4 minutes or until mussels open and liquid is absorbed.
13- Remove from heat.
14- Discard any unopened mussels.Wine note: Think pink for paella.
15- Crisp, dry Beckmen 2009 Purisima Mountain Vineyard Grenache Rose (Santa Ynez Valley, $18) has vibrant red fruit and spice to cover the smoked paprika and chorizo.
16- Great acidity keeps going with the tomatoes, and rich texture wraps around the mussels.
17- --Sara Schneider

2f7716e5fe.ingredients: 1 pint heavy cream (to decrease fat intake, use a 1/2 pint of light cream and 1/2 pint of heavy cream), 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 34 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 12 teaspoon white pepper, 1 cup sliced green onion, 1 cup chopped fresh parsley, 12 lb medium shrimp, cleaned and deveined, 12 lb bay scallop, 12 cup grated swiss cheese, 12 cup parmesan cheese,
2f7716e5fe.instructions:
1- Pour cream into large skillet and simmer, stirring constantly until just about boiling.
2- Reduce heat and add herbs, salt, peppers, onions, and parsley.
3- Simmer 7 to 8 minutes until thickened.
4- Stir in seafood, cooking shrimp until no longer transparent.
5- Add cheeses, blending well.
6- Serve over cooked noodles or fettucini immediately.

8af42175eb.ingredients: 1/2 pound shrimp cooked, shelled, deveined, 1/2 pound bay scallops cooked, 2 cups brown rice cooked, 1/2 cup sweet red bell peppers cut into julienne strips, 1/2 cup green peas cooked, 1/4 cup sunflower seeds, 1/4 cup raisins, seedless, 1 cup jarlsberg cheese cut into julienne strips, 1 x mixed salad greens crisp,
8af42175eb.instructions:
1- In bowl, combine all ingredients except dressing and greens.
2- Pour dressing over all and toss to blend.
3- Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour, to blend flavors.
4- To serve, spoon onto crisp greens.

748551dcca.ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 lb chicken sausage, sliced diagonally (or any other kind of sausage you like), 1 small onion, finelly chopped, 2 garlic cloves, finelly chopped, 1 red bell pepper, unseeded, cut into strips, 4 cups low sodium chicken broth, 1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes, 1 (16 ounce) package Spanish rice mix (I used 3 bags because I couldn't find a box), 4 ounces cooked ham, chopped, 1 cup frozen peas, salt (if necessary),
748551dcca.instructions:
1- Warm 1 Tbsp vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat and cook sausage until browned, about 5 minutes.
2- Transfer cooked sausage to slow-cooker.
3- On th same skillet cook onion, garlic and bell pepper, stirring often, until softened, 3 to 5 minutes.
4- Transfer to slow-cooker.
5- Still on the same skillet, add 1 cup chicken broth, turn up the heat to high and bring it to a boil, stirring up browned bits.
6- Pour into slow-cooker.
7- Add remaining chicken broth, can diced tomatoes, rice mix and ham to slow-cooker.
8- Add salt if necessary.
9- Stir and cook on low setting until rice is tender, about 4 hours.
10- Stir in frozen peas and cook until heated through, about 15 minutes.
11- Enjoy!

013a00b8b3.ingredients: 2 large avocados, pitted,peeled and mashed, 13 cup thick & chunky salsa, 1 tablespoon lime juice,
013a00b8b3.instructions:
1- Mix avocados, salsa and lime juice in glass bowl.
2- Serve with tortilla chips.

03e49000ba.ingredients: 1/2 whole chicken, 1 each tomatoes diced, 1 each red onion diced, 2 each sweet red bell peppers diced, 1 cup green peas, 1 each jalapeno pepper, 2 cups rice cooked,
03e49000ba.instructions:
1- Saute onions, red peppers and diced tomatoes in olive oil.
2- Add cooked rice and peas and saute covered for 30 minutes.
3- Add jalapeno pepper.
4- Steam fish items and then toss all together and bake covered in 375F (190C) oven for 15 minutes.

query: I want chicken that has a kick to it

options.111cc465a9: Chicken wings made with hot chili sauce, butter, and Worcestershire sauce
options.248df759a9: Cheese chicken made with chicken legs, eggs, cheese, and breading
options.3b3fc7998f: Hard-cooked egg with a sriracha kick
options.82a14c8504: Shrimp With a Kick - made with garlic, olive oil, and fresh cilantro
options.7caa750de0: Easy chicken legs made with Italian salad dressing

111cc465a9.ingredients: 2- 1/2 pounds Chicken Wings, 1/4 cups Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce, 1/2 cups Butter, Melted, 1 Tablespoon Worcestershire Sauce,
111cc465a9.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Spray a sheet pan with nonstick spray and place chicken wings on the pan and bake for 25 minutes.
2- In a medium saucepan add the sriracha hot chili sauce, butter and Worcestershire sauce and mix until combined and smooth.
3- Remove the chicken wings from the oven and place in a large mixing bowl and add the liquid ingredients and mix well.
4- Place the chicken wings back on the sheet pan and bake an additional 15 minutes.
5- Eat and enjoy!

248df759a9.ingredients: medium chicken legs, 3 eggs, 2 cup powdered cheese or mixed shreded cheese, 2 cup any type breading,
248df759a9.instructions:
1- Clean fat off chicken and put aside.
2- Beat 3 eggs in a bowl.
3- Put the 2 cups of cheese and the 2 cups breading in two different bowls.
4- Preheat the oven on 350.
5- Dip the chicken in eggs and make sure you cover each side.
6- Next in cheese and last in breading.
7- Spray a medium oven dish with non stick spray and line up the chicken one leg next to the other.
8- Put in oven for 45 minutes.
9- After the 45 minutes is up take out of the oven leave to cool and enjoy.

3b3fc7998f.instructions: 1- Drizzle Sriracha over hard-cooked large egg.

82a14c8504.ingredients: 2 -4 lbs of cleaned shrimp, 1 bunch diced fresh cilantro (corriander), 12 bulb of garlic, 12 cup extra virgin olive oil,
82a14c8504.instructions:
1- The best shrimp is fresh.
2- You can tell it's fresh when the flesh is clear, not cloudy.
3- Frozen shrimp works just as well, just allow plenty of time to thaw.
4- Put shrimp on skewrs, presoaked in water for 20 minutes, if you are wanting to grill the shrimp.
5- Arrange on flat, greased pan if you are wanting to bake the shrimp.
6- In a bowl, mix diced cilantro, diced garlic, and olive oil.
7- Let sit for 20 minutes.
8- Brush the mixture onto the shrimp and bake at 325 until thoroughly cooked.
9- You can tell when the shimp's flesh is white and the 'accents' are a nice pink.
10- If grilling, watch the shimp a little closer and turn when half way done.

7caa750de0.ingredients: 4 chicken legs, and thigh quarters skinned, 1 (8 ounce) bottle Italian salad dressing,
7caa750de0.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350.
2- Place chicken in a baking dish.
3- Pour Italian dressing over chicken.
4- Bake for 30 minutes.
5- Turn chicken over and bake another 30 minutes or until done, basting with dressing if desired.

0e433de9aa.ingredients: 1 ounce Thai seasoning (1/2 packet), 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, 2 12 lbs chicken breasts or 2 12 lbs chicken thighs or 2 12 lbs chicken drumsticks or 2 12 lbs chicken wings,
0e433de9aa.instructions:
1- In a medium size bowl, make a marinade by dissolving Spicy Chicken and Rice Seasoning Mix in Coconut Milk.
2- To bake: Place chicken in 9 x 13 baking dish.
3- Pour all of marinade over chicken.
4- Bake in 375F oven for 50 to 60 minutes, basting several times.
5- TO BROIL OR GRILL: Dip chicken in marinade.
6- Broil or grill, using medium heat.
7- Turn often while cooking, brushing with extra marinade.

query: I like eating pulled meats, but not beef or chicken

options.12609ac45a: Pork chops made with orange juice, garlic, and thyme
options.5b879fbf2c: Shredded barbecued beef with Worcestershire sauce
options.0174ab1696: Sandwiches made with shredded barbecued chicken thighs
options.483505eb71: Chicken, mushroom, and tomato baked in a sauce mixture

0120f8d20c.ingredients: 12 ounces beer, 1 cup water, 12 cup apple juice, 12 cup vinegar, 12 cup brown sugar, 6 peppercorns, 3 cloves, 1 tablespoon salt, 12 ice cubes, 6 lbs pork shoulder, 16 ounces barbecue sauce, 12 hamburger buns,
0120f8d20c.instructions:
1- Brine: Mix liquids (beer, water, apple juice, and vinegar) together and bring to a boil.
2- Remove from heat and add remaining brine ingredients.
3- Stir until brown sugar and salt are dissolved.
4- Let stand for 10 minutes.
5- Add ice cubes and allow to melt and cool down brine.
6- Put pork into a crock pot and add brine.
7- Ensure that brine completely covers pork.
8- Cover and put in refrigerator for 12 hours or more.
9- Cook/Smoke in your smoker for 10-12 hours at 200-240 degrees.
10- Cook until it virtually is falling apart.
11- Let rest until it is cool enough to handle.
12- Using a fork, pull the pork apart and place in crock pot with BBQ sauce.
13- Cook over low heat for another 1-2 hours.
14- Serve over hamburger buns.

12609ac45a.ingredients: 4 pork chops, 1 can orange juice, Garlic, chopped, Thyme, Basil, Lemon Grass if wanted,
12609ac45a.instructions:
1- Lay pork chops out on a pan: Pour 1 can of concentrated Orange Juice on top add: galic, thyme, basil , lemon grass Salt and Pepper.
2- cook at 350 for 50 minutes Cover with foil first 30 Minutes Let off foil, last 20.

5b879fbf2c.ingredients: 6 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 tbsp liquid smoke, 1 can beer, 3/4 cup water, 1/2 onion chopped, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 pinch ground black pepper, 1 barbeque sauce of choice, 1 1/2 lb bottom round roast,
5b879fbf2c.instructions:
1- add everything but the bbq sauce to a crock pot.
2- fyi for my beer I used Coors light.
3- any beer will do, since it's just for flavor
4- cook the meat on high until the thermometer pops out.
5- remove the thermometer and return to the crock pot for a few hours until the meat pulls apart easily.
6- drain the liquid from the roast.
7- you can keep the chopped onions in with the roast if you wish
8- pull apart the roast with two forks.
9- it's better to leave the roast in the pot, so it doesn't make as big of a mess.
10- add your bbq sauce and cook on low for about an hour
11- serve on your preference of bun or roll

0174ab1696.ingredients: 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken thighs, 1 onion, sliced King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09, 1/2 cup KRAFT Original Barbecue Sauce, 1/4 cup water, 1 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1 French bread baguette (16 to 20 inch), 4 KRAFT Singles,
0174ab1696.instructions:
1- Cook chicken and onions in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat 8 min., stirring occasionally.
2- Add barbecue sauce, water and sugar; stir.
3- Cover; cook on medium heat 7 min.
4- or until chicken is done (165 degrees F).
5- Remove chicken from skillet.
6- Shred with fork or chop into small pieces.
7- Return to skillet; stir to coat with sauce.
8- Cut baguette into 4 pieces; cut each piece lengthwise in half.
9- Fill with chicken mixture and Singles.

483505eb71.ingredients: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces, 2 bay leaves, 1/2 cup Italian-style salad dressing, 2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix, 1/4 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained, 2 medium tomatoes, quartered,
483505eb71.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2- In a 9x13 inch baking pan, arrange chicken and bay leaves.
3- In a small bowl, combine the salad dressing, onion soup mix and oregano.
4- Pour mixture over chicken.
5- Bake uncovered in preheated oven, basting occasionally, for 40 minutes.
6- Add the mushrooms and tomatoes and bake an additional 20 minutes (or until chicken and vegetables are tender.)
7- If desired, serve with rice and salad.

033b997219.ingredients: 5 lbs pork shoulder, 1 onion, peeled and quartered, 6 garlic cloves, 2 limes, zested, 14 cup lime juice, 1 orange, zested, 12 cup orange juice, 14 cup vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon oregano, 1 tablespoon salt, pepper,
033b997219.instructions:
1- Using a paring knife, pierce the roast all over.
2- Place the pork roast in a large ziptop bag.
3- In a food processor or blender, add the onion, garlic, lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, and a generous pinch of salt and fresh ground black pepper.
4- Process until mostly smooth.
5- Pour into the ziptop bag, press the excess air out of the bag and seal, massaging the marinade onto the roast.
6- Refrigerate overnight.
7- Pour the contents of the ziptop bag into your crockpot, rotating the roast so that the fat cap is on top, and cook 8-10 hours on low.
8- Remove the roast from the crockpot and shred, discarding the fat and bones.
9- Store leftovers tightly covered in the fridge (I pour some of the cooking liquid over the shredded meat before storing to keep it from drying out).
10- This can be made into sandwiches or tacos.
11- For tacos I like to serve with fresh lime wedges, chopped cilantro and onions on corn tortillas.
12- This is a traditional Mexican street taco.

query: Ways to cook lamb with fragrant seasoning

options.01106228e0: Racks of lamb flavoured with fried rosemary
options.1c2321be1c: Lamb shoulder seasoned with onion, soy sauce, and oyster sauce
options.18b1fe9757: Chicken breasts in a rosemary seasoning
options.6312a989de: Vanilla cake decorated with Cool Whip and marshmallows to look like a lamb
options.77e6ed9fc0: Lamb's Grandmother's Bread - sweet bread containing dried apricots, dates, and banana
options.0e4e3cfaf0: Broiled Lamb Chops with Mediterranean Potato-Veggie Mix

01106228e0.ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 racks of lamb (each with 6 chops), 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, ground pepper, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 onion, chopped, 1 garlic clove, crushed, 140 g tomato paste, 1 12 tablespoons vinegar, 1 12 tablespoons honey, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 beef stock cube, 1 cup water, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon dry mustard,
01106228e0.instructions:
1- Brush lamb racks with olive oil and sprinkle with rosemary & ground pepper.
2- Put foil around the bones to stop them burning & place on a rack in a baking dish.
3- Heat butter & fry onion & garlic until softened, stir in the tomato paste and the remaining ingredients and keep stirring until it boils.
4- Reduce heat & simmer uncovered for approx 20 minutes.
5- Brush the lamb racks with sauce and bake at 180.C for 45-50 mins basting often.

1c2321be1c.ingredients: 6 boneless lamb shoulder, 1 medium onion, chopped (wedges), 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce, 3 -4 tablespoons oyster sauce,
1c2321be1c.instructions:
1- Trim off the meat of fat.
2- Add dark soy sauce and oyster sauce,mix throughly and marinate for 1 hour or overnight in the refrigate.
3- Heat the oil in a large saucepan,saute the onion till soft.
4- Add the lamb to pan and brown the lamb on all sides, adding a little more oyster sauce, if necessary.
5- Turn heat down to slow and fry till dark brown on all sides,serve with warm rice.

18b1fe9757.ingredients: 3 12 lbs chicken breasts, 12 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 4 teaspoons minced garlic, 2 teaspoons rosemary, 1 tablespoon lemon, rind of, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper,
18b1fe9757.instructions:
1- Place chicken in a zip type plastic bag.
2- Pour remaining ingredients in bag with chicken.
3- Seal bag and shake to mix marinade ingredients.
4- Marinate in refrigerator for 6-24 hours.
5- Drain chicken.
6- Gill over medium heat or bake at 350 degrees f for 45 minutes or until juices are clear.

6312a989de.ingredients: 1 pkg. (2-layer size) yellow cake mix, 1 pkg. (85 g) Jell-O Cherry Jelly Powder, 3 cups thawed Cool Whip Whipped Topping, 15 Jet-Puffed Marshmallows, cut in half, 1/4 tsp. pink coloured sugar, 1 pink jelly bean, 1 tsp. black decorating gel,
6312a989de.instructions:
1- Heat oven to 350F.
2- Cover bottoms of 2 (9-inch) round pans with parchment; spray with cooking spray.
3- Prepare cake batter as directed on package.
4- Stir in dry jelly powder; pour into prepared pans.
5- Bake 25 to 28 min.
6- or until toothpick inserted in centres comes out clean.
7- Cool cakes in pans 15 min.
8- Invert onto wire racks; gently remove pans.
9- Cool cakes completely.
10- Place 1 cake layer on serving plate; spread top with 1 cup Cool Whip.
11- Cover with remaining cake layer.
12- Frost top and side of cake with remaining Cool Whip.
13- Press cut sides of 2 marshmallow halves in coloured sugar; gently press into Cool Whip on cake as shown in photo for the lamb's ears.
14- Decorate cake with jelly bean, decorating gel and remaining marshmallows as shown.

77e6ed9fc0.ingredients: 1 34 cups all-purpose flour, 8 teaspoons firmly packed light brown sugar, 2 14 teaspoons baking powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon cinnamon, 8 dried dates, chopped, 6 dried apricot halves, chopped, 1 egg, 1 medium very ripe banana, mashed, 14 cup skim milk,
77e6ed9fc0.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350F.
2- Spray an 8" x 4" loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray.
3- In a medium bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and cinnamon.
4- Add the dates and apricots.
5- In a small bowl, beat the egg; add the mashed banana and milk.
6- Add the banana mixture to the flour mixture, and mix just until blended.
7- Do not overblend.
8- Pour into the prepared pan and bake about 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
9- Cool thoroughly on rack.

0e4e3cfaf0.ingredients: 4 tablespoons EVOO (extra-virgin olive oil), 1 large baking potato, scrubbed clean, Salt and black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme (eyeball it), 1 large fennel bulb, cut in quarters, cored, and thinly sliced, a few fronds reserved, 1 large onion, thinly sliced, 3 large garlic cloves, chopped, 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes (eyeball it), 1 1/2 cups chicken stock, 2 pounds rack of lamb, cut into individual chops, 3 to 4 chops per person, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar (eyeball it), 10 kalamata olives, pitted and coarsely chopped, 1/2 cup, 10 fresh mint leaves, a few sprigs, chopped, 3/4 cup fresh basil, 15 leaves, chopped,
0e4e3cfaf0.instructions:
1- Preheat the broiler to high.
2- Place the rack about 6 inches from the heat.
3- Preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat with 2 tablespoons of the EVOO, twice around the pan.
4- Quarter the potato lengthwise, then thinly slice it across into small, thin bite-size pieces.
5- Add the potatoes to the hot skillet and spread them out in an even layer across the pan.
6- Season the potatoes with salt, pepper, and thyme.
7- Resist the temptation to shake or stir the pan for a few minutes, until the potatoes start to brown up.
8- Once they are a little brown on the first side, turn them and continue to cook them until they are evenly golden and cooked through, about 8 to 10 minutes.
9- Turn the heat down a little if the potatoes start browning faster than they are cooking through.
10- While the potatoes are working, preheat a second skillet over medium-high heat with the remaining 2 tablespoons of EVOO.
11- Add the sliced fennel, onions, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
12- Cook until both the onions and the fennel are tender, about 4 to 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
13- Add the chicken stock and bring up to a bubble, then simmer for 3 minutes or until there is very little liquid left in the pan, less than 1/2 cup.
14- Arrange the chops on a broiler pan.
15- Season both sides of the lamb chops with salt and pepper and broil them for 4 minutes on each side for medium rare.
16- Add the balsamic vinegar and olives to the skillet with the fennel, tossing to combine them.
17- Turn the heat down to low while the chops finish broiling.
18- Once the chops are ready to come out of the broiler, add the mint and basil to the fennel, add the cooked browned-up potatoes, and toss to combine.
19- Serve the chops alongside the fennel and potatoes and garnish with the fennel fronds.

query: I want some crispy chicken like what I could get at KFC

options.3e5eddf42b: Fried chicken wings made with buttermilk and vegetable shortening
options.33fe0a7d46: KFC style cabbage, carrot, and onion coleslaw
options.1746e9746c: Crispy chicken tacos with avocados and red onions
options.8072511bba: Spicy Chinese-style chicken wings with szechuan peppercorns
options.000875a149: Vietnamese-style chicken wings with jalapeno and fish sauce

3e5eddf42b.ingredients: 3 lbs chicken wings (16 to 18), 1 cup coarse salt, plus, 2 tablespoons coarse salt, 2 onions, sliced, 3 cups buttermilk, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons cracked black peppercorns, 1 teaspoon cayenne, 2 cups vegetable shortening, 12 cup unsalted butter,
3e5eddf42b.instructions:
1- Cut off chicken wing tips, and reserve them for another use (stock).
2- Arrange wings in one layer in a 9x13 inch glass baking dish and sprinkle them evenly with 1/2 cup coarse salt.
3- Turn wings over and sprinkle with l/2 cup more salt.
4- Chill wings for 2 hours.
5- Rinse wings in a colander under cold running water and drain.
6- (An alternative to this is to soak chicken wings overnight in a brine solution, using one cup salt and enough water to cover wings.)
7- Arrange wings in one layer in a baking dish and thinly slice onions.
8- Arrange onions over wings and pour buttermilk over onions.
9- Chill wings, covered, at least 12 hours and/or up to one day.
10- Discard onions and drain wings in a colander.
11- Tear off an 18 inch sheet of wax paper and set aside.
12- In a large shallow bowl, whisk together flour, peppercorns, cayenne, and remaining 2 tablespoons salt.
13- Working with no more than 2 wings at a time, dredge wings evenly in flour mixture and shake off the excess.
14- Arrange wings with the flat sides up, a few inches apart on wax paper and let stand 15 minutes.
15- Get out a rack, brown paper bag, or paper towels, and set on a baking pan.
16- In a large fish fryer set over two burners (or two heavy skillets), melt 2 cups shortening and 1/2 cup butter over high heat, just until butter begins to turn golden.
17- Add the wings, flat sides down, and reduce heat to moderately high.
18- Cook wings, covered, until deep golden, 8 to 10 minutes.
19- Turn wings and cook, uncovered, until deep golden, about 8 minutes.
20- With tongs, transfer wings to a rack set over pan, to drain.

33fe0a7d46.ingredients: 8 18 cups cabbage, 13 cup carrot, 1 teaspoon onion, chopped fine, 13 cup sugar, 12 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon pepper, 18 cup milk, 34 cup buttermilk, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 12 cup mayonnaise,
33fe0a7d46.instructions:
1- First core and shred the cabbage finely using the fine shredder disk attachment for the food processor.
2- Then shred the carrots.
3- In a bowl combine the buttermilk, mayonnaise, milk and lemon juice.
4- Mix with a whisk till well combined.
5- Then add the seasoning.
6- Add the sugar to the sauce and mix well.
7- Lastly, add the sauce to the cabbage and carrot mixture and mix well Allow the mixture to marinate for 13 hrs.

1746e9746c.ingredients: 1 cup All-purpose Flour, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1/2 teaspoons Pepper, 1/4 teaspoons Cayenne Pepper, 1/4 teaspoons Onion Powder, 1/2 teaspoons Taco Seasoning, 1/2 teaspoons Cornstarch, 1- 1/2 pound Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast, Thinly Sliced, 1 cup Vegetable Oil, 6 whole Flour Tortillas, 2 whole Avocados, Chopped Or Sliced Red Onion, Jalapeno Peppers And Cilantro Leaves, To Serve,
1746e9746c.instructions:
1- Add the flour, salt, pepper, cayenne, onion powder, taco seasoning and cornstarch into a large mixing bowl.
2- Whisk to combine.
3- Add the vegetable oil into a large, heavy-bottomed skillet.
4- Heat over medium-high heat.
5- While the oil heats up, lightly coat the chicken breasts in the flour mixture, then place on a wire rack until ready to cook.
6- Once the oil starts to ripple, put several of the sliced chicken breasts into the pan.
7- Cook for 10 minutes on each side.
8- Place on a wire rack to cool and drain.
9- Continue that process until all breasts have been cooked.
10- Allow 5 to 10 minutes to cool.
11- While the chicken is cooling, either warm the tortillas in the oven (set on very low heat) or rub with a little olive oil and cook on a grill pan over medium heat.
12- Scoop half of an avocado onto a tortilla.
13- Smash using a fork.
14- Top with sliced crispy chicken, some red onions, jalapenos and some fresh cilantro leaves.

8072511bba.ingredients: 14 whole chicken wings, 2 tablespoons chinese rice wine or 2 tablespoons dry sherry, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 pinch white pepper, 12 cup low sodium chicken broth, 2 tablespoons dark soy sauce, 1 tablespoon chinese rice wine or 1 tablespoon dry sherry, 1 12 tablespoons brown sugar, packed, 1 tablespoon cooking oil, 3 small dried red chilies, whole, 6 slices ginger, each the size of a quarter, lightly crushed, 2 green onions, halved, 1 cinnamon stick, 12 teaspoon szechuan peppercorns, toasted, 1 12 teaspoons cornstarch, dissolved in 1 tbs water,
8072511bba.instructions:
1- Remove tips from chicken wings (can save them to make chicken stock).
2- Cut wings apart at joint.
3- Combine the 2 tbs rice wine, 1 tbs soy sauce, and white pepper in a bowl or ziplock bag.
4- Mix well then add chicken wings to coat.
5- Let marinate for at least 15 minutes.
6- Meanwhile, combine broth, dark soy sauce, remaining rice wine, and brown sugar in a small bowl to make sauce.
7- Place wok over high heat until hot.
8- Add oil and chilies, swirling to coat sides of wok.
9- Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 3-4 minutes.
10- Add ginger, green onions, cinnamon stick, and peppercorns.
11- Stir-fry for 1 minute.
12- Add the sauce, bring to a boil then reduce heat to a simmer.
13- Cook until wings are tender when pierced, about 12 minutes.
14- Remove and discard chilies, ginger, green onions and cinnamon stick.
15- Add cornstarch solution.
16- Cook, stirring, until sauce boils and thickens and wings are glazed.
17- Serve hot.

000875a149.ingredients: 1 lb chicken wing pieces, 1 1/2 cup cilantro, 1 clove garlic, 1 medium jalapeno, 2 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp fresh lime juice, 6 tbsp unsalted butter, 1 cup flour, 1 canola oil, 1 kosher salt, 1 black pepper,
000875a149.instructions:
1- Heat canola oil, lightly flour chicken and fry in batches til golden brown.
2- Puree cilantro,jalapeno,garlic,fish sauce and lime juice.
3- Heat butter.
4- Make sure not to burn the butter.
5- Mix butter and puree together.
6- Toss chicken wings in mixture.
7- Pour onto platter and garnish with leftover puree and limes.
8- ENJOY!

0aa9410761.ingredients: 3 lbs chicken wings (thawed), 12 cup maple syrup, 12 cup whiskey, 2 tablespoons melted butter, 1 teaspoon five-spice powder, thinly sliced orange wedge, for garnish, pineapple slice, for garnish,
0aa9410761.instructions:
1- In a foil-lined baking pan, arrange the wings in a single layer.
2- Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes, drain well.
3- Combine the maple syrup, whiskey, melted butter, and five spice powder in a slow cooker.
4- Add`wings, stir to coat the wings with sauce.
5- Cover and cook on low 4-5 hours, or on high for 2 - 2 1/2 hours.
6- Serve immediately or you can keep them warm in the slow cooker on low for up to 2 hours.
7- Garnish with orange wedges, and pineapple slices.
8- ENJOY.

query: What is a sausage recipe for someone new to cooking?

options.6ffdb18909: Breakfast sausages and cream cheese wrapped in Crescent rolls
options.468dfce62b: Mixed sausages braised in sauerkraut, hard cider, apples and onions along with bacon, green cabbage, and pumpernickel bread
options.0744bb73a2: Meat loaf made with pork, onion, carrot, egg, meal, and breadcrumbs
options.3121e8ef10: Meat buns made with ground beef and containing cream of mushroom soup
options.0e2074f4ea: Easy meatballs containing ground beef, eggs, breadcrumbs, and onions

triples: (user, member of organization, Save the children)

6ffdb18909.ingredients: 1 packages Breakfast Sauage, 1 cup cream cheese, 1 can Cresent Rolls,
6ffdb18909.instructions:
1- Grill Breakfast Sausage
2- Preheat oven to 375.
3- Roll out Cressent Rolls on an ungreesed sheet
4- Scoop a spoonfull of cream cheese onto each roll
5- Place a bit of shredded cheese ontop of cream cheese.
6- Cut Sausage in half and place on top of cheese
7- Roll cressents and add a little bit more shredded cheese on top of each roll and place in the oven for about 10-11 minutes.

468dfce62b.ingredients: 2 cups julienned red onions, 3 cups julienned yellow onions, divided, 3 bay leaves, divided, 4 (8-ounce) bottles hard cider, 1 (8-ounce) bottle lager, 1 head green cabbage, sliced, 8 links bratwurst, chorizo, kielbasa sausage, 6 ounces bacon, chopped, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 3 large Red or Golden Delicious apples, cored and cubed, 1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns, 1 teaspoon juniper berries, crushed, 2 pounds sauerkraut, rinsed well under cold running water and drained, 2 tablespoons light brown sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, Freshly ground black pepper, Rye and pumpernickel bread, accompaniment, Russian mustard, accompaniment,
468dfce62b.instructions:
1- With a sharp knife or kitchen fork, prick each sausage several times.
2- In a paella pan, combine the red onions, 1 cup yellow onion, 2 bay leaves, beer and lager and bring to a simmer over medium heat.
3- Add the cabbage and sausages and poach until almost cooked through, about 5 minutes.
4- Remove the sausages from the liquid and set aside, reserving the liquid.
5- In a large pot, cook the bacon over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes.
6- Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
7- Add the yellow onions to the fat in the pan and cook, stirring, until very soft, 5 to 6 minutes.
8- Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds.
9- Add the apples and cook, stirring, until starting to soften, about 2 minutes.
10- Add the bay leaf, peppercorns, and juniper berries and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds.
11- Add the sauerkraut and reserved beer cooking liquid (without the onions), sugar, salt and pepper, and bring to a boil.
12- Reduce the heat and simmer uncovered until tender and aromatic, stirring occasionally, about 1/2 hour.
13- Remove the sauerkraut from the heat and discard the bay leaf.
14- Stir in the cooked bacon and adjust the seasoning, to taste.
15- Arrange the sauerkraut on the platter with the sausages and serve, if desired, with rolls and mustard.
16- Serve with cold beer.

0744bb73a2.ingredients: 1 12 lbs pork, beef, and veal combo, 1 large onion, grated, 1 carrot, grated, 1 egg, beaten, 12 cup instant oat meal, 12 cup plain breadcrumbs, 1 tablespoon tomato paste, 14 cup fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon italian seasoning or 1 teaspoon your favorite dried herbs, 1 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 14 cup half-and-half or 14 cup milk, ketchup,
0744bb73a2.instructions:
1- Combine all of the ingredients together, except the ketchcup, and place in a meatloaf shape pan (9X5X2 1/2).
2- Spread some ketchup on the top.
3- Put into a preheated 350 degree oven and cook for 1 hour.
4- Serve with your sides.

3121e8ef10.ingredients: 2 tablespoons yeast, 5 cups water, 12 cup skim milk powder, 23 cup margarine, 12 cup oil, 3 eggs, 2 tablespoons salt, 4 tablespoons sugar, 15 cups flour, 5 12 lbs lean ground beef, 1 (10 ounce) can Campbell's half-fat condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1 (39 g) package Lipton Onion Soup Mix, 1 tablespoon Oxo beef cube, water,
3121e8ef10.instructions:
1- Mix dough following bread method.
2- Brown beef in a saucepan.
3- Spoon off as much fat as possible.
4- Stir in soups and beef in a mug, add one tin of water, and heat and stir until onions are rehydrated and all water has evaporated.
5- Divide dough into 12 sections.
6- Divide each of those into 12 (careful to punch down other sections).
7- Shape into buns by flattening a ball from dough about the size of a small egg
8- Add a rounded teaspoon of meat to the middle of the ball.
9- Gather edges of the dough around the meat and pinch it shut.
10- Let buns rise until almost double.
11- Bake at 400 F for about 22 min or until golden brown.

0e2074f4ea.ingredients: 1 lb lean ground beef, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons water, 12 cup breadcrumbs, 14 cup minced onion, 12 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon pepper,
0e2074f4ea.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
2- In large bowl combine egg, water, bread crumbs, onion, salt and pepper and combine.
3- Add ground beef, broken into chunks, and mush with your hands to combine.
4- Form into meatballs about 1" in diameter and place on a broiler pan.
5- Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes until meatballs are no longer pink in center.
6- Cool and use or freeze.

0e77c6a912.ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 onion, roughly chopped, 2 chorizo sausages, sliced, 4 sticks celery, roughly chopped, 3 garlic cloves, sliced, 6 sprigs thyme, 400 g green lentils, rinsed, 750 ml chicken stock, salt and pepper, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar,
0e77c6a912.instructions:
1- Heat oil in deep frypan.
2- Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned.
3- Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes.
4- Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender.
5- Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar.

query: I would like meat lasagna but I'm watching my weight

options.0b82f37488: Beef lasagna with whole wheat noodles, low-fat cottage cheese, and part-skim mozzarella cheese
options.34572cc1ee: Vegetarian lasagna with mushrooms, mixed vegetables, textured vegetable protein, and meat replacement
options.7042fffd85: Forgot the Meat Lasagna with onions, mushroom and spinach
options.047ea4e60b: Cheesy lasagna with Italian sausage, mushrooms, and 8 types of cheese
options.57139f1a42: Healthy meat loaf containing vegetables such as potatoes, onions, corn, carrots, and cabbage

0b82f37488.ingredients: 6 whole-wheat lasagna noodles (about 4 ounces total), broken in half, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 small Italian eggplant (1 pound), peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices, 2 garlic cloves, minced, Coarse salt and ground pepper, 8 ounces ground beef sirloin, 1 can (10.75 ounces) tomato puree, 2 cups low-fat (1%) cottage cheese, 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese (1 ounce), 1/2 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese (2 ounces),
0b82f37488.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375F.
2- Place noodles in an 8-inch square baking dish, and cover with hot water; set aside to soften.
3- In a medium Dutch oven or other heavy pot, heat oil over medium-high.
4- Add onion, eggplant, and garlic; season with salt and pepper.
5- Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until eggplant is very tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
6- Add sirloin and cook, breaking up meat with a spoon, until no longer pink, 3 to 5 minutes.
7- Add tomato puree and cook until thickened, 3 to 5 minutes.
8- Season meat sauce with salt and pepper.
9- Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, combine cottage cheese and 1/4 cup Parmesan; season with salt and pepper.
10- Remove noodles from baking dish, discarding water (dry dish).
11- Spread about 1/4 cup meat sauce in bottom of dish, and top with 4 noodle halves in a single layer.
12- Sprinkle evenly with a third of the cheese mixture, then top with a third of the sauce.
13- Repeat twice with remaining noodles, cheese mixture, and sauce.
14- Sprinkle evenly with mozzarella and remaining 2 tablespoons Parmesan.
15- Bake until lasagna is bubbling and cheese topping is golden, 30 to 35 minutes.
16- Let stand 10 minutes before cutting and serving.
17- (Per Serving)
18- Calories: 469
19- Fat: 15.4g (6g Saturated Fat)
20- Protein: 40.4g
21- Carbohydrates: 42.4g
22- Fiber: 9.5g

34572cc1ee.ingredients: 9 lasagna noodles, cooked, 32 ounces chunky pasta sauce with mushrooms, 1 kg mixed vegetables, carrots, cauliflower and broccoli, 14 cup textured vegetable protein (TVP), 12 cup water, boiling, 1 teaspoon liquid beef bouillon, 1 cup ground round (or other soy based ground beef replacement), 1 (16 ounce) can tomatoes, diced with Italian Spices, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 16 ounces cottage cheese (I use fat free), 12 cup grated parmesan cheese, 8 ounces frozen chopped spinach, 2 medium eggs, 4 cups mozzarella cheese, shredded,
34572cc1ee.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375F Cook lasagna noodles as directed, boiling approximately 8-9 minute Also boil mixed vegetables until tender, approximately 8-9 minute Meanwhile, add boullion to boiling water then add TVP to rehydrate.
2- Add diced tomatoes and garlic to sauce, then split into two seperate pots (I rinse and reuse pots from step 1).
3- In one pot of half sauce add boiled veggies, cover and let simmer for about 15 minute In the other pot of half sauce add TVP and ground round, cover and let simmer for about 15 minute Meanwhile, in a bowl combine spinach, cottage cheese, parmesean cheese and eggs.
4- In a deep 9x13 lasagna pan, add enough of the 'meat' pasta sauce to lightly coat the bottom.
5- Add 3 lasagna noodles to cover the bottom of the pan with out overlapping the noodles if possible.
6- Spread 1/2 cheese mixture on top of noodles, top with 1/2 veggie pasta sauce, sprinkle 1 cup mozzarella to complete first layer.
7- Repeat layer, 1/2 'meat' sauce, 3 noodles, remaining cheese mixture, remaining veggie sauce, 1 cup mozzarella.
8- Last layer, add remaining 3 noodles, remaining 'meat' sauce, sprinkle with remaining mozzarella.
9- Bake for 50-60 minutes.
10- Once removed from oven, let sit at least 10 minutes to allow lasagna to reabsorb a lot of the liquid you'll see on top.

7042fffd85.ingredients: 12 lasagna sheets, 1 28 oz, can crushed tomatoes, 1 6 oz. can tomato paste, 5 garlic cloves, 1 md. white onion, chopped, 1 T sugar, 1 cup beef stock, 1 lb. roughly chopped mushrooms, 10 oz. frozen spinach (thawed and drained), use fresh if you prefer, Italian seasoning - parsley - oregano, salt and pepper -- to taste, 1 lg. egg, 15 oz. ricotta cheese, 2 cups Mozzarella, Italian blend cheese, shredded, 1 cup parmesan cheese,
7042fffd85.instructions:
1- In a large pot or dutch oven combine the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, garlic, onions, sugar, and seasonings.
2- Allow this to simmer for an hour or so to bring flavors together.
3- Add the mushrooms and broth after 30-40 minutes.
4- In a bowl combine egg, spinach, ricotta, and parmesan.
5- Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with a bit of the tomato sauce and begin layering: pasta, cheese/egg mix, tomato sauce, shredded cheese.
6- The final layer should be the shredded cheese.
7- Since the pasta is going in uncooked be sure to cover it well with sauce, the pasta will cook nicely.
8- (Does not have to be the "no boil" type -- this works with any pasta.)
9- Bake for 30 minutes at 350 or until bubbly.
10- Pop it in the broiler for a few minutes to nicely brown the top if you want.
11- (Servings -- depends on how much you like to eat.
12- Divided into 8 servings, this recipe is 380 cals per serving.)

047ea4e60b.ingredients: 16 ounces ricotta cheese, 3 cups mozzarella cheese (2% or skim), 14 cup provolone cheese, 18 cup muenster cheese, 14 cup parmesan cheese, 14 cup romano cheese, 18 cup feta (finely crumbled), 2 ounces goat cheese, 2 large eggs, 1 teaspoon white pepper, 3 tablespoons dried parsley, 5 cups pasta sauce (homemade or your fav brand), 12 portabella mushroom (finely diced), 12 lb Italian sausage (really depends on how meaty you like it), 1 lb lasagna noodle (boiled), 12 cup mozzarella cheese (not part of cheese mixture),
047ea4e60b.instructions:
1- Line your dish lightly with oil (I like to use an extra virgin olive.
2- Mix together the ricotta, mozzarella, provolone, muenster, parmesan, romano, feta, goat cheese, eggs, pepper, and parsley well in a large mixing bowl (being careful, cheese tends to fly out at you).
3- Stir your sauce ingredients together in mixing bowl.
4- Lay strips of pasta across dish parallel until layer is covered.
5- Paste out the cheese mixture on top of pasta evenly.
6- Repeat 5 with sauce on top of cheese mixture.
7- Lightly sprinkle mozzarella on top of pasta (this helps hold the pasta together.
8- Lay down another layer of pasta and repeat steps 5-8 until you reach the top of your dish.
9- Sprinkle a little mozzarella and parmesan on the last layer of pasta (for looks).
10- Cover with aluminum foil (this prevents the top from drying out--unless you like that).
11- Preheat oven to 315F and cook for 1 hour.

57139f1a42.ingredients: 4 cups cabbage packed, finely shredded, 1 each onions finely chopped, 1 1/2 tablespoons corn oil, 1 cup carrots packed shredded, 1 clove garlic minced, 1/2 pound beef ground round or lean ground, 1 each eggs white, 1 each eggs whole, 13 cup bread crumbs preferably whole wheat, 1 teaspoon basil dried, crumbled, 1/4 teaspoon oregano crumbled, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper fresh, ground, to taste, 1/4 cup water, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 1 cup potatoes packed shredded,
57139f1a42.instructions:
1- Saute cabbage and onion in the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, stirring them often, for about 5 minutes.
2- Reduce the heat to medium low and saute the vegetables for 5 to 10 minutes longer or until cabbage begins to turn golden.
3- Add the carrots and garlic; saute the vegetables another 5 minutes.
4- Remove the vegetables from the heat and let them cool to room temperature.
5- In a large bowl, combine the beef with the egg white and whole egg, bread crumbs, basil, oregano, black pepper, water and vinegar.
6- Add the cooked vegetables and shredded potatoes to the beef mixture.
7- Mix ingredients well.
8- In a shallow baking pan, shape the meat and vegetable mixture into a loaf about 8 inches long.
9- Cover the pan tightly with aluminum foil.
10- Bake the meat loaf in a preheated 350F (180C) oven for 30 minutes.
11- Uncover the meat loaf and bake it 30 minutes longer.
12- Let the meat loaf rest for about 15 minutes before slicing it.
13- Serves 8.

5e33b8fab1.ingredients: 12 lasagna noodles, uncooked, 3/4 lb. lean ground beef King Sooper's 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09, 3/4 lb. Italian sausage, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 1 can (15 oz.) tomato sauce, 1 jar (15 oz.) CLASSICO Creamy Alfredo Pasta Sauce, 2 tsp. Italian seasoning, 1/3 cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese, 2 eggs, beaten, 1-1/2 cups KRAFT Shredded Mozzarella Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA, divided,
5e33b8fab1.instructions:
1- Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
2- Cook noodles as directed on package, omitting salt.
3- Meanwhile, brown meat with garlic in skillet; drain.
4- Place in large bowl.
5- Mix sauces and seasoning.
6- Add 1 cup to meat with Parmesan, eggs and half the mozzarella; mix well.
7- Spoon half of the remaining sauce evenly into 12 muffin pan cups.
8- Drain noodles.
9- Spread 1/3 cup meat mixture onto each noodle; top with 1 Tbsp.
10- of the remaining mozzarella.
11- Roll up; secure with wooden toothpicks, if desired.
12- Place, spiral sides up, in muffin cups; drizzle with remaining sauce.
13- Cover.
14- Bake 25 min.
15- or until heated through.
16- Top with remaining mozzarella; bake, uncovered, 5 min.
17- or until melted.
18- Discard toothpicks before serving.

72ba593c67.ingredients: 1 lb hamburger, 12 onion, diced, 1 (14 ounce) can canned kidney beans, rinsed, 1 (14 ounce) can canned pinto beans, rinsed, 1 (14 ounce) can refried beans, 1 (14 ounce) can canned corn, drained, 3 (15 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, 1 cup broth or 1 cup water, 2 tablespoons southwest seasoning, cheese, lettuce, diced onion, diced jalapeno pepper, crushed tortilla chips,
72ba593c67.instructions:

2- Add beans, corn, and tomatoes.

05a8d8f651.ingredients: 14 cup butter, 5 large onions, 5 cups beef broth (4 small cans), 12 cup dried celery leaves or 12 cup dried celery flakes, 1 large potato (peeled & quartered), 1 cup white port or 1 cup cream sherry, 34 cup vinegar (or more), 4 tablespoons sugar, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes, salt & pepper,
05a8d8f651.instructions:
1- Melt butter in a large pot.
2- Add quartered onions, beef broth, celery leaves or flakes, quartered potato & bring to a boil.
3- Cover pot & simmer on medium-low heat for 30 minutes.
4- Puree little by little in a blender, emptying the puree from the blender into another large pot.
5- Continue to puree little by little, so that it won't splash out of the blender & placing the puree in the 2nd pot, until all of the puree is in the 2nd pot.
6- Mix in the wine, vinegar & sugar.
7- Bring to boil again & then simmer on medium-low heat for 5 minutes.
8- Stir in the cream, parsley, salt & pepper.
9- Heat on low flame another 5 minutes & be VERY, VERY CAREFUL NOT TO BOIL!

24cdba3084.ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 1/2 pounds haricots verts or green beans, 1 tablespoon minced fresh garlic, 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 1 1/2 teaspoons white wine vinegar, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper,
24cdba3084.instructions:
1- Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
2- Add haricots verts.
3- Cook 3 minutes or until lightly browned.
4- Add garlic and crushed red pepper.
5- Remove from heat; stir in vinegar, salt, and freshly ground black pepper.

82f40d6155.ingredients: 1-1/4 qt. dry lentils, cooked, rinsed and drained, 1-1/4 qt. canned chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained, rinsed, 1-1/4 qt. canned pinto beans, drained, rinsed, 1-1/4 qt. canned black beans, drained, rinsed, 1-1/4 qt. canned great Northern beans, drained, rinsed, 2-1/2 cups onions, chopped, 1-1/4 cups OSCAR MAYER Bacon Pieces, 1-1/4 qt. KRAFT Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing,
82f40d6155.instructions:

0262d0535c.ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 cup rice or 1 cup orzo pasta, 1 whole onion, avgolemono sauce, salt, pepper,
0262d0535c.instructions:

2- Bring to a boil and remove the foam.
3- At this point add the onion and salt and pepper to taste.
4- Once the chicken is boiled remove it and the onion from the pot.
5- Now add the rice or orzo to the broth and let it boil.
6- When the rice or orzo is ready, add the avgolemono sauce.

5f73abe97e.ingredients: 2 cups fat-free reduced-sodium chicken broth, 2 cups water, 3/4 cup CLASSICO FAMILY FAVORITES Traditional Pasta Sauce, 1 can (15 oz.) cannellini beans, drained, 1/4 lb. spaghetti, broken into bite-size pieces, uncooked, 1 cup frozen cut green beans, 1 cup KRAFT Shredded Cheddar Cheese,

0001d81db6.instructions:

query: What are ways to cook asparagus if I don't have an oven at home?

options.63e01fc241: Steamed asparagus with olive oil, black pepper, salt, and lemon
options.0b3fea9676: Creamy asparagus bake with cheddar cheese
options.09fbcdaf19: Baked asparagus casserole dish with Worcestershire sauce
options.b13de394b3: Belgian White Asparagus With Shrimp and Scrambled Eggs

63e01fc241.ingredients: 1 pound medium asparagus, stalks trimmed and peeled, 1 to 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, 1 lemon, cut into wedges,
63e01fc241.instructions:
1- Pour about 1-inch of water into a large saucepan, and set up a collapsible steamer inside.
2- Bring the water to boil, lay the asparagus in the steamer, cover, and steam until crisp-tender, about 4 to 5 minutes.
3- Transfer asparagus to a heated serving dish, drizzle with the olive oil, and season with salt and pepper, to taste.
4- Garnish with lemon and serve immediately.
5- Cook's Note: You may finish the asparagus with the grated zest of a small lemon, a tablespoon of unsalted butter, and a teaspoon of minced flat-leaf parsley leaves, instead of the oil.

0b3fea9676.ingredients: 1 lb asparagus (fresh or frozen), 1 (14 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup, 1 (14 ounce) can cream of celery soup, 1 (16 ounce) boxsociables crackers, 12 lb cheddar cheese, shredded,
0b3fea9676.instructions:
1- Grease a 13x9 pan.
2- Lay asparagus in the bottom is a single layer.
3- Crunch entire box of crackers, mix with cream soups.
4- Spread over asparagus.
5- Bake at 375* F for 30-40 minutes, until asparagus is cooked crisp tender.
6- Sprinkle cheese over top of the dish, and continue to bake for 6-7 minutes, just until the cheese melts.

09fbcdaf19.ingredients: 2 -3 lbs asparagus, 6 tablespoons butter, divided, 34 cup soft breadcrumbs, 14 cup all-purpose flour, 12 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon white pepper, 2 cups milk, 12 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 34 cup grated mild cheddar cheese, 2 ounces drained pimiento, chopped (optional),
09fbcdaf19.instructions:
1- Wash asparagus, remove woody part of stalks and cut into 2 1/2-inch pieces.
2- Cook in boiling salted water until just tender.
3- Drain and place in a shallow baking dish or casserole.
4- Melt 2 tablespoons of the butter in a saucepan mix in the soft bread crumbs; set aside for topping casserole later.
5- Melt 4 tablespoons of butter in a saucepan and add flour, salt, and pepper; stir.
6- Continue cooking and stirring over low heat.
7- Gradually add milk, stirring until thickened.
8- Add Worcestershire sauce, pimiento, and cheese; stir until cheese is melted.
9- Pour sauce over asparagus in casserole; top with buttered crumbs.
10- Bake at 350 for 20 minutes.

0b42118565.ingredients: 1 small flower cauliflower, 200 g beans, 200 g carrots, 1 teaspoon mustard seeds, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt & pepper,
0b42118565.instructions:
1- Wash the vegetables thoroughly under running water.
2- Peel the carrots and cut the cauliflower in small flowers (not very small).
3- Now cut the carrots into thin 5 cm rectangular slices and beans too of approximate length.
4- In a non stick pan add 2 cups of water and put all the sliced vegetables into the same.
5- Sprinkle little salt and close the lid.
6- Lets the vegetables cook for around 10 min or so until slightly tender, medium flame.
7- Drain the water,transfer the vegetables into another pan.
8- Wipe the non stick pan dry and put 1 tablespoon oil
9- Add the mustard seeds, close the lid until the seeds have crackled.
10- Now add the cooked vegetables and sprinkle salt as per taste.
11- Close the lid and toss the plan for the salt to mix.
12- (One can use a wooden stapula for mixing if the veggies are not too soft).
13- Let it cook for another 5-10 min
14- Add pepper when the pan is off the flame and toss.
15- (Optionally add some fresh sprouts).
16- Enjoy!

05fff8f56e.ingredients: 1 pound carrots, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices on the diagonal, 1 head cauliflower, trimmed and separated into small florets, 1 pound pickling cucumbers, unpeeled, washed and cut into 1/4-inch slices on the diagonal, 3/4 cup chopped fresh oregano leaves, 1 quart white vinegar, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup coarse salt, 2 tablespoons cracked black pepper, 6 red jalapeno chilies, 6 green jalapeno chiles, 2 heads garlic, cloves separated, peeled, cut in half lengthwise, 1 medium yellow onion, sliced,
05fff8f56e.instructions:
1- Bring a medium saucepan of salted water to a boil, and blanch the carrots for 3 minutes.
2- Remove from the boiling water with a slotted spoon, and refresh in a bowl of iced water.
3- Drain and reserve.
4- Then blanch the cauliflower about 6 minutes, drain, refresh and drain again.
5- Place the carrots, cauliflower, cucumbers and oregano in a large nonreactive bowl.
6- Combine the vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
7- Add the jalapeno chiles, garlic and onion and return to a boil.
8- Cook 1 minute longer, and pour over the vegetables.
9- Set aside to cool to room temperature.
10- Pour into three 1-quart glass jars and refrigerate as long as 1 month.

b13de394b3.ingredients: 5 cleaned white asparagus, 7 shrimp, 1 tablespoon butter, salt, pepper, garlic, 2 eggs, parsley (to garnish),
b13de394b3.instructions:
1- Fill a pot with enough water for the cleaned asparagus to be fully under.
2- Add some salt.
3- Place the pot on the stove and add the asparagus to the cold water.
4- Turn on full heat and leave the asparagus in the water until it cooks.
5- Peal the shrimp in the meantime and fry them with some butter in a pan.
6- Season with plenty of salt, pepper en garlic.
7- While they cook, go ahead and whisk your eggs in a bowl with some salt and pepper.
8- When the shrimp are done, take them out and add some more butter to the pan.
9- In this pan, make scrambled eggs.
10- Making the eggs in the same pan will give them a great taste.
11- When the water for the asparagus boils, turn off the heat but let the asparagus float in the water for about 5 minutes.
12- To check if they are done, poke them with a fork, if the asparagus falls of before your fork leaves the water, they are done.
13- Place asparagus on a plate, pile on the eggs and decorate with the shrimp.
14- Use nice, green, fresh parsley for garnish.
