1d5f95763f.ingredients: 1 bunch fresh broccoli (1 1/2 lb.), 2 c. onion, sliced very thin, 1/2 c. fresh Parmesan cheese, cut into thin slivers with swivel peeler, 1/3 c. extra virgin olive oil, 1 c. dry, robust red wine,
1d5f95763f.instructions:
1- Separate broccoli flowerets from stalk.
2- Divide large ones.
3- Peel dark green skin from stalks and cut in 1/4 inch thick strips.
4- In large saute/fry pan, cover bottom with thin layer of onions.
5- Over this spread layer of broccoli stalks, dot with Parmesan slivers.
6- Sprinkle on a little salt if you like.
7- Moisten with thin stream of extra virgin olive oil.
8- Repeat above procedure till ingredients are used up.
9- Save flowerettes for top layer.
10- Add in red wine.
11- Cover, cook 1 hour over medium low heat on top of stove, or possibly till all wine has evaporated.
12- Don't stir.
13- Serve promptly.
14- Don't reheat.

03017f9de6.ingredients: 1 large cauliflower, chopped, 1 egg, salt and pepper, flour, vegetable oil or canola oil,
03017f9de6.instructions:
1- In the microwave, cook the cauliflower in a covered dish with two tablespoon of water until soft.
2- Drain the cauliflower and mash with the back of a fork or potato masher.
3- Add the egg, salt and pepper, and enough flour until you can form patties; about 1/4 cup.
4- Add enough oil to coat the bottom of a skillet.
5- Over medium high heat, brown the caulflower patties.
6- Eat!

0371e33d63.ingredients: 1 pound Brussels Sprouts, 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil, 1/2 cups Giada De Laurentiis Parmesan Vinaigrette, 1 pinch Black Pepper, 1/2 Tablespoons Kosher Salt, Divided,
0371e33d63.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2- Cut the stems off of your Brussels sprouts and then slice them in half.
3- Place them in a Ziploc bag.
4- Add the olive oil, vinaigrette, ground pepper and half of the salt to the Ziploc bag.
5- Give it a good shake.
6- Empty the Brussels sprouts into the pan.
7- Turn the Brussels sprouts cut side down and roast for 20 minutes.
8- If you have really large Brussels sprouts, roast for 25 minutes.
9- You want the Brussels sprouts to be browned and crispy.
10- Take them out of the oven and sprinkle with the remaining salt.

77347080f6.ingredients: 4 ounces 1/4- to 1/3- inch-thick slices pancetta (Italian bacon) or thick-cut bacon slices, cut into 1/4- to1/3-inch cubes, 5 1/2 cups 1-inch broccoli florets (from 1 pound broccoli crowns), 9 ounces fresh or dried fettuccine, 1/4 cup (1/2 stick) butter, melted, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1 tablespoon finely grated lemon peel, 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves, 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese,
77347080f6.instructions:
1- Saute pancetta in heavy medium skillet over medium-high heat until almost crisp and brown.
2- Transfer to paper towels.
3- Cook broccoli in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender but still bright green, about 3 minutes.
4- Using slotted spoon, transfer broccoli to medium bowl.
5- Add pasta to same boiling water; cook until tender, stirring occasionally.
6- Drain pasta; return to same pot.
7- Add next 5 ingredients.
8- Toss over low heat to coat.
9- Add pancetta, broccoli, and cheese; toss to blend.
10- Season pasta with pepper.

3625a983af.ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, 1 large onion, diced, 1 stalk celery, diced, 2 cups cabbage, shredded, 3 potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced, 6 cups chicken stock, divided, 1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped, 2 tablespoons flour, 12 cup sour cream, salt and pepper, to taste,
3625a983af.instructions:
1- Melt butter in saucepan over medium heat.
2- Add onion, celery, cabbage, salt, and pepper.
3- Partly cover and cook for 10 minutes over a low heat.
4- Add potatoes, chicken stock, and dill.
5- Bring to a boil while stirring periodically.
6- Boil, partly covered, for 20 minutes.
7- Mix the flour with the sour cream in a bowl.

1b010c2f36.ingredients: 7 whole Potatoes, Peeled And Cubed, 1 Tablespoon Salt, 1/2 whole Yellow Onion, Chopped, 3 stalks Celery, Chopped, 3 strips Turkey Bacon, 1/2 cups Celery Leaves, 4 cans 98% Fat Free Cream Of Celery Soup, 1- 1/2 Tablespoon Parsley, 2 pinches Ground Pepper,
1b010c2f36.instructions:
1- Peel and dice the potatoes into about 3/4-inch chunks.
2- Purposefully slice some cubes much smaller so that they disintegrate while cooking.
3- Add to a large soup pot and cover with water, allowing one inch more above the potatoes.
4- Add the salt and allow the potatoes to cook on low heat.
5- Chop the onion finely.
6- Slice three ribs of celery, reserving the celery leaves.
7- Take the turkey bacon and put it in a skillet with a tablespoon of vegetable oil.
8- Allow the bacon to cook for a while, then add the vegetables and saute until the onion is soft.
9- Remove the bacon and add the vegetables to the potatoes.
10- Place the bacon back in the frying pan and cook until cooked through, then remove the bacon to a cutting board.
11- Chop the bacon roughly and add that to the potatoes.
12- Chop the celery leaves and add them to the soup.
13- When the potatoes have finish cooking, begin to add the cream of celery.
14- You may not need all four cans; add the first two and taste.
15- If you need more, add another can.
16- If the broth is still too weak for your tastes, add the last can.
17- Stir until the cream soups dissolve.
18- Add the parsley and pepper.
19- Add salt if you wish.
20- Stir well and serve.
21- Serves a lot of people!

3fcfc58063.ingredients: 4 cups carrots, cooked, pureed, 1 cup whole milk, 1 12 tablespoons cornstarch, 3 cups light cream,
3fcfc58063.instructions:
1- Cook carrots until tender.
2- Drain carrots and save 1/4 cup liquid.
3- Allow to cool.
4- In a double boiler, or heavy saucepan over medium heat, cook whole milk and cornstarch until mixture forms a soft paste.
5- Remove cornstarch mixture from heat and allow to cool.
6- If lumpy, pass through a sieve.
7- If not already pureed, puree carrots in a food processor or blender, adding reserved carrot water if needed.
8- In a mixing bowl combine carrots, cornstarch mixture and light cream; mix well.
9- Cool mixture to 40 degrees Fahrenheit in refrigerator.
10- Place cold mixture into the ice cream freezer; freeze according to manufacturer's directions.

035f3a2de2.ingredients: 1 cup French fries, diced, 1 cup milk, 1 teaspoon butter, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 pinch nutmeg, 14 medium onion, finely diced, 14 cup celery, finely diced, 14 cup carrot, finely diced, 1 cup seafood (clam, shrimp, mouselle, squid, crab meat, ... using one kind or mixing a few kinds is both okay),
035f3a2de2.instructions:
1- Cook onion, celery and carrots in water just covering the food for 10 minutes; drain.
2- Meanwhile, blend the first 6 ingredients till smooth (about 2 minutes).
3- Cook the seafood in minimal water.
4- Cooking Time: most seafood will get tough if cooked longer than the time to just cook through, but things like shrimp head can cook for 5 - 10 minutes to release great flavor.
5- Put the drained vegetable and the blended mixture into the pot of seafood, stir and bring to a boil.
6- Enjoy!

7a6ee284ac.instructions:

a4a7518c8d.instructions:
1- Slice the onions very thinly.
2- Cook them in butter until clear (do not let them brown).
3- Add stock and simmer for 45 minutes.
4- Just before serving, add the brandy.
5- Toast the bread towards the end of the cooking time, place the grated Gruyere on the toasted bread and float on the top of the soup.
6- If the soup is served in ovenproof bowls, you can place the filled bowls under the broiler for a minute or so to brown the cheese.

8de97ec8e3.instructions:

12- Cook until thickened.

7- Bake uncovered in a 400 oven for 1 hour.
8- During the first 30 minutes, rotate the bottom layer to the top and put the second layer to the bottom and finish off for the second 30 minute increment.

8ad8f43ff5.ingredients: 1 medium cucumber, peeled and sliced, 10 ounces cream of chicken soup, 34 cup milk, 1 cup sour cream, 1 dash curry powder, celery salt, pepper,
8ad8f43ff5.instructions:
1- Put cucumber, soup, milk, sour cream and seasoning in blender for 1 minute.
2- Chill several hours.
3- To serve, stir and pour into small bowls or cups.
4- Garnish with chopped fresh chives.
5- Serves 6.

748c435252.ingredients: 2 large cucumbers, thinly sliced, 12-34 bunch fresh dill, finely chopped, 20 cherry tomatoes, sliced in half, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 3 tablespoons olive oil, salt and pepper, to taste,
748c435252.instructions:
1- Slice the tomatoes in half and chop the cucumbers, put in a bowl together and salt them, put aside.
2- Whisk together the vinegar, oil and salt& pepper, taste and add more of whatever it needs.
3- Then add the veggies.
4- Optional add small chunks of feta cheese.

query: I want a dip with vegetables to go with my tortilla chips for snack

options.9e0fb34c51: Salsa made with pineapple, mangoes, onions, black beans, corn, strawberries, jalapeno, and tomatoes
options.03c7d512c2: Vegetable lasagna made with zucchini, mozzarella, and feta cheese

options.5b45c39e98: Cherry cream cheese dip with cinnamon tortillas

9e0fb34c51.ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple tidbits (you could probably put in less pineapple), 2 mangoes, 12 white onion, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained & rinsed, 0.5 (15 1/4 ounce) can corn, 8 -10 strawberries, 12-1 jalapeno, 1 tomatoes, 12-1 bunch cilantro, 2 -3 tablespoons lime juice, salt,
9e0fb34c51.instructions:
1- Dice or chop up everything but the beans, pineapple tidbits, corn (since they're already 'chopped') and lime juice (obviously).

6- Break out the chips and enjoy!

03c7d512c2.ingredients: 28 ounces, weight Spaghetti Sauce, 6 whole Lasagna Noodles (Uncooked), 15 ounces, weight Fat-free Ricotta Cheese, 2 cups Zucchini, Finely Chopped, 8 ounces, weight Low Fat Mozzarella Cheese, Shredded, Divided,
03c7d512c2.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Spray an 11 x 7 inch baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.
2- Spread 1/3 of the sauce on the bottom of the pan.
3- Arrange 3 noodles in a single layer over the sauce.
4- Top with another 1/3 of the sauce, all of the ricotta and zucchini, and 1/2 the mozzarella.
5- Next add remaining noodles in a single layer and top with remaining sauce.
6- Cover with foil and bake for 60 minutes.
7- Top with remaining mozzarella and bake uncovered for another 5 minutes.
8- Let it stand for 5 minutes before cutting.
9- Adapted from Weight Watchers recipe card.

1f09ff45ae.ingredients: 2 cups chocolate chips, 12 cup heavy cream,
1f09ff45ae.instructions:
1- Pour both into small saucepan over very low heat, so chocolate will not burn.
2- Stir till melted.
3- Take off of heat and serve immediatly.
4- I sometimes add splashes of our favorite liquors and flavorings and a dash of cinnamon.
5- Serve with fresh fruit, like strawberries, and/or cut up pieces of pound cake or angelfood cake.
6- Enjoy!

026f93fbea.ingredients: 2 kg salmon, 150 grams edamame, 200 grams carrots, 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch pepper, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp butter,
026f93fbea.instructions:
1- Put salmon in a baking dish.
2- Bake it for 20 minutes, or until the fish is fully cooked.
3- Season with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
4- Slice the carrots and put in a pan with edamame and butter.
5- Season with salt and pepper.
6- Cook it for a few minutes.
7- When the salmon is ready, add the vegetables to the baking dish together with the salmon.
8- Bake it for 5 more minutes.
9- It goes well together rice or some pasta.

5b45c39e98.ingredients: 1 (250 g) package cream cheese, 14 cup sugar (can use Splenda), 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 (540 ml) can cherry pie filling, 8 tortillas, 12 cup white sugar (can use Splenda), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 12 cup margarine, melted,
5b45c39e98.instructions:
1- DIP.
2- Mix softened cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla and line the bottom and sides of a bwol with the mixture.
3- Pour the filling in the centre and serve with the Cinnamon Tortillas!
4- TORTILLAS.
5- Mix together the sugar and cinnamon.
6- Brush melted butter on each of the tortillas then cut into any shape you want and sprinkle with the cinnamon sugar.
7- Place on a lightly greased cookie sheet and bake at 350 for 5 to 8 minutes or until crispy!

a93912ea4b.ingredients: 3 whole Jalapenos, Halved, Seeded (leave Seeds For More Heat), 1 whole Onion, Cut In Half, 8 whole Tomatoes, Cut In Half, 18 cups Olive Oil, 1 can (15.5 Oz.) Diced Tomatoes, 1 bunch Fresh Cilantro, Chopped, 13 cups Garlic Powder, Salt And Pepper, to taste,
a93912ea4b.instructions:

2- Place a grill pan over medium-high heat or prepare the barbecue (medium-high heat).

5- The key to getting those great grill marks is to not shift the vegetables too frequently once theyve been placed on the hot grill.
6- 2.
7- Finish the vegetables by pureeing them in the blender.
8- Pour the puree into a large bowl.
9- 3.
10- Add the diced tomatoes, chopped cilantro, garlic powder and salt and pepper to taste.

query: I want a green smoothie to have after my workout

options.01034c02d0: Green chili made with bell peppers, beef stew meat, and chili peppers

44ed2cb069.ingredients: 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 12 cup chopped celery, 14 cup fresh parsley leaves, 14 cup Baby Spinach, 2 teaspoons lemon juice,
44ed2cb069.instructions: 1- In blender, combine all ingredients until smooth.

01034c02d0.ingredients: 1 lb beef stew meat, diced, 1 cup water, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1 teaspoon salt, chili pepper (1 or 2 hot such as jalapenos), 2 bell peppers, diced (green),
01034c02d0.instructions:
1- In a 2 quart saucepan, combine beef, water, garlic and salt.
2- Cover and simmer one hour.
3- Place chile peppers on baking sheet, bake in 400 degree oven until peppers are browned and skin splits (about 25 minutes.
4- Cool slightly.
5- While still warm, peel skin, halve peppers and remove seeds.
6- Finely chop chili peppers and add to meat mixture along with bell peppers.
7- Simmer covered 20 minutes.
8- Uncover and simmer 20 minutes more.

09a7f9380f.ingredients: 1 can (1-1/4 lb.) unsweetened pineapple chunks, 2 tsp. liquid sweetener, 1 cup buttermilk, Mint leaves (optional), 2 tsp. vanilla extract,
09a7f9380f.instructions:
1- Drain pineapple, reserving 1/2 cup juice.
2- Freeze pineapple chunks.
3- Place juice, buttermilk, vanilla, sweetener and frozen pineapple into a blender container.
4- Blend until smooth.
5- Pour into glasses and garnish with mint if desired.

02cac0b8b8.ingredients: 12 eggs, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cups diced onion, 2 1/2 cups chopped zucchini, 2 1/2 cup chopped yellow squash, 2 red peppers, diced, 2 cups diced broccoli, 2 cups diced cauliflower,
02cac0b8b8.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
2- In a medium mixing bowl, beat the eggs with some salt and pepper.
3- Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the olive oil.
4- When the oil is hot, add the onion, zucchini, squash, and peppers and cook until the vegetables are soft but not brown, about 6 or 7 minutes.
5- Add salt and pepper, to taste, and remove the skillet from the heat.
6- Add the broccoli and stir.
7- Grease a 12-cup muffin tin and fill each cup halfway with the vegetable mixture.
8- Pour in the beaten egg, filling each cup to the top.
9- Sprinkle each with some of the cauliflower.
10- Bake in the oven until it is set in the center, about 25 to 30 minutes.
11- Serve immediately.
12- This recipe was provided by professional chefs and has been scaled down from a bulk recipe provided by a restaurant.
13- The Food Network Kitchens chefs have not tested this recipe, in the proportions indicated, and therefore, we cannot make any representation as to the results.

88504d478f.ingredients: 1/2 cup Vanilla Almond Milk, 1/2 Banana, 1 Handful (~5) Fresh Raspberries, 1 Handful Fresh Blueberries, 2 Strawberries, 2 tsp Vanilla or Honey Flavoured Greek Yogurt (I used honey flavoured), 1 Handful Crushed Ice, 1 (optional crushed almonds for garnish),
88504d478f.instructions:
1- Blend it all up (i used my handy magic bullet) until well blended and enjoy!
2- Crush some almonds and sprinkle them on top if you like too!

a9f127cd74.ingredients: 2 bananas, broken into chunks, 2 cups baby spinach, 1 cup frozen mango chunks, 1/2 teaspoon chopped jalapeno pepper, or to taste,
a9f127cd74.instructions: 1- Blend banana, spinach, mango, and jalapeno pepper in a blender until smooth.

query: What are some spinach or kale-based dishes I can make in the oven?

options.7317b9bdd3: Oven style cabbage with butter, bacon, salt, and pepper
options.957335f649: Spinach salad with bacon, green onions, and Worcestershire sauce
options.a867087aa9: Sauteed kale with onion, olive oil, and sea salt
options.07eaf5a916: Spinach and kale smoothie also containing banana, chia seeds, peanut butter, and almond milk

083eac09aa.ingredients: One 10-inch piecrust or fresh pastry, 2 cups whole milk, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground white pepper, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 8 eggs, whipped, 1 cup spinach, thin cut, 1/2 cup cooked and chopped bacon, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, Monterey Jack or other, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley,
083eac09aa.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (on low fan speed, if using convection).
2- During this time, cover the bottom of the piecrust with aluminum foil and uncooked beans.
3- Place the piecrust in the oven and bake (blind bake) for 10 to 12 minutes to allow the crust to cook.
4- The crust should be light brown on the edges when removing from the oven.
5- During the cooking of the crust, whisk together the milk, salt, pepper, nutmeg and eggs in a bowl.
6- After mixing the eggs, in a second bowl, blend together the spinach, bacon, cheese and parsley.
7- Add half of the egg mixture to coat the ingredients, again mixing well.
8- Next, add the mixture to the cooked crust then finish with the remaining egg mixture.
9- Bake in the oven until the middle of the quiche is set, about 20 minutes.
10- Remove and serve.

7317b9bdd3.ingredients: 1 head Cabbage, 2 tbsp Butter, 3 slice Bacon (I used turkey bacon), 1 as needed Salt, 1 as needed Pepper,
7317b9bdd3.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350F.
2- Use a knife to cut the cabbage head into quarters.
3- Wash the pieces in cold water before preparing to remove any dirt.
4- Cut off the stems on each cabbage quarter.
5- And proceed to cut cabbage up.
6- (I use the fold then cut method?
7- Cut the bacon in to small, bite size pieces with your knife.
8- Spread a piece of aluminum foil on a baking sheet and add cabbage and bacon
9- Season your cabbage with salt and pepper and add butter to cabbage.
10- Fold aluminium foil so that the cabbage is completely sealed inside.
11- Bake for 1 hour or until cabbage is tender.

957335f649.ingredients: 1/2 cup Oil, 1/3 cup Sugar, 1 tbsp Vinegar, 1/4 cup Catsup, 1/2 cup Worchester, 1 lb Bacon (cooked and chopped), 2 bunch Spinach, 3 Green onions (chopped),
957335f649.instructions:
1- You can make ahead and pour dressing over at the last minute and toss.
2- Add white bean sprouts, cheddar cheese, sliced fresh mushrooms

a867087aa9.ingredients: 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 whole Medium Onion, Chopped, 1 bunch Kale, Trimmed And Chopped Into 1-inch Strips, 1/4 teaspoons Celtic Sea Salt,
a867087aa9.instructions:
1- In a large pan, heat oil over medium heat.
2- Reduce heat to medium low and add onion.
3- Saute for 15 minutes until caramelized.
4- Add kale and saute for 5 minutes uncovered.
5- Cover pot with a lid and saute for 1-2 minutes until wilted.
6- Season with salt and serve.

07eaf5a916.ingredients: 2 cups fresh spinach, 1 cup almond milk, 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1 tablespoon chia seeds (optional), 1 leaf kale, 1 sliced frozen banana,
07eaf5a916.instructions:
1- Blend spinach, almond milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and kale together in a blender until smooth.
2- Add banana and blend until smooth.

084503928c.ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, more as needed, 2 large yellow onions, finely chopped, Sea salt, 2 pounds fresh spinach, washed and thoroughly dried, Vegetable oil or nonstick spray, for oiling pan, 1 pound feta cheese, rinsed in cool water, then crumbled, 12 ounces ricotta cheese, drained, 5 ounces (about 2 cups) finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, 5 large eggs, lightly beaten, Freshly ground black pepper, 1 to 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh dill, or to taste,
084503928c.instructions:
1- In a large skillet over low heat, heat olive oil.
2- Add onions and pinch of salt, and saute until soft and beginning to turn golden, 30 to 40 minutes.
3- Transfer to a large mixing bowl.
4- Return pan to medium heat.
5- Working in batches and adding oil 1 tablespoon at a time as needed, saute spinach until wilted, then transfer to a bowl.
6- Coarsely chop cooked spinach, then squeeze hard to remove as much excess liquid as possible.
7- Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
8- Lightly oil a shallow 9-by-13-inch baking dish and set aside.
9- In a large bowl, combine feta, ricotta, Parmigiano-Reggiano, eggs and a generous amount of pepper.
10- Mix well.
11- Add spinach and onions and mix thoroughly.
12- Add dill, and toss to blend.
13- Spoon into baking dish, pat down evenly and drizzle lightly with olive oil.
14- Bake pie for 30 minutes.
15- Raise heat to 350 degrees and bake until lightly firm in center and golden on top, about 20 more minutes.
16- If top begins to brown too much, cover lightly with foil.
17- To serve, allow pie to cool slightly before cutting into squares.
18- It may also be served cold.

query: How do I cook green beans in the oven?

options.05e0b32f18: Green beans roasted with fresh ginger
options.02f85544ee: Green beans sauteed with bacon and almonds
options.014c0a58db: Green beans cooked with red pepper, onion, and cashews in Teriyaki sauce

05e0b32f18.ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 1 garlic clove, sliced, 14 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, 1 lb fresh green beans, 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger,
05e0b32f18.instructions:
1- Combine first 5 ingredients in a jellyroll pan; add green beans, tossing to coat.
2- Bake at 400, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes or until beans are crisp-tender.
3- Toss in ginger.
4- serves 6.

02f85544ee.ingredients: 5 slices bacon, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 1 (16 ounce) package frozen cut green beans, 1/4 cup butter,
02f85544ee.instructions:
1- Place bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
2- Cook until browned on one side, then turn over to cook on the other side.
3- Add the almonds to the skillet at this time, and cook, stirring until light golden brown.
4- Remove the bacon from the skillet, leaving the bacon drippings.
5- Crumble or chop bacon, and return to the skillet.
6- Melt the butter in with the drippings.
7- Add the green beans; cook and stir until tender, about 8 minutes.

014c0a58db.ingredients: 2 tablespoons teriyaki sauce, 1 tablespoon honey, 2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine, 1 small red pepper, cut into strips, 1 small onion, cut into strips, 1 12 lbs fresh green beans or 1 12 lbs frozen green beans, trimmed and steamed until tender, 12 cup coarsely chopped cashews, toasted,
014c0a58db.instructions:
1- In a small bowl, combine teriyaki sauce and honey; set aside.
2- In a large saute pan, melt butter over medium-high heat.
3- Add pepper and onion, saute for 5 to 6 minutes, or until tender.
4- Add beans, cashews, and teriyaki-honey mixture; toss gently until heated through.

026ce10bc6.ingredients: 6 peaches, pitted and cut into quarters or eighths, 6 plums or Italian prune plums, pitted and quartered or halved, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 cups fresh raspberries, 2 tablespoons orange juice,
026ce10bc6.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F.
2- Place the peaches and plums snugly in a single layer, cut side up, in 2 glass or porcelain oven-proof baking dishes.
3- Sprinkle with the sugar, and then top with the raspberries.
4- Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until tender.
5- Heat the broiler and place the fruit about 5 inches below the heat and broil for 5 to 8 minutes, until the berries release some of their juices.
6- Remove from the broiler and sprinkle with orange juice.
7- Serve warm, at room temperature, or chilled.

312ec98a8d.ingredients: 2 lbs carrots, cut into 3 1/2- by 1/2-inch sticks, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 14 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar,
312ec98a8d.instructions:
1- Toss carrots with oil and salt in a shallow roasting pan (1 inch deep).
2- Roast carrots in middle of oven, stirring occasionally, until golden and tender, 25 to 30 minutes.
3- Drizzle vinegar over carrots and shake pan a few times.
4- Roast carrots until most of vinegar is evaporated, about 2 minutes more.

08c55ef7b1.ingredients: 2 12 lbs fresh green beans, 3 cups water, 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 13 cup chopped onion, 1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 12 teaspoon basil, 1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning, 13 cup olive oil, 14 cup grated parmesan cheese,
08c55ef7b1.instructions:
1- Wash beans, trim ends and remove strings.
2- Combine beans and water in a dutch oven.
3- Bring to a boil.
4- cover, reduce heat and simmer 6 to 8 minutes until crisp-tender.
5- drain.
6- Plunge into ice water to stop the cooking process.
7- Drain beans and set aside.
8- Saute mushrooms and next 7 ingredients in oil in a Dutch oven.
9- Stir in beans and cook until thoroughly heated.
10- sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

query: How do I make cream puffs that don't have too many calories?

options.3a31aa6e93: Cream puffs made with low-fat margarine
options.285708a7f9: Almond cream puffs made with heavy whipping cream and whole milk
options.015655b152: Chocolate cream puffs made with heavy cream
options.a6ee7755a2: Low-calorie cherry and yogurt ice cream containing rum
options.1cbef47545: Banana cream pie made with low-fat graham crackers and nonfat milk

3a31aa6e93.ingredients: 12 cup low-fat margarine or 12 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup boiling bottled water, 1 cup sifted flour, 12 teaspoon salt, 4 eggs, confectioners' sugar,
3a31aa6e93.instructions:
1- If butter is not at room temperature, chop it up first.
2- Add butter to boiling water.
3- When butter is dissolved remove from heat.
4- Add flour and salt.
5- Beat with a spoon until it looks like putty (about 15 minutes).
6- Cool, add eggs unbeaten one at a time.
7- Beat until creamy.
8- Drop 3/4 to 1 tablespoon of cream puff mixture, for each cream puff, onto a greased cookie sheet.
9- Bake for 10 minutes at 375.
10- Reduce oven to 350 and bake for an additional 30 minutes.
11- Allow to cool.
12- To Serve: cut off the top and fill with whipped cream or vanilla pudding, then replace the top.
13- Sift small amount of powdered sugar over each cream puff.

285708a7f9.ingredients: 8- 1/2 ounces, fluid Whole Milk, 7 ounces, fluid Water, 1 cup Unsalted Butter, 2 Tablespoons Sugar, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1- 3/4 cup All-purpose Flour, 6 whole Eggs, 1 pint Heavy Whipping Cream, 4 Tablespoons Confectioners Sugar, 1- 1/2 teaspoon Pure Almond Extract, 1/4 cups Sugar For Sprinkling, 1/4 cups Confectioners' Sugar, For Garnish, 1/4 cups Sliced Almonds, For Garnish,
285708a7f9.instructions:
1- In a large saucepan, combine the milk, water, butter, sugar and salt.
2- Bring to a slow simmer over medium heat and let the butter fully melt.
3- Remove from heat and add the flour.
4- Whisk the flour into the liquid and return to the heat for one minute, stirring continuously.
5- Remove from heat and place the mixture in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a paddle attachment.
6- Turn the mixer on and add the eggs one at a time, allowing each to fully incorporate before adding the next.
7- Once the batter is smooth and no lumps remain, place the batter in a large piping bag fitted with a large round tip.
8- Or if youd like, use a regular bag and snip a hole in the corner of the bag, about 1/2 inch in diameter.
9- Preheat your oven to 375 F. Line two baking sheets with parchment.
10- I flipped over the parchment prior to piping and used a drinking glass to trace the 3-inch rounds with a pencil.
11- I then flipped the parchment over and piped within the traced rounds.
12- Set one of the baking sheets aside.
13- On the first baking sheet, pipe the batter into rounds, about 3 inches in diameter.
14- Sprinkle half of the 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar over the tops of the dough, reserving the second half for the second batch.
15- You should be able to safely get 12 rounds on each pan.
16- Pipe the second pan of pastries only after the first have come out of the oven.
17- Put the first sheet into the heated oven.
18- Bake the rounds for 35-40 minutes, until a very dark golden brown.
19- Remove pan from oven and set it on a rack.
20- Repeat with the second sheet of dough rounds.
21- Allow them to cool completely before filling.
22- To fill: In a medium sized bowl, whip the cream, sugar and extract using a mixer until stiff peaks form.
23- Put the mixture into a pastry bag that has been fitted with a small round tip.
24- Pierce a small hole in the bottom of the pastry (I used a chopstick) and insert the pastry tip.
25- Fill each puff with cream, sprinkle the top with confectioners sugar and almonds and serve.
26- These can be made up to 6 hours in advance.
27- You can also freeze the puffs prior to filling with whipped cream if you need to make them ahead.
28- Fill just prior to serving.
29- Recipe adapted from mimithorisson.com.

015655b152.ingredients: 1 cup water, 5 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into small pieces, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon sugar, 1 cup all-purpose flour, sifted, 5 eggs, 13 ounces semisweet chocolate, finely chopped, 2 cups heavy cream, 14 cup sugar,
015655b152.instructions:
1- Preheat an oven to 400 degrees.
2- Butter and flour a large baking sheet.
3- FOR THE PASTRY PUFFS:.
4- In a saucepan, combine the water, butter, salt and the 1/2 teaspoon sugar and bring to a boil.
5- As soon as it boils, remove the pan from the heat and add the flour all at once.
6- Using a rubber spatula or a wooden spoon, briskly beat in the flour.
7- Place the saucepan over high heat and continue beating briskly for 2 minutes.
8- Remove from the heat again and scrape the contents of the pan into a large bowl.
9- Add 4 of the eggs, one at a time, beating vigorously after each addition until smooth.
10- Place the dough in a pastry (piping) bag with a 1/2-inch plain tip.
11- Pipe mounds about 2 inches in diameter and 3 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheet.
12- You should have 16-20 mounds in all.
13- In a small bowl, beat the remaining egg until well blended.
14- Using a pastry brush, lightly brush each mound with the egg.
15- Bake until the puffs are golden brown, about 30 minutes.
16- Transfer the puffs to a rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes.
17- When the puffs are cool, slice off the top one-third of each puff.
18- Set the bottoms and tops aside.
19- FOR THE CHOCOLATE CREAM:.
20- Place the chocolate in the top pan of a double boiler or in a heatproof bowl over (not touching) barely simmering water in a pan.
21- Stir just until the chocolate melts.
22- then remove from the heat.
23- Pour the cream into a bowl.
24- Using an electric mixer set on high speed, beat until soft peaks form.
25- Add the 1/4 cup sugar and beat until stiff peaks form, about 20 seconds.
26- Pour all of the melted chocolate into the whipped cream as quickly as possible, and continue to mix on high speed until evenly combined, about 1 minute.
27- Place the chocolate cream in a clean pastry (piping) bag fitted with a 1/2-inch plain tip.
28- Pipe the cream into the bottoms of the cooled puffs so a little bit of the cream is exposed between the crusts.
29- Replace the tops on the filled bottoms and serve immediately.

a6ee7755a2.ingredients: 10 Cherries, 200 ml Yoghurt, 2 tbsp Honey, 1 tbsp Rum or brandy (optional),
a6ee7755a2.instructions:
1- Wash the cherries and remove the seeds.
2- Put all the ingredients in a mixer and blend.
3- Put the mixture in a thick plastic bag, thinly spreading out the contents inside.
4- Place the bag in the freezer.
5- Give the bag a rub every 30 to 60 minutes to even out the texture of the ice cream.
6- It'll be ready after around 2 hours.
7- It's nice as a sherbet, or even when it's slightly melted.
8- If you forget to rub it while it's freezing, you can heat it in a 600W microwave for 30-40 seconds and then crush with a rolling pin.
9- [Another version] Remove the seeds from the cherries and freeze them.
10- Throw the frozen cherries and all the other ingredients into a blender, and you'll end up with a smoothie.
11- Rum Raisin Ice Cream
12- Banana Yogurt Ice Cream
13- I recommend eating it with chilled cake.
14- Here's an easy oil-free souffle made with egg whites and yoghurt.
15- Easy crunchy sesame cookiesFluffy chocolate banana

1cbef47545.ingredients: 12 low-fat graham crackers, preferably containing no trans fat (6 full sheets), 2 tablespoons Smart Balance butter spread or 2 tablespoons other regular tub margarine, 1 tablespoon water, 3 tablespoons cold water, 1 12 teaspoons unflavored gelatin, 13 cup sugar, 14 teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 egg yolk, beaten, 1 12 cups nonfat milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 teaspoons banana rum or 2 teaspoons other rum, 1 tablespoon dark rum, 3 bananas, sliced,
1cbef47545.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2- Spray a 9-inch pie tin with Pam.
3- In a food processor, pulse graham crackers until finely ground.
4- Add tub margarine and 1 tablespoon of water, and process until becomes crumbly and clumps form.
5- Press crumb mixture into bottom and partially up sides of pie tin.
6- Bake 10 minutes.
7- Let cool.
8- To make the filling, place 3 tablespoons of cold water in a small ramekin.
9- Slowly sprinkle gelatin evenly over water, being careful not to let it clump.
10- Let bloom (it is done when it soaks up all the water - this will happen pretty quickly).
11- In a medium saucepan, whisk together sugar, salt and flour.
12- In a bowl, beat the egg yolk and milk together.
13- Add the egg mixture to the pan of dry ingredients and whisk to dissolve.
14- Cook over medium high heat, stirring constantly, 5 minutes.
15- It should come to a boil and thicken.
16- Turn off heat and stir in gelatin until dissolves.
17- Take off heat and add the vanilla and rums.
18- Set aside to cool for a few minutes.
19- Arrange a third of the bananas (one banana) on the bottom of the graham cracker crust.
20- Pour half the pudding over it.
21- Continue to layer another third of the bananas, followed by the other half of the pudding.
22- Top with remaining third of bananas.
23- Store in the refrigerator until pudding has set, approximately 3 hours.

540f89f20b.ingredients: 48 each Prepared cream puffs, 1 bag JELL-O Strawberry Whip N Chill Mousse, 1 qt. cold water, 1-1/4 gal. strawberries, divided, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1 cup sugar,
540f89f20b.instructions:
1- Cut tops from cream puffs; set aside.
2- Prepare mousse mix with cold water as directed on package; set aside.
3- Mash 24 of the berries (or 6 of the berries for trial recipe) with fork.
4- Stir in vanilla.
5- Fold into mousse.
6- Chop half of the remaining strawberries; fold into mousse.
7- Place remaining strawberries in food processor or blender container.
8- Add sugar; cover.
9- Process until pureed; set aside.
10- Spoon about 1/3 cup of the mousse mixture into each cream puff; cover with top of cream puff.
11- Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
12- Drizzle with 1 Tbsp.
13- of the strawberry sauce.

query: What's a treat I can make for myself with milk during this heat wave?

options.8d4c0d370f: Peanut ice cream made from scratch using milk
options.3f21e63e28: Sweet heat chili with ground meat, vegetables, beans, and jalapeno peppers
options.47b387223f: Abalone soup made with abalone, water, salt, bacon, onion, potatoes, parsley, milk, butter, crackers
options.39d79732f3: Cold drink made with mint, ice cubes, vodka, Midori melon liqueur, lime, and club soda for the summer heat
options.5ebd161f48: Treats for dogs that contain milk

8d4c0d370f.ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can evaporated milk, 4 tablespoons lemon juice, 12 cup sugar, 1 cup peanut butter, 1 (14 ounce) can condensed milk, 14 cup milk,
8d4c0d370f.instructions:
1- In 2-quart saucepan, immerse the unopened can of evaporated milk in boiling water to cover, and continue boiling for 20 minutes.
2- Chill the can thoroughly for several hours, along with a 2-quart metal bowl and egg beater.
3- Using the chilled egg beater, whip the cold evaporated milk in the cold bowl.
4- Add lemon juice and sugar.
5- In a 3-quart bowl, combine peanut butter, condensed milk, and milk.
6- Fold the whipped mixture carefully into the peanut butter mixture until smooth.
7- Pour into freezer trays or into a 6 cup mold and freeze.

3f21e63e28.ingredients: 1 pound Ground Meat, 4 cans (14.5 Oz. Can) Stewed Tomatoes, 1 whole Medium Onion, Diced, 1 whole Green Pepper, Chopped, 3 stalks Celery, Chopped, 3 cloves Garlic, Minced, 4 cups Beef Stock (or Other), 1 can (15 Oz. Can) Kidney Beans, Rinsed And Drained, 1 can (15 Oz. Can) Black Beans, Rinsed And Drained, 1/2 cups Roasted Red Peppers, Chopped, 1 whole Jalapeno Pepper, Finely Chopped (seeded To Reduce Heat), 3 whole Bay Leaves, 1 teaspoon Dry Mustard, 1 Tablespoon Chili Powder, 1 teaspoon Paprika, 1/2 teaspoons Black Pepper, 1/2 teaspoons Garlic Powder, 1/2 teaspoons Onion Powder, 1/4 cups Brown Sugar, 2 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar, 1 pinch Salt To Taste, Optional For Garnish: Sour Cream,
3f21e63e28.instructions:
1- Heat a medium skillet over medium low heat and brown the ground meat.
2- Once its browned, drain off the grease and rinse off excess fat.
3- Pour the cans of stewed tomatoes into a food processor and pulse a few times to desired consistency.
4- Combine all ingredients (except the sour cream garnish) into a 6 or 7-quart slow cooker and cook on low 68 hours or on high for 4 hours.
5- Serve with a dollop of sour cream.
6- Recipe adapted from melskitchencafe.com.

47b387223f.ingredients: 1 lb abalone, trimmed, 4 cups water, 1 teaspoon salt, 14 lb bacon, 1 large onion, peeled and chopped, 4 potatoes, peeled and cubed, 1 tablespoon parsley, chopped, 2 cups milk, 2 tablespoons butter, 14 cup cracker, finely crushed,
47b387223f.instructions:
1- Remove abalone from shell and pound with a mallet until soft (abalone from the market is already tenderized).
2- Add water and salt; simmer about 1 hour or until tender.
3- Drain and force through food chopper and return to cooking water.
4- Dice bacon and fry until crisp.
5- Remove bacon and fry onions until translucent in bacon fat.
6- Add bacon, onions, potatoes and parsley to the ground abalone and cook until potatoes are tender (about 20 minutes), adding more water as needed.
7- When ready to serve, add milk and heat almost to boiling; add cracker crumbs and butter and serve at once.

39d79732f3.ingredients: 1 mint sprig, 8 ice cubes, 2 ounces vodka, 12 ounce Midori melon liqueur, 1 lime wedge, 2 -3 ounces club soda,
39d79732f3.instructions:
1- Fill a tall 12 oz glass with ice cubes, add vodka and Midori.
2- Squeeze lime wedge over drink and drop into glass.
3- Then add club soda to fill glass and stur.
4- Hang the cucumber spear over edge of glass.
5- Or you can simply garnish with a mint sprig if preferred.
6- Add a straw and you are good to go.

5ebd161f48.ingredients: 1 cup (225 ml) rolled oats, 1/2 cup (125 ml) butter, 3/4 cup (175 ml) cornmeal, 1 tbsp (15 ml) sugar, 1 cup (225 ml) boiling water, 1/2 cup (125 ml) milk, 1 2 tsp (10 ml). beef boullion, 4 oz (112 grm). shredded cheddar cheese, 2 cups (475 ml) to 3 cups (700 ml) flour, 1 egg, beaten,
5ebd161f48.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 325 degrees (175 C.), grease cookie sheets.
2- In large bowl, mix oats, butter, and boiling water.
3- Let stand 10 minutes.
4- Stir in cornmeal, sugar, bouillion, milk, cheese, and egg; mix well.
5- Slowly add flour, one cup at a time; mix well to form a stiff dough.
6- On floured surface, knead in remaining flour until smooth and no longer sticky.
7- Roll or pat dough to 1/2-inch thickness.
8- Cut with cookie cutter.
9- Place 1-inch apart on cookie sheets.
10- Bake 35 to 45 minutes.
11- Cool and store covered.

5bf87faea5.ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk (I prefer Eagle Brand Condensed Milk), 1 12 cups whiskey, 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon instant coffee, dissolved in, 1 tablespoon hot water, 12 pint Riches frozen milk,
5bf87faea5.instructions:
1- Put all ingredients in blender until smooth.
2- Put in a bottle; a liter is best because is almost fills it.
3- Place in a refrigerator for 24 hours to rest.
4- Keep refrigerated.
5- Enjoy.

query: Can I have a simple cheese pizza?

options.74dd3a4d6e: Pizza made with three types of cheese, 2 types of sausage, and pepperoni

options.00b10e1c92: Garlic cheese bread with parmesan and mozzarella cheese

0d534fbf5e.ingredients: 2 recipes Quick Pizza Sauce (click here for recipe), 1 recipe Fast and Fabulous Pizza Dough (click here for recipe), 8 oz. fresh mozzarella, drained and shredded,
0d534fbf5e.instructions:
1- Prepare Fast and Fabulous Pizza Dough and Quick Pizza Sauce.
2- Preheat oven to 425F.
3- Spread Quick Pizza Sauce over Fast and Fabulous Pizza Dough.
4- Sprinkle with cheese.
5- Bake 20 to 25 minutes, or until crust is browned and cheese has melted.

5501fbfc6e.ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) thin pre-baked prepared pizza crust, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 34 teaspoon italian seasoning, 14 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 2 cups shredded lettuce, 1 cup colby-monterey jack cheese, finely shredded, 34 cup tomatoes, chopped fresh, 7 slices bacon, cooked until crisp,crumbled, sliced ripe olives, optional,
5501fbfc6e.instructions:
1- Pre-heat oven to 400F degrees.
2- Place pizza shell on baking sheet.
3- Heat in oven 5 minutes or until slightly crisp.
4- Remove from oven and let cool slightly.
5- In a small bowl combine cream cheese, Italian seasoning and pepper.
6- Spread on pizza shell to within 1/2 inch of the edge.
7- Sprinkle with lettuce, cheese, tomato and bacon.
8- Top with sliced black olives if desired.
9- Cut pizza into 12 wedges and serve.

74dd3a4d6e.ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 14-12 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 2 lbs hot Italian sausage, cut in 1 inche pieces, 2 lbs sweet Italian sausage links, cut in 1 inch pieces, 6 cups jarred pizza sauce (or your favorite recipe), 5 large eggs, 3 cups ricotta cheese, 34 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, 13 cup chopped fresh basil leaf, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 6 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 34 lb pepperoni, thinly sliced, 2 lbs prepared pizza crust,
74dd3a4d6e.instructions:
1- Combine the oil and red pepper flakes in a small bowl; set aside.
2- In a large, heavy skillet, cook both sausages in batches over medium heat, stirring often, until browned--about 10-15 minutes.
3- Using a slotted spoon, transfer sausage to a large bowl; stir in the pizza sauce and set aside.
4- In a large bowl, whisk 4 of the eggs until frothy; stir in the ricotta and Parmesan cheeses, basil, oregano, and pepper.
5- Spoon 1/2 the sausage mixture into a shallow 6-quart casserole dish; spoon small dollops of the ricotta mixture over the sauce.
6- Sprinkle with 1/2 the mozzarella; arrange the pepperoni over the cheese.
7- Repeat with remaining sauce, ricotta mixture, and mozzarella.
8- Cover dish with foil and refrigerate for 1-2 hours (the flavors will blend well).
9- Preheat oven to 375*F.
10- On a lightly floured surface, roll out 3/4 of the dough about 1/4" thick; trim to the shape of the baking dish, but leave the dough 1" larger.
11- Place dough over the filling, turn edges under, and crimp.
12- Whisk the remaining egg with 1 tablespoons.
13- water; brush some over the dough.
14- Roll out remaining dough and cut out shapes with a small cookie cutter; arrange shapes over crust and brush with remaining egg mixture.
15- Brush the entire crust with the reserved olive oil-pepper flake mixture.
16- Bake the pie, uncovered, for 35-45 minutes, or until the top is golden and the filling is heated through.
17- Cool on a wire rack for 20 minutes before cutting and serving.

01c0d100a5.ingredients: 18 Pre-baked 6-inch pizza crusts, 4 cups pizza sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, sliced pepperoni,
01c0d100a5.instructions:
1- Spread 1/4 cup pizza sauce on each crust.
2- Top each pizza with 1/2 cup cheese and 3/4 oz pepperoni.
3- Bake at 450F for 10 to 12 minutes or until cheese is melted and crust is crisp.

00b10e1c92.ingredients: 6 cups parmesan, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, grated grated, 1 cup oregano dried, 1 cup parsley flakes dried, 3 cups butter or margarine, soft, 12 cloves garlic mince, 3 cups vegetable oil, 18 loaf french bread, 18 pounds mozzarella cheese shredded,
00b10e1c92.instructions:
1- Combine parmesan, oregano and parsely; mix well and set aside.
2- In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and garlic.
3- Gradually beat in oil until smooth.
4- Spread over 1 side of bread.
5- Place with buttered side up in greased large shallow baking pans.
6- Top each slice with 1/4 cup mozzarella.
7- Sprinkle with parmesan mixture.
8- Bake at 400~ for 10 to 12 minutes or until the cheese is melted and top is lightly browned.

1190480c8f.ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, 8 ounces cream cheese, 12 cup mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon dill weed, garlic salt, 1 (2 1/4 ounce) cansliced black olives, 12 cup shredded carrot, 12 cup chopped broccoli, 12 cup chopped green onion,
1190480c8f.instructions:
1- Roll out flat on cookie sheet and bake as directed.
2- Spread cream cheese mixture on cooled dough.
3- Top with your favorite veggies: (chopped tomatoes, celery, carrots, radishes, green peppers, cucumbers, onions).

26845ab513.ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package reduced-fat mozzarella string cheese, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 8 tablespoons panko (Japanese) bread crumbs, 1/2 cup prepared marinara sauce, warmed (optional),
26845ab513.instructions:
1- Position rack in upper third of oven and preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2- Line a baking sheet with foil and spray lightly with cooking spray.
3- Remove cheese from packaging and set aside.
4- In a small bowl, whisk egg until foamy.
5- In small non-stick skillet, mix Italian seasoning with bread crumbs and place over medium heat.
6- Cook and stir bread crumbs until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
7- Dip one piece of string cheese in egg until coated and then into toasted bread crumbs, coating completely.
8- Redip the string cheese in egg and again into the bread crumbs, if desired.
9- Place on baking sheet.
10- Repeat with remaining string cheese and place on baking sheet 1 1/2 inches apart.
11- Spray string cheese lightly with cooking spray.
12- Bake 5-6 minutes or until heated through.
13- (Cheese may melt slightly and loose shape.
14- Simply press it back into place.)

02635ac5c3.ingredients: 2 (19 ounce) cans ready-to-serve tomato basil soup, 12 cup pepperoni, chopped, 1 12 cups pizza cheese, blend shredded (6 oz.), 2 teaspoons fresh basil or 2 teaspoons parsley, chopped, if desired,
02635ac5c3.instructions:
1- In 2-quart saucepan, combine soup, pepperoni and 1 cup of the cheese; mix well.
2- Cook over medium heat for 4 to 6 minutes or until thoroughly heated and cheese softens, stirring occasionally.
3- (Cheese will not melt completely.
4- ).
5- Top individual servings with remaining cheese and basil.

4ad12bd622.ingredients: 1 (8 inch) round angel food cake, 3 (1 g) packagesknox unflavored gelatin, 12 cup sugar, 12 cup water, 3 14 cups apple juice, Pam cooking spray, fresh fruit or canned fruit,
4ad12bd622.instructions:
1- In medium saucepan add sugar and 1/2 cup.
2- water, add the dry gelatin.
3- Heat on low heat.
4- Stir until gelatin and sugar are dissolved.
5- I use a wire whisk.
6- Add the apple juice and mix.
7- Place in the refrigerator until the gelatin starts to soft set.
8- It must be spoonable.
9- This will set quickly so check frequently.
10- Find a deep flat bottomed serving bowl that is round, about an inch and a half larger in diameter than the angel food cake.
11- Spray the bowl with Pam.
12- Place the angel food cake in the bowl, bottom side up.
13- Spoon soft set gelatin around the sides of the bowl,pushing the gelatin down with the edge of the spoon.
14- Do this until all sides of the bowl are filled to the top with the gelatin.
15- Fill the center hole of the cake.
16- Place the gelatin filled cake bowl in the refrigerator.
17- Chill at least 2 hours or you can leave overnight.
18- To unmold: Dip the bowl in some hot water for a few seconds.
19- I mean only 2 to 3 seconds.
20- You do not want to melt the gelatin.
21- Find a platter that has raised edges.
22- Put platter over the bowl.
23- Turn quickly upside down to unmold.
24- Cake with the gelatin wrap should plop right out.
25- Garnish with drained mandarin oranges, or.
26- fruit of your choice.
27- Cooling time is listed as cooking time.
28- Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or whipped cream.
29- I have used cran-raspberry juice with raspberries; cran-grape juice with sliced grapes; strawberry Jello with sliced strawberries; orange pineapple juice with crushed pineapple; lime or lemon Jello with kiwi fruit; lemonade works well with Knox also; peach Jello with sliced peaches.
30- I used to use a 7 1/2-quart Tupperware bowl with lid and turn it upside down a few times but this works also and you don't have to purchase the packaged flavored gelatin which is more expensive than using fruit juices and Knox.
31- Use 2 cups of water if you use the large Jello packages which call for 4 cups of water.
32- For 4th of July celebration, Independence Day you can use blueberry for the Bottom and strawberry or raspberry for the top, so you have two colors on the side of the cake and white cake inside and two colors of gelatin in the middle.
33- The possibilities are endless and I have fun thinking of combinations.
34- Cooling time is cooking time (passive).

3f2895a92a.ingredients: 1 lb bay scallop (smaller than sea scallops), 8 large egg roll wraps, oil (enough for frying), lime juice, 12 pieces bacon, 14 cup mayonnaise, 18 teaspoon chili oil,
3f2895a92a.instructions:
1- Place scallops in bowl.Squeeze limes or lime juice over the scallops until scallops are completely covered in lime juice.
2- Refrigerate scallops in lime juice at least 6 hours.
3- If you do this in the morning, your appetizers will be ready for dinner and only takes seconds to prepare.
4- Take egg roll wrappers, Cut 4 squares out of each sheet.
5- Cut in half and then in half again to have uniform sized squares.
6- Heat oil in a pan, fry the squares, flipping quickly until light golden brown.
7- (Don't try to put all squares in at once, they fry super quickly and you may burn some trying to cook all of them at once.
8- this only takes a few seconds each.
9- Set squares on a paper towel to drain off excess oil.
10- Place bacon on several paper towels and cover with several more paper towels.
11- Put in the microwave for approximately 4 minutes.
12- Check on them because Microwaves vary.
13- When ready cut bacon so that each piece of bacon fits on the fried squares.
14- I actually use scissors and cut the bacon, you could break the bacon as well.
15- In a small bowl, mix mayonaise and a few drops of chili oil.
16- (add more chili oil if you like things really hot!
17- ).
18- You are now ready to assemble your appetizer.Take a fried square then place bacon on top, then drain the lime juice from the scallops,place one or two scallops on top of the bacon.
19- Now add a dollop of mayonaise mixture.

21bae58f04.ingredients: 1 (24 ounce) can tuna, 5 tablespoons mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons parmesan cheese, 1 cup swiss cheese, 12 cup cheddar cheese, 14 cup ranch dressing,
21bae58f04.instructions:
1- mix ingredients well.
2- serve on lettuce leaves or in a sandwich.

18d3f7d25a.ingredients: 4 medium apples, 4 sticks, 1/4 cup PLANTERS Walnut Pieces,
18d3f7d25a.instructions:
1- Serve each person 1 apple, 1 cheese stick and 1 Tbsp.

query: I have a lot of apples, what can I bake with them?

options.05a6a7e8ef: Apple pie made with apples, cinnamon, sugar, butter, and premade shell and crust
options.24dc42cd35: Baked peach dessert with vanilla ice cream
options.5f14dad64d: Caramel apple jam made with granny smith and braeburn apples
options.9b47867a69: No-Bake apple crumble dessert containing walnuts, dates, and raisins
options.a6821fe5b2: Apple Pie with Raisin and Pecan

05a6a7e8ef.ingredients: 12 medium mcIntosh apples, 1 unbaked pie shell, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tbsp cinnamon, 1 bunch butter, 1 unbaked top crust,
05a6a7e8ef.instructions:
1- Peel and thickly slice the apples.
2- Place in pie shell.
3- Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon, mix with apples.
4- Top with parties of butter.
5- Cover with top crust and slit vents in top.
6- Bake at 450F for 15 minutes.
7- Turn heat to 350 then bake for 45 minutes.

24dc42cd35.ingredients: 8 teaspoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons butter, cut into 8 pieces, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste, 4 ripe peaches, halved and pitted, 4 scoops vanilla ice cream,
24dc42cd35.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
2- Arrange brown sugar, 1 teaspoon per peach, in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
3- Top each brown sugar mound with a piece of butter and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
4- Place a peach half, cut-side down, on top of brown sugar-butter.
5- Bake in the preheated oven until peaches are soft, 15 to 20 minutes.
6- Plate 2 warm peaches per serving and top with 1 scoop vanilla ice cream.

5f14dad64d.ingredients: 6 granny smith apples, 6 braeburn apples (or other sweet apple), 6 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 tablespoon fruit fresh (a citric acid powder that prevents fruit from browning), 3 cups sugar, 2 cups apple juice (not cider), 1 vanilla bean, split & scraped (substitute 1 grated tonka bean, if possible), 2 tablespoons honey,
5f14dad64d.instructions:
1- Peel, core and cut the apples into 1 chunks.
2- Toss immediately with the lemon juice and Fruit Fresh.
3- In a large, heavy preserving pan combine 2 1/2 cups of the sugar with 1/2 cup of apple juice.
4- Cook over medium high heat until the sugar dissolves, boils and turns light brown, a very early stage caramel.
5- This can take 10-15 minutes or longer, depending on how high the heat is.
6- Heat the remaining juice to a simmer and add to the pot with the apples, the vanilla bean and 2 T. of honey.
7- When the apples and juice come to a simmer, pour in the early stage caramelized sugar.
8- Cook over medium heat, stirring , for 20 minutes.
9- The sweet apples will break down while the Granny Smith will show her mettle and stay pretty chunky, though the chunks will be nice and soft.
10- Meanwhile, take the remaining 1/2 cup of sugar and a T. of water.
11- Put in a pan and cook over high heat, stirring, constantly, until you have a nice dark brown caramel.
12- Go as far as you dare, being careful to stop short of burning the sugar.
13- Pour the hot dark brown caramel into the apple jam mixture careful, it will erupt though after a few quick stirs it will meld with the whole.
14- Pour into prepared 1/2 pint jars and process in a boiling water bath for 5 minutes (If your altitude is above 1000 ft = 10 minutes, if over 6000 ft = 15 minutes).

749ee39fcc.ingredients: 2 c. Sifted all-purpose flour, 1 c. Butter (or possibly margarine), 1 tsp Baking pwdr, 1 tsp Baking soda, 1 1/4 c. Sugar, 3 x Large eggs, separated, 1 ct (8-ounce) lowfat sour cream, 1 Tbsp. Grated orange rind, 1/2 c. Minced walnuts or possibly pecans, 1/4 c. Orange juice, 1 tsp Orange-flavored essence (or possibly orange liqueur), 2 Tbsp. Minced nuts,
749ee39fcc.instructions:
1- Sift flour, baking pwdr and baking soda onto wax paper or possibly a large bowl.
2- Preheat oven to 350 F. Beat egg whites in a small bowl with an electric mixer till stiff but not dry.
3- Set aside.
4- Beat butter, 1 c. of the sugar and egg yolks in a large bowl till light and fluffy.
5- Add in flour mix alternately with lowfat sour cream, starting and ending with flour.
6- Stir in orange rind and c. minced walnuts (or possibly pecans).
7- Mix in the beaten egg whites.
8- Spoon batter into a greased 9-inch tube pan.
9- Bake in preheated oven (350 F) for 50 min or possibly till a wooden pick inserted in top comes out clean.
10- Combine orange juice and remaining 1/4 c. sugar in a small saucepan.
11- Heat, stirring constantly, over low heat just till sugar is dissolved.
12- Remove from heat and stir in the orange essence.
13- Spoon mix over warm cake.
14- Sprinkle with 2 table-spoons nuts.
15- Cold cake in pan on wire rack for 15 min; loosen around the edge of the pan with a knife and turn out onto wire rack.
16- Cold completely.
17- Notes: Use a rectangular 9"x13" pan instead of a tube pan, if you wish.
18- Reduce baking time by 10 min and check for doneness.
19- If you do not want a very "soggy" cake, use a little less orange juice than called for.

9b47867a69.ingredients: 8 apples, peeled and chopped, 1 cup raisins, soaked and drained, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 14 teaspoon nutmeg, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 cups walnuts, 1 cup pitted dates, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 18 teaspoon salt,
9b47867a69.instructions:
1- To make filling, in a food processor, place 2 apples with raisins, cinnamon and nutmeg, process until smooth.
2- In a bowl place remaining chopped apples and toss with lemon juice.
3- Pour pureed filling mixture over top, mix well.
4- Spoon apple mixture into a med sized lasagna pan and set aside.
5- For crumble, in a food processor, pulse walnuts, dates, cinnamon and salt until coarsely ground.
6- Do not over mix.
7- Crumble the mixture over the apples with your hands and press lightly.
8- Serve immediately or let marinate for a few hours for extra flavor.

a6821fe5b2.ingredients: 2 each pie shell (9 inch), 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 3/4 cup sugar, 6 each apples peeled, sliced, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup honey, 1/2 cup raisins, seedless, 1/2 cup pecans chopped,
a6821fe5b2.instructions:
1- Mix cinnamon-sugar mixture with sliced apples.
2- Mix apples with a combination of brown sugar and honey.
3- Add raisins and pecans.
4- Pile into pastry-lined pie pan, dot with butter and cover with slitted top crust.
5- Bake 425 degrees Ffor about 50 minutes.

query: My family wants a recipe for peach cobbler that's healthier

options.4d6f529ff8: Peach cobbler made with cream cheese, pie filling, sugar, and crescent rolls

019f60c787.ingredients: 7 cups peaches, sliced, peeled, 13 cup brown sugar, packed, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 34 cup all-purpose flour, 12 cup whole wheat flour, 3 tablespoons brown sugar, packed, 1 12 teaspoons baking powder, 14 cup butter, cubed, 12 cup milk,
019f60c787.instructions:
1- BISCUITS: In bowl, whisk together all-purpose and whole wheat flours, sugar, baking powder and salt.
2- Using pastry blender or 2 knives, cut in butter until in coarse crumbs.
3- Using fork, stir in milk to make ragged dough.

6- Transfer to 8-inch square glass baking dish.
7- Bake in 350F oven for 20 minutes.
8- Drop dough by 9 heaping 1 tablespoons onto hot fruit mixture.
9- Bake until biscuits are golden and no longer wet underneath, about 50 minutes.

00050108a0.ingredients: 1- 1/2 cup All-purpose Flour, 1/4 cups Sugar, 1/2 Tablespoons Baking Powder, 1/4 cups Unsalted Butter, Cubed, Cold, 1 whole Egg, Beaten, 1/2 cups Ricotta Cheese, 1 teaspoon Vanilla, 2 teaspoons Cinnamon, 2 whole Peaches, Cored, Diced, 1 Tablespoon Turbinado Sugar, 1 cup Confectioners Sugar, 13 cups Milk, 1/2 teaspoons Cinnamon,
00050108a0.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 400 F. In a food processor, pulse flour, sugar and baking powder until well combined.
2- Next, add butter and pulse until the mixture resembles small peas.
3- In a separate bowl, mix egg, ricotta, vanilla and cinnamon.
4- Next, add the egg mixture into the food processor and pulse just until wet and dry ingredients come together.
5- Roll out dough on a floured surface.
6- Cut into 6 pieces and place on a parchment paper lined baking sheet.
7- Top each piece with bite sized peach pieces and sprinkle with pinch of turbinado sugar on each scone.
8- Bake 13-15 minutes.
9- For the glaze, mix confectioners sugar, milk, and cinnamon in a small bowl until well combined.
10- Top scones with cinnamon glaze.

4d6f529ff8.ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans crescent rolls, 16 ounces cream cheese, 1 cup sugar, 2 (21 ounce) cans pie filling (your choice),
4d6f529ff8.instructions:
1- Spray a 9 x13 pan with pam.
2- Lay one can of crescent rolls on bottom of pan and mash to seal edges.
3- Mix softened cream cheese with sugar and spread on top of rolls.
4- Pour two cans of pie filling on top of that.
5- Separate second can of crescent rolls into triangles and place on top.
6- bake in 350 oven until top rolls are brown.

1201cd8dfd.ingredients: 12 cup sugar, 12 cup cornstarch, 4 cups fresh raspberries or 4 cups frozen raspberries, 4 cups fresh blueberries or 4 cups frozen blueberries, 4 cups fresh blackberries or 4 cups frozen blackberries, 14 cup lemon juice, 1 12 cups all-purpose flour, 12 cup packed brown sugar, 1 12 teaspoons baking powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 12 cup butter or 12 cup margarine, 13 cup hot water, whipped cream, for topping, orange rind, for topping (optional),
1201cd8dfd.instructions:
1- Heat oven to 400F Grease 4-quart casserole.
2- Mix sugar and cornstarch in 4-quart Dutch oven.
3- Add berries and lemon juice; toss until evenly coated.
4- Heat to boiling.
5- Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
6- Spoon into casserole dish.
7- Mix flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg in large bowl.
8- Cut in the butter until mixture looks like coarse crumbs.
9- Stir in hot water until soft dough forms.
10- Spoon dough onto berry mixture.
11- Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until top is golden brown.
12- Serve warm with whipped cream.
13- Garnish with orange peel.

47865479a4.ingredients: 3 cups Mixed Berries Or Any Fruit, Fresh Or Frozen, 1/4 cups Plus 1 Tablespoon Whole Wheat Flour, 1/2 cups Honey, Divided, 1/2 cups Rolled Oats, 1/4 cups Chopped Walnuts, 1 teaspoon Cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoons Ginger, 1/4 teaspoons Nutmeg, 1 teaspoon Canola Oil,
47865479a4.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2- Spray an 8 x 8 baking pan with cooking spray and set aside.
3- In a large bowl, toss fruit and 1 tablespoon flour together.
4- Add 1/4 cup honey (reserve the remaining 1/4 cup of honey for topping) and use your fingers to thoroughly combine ingredients.
5- If using frozen berries, the honey may cause them to bunch together, so youll have to pick them apart by hand.
6- Pour fruit mixture into the baking pan.
7- In a medium bowl, mix remaining flour, oats, walnuts, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg until combined.
8- Add remaining honey and canola oil.
9- Use your fingers to thoroughly combine the ingredients.
10- Sprinkle the flour and oat mixture evenly over the fruit.
11- Bake for 40 to 45 minutes until fruit is bubbly and the topping is browned and crisp.
12- Let cool for 20 minutes.
13- Serve plain or top each serving with vanilla yogurt.

071541fa98.ingredients: 1 (21-ounce) can peach pie filling*, 1 (15-ounce) can peach slices in light syrup, well-drained, 1 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup quick-cooking oats, 1/2 cup Land O Lakes Butter, softened, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup Land O Lakes Butter, softened, 2 Land O Lakes Eggs, slightly beaten, 1 1/4 cups sour cream, 1 tablespoon vanilla, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup powdered sugar, 1 to 2 tablespoons milk,
071541fa98.instructions:
1- Heat oven to 350F.
2- Combine all filling ingredients in bowl; set aside.
3- Combine all topping ingredients in another bowl until mixture resembles coarse crumbs; set aside.
4- Combine sugar and 1 cup butter in another bowl.
5- Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy.
6- Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla.
7- Continue beating, scraping bowl often, until well mixed.
8- Add all remaining coffee cake ingredients.
9- Continue beating, scraping bowl often, until smooth.
10- Spread half of batter into greased 13x9-inch baking pan.
11- Spread peach filling over batter.
12- Drop spoonfuls of remaining batter over filling (do not spread).
13- Sprinkle with topping.
14- Bake 60-70 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
15- Cool 15 minutes.
16- Stir together powdered sugar and enough milk in bowl for desired glazing consistency.
17- Drizzle over cooled coffee cake.
18- *Substitute 1 (21-ounce) can your favorite flavor pie filling.

9dc0cc4b9f.instructions:

query: I would like to make a pear cake for dessert but I'm a beginner at baking

6d2bfd8462.ingredients: 2 Asian pears (For decoration and for the batter), 30 grams Soft light brown sugar, 50 ml White wine, 1/2 lemon, juiced, 50 grams Butter (or vegetable oil), 50 grams Soft light brown sugar, 1 Egg, 1/2 tsp Baking powder, 50 grams White flour,
6d2bfd8462.instructions:
1- Cut one of the pears into 16 slices and the other one into small pieces.
2- Add the brown sugar, white wine, and lemon juice.
3- Simmer on low heat for 10 minutes.
4- When the pears have yellowed and become translucent, turn off the heat.
5- Sprinkle on cinnamon as desired.
6- Line the pan with baking paper or oil and arrange the pear slices on the bottom.
7- This time, my pear was small, so I filled in the centre with the scraps from the chopped pear.
8- Make the cake batter.
9- One at a time, mix together the butter, brown sugar, egg, dry ingredients, and the chopped pear.
10- Pour the batter on top of the pear already in the pan.
11- Bake at 180C for 40 minutes.
12- Flip it over and enjoy!
13- Easy!
14- If you want it glossier, brush something on top such as the juice from the pear compote.
15- If you leave no gaps in the pear slices by using some of the pear for the batter, it will give it a nice finish.

05f06b495f.ingredients: 2 cups cake flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 21 ounces cherry pie filling or apricot pie filling, 3/4 cup vegetable oil, 3 large eggs lightly beaten, 1 x powdered sugar optional,
05f06b495f.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350F.
2- Combine all ingredients except powdered sugar.
3- Stir well.
4- Pour batter into ungreased 13 x 9 inch pan.
5- Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until a pick inserted in center comes out clean.
6- Remove from oven and let cool completely in pan.
7- Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.

154998f9a7.ingredients: 12 cup gll-purpose flour, 14 cup granulated sugar, 14 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, sifted, 3 tablespoons cold butter, 1 egg white, 1 12 ounces unsweetened chocolate, coarsely chopped, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 egg, separated, 3 tablespoons granulated sugar, 1 ripe pear,
154998f9a7.instructions:
1- Chocolate Pastry: In bowl or food processor, combine flour, sugar and cocoa; cut in or process butter until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
2- Add egg white; stir or process until moistened.
3- Lightly press pastry into ball (do not overwork).
4- Working with small pieces, press dough onto bottom and sides of 6-inch (15 cm) flan pan with removable bottom.Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 5 days.
5- Filling: In small bowl over simmering (not boiling) water, melt chocolate with butter.
6- (Alternatively, microwave at High for 45 seconds; stir until smooth.)
7- Let cool slightly.
8- In bowl, whisk egg yolk with sugar; whisk in chocolate mixture.
9- Beat egg white until stiff peaks form; whisk one-third into chocolate mixture.
10- Fold in remaining egg white.
11- Peel, halve and core pear.
12- Thinly slice one half crosswise; line bottom of pastry shell with overlapping slices.
13- Pour chocolate mixture into shell.
14- Thinly slice remaining pear half crosswise; starting at outer edge, arrange slices over filling in concentric circles to resemble petals.
15- Bake in 350F (180C) oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until top is set and firm to the touch, yet center is still moist.
16- Let cool on rack.
17- Serve warm or at room temperature.

26a530de59.ingredients: 120 grams Rice flour (Joshinko), 4 Eggs, 80 grams Sugar, 6 drops aVanilla oil, 40 grams aSoy milk,
26a530de59.instructions:
1- Line the cake pan with parchment paper.
2- Sift the rice flour to get rid of lumps.
3- Combine the a ingredients and set aside.
4- Combine the eggs and sugar and use a hand mixer to whip.
5- Continue whipping even if you think it's done.
6- If you see shiny bubbles like in the picture, continue whipping.
7- Whip up from the bottom until the shiny bubbles are gone and the mixture becomes opaque.
8- Preheat your oven to 170a.
9- Add the a ingredients from the side of the bowl and mix.
10- Add the rice flour.
11- Use a whisk and mix from the bottom to the top in a circular motion.
12- It's okay if you knead it, so take your time.
13- Pour the dough into the paper-lined pan and heat in the preheated oven at 170a for 35 minutes.
14- Once it finished baking remove from the pan and let cool.
15- Once the outside has chilled, slowly remove the paper.
16- Wrap and let sit in the refrigerator overnight and it's complete.
17- You can change the amounts according to how many eggs you want to use.
18- 1 Egg: 30 g rice flour, 20 g sugar, 10 g soy milk.
19- For the baking time - 1 Egg: 20 minutes.
20- 2 Eggs: 2 minutes.
21- 3 Eggs: 30 minutes.
22- 4 Eggs: 35 minutes.
23- 5 Eggs: 40 minutes.
24- For a sponge cake made with regular cake flour, check out this recipe..

2- let steep for three weeks.

7866db4b5b.instructions:

3- Decoratively place each pear piece, rounded side down, in pan flutes.

5- Sprinkle brown sugar and butter mixture over the pears.

9- Bake for 60-65 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean.

035e92db22.ingredients: 1 lb fish fillet (try snapper or tilapia), canola oil (for frying), 1 medium onion, sliced, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 12 cup diced green chilis, 8 flour tortillas, 2 cups colby cheese, shredded, 2 cups romaine lettuce, shredded, 2 cups tomatoes, chopped and drained, 12 cup radish, diced, 12 cup scallion, chopped, green taco sauce,
035e92db22.instructions:
1- Cut fish into 1/2 inch strips (I usually skip this, because the fish breaks apart easily onces it's cooked, anyway).
2- Heat a skillet until a drop of water quickly sizzles away.
3- Add enough canola oil to coat the bottom of the skillet.
4- Add fish and cook until firm, about a minute on each side.
5- remove fish to a paper towel to drain; cover with foil to keep warm.
6- Add onion, garlic, and green chiles to skillet and cook until onion is softened.
7- Set aside and keep warm.
8- In a clean, dry skillet, heat each tortillas till brown spots start to appear (about 15-20 seconds).
9- Turn tortilla over and repeat on other side.
10- (You could also zap the tortillas in the microwave to save time.
11- I do.
12- ).
13- Spoon some fish into center of tortilla, add sauteed vegetables, sprinkle cheese on top, then add romaine, tomatoes, radishes, scallions, and green taco sauce.
14- Serve with refried beans.
15- Enjoy!

7baf722700.ingredients: 1 cup spelt flour, 1 cup barley flour, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 ripe bananas, peeled, 3 tablespoons blackstrap molasses, 12 cup apple juice (more, if necessary), 2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar, 1 zucchini, finely grated (about 1 1/2 cups), 12 cup finely chopped walnuts, 12 cup raisins,
7baf722700.instructions:
1- **I usually buy an entire bundle of bananas and because not all of them get eaten right away, once they ripen, I put them in the freezer until ready for use.
2- I usually take them out a few hours prior to using in a recipe.
3- Works well for banana bread too.
4- Preheat the oven to 375 degrees .
5- Prepare muffin pan with 12 cup liners.
6- Whisk together spelt, barley, cinnamon, baking powder, and baking soda in a medium mixing bowl.
7- Place the bananas, blackstrap molasses, apple juice, and apple cider vinegar in a blender and blend until smooth.
8- Mix the wet and dry ingredients together, then fold in the zucchini, walnuts, and raisins.
9- (If necessary, use an extra 1-2 tablespoons of apple juice to wet all of the flour).
10- Divide mixture evenly into the 12 lined muffin cups, and bake for 20 minutes, or until the top springs back to the touch.
11- Remove muffins from the pan and cool on a wire rack.
12- Store in an airtight container or freeze in individual freezer bags to pull out and put into lunches as needed.

3- Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
4- Pour contents (including ice) into a 12 ounce highball glass.
5- Garnish with celery, pickle, olives, and lemon wedge before serving.

3- Transfer to jar with tight-fitting lid.

4b5adfc2f1.ingredients: Crepes:, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 eggs, 1 1/4 cups milk, 1% or 2%, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, Chicken and Garlic Filling:, 5 tablespoons butter, 4 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme, 2 1/2 cups shredded rotisserie chicken, 1/3 cup herb and garlic cream cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley,
4b5adfc2f1.instructions:

2- Crepes: In a bowl, combine flour and salt.
3- In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, milk and melted butter.
4- Whisk egg mixture into flour mixture until smooth.
5- Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
6- Strain mixture into a clean bowl.
7- Heat a small non-stick skillet or crepe pan over medium heat.
8- Brush pan with some oil.
9- Pour approximately 1/4 cup batter into centre of pan, swirling pan to coat.
10- Cook for about 1 minute or until bottom is a light golden colour.
11- Flip and cook for 30 seconds.
12- Transfer to plate.
13- Repeat with remaining batter.
14- (Make-ahead: Stack crepes between waxed paper, wrap and refrigerate for up to 3 days or freeze for up to 1 month.)
15- Chicken and Garlic Filling: In a skillet, melt 3 tablespoons of the butter over medium high heat with garlic and thyme.
16- Add chicken and cook, stirring for 5 minutes or until heated through.
17- Stir in cream cheese until melted and smooth.
18- Remove from heat and divide the chicken mixture into centre of each crepe and fold over.
19- Place in shallow casserole dish, overlapping slightly.
20- Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter and drizzle over stuffed crepes.
21- Place in preheated oven for about 10 minutes or until warmed through.
22- Sprinkle with parsley before serving.

26aeb9688e.ingredients: 1-1/4 cups sugar, 1-1/4 qt. (5 cups) milk, divided, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 2 eggs, 2 Tbsp. butter, melted, 1 cup flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 oz. BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted, 1 cup PLANTERS Slivered Almonds, toasted, 1 cup thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping,

2- (4 cups) of the milk in small heavy-bottomed saucepan on medium-low heat until mixture just begins to boil.

6- Blend on medium speed until well blended and smooth.
7- Let stand 20 min.
8- Ladle 1/4 cup batter into lightly greased hot skillet.
9- Cook until lightly browned on each side.
10- Repeat to make a total of 8 crepes.
11- Spoon 2 Tbsp.
12- filling down center of each crepe.
13- Roll up.
14- Serve crepes warm, topped with the chocolate, almonds and whipped topping.

138fbf3b6a.ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon dry mustard, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 12 teaspoon cumin, 12 cup sugar, 12 cup snack cracker (crushed ), 1 cup frozen green pea (thawed ), 1 onion, finely chopped, 1 cup milk, 2 eggs, 14 cup canola oil,
138fbf3b6a.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit
2- Assemble dry ingredients in a medium sized bowl and set aside.
3- In a large mixing bowl combine Milk, eggs and Oil, stir until egg mixture is smooth.

36c07e3aec.ingredients: 1 cup mascarpone cheese, 2 tablespoons sugar-free strawberry jam, 2 12 teaspoons cherry brandy, 1 12 cups fresh blueberries, 1 12 tablespoons Splenda sugar substitute, 1 14 teaspoons lemon juice, 4 crepes, already prepared,

2- Set aside.
3- Heat a small saucepan and add the blueberries, splenda and lemon juice.
4- Cook over a low heat for about 3 or 4 minutes, stirring constantly.
5- When the blueberries start to pop and release their juices they should be ready.
6- Set aside.
7- Heat the prepared crepes in the microwave.
8- It should take about 40 seconds per crepe.
9- Put each crepe on a plate.

11- Roll each crepe up into an open ended cigar type shape.
12- Drizzle the blueberries and their juice over each rolled up crepe.

52eda14efa.ingredients: 1 pound ground beef, 1 large onion, chopped, 1 (15 ounce) can ranch-style beans, 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, 1 (1.25 ounce) package chili seasoning mix, salt and pepper to taste, 2 teaspoons chili powder, or to taste, 1 cup water, or as needed,

04b2c1f5db.instructions:
1- Cut cauliflower into small pieces and chop off as much of the stems as possible using mostly the flowers.
2- Chop up onion and carrot.
3- Put cauliflower, onion and carrot into a pot and add just enough water to simmer vegetables.
4- Add chicken stock cube.
5- Simmer until cauliflower is soft.
6- Put vegetables and some stock into crockpot, add 1 can of cream of mushroom soup and milk (just enough to make it creamy, approx 1/2 cup).
7- In frying pan cook sausage/bacon in small pieces.
8- I take sausage out of casing.
9- Drain fat and pat as much grease off as possible.
10- Add to crockpot.
11- Leave on low for 4-5 hours, stirring occasionally.
12- Add parsley 1/2 hour before serving.
13- Top off with grated cheese.
