1- Cut a slice from the stem end of 6 green peppers, remove seeds, drop in rapidly boiling salted water and cook 5 min.
2- Drain.
3- Fill peppers with desired stuffing, and bake in moderate oven.

4d69fe708c.ingredients: 12 teaspoon black peppercorns, 12 teaspoon green peppercorn, 12 teaspoon red peppercorns, 12 teaspoon white peppercorns, 2 lbs shrimp, shells on, 2 teaspoons salt, divided, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil or 2 tablespoons peanut oil, 4 garlic cloves, chopped, 1 cup fresh cilantro leaf, roughly chopped,
4d69fe708c.instructions:
1- Put peppercorns in a mortar and crush roughly with a pestle.
2- Or put peppercorns in a large resealable plastic bag, spread out on a hard, flat surface, and crush with the bottom of a heavy frying pan or rolling pin.
3- Put shrimp, half of the crushed peppercorns, and 1 teaspoons salt in a large bowl and toss to coat shrimp evenly.
4- Set aside.
5- Heat a wok or large (not nonstick) pot over high heat.
6- Add oil, garlic, remaining crushed peppercorns, and remaining 1 teaspoons salt and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
7- Add shrimp and cook, stirring constantly, until pink and cooked through, 3 to 4 minutes.
8- Add cilantro, turn off heat, and toss to combine.
9- Serve immediately.

8cbb5449f8.ingredients: 8 green bell peppers or possibly lg. roblano chilies, 1 (16 ounce.) can tomatoes, 1 teaspoon instant beef bouillon granules, 8 egg yolks, 2 tbsp. water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Fat for frying, 1 sm. onion, cut up, 4 c. shredded Monterey Jack or possibly Cheddar cheese, 1 pound (4 c.) Picadillo, heated, 1/4 c. flour, 8 egg whites,
8cbb5449f8.instructions:
1- Broil peppers 2 inches from heat for about 15 min, turning often, till all sides are blistered.
2- Place peppers in a paper or possibly plastic bag.
3- Close bag and let stand about 10 min or possibly till cold sufficient to handle.
4- Meanwhile, make tomato sauce: In blender container combine undrained tomatoes, onions, bouillon granules, pepper and cinnamon.
5- Cover; blend till smooth.
6- Transfer to a saucepan.
7- Heat to boiling, simmer, uncovered, for 5 min.
8- Cover and keep hot over low heat while preparing peppers.
9- Peel peppers; remove stems and seeds.
10- Stuff each pepper with 1/2 c. of the cheese or possibly 1/2 c. warm Picadillo.
11- Set aside.
12- Slightly beat egg yolks and water.
13- Add in flour and salt; beat 6 min or possibly till thick and lemon colored.
14- Beat egg whites till stiff peaks form.
15- Fold yolks into whites.
16- In a large heavy skillet heat 1/2 inch fat to 375 degrees.
17- For each serving, spoon about 1/3 c. egg batter at a time into warm fat, spreading batter into mound with a stuffed chili.
18- Cover with another 1/3 c. batter.
19- Continue cooking 2 to 3 min more, till underside is brown.
20- Turn carefully; brown second side.
21- Drain on paper toweling; keep hot in 300 degree oven while preparing remainder.

Pork ribs, 2 tsp. salt, 4 tbsp. freshly ground black pepper, 1-1/2 tbsp. peanut oil, 2 tbsp. shallots, finely chopped, 2 tbsp. scallions, finely chopped, 1 tbsp. garlic, finely chopped, 1 tbsp. fresh ginger, finely chopped, 2 tbsp. fresh cilantro, finely chopped, 3 tbsp. fresh chiles, finely chopped, 2 tbsp. rice wine, dry sherry, 3 tbsp. 10- Cover and let marinate for about 10 minutes.

14- Bring to a boil again, then add the egg mix, drizzling it slowly over the boiling broth.

2- Hold a large egg in one hand, tapered end up.
3- Place an egg topper (a special tool for neatly snipping off the tip of the shell) over the top and squeeze, using a scissor motion.
4- Discard top of egg.
5- Pour egg into a medium bowl.
6- Repeat with remaining eggs.
7- Boil shells for 5 minutes.
8- Using a slotted spoon, transfer to a wire rack.
9- Let dry, cut sides down.
10- Prepare eggs Scramble eggs, using the butter and a large skillet.
11- Transfer eggs to a pastry bag fitted with a 1/2-inch plain round tip (wrap bag with a kitchen towel if necessary, as eggs will be very hot).
12- Pipe eggs into shells.
13- Transfer shells to egg cups.
14- Serve with a dollop of creme fraiche or sour cream, if desired.
15- Top with caviar.

076ea35630.ingredients: 2 long narrow sweet potatoes (about 1 1/4 pounds), scrubbed, about 1/2 cup creme fraiche or sour cream, 1 ounce caviar, tiny dill sprigs for garnish,
076ea35630.instructions:
1- Cut the sweet potatoes crosswise into 1/4 inch slices with a large sharp knife and with a sharp 1- to 1 1/2-inch decorative cutter cut a decorative shape from each slice.
2- Steam the sweet potatoes in a steamer set over boiling water, covered, for 5 to 6 minutes, or until they are just tender, arrange them in one layer on a plate, and let them cool, their surface covered with plastic wrap.
3- Chill the sweet potatoes for at least 1 hour or overnight.
4- The sweet potatoes my be made 1 day in advance and kept covered and chilled.
5- Arrange the sweet potatoes, patted dry, on serving plates, top each piece with 1/2 teaspoon of the creme fraiche and 1/8 teaspoon caviar, and garnish the "bites" with the dill.

924fe7ce6f.ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 (15 ounce) can Mexican-style corn, drained, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 lime, juice of,
924fe7ce6f.instructions:
1- Rinse the black beans thoroughly to keep dip from looking "muddy".
2- Dump beans and corn into bowl.
3- Squeeze in the juice from the lime.
4- Add cilantro to taste.
5- Chill.
6- I think this dip is best served cold with Frito Scoops.
7- You could also serve it with other chips, crackers, or tortillas, but I've seen people eat it with nothing but a spoon!
8- It is best when made the day before, but it certainly doesn't have to be.

query: I miss my mom's homemade Acadian dessert

options.14fdc2f88d: Low fat tiramisu made with ladyfingers, nonfat milk, and brandy
options.7fd4e18f0d: Acadian style crab salad with croissants

6552ee872e.ingredients: Cane Syrup is one by-products of sugar cane refining. The C. S. Steen Company of Abbeville, Louisiana, produces Steen's Syrup, a pure and excellent ribbon cane syrup. This recipe is an adaptation of one of theirs. Rick McDaniel, 2 1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour, 1 tsp grnd cinnamon, 1 tsp grnd ginger, 1/2 tsp grnd cloves, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 c. vegetable oil, 1 1/2 c. ribbon cane syrup, 1 x egg, beaten till frothy, 2/3 c. minced pecans, 1 1/2 tsp s baking soda, 3/4 c. warm water Vanilla ice cream,
6552ee872e.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 F Butter and flour a 13" x 9" baking pan; shake out excess flour.
2- Set pan aside.
3- Sift flour, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and salt into a bowl; set aside.
4- In bowl of an electric mixer, combine oil, cane syrup and egg.
5- Beat just to blend.
6- Add in pecans and beat to incorporate.
7- Combine baking soda with warm water and stir to blend.
8- Add in flour mix to oil-syrup mix alternately with warm water mix, adding each in 3 additions and stopping to scrape down side of bowl after each addition.
9- Then beat just to smooth out batter (about 15 seconds longer).
10- Pour batter into prepared pan.
11- Bake in preheated oven till cake springs back when touched (about 45 min).
12- Serve warm or possibly hot and top with vanilla ice cream.

579872a461.ingredients: 3 pounds Chicken (or Turkey) Pieces, With Bone, 10 cups Water, 2 whole Onions, Chopped, 2 Tablespoons Butter, 1 Tablespoon Flour, 6 whole Large Potatoes, Peeled And Cubed, 2 whole Carrots, Sliced And Peeled, 1 Tablespoon Salt, 1 teaspoon Pepper, 1 Tablespoon Summer Savory (traditional Herb- Can Use Thyme Or Some Sage),
579872a461.instructions:
1- Preparing the chicken can be done 2 ways:
2- 1) You can use 3 pounds of chicken, with bone in, and just simmer in the 10 cups of water for 45 minutes to an hour.
3- Then remove the chicken pieces, (reserving the cooking water as the stew broth), let cool slightly and remove the meat from the bones, cutting to bite-sized pieces.
4- or
5- 2) Roast a small chicken (or you can make a larger amount of stew using a turkey), then remove as much meat as possible, cutting to bite-sized pieces, and reserve.
6- Then simmer the chicken bones in the 10 cups water for about an hour to make the broth.
7- After preparing the meat and broth with your chosen method:
8- Saute the onions in the butter until translucent.
9- Add flour and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
10- Put all remaining ingredients into the reserved broth, including meat, and simmer for another 30 minutes.
11- Adjusting seasonings to taste.
12- If preparing dumplings, add them in the last 10 minutes that the stew is simmering.

47f4e3284b.ingredients: 1-1/2 cups (350 ml) sugar, 1/2 cup (125 ml) cocoa powder (unsweetened), 1/2 cup (125 ml) shortening, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup (125 ml) milk, 2 tsp (10 ml) soda, 2 cups (475 ml) flour, 1/4 tsp (1 ml) salt, 1 cup (225 ml) boiling water, 1 tsp (5 ml) vanilla,
47f4e3284b.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees (175 C.).
2- In a mixing bowl, combine sugar, cocoa, shortening and eggs until well blended.
3- Dissolve soda in milk.
4- Blend milk into sugar mixture.
5- While continuing to mix add flour and salt.
6- Mix in boiling water and vanilla.
7- Pour into prepared pans.
8- Bake at 350 degrees (175 C.) until done (but not dry).
9- Check at 20 minutes by testing with toothpick or broom straw.

14fdc2f88d.ingredients: 1 pkg. (3 oz.) ladyfingers, split, cut crosswise in half, 1-1/2 cups cold fat-free milk, divided, 1 tub (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese, 2 Tbsp. MAXWELL HOUSE Instant Coffee, 1 Tbsp. hot water, 2 Tbsp. brandy, 1 pkg. (1.5 oz.) JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Sugar Free Fat Free Instant Pudding, 2 cups thawed COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping, 1 oz. BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate, grated,
14fdc2f88d.instructions:
1- Cover bottom of 8-inch springform pan with some of the ladyfinger halves; arrange remaining ladyfingers, cut-sides down, around side of pan.
2- Blend 1/2 cup milk and reduced-fat cream cheese in blender until smooth.
3- Dissolve coffee granules in hot water.
4- Add to blender along with brandy and remaining milk.
5- Add dry pudding mix; blend well.
6- Pour into large bowl.
7- Stir in COOL WHIP with whisk; spoon into prepare pan.
8- Refrigerate 4 hours or until set.
9- Remove rim of pan.
10- Sprinkle dessert with chocolate.

7fd4e18f0d.ingredients: 2 (6-ounce) tubs fresh lump crab (1 pound 300 count shrimp may be substituted), 2 ribs celery from the heart, finely chopped, 1/4 cup white onion, finely chopped or grated with a hand grater, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, 1/4 cup chili sauce, eyeball the amount, 1 teaspoon hot sauce (recommended: Tabasco), 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, Salt and pepper, Bibb or leaf lettuce, 4 leaves, 4 large croissants, split lengthwise,
7fd4e18f0d.instructions:
1- Run your fingers through the crab meat to remove any bits of shell.
2- In a bowl, combine the celery, onion, mayo, chili, hot sauce and Worcestershire.
3- Add the crab meat to the bowl and mix with a fork.
4- Season with salt and pepper, to your taste.
5- Pile salad on lettuce leaves in croissants.
6- Cut each croissant in thirds on angles, following the shape of the pastry.
7- Arrange sandwiches on a plate and serve.

ab70e0ac3b.ingredients: 1 cup sugar, 12 cup heavy cream, 3 tablespoons dark corn syrup, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup pecan halves, 12 teaspoon vanilla,
ab70e0ac3b.instructions:
1- In a heavy 2 quart saucepan, stirl together sugar, cream, syrup, baking soda and salt.
2- Cook over medium heat, stirring until sugar dissolves and mixture reaches 234 degrees on a candy thermometer.
3- Once mixture reaches proper temp, remove from heat.
4- Add pecans and vanilla, stirring constantly until the mixture is creamy and covers pecans with a slight opaque coating.
5- Drop by heaping teaspoonful onto wax paper.
6- Cool completely.
7- These should be stored in an airtight container between sheets of wax paper to prevent sticking.
8- THIS RECIPE CAN EASILY BE DOUBLED.

query: I want kebabs that are easy on the stomach

options.0047cc5fcd: Fruit kebabs made of strawberry, kiwi, bananas, and more fruits
options.182eb47c26: Tukey kebab flavoured with salt and pepper

0047cc5fcd.ingredients: 1 kg fresh strawberries, 6 -8 kiwi, 6 -8 bananas, 1 large pineapple, 3 -4 ripe mangoes, cubed, 14 cup butter, 14 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup fresh milk, heated, 14 cup Equal sugar substitute, 2 egg yolks, 3 cups sliced strawberries, 3 tablespoons honey, 500 g semi-sweet chocolate chips, chopped or 500 g semisweet chocolate, block chopped, 2 cups heavy cream or 2 cups cream, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 cups Equal sugar substitute, 1 cup cream, 1 tablespoon butter,
0047cc5fcd.instructions:
1- Prepare fruits.
2- Wash strawberries well, removing leaves and stems.
3- Peel kiwi and cut into half-moon slices.
4- Cut bananas into circles.
5- Peel pineapple and mangoes and cut into cubes.
6- Thread the fruits into bamboo skewers.
7- Chill while making the dip.
8- Strawberry Dip.
9- In a thick-bottomed saucepan melt butter over low heat.
10- Add flour all at once and using a wire whip, whisk thoroughly to cook flour.
11- Slowly pour hot milk while whisking.
12- Combine sugar and egg yolks and stir into mixture.
13- Cook-stir for a few minutes until thick and smooth, not lumpy.
14- Cool.
15- In a blender or food processor, puree strawberries and honey until smooth.
16- Reserve one tablespoon of the puree.
17- Stir remaining puree into prepared milk mixture until completely blended.
18- Drizzle reserved puree over the mixture in a swirl design.
19- Chill and serve cold with fruit kebabs.
20- Chocolate Dip.
21- Put chocolate into a heat proof bowl.
22- In a saucepan, heat cream and butter until bubbles form on the side.
23- Pour into chocolate.
24- Cover bowl and let stand about five minutes to let chocolate melt.
25- When chocolate is melter, stil until smooth.
26- Serve as dip for fruit kebabs.
27- Caramel Dip.
28- In a saucpan, melt sugar over low heat until it turns golden.
29- Make sure it does not burn.
30- Add cream and stir until smooth.
31- Remove from heat and stir in butter.
32- Mix thoroughly.
33- Serve as dip.

028b07e4f7.ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 1 small clove minced garlic, 1 scallion, finely sliced, 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander, Salt and cayenne pepper to taste, 1 1/2 pounds boneless leg of lamb, cut into 1inch squares,
028b07e4f7.instructions:
1- Combine the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, scallion, and coriander in a mixing bowl and season to taste with 1/2 teaspoon of salt or more; season with cayenne pepper if you wish.
2- Add the lamb and marinate for as long as possible (up to 3 hours at room temperature or 6 hours in the refrigerator); turn the meat in the marinade every now and then.
3- Soak bamboo skewers in water while this marinates.
4- Position the broiler pan 4 to 5 inches away from the heat source and preheat the broiler.
5- Thread lamb cubes on skewers.
6- Broil kebabs for 6 to 7 minutes a side or until lamb is cooked through.

0aff6a8ff0.ingredients: 12 cup pineapple juice, 3 tablespoons teriyaki sauce, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 cherry tomatoes, 1 boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into large chunks, 2 -3 fresh pineapple chunks, 2 -3 pieces green bell peppers or 2 -3 pieces red bell peppers,
0aff6a8ff0.instructions:
1- In a shallow dish, combine pineapple juice, teriyaki sauce, and oil.
2- Thread the skewer, alternating tomatoe, chicken, pineapple, and pepper.
3- Dip in the marinade, coating well, and discard the marinade.
4- Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
5- (Personally, I would let it soak in the marinade for 30 minutes.
6- At least.
7- ).
8- Grill or broil until the chicken is cooked through.
9- (No suggested time is given, but I would think 3-5 minutes per side depending on the size of your chicken chunks, and would suggest turning the skewer once or twice.
10- ).
11- Remove from the skewer and serve.

0e29809831.ingredients: 2 pounds pork boneless, lean, cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes, 1/4 cup peanut butter smooth, 1 teaspoon coriander ground, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 teaspoon cumin ground, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 4 each onions, 1 clove garlic minced, 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, tamari,
0e29809831.instructions:
1- Grate the onions.
2- This is best done using a food processor.
3- Mincing is not good enough; you want to end up with something wet and mushy.
4- Don't stick your nose into the food processor.
5- Put all the ingredients into a large bowl, mix well, and cover.
6- Refrigerate for several hours, mixing occasionally.
7- Put meat cubes on skewers, keeping as much of the onion mixture on them as you can.
8- Grill over hot coals, turning to brown each side, for 20 to 25 minutes or until meat is cooked through.
9- (Lamb should still be slightly pink; pork should not.)

182eb47c26.ingredients: 1 12 lbs boneless turkey breast, 13 cup olive oil, 12 cup dry white wine, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 12 teaspoons salt, 12 teaspoon black pepper,
182eb47c26.instructions:
1- Trim turkey into 2 inch cubes.
2- Place in a bowl and toss with oil, wine, garlic, salt and pepper.
3- Toss to coat well.
4- Refrigerate overnight.
5- Prepare hot fire.
6- Thread turkey onto skewers.
7- Grill 10 minutes, turning occasionally.

068e371552.ingredients: 3 bananas (cut into 1 inch chunks), 2 cups pineapple chunks (30-40 pieces), 30 -40 strawberries, 30 -40 seedless grapes, 12 cup orange juice, 10 wooden skewers, apple jelly (optional),
068e371552.instructions:
1- Put the cut up bananas in a medium bowl.
2- Combine the orange juice with the bananas and gently toss a couple of times to coat bananas.
3- This method should keep bananas from turning brown.
4- Take a wooden skewer and thread your fruit on.
5- *To enhance the sweetness of the strawberries, instead of using whole strawberries, cut each one in half place in a medium bowl and add a wee bit of sugar and toss around.
6- Method 2.
7- Add about 5 large tbsp of apple jelly to a small saucepan and stir over a medium jelly, until it because less lumpy, let cool.
8- Slice bananas and coat with apple jelly.
9- Slice strawberries and cut in half and coat with either sugar or apple jelly.
10- Slice the rest of the fruit and set aside.
11- Stick the fruit on the skewers.
12- Enjoy!

query: I want to use up the corn in my fridge for a warm dish

options.0302a9c63c: Chowder soup made from corn, bacon, cornstarch and heavy cream
options.036f8a1d83: Easy to make refrigerated garlic fridge pickle
options.2299a67ffd: Chocolate fridge cake made with biscuits, nuts, and cherries
options.80cf34082f: Fat free fridge fruit salad made with yogurt and granola
options.724772d056: Soup made with carrots, pepper, celery, and egg noodles to use up the fridge leftovers

0302a9c63c.ingredients: 3 ears fresh corn or 3 ears bicolor corn, 4 ounces bacon, cut into 1/3 inch dice, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 medium onion, cut into 1/2 inch dice, 12 large red bell pepper, cut into 1/2 inch dice, 1 sprig fresh thyme, leaves removed and chopped, 12 teaspoon ground cumin, 18 teaspoon turmeric, 1 lb yukon gold potato, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch dice, 3 cups chicken stock, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, dissolved in, 2 tablespoons water, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 tablespoons minced fresh chives or 2 tablespoons thinly sliced scallions,
0302a9c63c.instructions:
1- Husk the corn.
2- Carefully remove most of the silk by hand and then rub the ears with a towel to finish the job.
3- Cut the kernels from the cobs and place in a bowl.
4- You should have about 2 cups.
5- Using the back of your knife, scrape down the cobs and add the milky substance that oozes out to the corn kernels.
6- Heat a 3-to 4-quart heavy pot over low heat and add the diced bacon.
7- Once it has rendered a few tablespoons of fat, increase the heat to medium and cook until the bacon is crisp and golden brown.
8- Pour off all but one tablespoon of the bacon fat, leaving the bacon in the pot.
9- Add the butter, onion, bell pepper, thyme, cumin, and turmeric and saute, stirring occasionally with a wooden spoon, for about 8 minutes, until the onion and pepper are tender but not browned.
10- Add the corn kernels, potatoes and stock, turn up the heat, cover, and boil vigorously for about 10 minutes.
11- Some of the potatoes will have broken up, but most should retain their shape.
12- Use the back of your spoon to smash a bit of the corn and potatoes against the side of the pot.
13- Reduce the heat to medium and season the chowder with salt and pepper.
14- Stir the cornstarch mixture and slowly pour it into the pot, stirring constantly.
15- As soon as the chowder has come back to a boil and thickened slightly, remove from the heat and stir in the cream.
16- Adjust the seasoning if necessary.
17- If you are not serving the chowder within the hour, let it cool a bit, then refrigerate; cover the chowder AFTER it has chilled completely.
18- Otherwise, let it sit at room temperature for up to an hour, allowing the flavors to meld.
19- When ready to serve, reheat the chowder over low heat; don't let it boil.
20- Ladle into cups or bowls and sprinkle with the chopped chives.

036f8a1d83.ingredients: 2 whole Cucumbers, 2 cloves Garlic, 1 cup Vinegar, 1 cup Water, 13 cups Sugar, 1 Tablespoon Salt, 1 teaspoon Dill, Dried, 1 pinch Red Pepper Flakes, 1 pinch Coriander, 6 whole Peppercorns,
036f8a1d83.instructions:
1- Use cucumbers with no wax residue on the peels.
2- Slice cucumbers in 1/4-1/8 slices.
3- Cut garlic cloves in quarters, then smash them a bit.
4- Put cucumbers and garlic in a bowl.
5- Heat vinegar (I like apple cider vinegar, but white works also), water, sugar, salt, dill, red pepper flakes, coriander and peppercorns in a small sauce pan until sugar and salt are dissolved.
6- *
7- Pour over the cucumbers and garlic.
8- Cover and let marinate in refrigerator for at least two hours.
9- Serve cold.
10- * We dont use very much salt at my house.
11- You may want more salt.
12- Or more sugar.
13- This recipe is just basic, you can play with the ingredients to make them work for you.

2299a67ffd.ingredients: 5 1/4 ounces (150 grams) digestive biscuits, 3 1/2 ounces (100 grams) pecans, 3 1/2 ounces (100 grams) pistachio nuts, 10 glace cherries, 2 ready made meringue nests, crumbled into small pieces, 5 1/4 ounces (150 grams) butter, 1 tablespoon golden syrup, 7 ounces (200 grams) good quality chocolate, Cocoa powder, for dusting,
2299a67ffd.instructions:
1- Break the biscuits into small pieces directly into a large bowl.
2- Add the pecans, pistachio nuts, cherries and bits of meringue.
3- Put the rest of the ingredients, except the cocoa powder, into a bowl and put over a pan of simmering water on low heat to melt.
4- Mix the ingredients together and place in the container which acts as your mold.
5- To help with turning out, line a 12 by 8-inch (30 by 20 centimeter) container with cling film, first leaving plenty of extra film at the edges to fold over the top.
6- Leave in the refrigerator to firm up then turn out and cut into chunky slices.
7- This cake can be kept in an airtight container and actually improves after a couple of days.

80cf34082f.ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container fat-free cool whip, 4 ounces blueberry yogurt, 14 cup walnuts, 2 apples, 1 orange, 2 kiwi fruits, 12 cup granola cereal,
80cf34082f.instructions:
1- Peel Orange and peel sections.
2- Cut into 1/2 inch pieces and throw in a mixing bowl.
3- Peel the apples and kiwi and dice each into 1/2 inch cubes or whatever size you choose.
4- Chop the walnuts and throw nuts and fruit into the mixing bowl with the oranges.
5- Mix in the cool whip and yogurt.
6- Try not to over stir as it will get a bit too runny.
7- Sprinkle optional granola on top.
8- Enjoy!

724772d056.ingredients: 2 teaspoons Olive Oil, 1 whole Onion, Small, Diced, 2 Carrots, Diced, 2 stalks Celery, Chopped, 1/2 Red Bell Pepper, Diced, 1/2 Yellow Bell Pepper, Diced, 4 cloves Garlic, Minced, 1/4 teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes, 1/2 teaspoons Dried Parsley, 1/4 teaspoons Oregano, 1 can (28 Oz. Size) Diced Tomatoes, 6 cups Chicken Broth, 1/2 cups Pasta Sauce, 1 Bay Leaf, 2 cups Egg Noodles, 13 cups Frozen Spinach,
724772d056.instructions:
1- 1.
2- In a large soup pot over medium heat, saute onions, carrots and celery in olive oil for about 5 minutes.
3- Add peppers and garlic and saute for another 2 to 3 minutes.
4- 2.
5- Mix in spices until they give off a nice aroma (about 1 minute).
6- 3.
7- Add tomatoes, broth, pasta sauce and bay leaf.
8- Bring to a boil and then let simmer for about 15 to 20 minutes.
9- 4.
10- Pour in egg noodles and let them cook for about 10 minutes.
11- Stir in frozen spinach and heat until heated through.
12- 5.
13- Remove from heat and serve or let it cool and store.
14- I find that soup is often better the second day or several hours after making.
15- This allows the flavours to meld nicely.
16- Also, egg noodles are great for soups that arent going to be eaten first day, because they dont get soggy like other pasta noodles.
17- Note: You can also add chicken, mushrooms, beans, etc.
18- for different variations.

aa410c84b5.ingredients: 2 cups frozen corn, thawed, well drained, 1 (8 ounce) containerphiladelphia light cream cheese spread, 1 large tomatoes, chopped about 1 cup, 12 cup shredded kraft 2% low-fat monterey jack and colby cheese, 1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded, finely chopped,
aa410c84b5.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350.
2- Mix all ingredients until well blended.
3- Spread into 9-inch pie plate.
4- Bake 20 minutes or until golden brown and bubbly.
5- Serve with crackers.
6- Makes 2-1/2 cups or 20 servings.

query: How do I make a banana split ice cream dessert for my kids?

options.4a13c4e253: Banana split ice cream, ice cream and banana drizzled with chocolate syrup
options.7dd92674fa: An alcoholic cocktail made of banana liqueur
options.4f215a2694: Banana smoothie made of milk, nutritious for kids

4a13c4e253.ingredients: 2 whole Bananas, Mashed, 1 can (10 Oz. Can) Crushed Pineapple, Drained, 1 jar (10 Oz. Jar) Maraschino Cherries, Drained And Quartered, 1 pint Strawberries, Hulled And Sliced Or Mashed, 2 cans (14 Oz. Can) Eagle Brand Sweetened Condensed Milk, 12 ounces, fluid Evaporated Milk, 1/2 cups Chopped Pecans, 8 cups, 7 tablespoons, 3/4 teaspoons, 13 pinches Big Red Soda,

4- Stir thoroughly.

6- (Dont over fill!)
7- Freeze according to your ice cream makers instructions.

7dd92674fa.instructions:
1- Directions:.
2- Using a shaker filled with ice, combine all ingredients.
3- Shake well.
4- Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5- Garnish with a banana slice or cherry if desired.

a65b74c7d2.ingredients: 4 bananas, 40 g butter, 14 cup rum, 4 tablespoons sugar, 1 tablespoon cinnamon,
a65b74c7d2.instructions:
1- Peel the bananas, making sure the are riped but firm.

3- Remove from heat place on serving plates and sprinkle with the sugar and cinimon over top.

4f215a2694.ingredients: 1 banana, 1 cup milk, 12 teaspoon vanilla, 1 -3 ice cube,
4f215a2694.instructions:
1- Take out ye olde blender and pour in a cup of milk -- feel free to guestimate.

6e19304554.ingredients: 500ml cream, 395g can condensed milk, 150g OREO* Original Cookies , crushed,
6e19304554.instructions:
1- Beat the cream and condensed milk until thick and frothy.
2- Fold through the biscuit pieces, pour into a flat freezer-safe dish.
3- Freeze until firm.

70f2afd49e.ingredients: 6 bananas, frozen, 12 cup peanut butter, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 14 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips, 2 tablespoons peanuts, chopped,
70f2afd49e.instructions:
1- Add bananas to food processor and blend.
2- When the bananas start to become smooth and close to the consistency of soft serve, add the peanut butter.
3- Process until smooth.
4- Pour into an 8-inch springform pan and smooth over the top.
5- Freeze for at least one hour or overnight.
6- Topping: Take out the cake.
7- Run the edges briefly under hot water to help remove the ring of the springform.

10- Place the cake back in the freezer for about 5 minutes to harden the chocolate.

query: I want to make a fancy grilled fish entree

options.9f0a71eb0f: Savory French fish soup made of boneless fish fillet
options.046842e753: Smoked salmon chips made from smoked salmon wrapped in flour batter
options.5922dcd98d: Fried fish made with fried potato chips

1e5c94f511.ingredients: alaska salmon steaks or fillets, thawed if necessary, 14 cup peanut oil, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 2 tablespoons chopped green onions, 1 12 teaspoons brown sugar, 1 garlic clove, minced, 34 teaspoon grated ginger, 12 teaspoon red chili pepper flakes (or more to taste), 12 teaspoon sesame oil, 18 salt,
1e5c94f511.instructions:
1- Place salmon steaks or fillets in a glass dish.
2- Whisk together remaining ingredients and pour over salmon.
3- Cover with plastic wrap and marinate in refrigerator 4-6 hours.
4- Remove salmon from marinade and place on a well-oiled grill 5 inches from coals.
5- Grill for 10 minutes per inch of thickness, measured at the thickest part, or until fish just flakes when tested with a fork.
6- Turn halfway through cooking.

9f0a71eb0f.ingredients: 1 head fennel, 1 large brown onion, 3 -4 garlic cloves, bay leaf (optional), fresh thyme (optional), 12 liter dry white wine, 350 g fresh boneless fish fillets, 1 liter fish stock, 3 tablespoons tomato paste (heaped), Pernod or ouzo, to taste, fresh parsley, to taste, Tabasco sauce, to taste, maggi seasoning, to taste or Braggs liquid aminos, sauce to taste, lemon juice, to taste, salt & pepper, to taste,
9f0a71eb0f.instructions:
1- Chop the fennel, onion and garlic and saute in olive oil.
2- Add the dry white wine and let simmer for about 10-15 minutes with the lid open so that it reduces to about half of the original volume.
3- If youve got dried bay leaves and some fresh thyme, throw some in too!
4- Cube the fish fillets and add them to the vegie mixture.
5- Add the fish stock, tomato paste and Tabasco to taste.
6- Mix well, cover with the lid and let simmer for another 10 minutes or so while you prepare the croutons.
7- Now remove any bay leaves and/or sprigs of thyme that might be a bit woody.
8- Add fresh parsley.
9- Blend with a hand beater and taste!
10- Now comes the most important step: Adjust the seasoning by adding a shot of Pernod or similar spirit (very important for a French recipe!
11- ), some lemon juice (about 1/2 lemon), some Maggi or Braggs sauce, more salt, pepper, Tabasco and/or olive oil to taste.
12- Keep hot until ready to serve with the croutons.
13- Croutons the easy way nice and quick:.
14- Toast a few slices of bread (rye is best).
15- When crisp, rub them on both sides with peeled cloves of garlic (optional), spread some olive oil to taste, and cut all slices in small cubes.
16- Serve with the soup and enjoy!
17- Croutons and rouille the French way more spectacular: Slice a French stick at an angle, so you get larger slices of bread about 1cm thick.
18- Grill them in the oven, at about 180-190 degrees until crisp and golden brown.
19- Keep them hot while you prepare the rouille.
20- For the rouille, vitamise together a few tablespoons of a good mayonnaise, a couple of slices of roasted red capsicum (available in most delis), lemon juice and fresh garlic to taste.
21- Serve the soup in individual plates.
22- Spoon some rouille over your slices of hot bread and place one of those slices on each plate, floating like a little pink boat on top of the soup!
23- Season to taste with some freshly ground black pepper.
24- Serve with a glass of champagne and enjoy!

8bd350c9e8.ingredients: 4 oz. salmon fillet or steak Walmart Supercenter 1 lb For $5.00 thru 02/14, 1 tsp. packed brown sugar, 2 Tbsp. orange juice, 1 tsp. extra virgin olive oil, 1 cup fresh chopped spinach leaves, 1/4 cup canned mandarin oranges (in juice), drained, 1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar, 2 Tbsp. fresh chives, chopped, 2 oz. linguine, uncooked, 8 fl oz (1 cup) fat-free milk,
8bd350c9e8.instructions:
1- Place salmon in small, shallow baking dish, flesh side up.
2- Blend brown sugar, orange juice, and olive oil in a small bowl.
3- Pour marinade over the salmon; cover and refrigerate 1 hour or overnight.
4- Remove salmon from the refrigerator.
5- Heat broiler and spray broiler pan with cooking spray.
6- Place fish on broiler pan flesh side up; broil fish 4 to 6 min.
7- or until cooked through.
8- Season to taste with favorite salt-free seasoning.
9- Toss together spinach, mandarin oranges, vinegar, and chives to make salad.
10- Cook pasta according to package instructions.
11- Toss drained (but not rinsed) hot pasta with your favorite garden herbs and a spritz of lemon to season.
12- Serve alongside salmon.
13- Serve meal with a glass of milk.

046842e753.ingredients: 4 12 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons sugar, 12 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 chilled large egg white, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature, 1 tablespoon black sesame seed, 4 ounces sliced smoked salmon, finely chopped, 1 12 teaspoons very finely chopped shallots, 1 12 teaspoons very finely chopped chives, plus a few snipped, for garnish, 14 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest, fresh ground white pepper, 12 cup creme fraiche,
046842e753.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 400F
2- Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.
3- In a medium bowl, whisk the flour with the sugar and salt.
4- Add the egg white and whisk until smooth.
5- Whisk in the butter until smooth and creamy.
6- Spoon teaspoons of the batter 3 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets and spread to 2-inch rounds.
7- Sprinkle with the sesame seeds and bake in the upper and middle third of the oven for about 15 minutes, shifting the pans from top to bottom and front to back, until the tuiles are golden and fragrant.
8- Let cool.
9- In a medium bowl, combine the salmon with the shallot, chopped chives, lemon zest and a pinch of white pepper.
10- Spoon the salmon onto the tuiles and top with a dollop of creme fraiche and a couple of snipped chives.
11- Serve right away and ENJOY!

5922dcd98d.ingredients: 12 lb white fish fillet (cod or halibut), 1 cup beer (not dark), 1 cup flour, and a little more for dusting, 12 teaspoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch fresh ground black pepper,
5922dcd98d.instructions:
1- Combine all batter ingredients in a mixing bowl.
2- Cut the fillets into desired sized pieces.
3- Dust fillets with flour.
4- Dip the fillets in the batter.
5- Fry fillets in deep fryer at 375 degrees with at least 2 inches of vegetable oil until golden brown.
6- Don't crowd the fillets while frying.
7- Drain fillets on paper towels or brown paper bags from the grocery store.
8- Serve with french fries, tarter sauce, cocktail sauce, malt vinegar and cole slaw or cucumber salad (see Zaar recipe 211355).

1cc110d554.ingredients: 400 grams flaked steak of salmon (pre-cooked and smoked if available) or bite size grilled chicken breasts or thinly sliced grilled steak., 150 grams pre-chopped and washed salad greens mix (eg: lettus, red radicchio and shredded yellow carrots), 50 grams Arugula leaves, 1 or 2 small cucumbers (you can slice it into long strips with a potato pealer and slice the remaining inside part as normal), 1/2 red sweet capsicum (cut into small cubes), 1/2 yellow sweet capsicum (cut into small cubes), 1/2 can precooked chickpeas ( 400 gram can), 2 tbsp prepared horseradish paste, 4 tbsp EVOO, 1/2 lemon (juiced) or a dash of vinegar if you don't have lemon juice, 3/4 tbsp dried parsley or 2 tbsp fresh chopped, 1/2 loaf french baguette - you can use brown as a healthy option, 1 butter - or low fat alternative, 1 clove garlic split in half,
1cc110d554.instructions:
1- If you can't find the pre-cooked and smoked salmon steak flakes (the package normally says salad smoked salmon flakes), you can cook a couple of salmon steaks to your liking.
2- You can use my Salmon steak recipe.
3- Just leave to cool before adding to the salad.
4- This salad works as well with grilled chicken cut into bite size pieces or thinly sliced grilled steak or even cocktail shrimps or a mix of non-cooked mushrooms instead of the salmon.
5- You can cook the protein any way you prefer, but I prefer grilling, roasting in the oven or pan frying.
6- Follow the rest of the steps as normal but substitute the salmon with the protein of your choice.
7- The amount of protein specified in this recepie is a personal prefrence, you can use less if you want.
8- Cut the half of baguette all the way through like a sandwish then cut each side in two to get 4 slices (2 per person
9- Spread butter on the slices from the previous step
10- put them in the oven on 180C for 4 minutes or until crisp and golden yellow on the top (make sure you keep an eye on them as each oven is different).
11- Rub the halved garlic clove on the bread as soon as it comes out of the oven .
12- In the meantime, assemble all the ingredients for the salad - leave out half of the chikpeas and all the salmon
13- Mix all the dressing ingredients.
14- I didn't have lemons so added a dash of vinegar instead.
15- Taste and adjust to taste.
16- You may want to add salt and pepper if needed.
17- Found this dressing on "tesco.com" as a part of an other recipe.
18- Add the dressing a bit at a time on the salad then mix well and taste.
19- If preparing beforehand, only do steps 6 and 7 (and 1 or 2 if choosing one of those options) then do the rest of the steps just before serving.
20- Add the salmon flakes and the rest of the chikpeas on top
21- Serve the salad with the garlic bread on the side

8061de698c.ingredients: 1/2 lb. (225 g) extra-lean ground beef King Sooper's 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09, 12 frozen waffle fries, 3 Kraft Singles Cheese Slices, quartered, 12 bread and butter pickle slices, 12 grape tomatoes,
8061de698c.instructions:
1- Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
2- Shape meat into 12 (1-1/2-inch) patties; place on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
3- Place waffle fries in single layer on second foil-covered baking sheet.
4- Bake as directed on package, adding baking sheet with patties to oven for the last 13 min.
5- of the fries baking time and baking until done (165 degrees F).
6- Top fries with burgers and Kraft Singles pieces; bake 1 min.
7- or until Singles are melted.
8- Transfer fries to serving plate; top with pickles and tomatoes.
9- Secure with decorative skewers or picks.

1831e9d443.ingredients: Canola oil, for greasing grill, 3 pounds organic prime ground beef chuck (preferably grass-fed), 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 3 tablespoons salted butter, 1 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, 6 English muffins, split, 1 large beefsteak tomato, cut into 6 slices,
1831e9d443.instructions:
1- Prepare a charcoal grill and position the rack 4 inches above medium-high heat, or heat a gas grill to medium-high heat.
2- Lightly oil the grill.
3- Form the beef into 6 patties, about 3 1/2 inches in diameter, and sprinkle on both sides with the salt and pepper.
4- Grill the burgers, charring well on both sides, until almost but not quite as done as desired, 3 to 4 minutes per side for medium-rare.
5- (Gas grills may require 1 to 2 minutes more total cooking.)
6- Transfer the burgers to a rack to rest for 5 minutes.
7- Top each burger with about 1/2 tablespoon of the butter and a sprinkling of the chopped parsley.
8- Meanwhile, toast the English Muffins on the grill for 2 to 3 minutes.
9- Reheat the burgers on the grill for about 1 minute.
10- Serve them on the toasted English muffins, topped with the tomato slices.

7e6767b6c2.ingredients: 4 whole Russet Potatoes, 1 gallon Peanut Oil, 2 Tablespoons Fine Salt,
7e6767b6c2.instructions:
1- Scrub and clean your potatoes.
2- Heat oil to 320 F in a Dutch oven or deep heavy pot.
3- Line 2 sheet pans with aluminum foil and top with a cooling rack.
4- Using a V-slicer, put on the french fry attachment and cut up your potatoes or cut them into 1/4 x 1/4 strips.
5- Preheat oven to 200 F.
6- Once oil has reached temperature gently submerge potatoes in the hot oil using a kitchen spider (cook them in small batches so as to not bring down the oil temperature).
7- Fry each batch for 2-3 minutes then use the kitchen spider and remove them from the oil.
8- Let them drain on one of the cooling rack with aluminum foil covered sheet pan beneath.
9- Continue until all batches are complete.
10- Next bring oil temperature up to 375 F and do a second fry with the potatoes, again in small batches for another 2-3 minutes.
11- Let them drain on the second cooling rack with the aluminum foil covered sheet pan below.
12- Immediately top each batch with salt as you pull it out of the oil the second time, so it sticks.
13- Once all batches are complete, you can keep them in a 200 F oven until all your other dishes are complete.
14- Recipe modified from Alton Brown Food Network.

03ef043883.ingredients: 380 g baked beans, 300 g cannellini beans, 125 g carrots, 4 tablespoons onion chutney, 1 tablespoon sweet chili sauce, 100 g breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons olive oil,
03ef043883.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to has mark 5 and line a baking tray with baking paper.
2- Stand a colander over a bowl and put the baked beans in it leave for 10 minutes to drain most of the sauce, place the beans into a clean bowl.
3- Rinse the cannellini beans in the colander under the tap, add these to the baked beans and mash them with a potato masher.
4- Grate the carrots and add to the beans along with the chutney, sweet chilli sauce and breadcrumbs.
5- Shape into 6 cakes and put on prepared baking tray.
6- Cook in oven for 15 minutes and cool on tray for 5 minutes.
7- Serve in buns with lettuce.

9e4dfd210d.ingredients: 2 sheets of puff pastry, 2 golden delicious apples, 1/3 cup sugar, pinch of salt, 1/2 tsp cornstarch, 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon, pinch of nutmeg, 1 tsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp unsalted butter, 1 slightly beaten egg with 1 tbsp of water (for glaze),
9e4dfd210d.instructions:
1- Peel and dice the apples in small cubes.
2- Mix the sugar, salt, cornstarch, Cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon juice and set aside.
3- Let it rest for 10 min.
4- Cut the puff pastry in 4 or 5 large rectangles and then all in half.
5- Fill each individual rectangle with the apple filling that has been drained to avoid excess moisture.
6- Then add 2 small cubes of butter.
7- Brush the edge with the egg wash and fold.
8- Use a fork to seal.
9- Brush more egg wash on top and sprinkle sugar.
10- Make a small cuts to help the air scape.
11- Put them in a cookie pan with parchment paper and grease it with butter.
12- Bake them at 350 for 15-20 min.

1d638fa0e4.ingredients: 13 cup Greek yogurt (95 grams or just over 3 ounces), 13 cup hummus ((90 grams/3 ounces), 1 medium eggplant (300 grams/91/2 ounces), 500 g ground beef (16 ounces or just over 1/2 ounce), 4 garlic cloves, minced (or more or less depending on taste preferences), 1 tablespoon tomato paste or 2 teaspoons dried australian bush tomatoes, 1 small brown onions (80 grams or just under 3 ounces) or 1 small yellow onion, finely chopped (80 grams or just under 3 ounces), 1 fresh small red Thai chile, finely chopped, 12 cup fresh basil, finely chopped, 12 cup stale breadcrumbs (35 grams or just over 1 ounce), 1 egg, 1 loaf Turkish bread, cut into quarters (430 grams/131/2 ounces) or 4 crusty rolls, halved (such as ciabatta), salad greens, to serve (such as baby spinach leaves or rocket),
1d638fa0e4.instructions:
1- Combine the yoghurt and hummus in a small bowl.
2- Cut the eggplant (aubergine) into 6 slices lengthways; discard the 2 skin-side pieces (or put in your freezer bag of vegetable peelings etc.
3- for using to make vegetable stock (see note above).
4- Preheat the grill or barbecue.
5- Combine the beef, garlic, tomato paste (or dried Australian Bush Tomato), onion, chilli, basil, breadcrumbs and egg in a large bowl; shape the mixture into 4 patties; cook the patties and eggplant, in batches, on the heated oiled flat grill or barbecue until browned on both sides and cooked through.
6- Halve the bread pieces (or rolls) horizontally; toast, cut-sides up; spread the cut-sides with the yoghurt mixture; sandwich the eggplant, patties and salad greens between the toasted pieces of bread or roll.

query: I want to make a lunch I can bring to school from leftover Thanksgiving turkey

options.07db8009c5: Stuffing balls made of leftover meat stuffing, egg, and cheese

7d71c4a5df.ingredients: 2 slice Leftover Turkey breast, 2 tbsp hummus (I used roasted red pepper hummus), 2 slice bread of your choice, 1 small handfull of baby spinach,
7d71c4a5df.instructions: 1- toast bread, spread one tablespoon of hummus in each slice, and assemble sandwich

836ce325a0.ingredients: 1 Large (about 13 Lb. Size) Turkey, Thawed Completely, 2 cloves Garlic, Minced, 2 whole Lemons, Zested, Then Cut In Half, 1/4 cups Minced Flatleaf Parsley, 2 Tablespoons Minced Fresh Sage, 2 teaspoons Fresh Thyme Leaves, 1/2 cups Coconut Oil, Kosher Salt And Freshly Ground Black Pepper, 1 Large Yellow Onion, Cut Into Thick Rings, 2 cups White Wine (optional), 4 cups Turkey (or Chicken) Broth,
836ce325a0.instructions:
1- First, make sure turkey is properly and completely thawed.
2- This is best done in the refrigerator over a day or two.
3- Make sure you remove the neck and innards from the cavity.
4- (I like to keep the neck for gravy and dispose of the organs, but you do what you like with those little guys!)
5- Rinse and pat dry the turkey, then let it come to room temperature for about 30 minutes.
6- Truss the bird.
7- Note about roasting time: As a general rule, roast the turkey for 1213 minutes per pound, For that gorgeous brown color, roast it at 400 degrees F for the initial 30 minutes, then lower the temperature to 350 degrees F and roast for the remainder of the cook time.
8- (If you dont care so much about the color and would rather not have to worry about changing the oven temperature, you can simply roast the turkey at 350 degrees F for the entire roasting time.)
9- Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (or 350 degrees F if desired) and remove the extra racks.
10- You want your rack low in the oven so the turkey has plenty of room.
11- Prepare a roasting pan with a roasting rack, so the bottom of the bird doesnt braise in its own juice.
12- In the bottom of the roasting pan, put the turkey neck, onion rings, broth, and wine.
13- In a medium bowl, mash together the lemon zest, garlic, parsley, sage, thyme, and coconut oil until it forms a paste.
14- Coat the turkey in a thick layer of the coconut oil mixture.
15- Generously season with kosher salt and pepper.
16- Place the lemon halves into the cavity of the bird.
17- Transfer the whole thing to the roasting rack set in the roasting pan.
18- Place the turkey on the lowest rack in the oven.
19- If starting at 400 degrees F, cook for 30 minutes, then reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F and continue roasting for the remaining cook time, about 2 hours and 15 minutes more for a 13-pound bird (for a total roasting time of 2 hours 45 minutes).
20- If starting at 350 degrees F, simply roast the turkey at that temperature for the entire time (2 hours 45 minutes for a 13-pound bird).
21- Every 45 minutes or so, I like to baste the turkey with the juices in the bottom of the pan.
22- When the turkey is done, the skin should be golden brown, the juices should run clear, and a thermometer inserted deep into the thigh should read 160 degrees F. Remember that as the turkey rests, it will continue to cook.
23- Remove the turkey from the oven and let it rest for at least 20 minutes before carving.
24- Display the whole roasted turkey for the buffet if you wish, or begin carving.

07db8009c5.ingredients: 2 cups left over prepared stuffing, 1 egg, any left over cooked vegetables (optional), left over shredded cheese (optional),
07db8009c5.instructions:
1- Mix all ingredients together and form into balls.
2- Place on a greased baking sheet and bake at 350F for about 8 minutes or until warmed and "set".

0ec1ad1d3f.ingredients: 6 cups chicken broth or 6 cups turkey broth, 14 cup uncooked white rice, 14 cup raw wild rice, 1 cup green onion, chopped fine, 12 cup butter, 12 cup flour, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 2 cups milk, 3 cups cubed cooked turkey, 8 slices bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled, 3 tablespoons sherry wine, 1 cup mushroom, sliced, 1 dash cayenne,
0ec1ad1d3f.instructions:
1- I boil my turkey bones for stock and use that rather than chicken broth.
2- Combine broth, rice, and onions.
3- Bring to a boil.
4- Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes.
5- In a medium sauce pan, melt butter.
6- Stir in the flour, salt and pepper.
7- Cook 1 minute stirring until smooth and bubbly.
8- Slowly stir in the milk and cook until slightly thickened.
9- Slowly add the milk mixture into the rice mixture, stirring slowly until well blended.
10- Add remaining ingredients and heat gently.
11- Do not boil.
12- Garnish with crisp bacon bits.

615148538a.ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds ground sage pork sausage, 4 onions, chopped, 2 stalks celery, chopped, 6 cups crumbled cornbread, 6 cups cubed soft white bread, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 eggs, lightly beaten, 2 teaspoons poultry seasoning, 1 teaspoon steak sauce, 1 tablespoon salt,
615148538a.instructions:
1- Place the sausage in a skillet over medium heat.
2- Cook, breaking sausage apart with a fork, until evenly brown.
3- Set aside, reserving pan drippings.
4- Mix onions and celery into skillet, and cook in the pan drippings until browned.
5- Drain remaining drippings.
6- In a large bowl, toss together the sausage, onions and celery, cornbread, white bread, broth, and eggs.
7- Mix in poultry seasoning, steak sauce, and salt.
8- Stuff turkey just before roasting.

7a036956a7.ingredients: 2 cup cold leftover turkey gravy (packed), 2 cup cold leftover shredded turkey (packed), 4 tbsp olive oil or butter (seperated), 1 tsp garlic powder, 2/3 cup small diced onion, 1/2 cup small diced green pepper, 2/3 cup small diced mushrooms, 1 salt and pepper to taste, 8 slice toast,
7a036956a7.instructions:
1- me n my fiance came up with this recipe this morning when we opened the fridge and it threw up on us because it was so stuffed with leftovers from thanksgiving.
2- this a nice twist on an old classic shit on a shingle..I hope u enjoy it!
3- in a skillet heat 2tbl.
4- oil, add green pepper, onion, mushroom, garlic powder.
5- saute until soft and onion is translucent.
6- add rest of oil and turkey.
7- heat well and toss to coat.
8- add cold gravy.
9- and heat until gravy has melted and is heated through.
10- add salt and pepper to taste.
11- place 2 slices of toast on a plate.
12- place 1/4 of your turkey mix onto both slices of toast.
13- repeat until none left.
14- serve hot!
15- and enjoy!

2f55089d6c.ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans whole tomatoes, 3 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 (340 g) package soy crumbles (I use Yves), 12 cup frozen corn, 5 mushrooms, sliced, 1 green pepper, chopped, 1 red pepper, chopped, 1 jalapeno pepper, minced, 12 cooking onion, chopped, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, coarse salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper,
2f55089d6c.instructions:
1- Put everything in a Crock pot or slow cooker.
2- Cook on low 4-6 hours.
3- This is a very flexible recipe - you can easily vary the vegetables and spiciness according to your own personal preferences.

0147c0e5d9.ingredients: 1 bag of Griller Grounds (frozen), 1/2 medium onion chopped, 1/2 bell pepper chopped, 1 can dark kidney beans, 2 tablespoon cumin or to taste, 2 tablespoon chili powder or to taste, cayenne pepper and sea salt to taste, 2 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cup tomato sauce,
0147c0e5d9.instructions:
1- Over medium heat, in a large saucepan add oil, bell peppers, and onions.
2- Let cook for 3 minutes and then add thawed griller grounds and continue to saute for another 5 minutes.
3- While stirring, add cumin, chili powder, salt and pepper.
4- Cook for 2 minutes more and add kidney beans and tomato sauce.
5- Simmer for 5 minutes on low heat.
6- Taste for seasoning.

a1afd74269.ingredients: 1 lb lean beef, 1 lb breakfast sausage (NOT links), 6 tablespoons chili powder, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 2 teaspoons paprika, 1 large white onion, finely chopped, 3 garlic cloves (minced), 34 teaspoon Mexican oregano (dry), 1 teaspoon salt, 1 12 teaspoons cayenne pepper (optional), 2 tablespoons masa harina flour or 2 tablespoons cornmeal, 8 ounces water,
a1afd74269.instructions:
1- The sausage used for this recipe is pork country style like Jimmy Dean or Owens roll etcetera.
2- Brown meat and onion together in a large 12 inch skillet and drain well.
3- For even lower fat rinse meat with hot water, drain and place back in skillet.
4- Add remaining ingredients into a mixing bowl then stir in 8 ounces of water mixing well, now blend well in with meat and onion mixture.
5- Simmer 30 minutes.
6- You can simmer for hours if you want, just stir every 30 minutes.
7- Chow down.
8- This is great by itself or to make nachos, top cheese enchiladas, frito pie, quite good rolled in a flour tortilla with cheddar etc -- .

49d5ab2765.ingredients: 2 cups Dried Pinto Beans, 2 cups Dried Navy Beans, 3 cups Water, 32 ounces, weight Vegetable Broth, 1 whole Yellow Onion, Medium, Diced, 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 cloves Garlic, Diced Or Grated, 1 can (14.5 Oz. Size) Fire Roasted Diced Tomatoes With Green Chilies, 1 jar (12 Oz. Size) Salsa, 2 Tablespoons Smoked Paprika, 2 Tablespoons Cumin,
49d5ab2765.instructions:
1- Rinse and soak beans in the crock overnight with 1 inch of water above the beans.
2- In the morning, drain and rinse beans again.
3- Place soaked, drained, rinsed, beans in crockpot and add the water and veggie broth.
4- Saute onions in olive oil over medium high heat until transparent, adding garlic during the last minute of cooking.
5- Add to the crock pot.
6- Add tomatoes, salsa and spices to crockpot.
7- Stir, cover and cook on high for 2 hours then turn to low for 4 hours.
8- Serve with your favorite corn bread or corn chips.
9- Note: I used orca beans instead of pinto beans.
10- They have a slight black-eyed pea flavor and are delicious.
11- They arent easy to find so pinto beans or even black-eyed peas will work fine!

32ca033a74.ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) canspicy chili beans, in sauce,undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, undrained, 1 (14 1/2 ounce) canchili-style chunky tomatoes, undrained, 1 large onion, chopped, 2 -3 teaspoons chili powder, 18 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper,
32ca033a74.instructions:
1- Combine ingredients in the slow cooker.
2- Cover and cook on low heat setting for 5 to 6 hours or until flavors have blended Stir well before serving.

3d21b36b7d.ingredients: 1 teaspoon oil, 2 -4 garlic cloves, minced, 1 lb Yve's veggie ground round (mince meat substitution), 1 tablespoon marmite (yeast extract), 1 red bell pepper, grated or chopped, 1 green bell pepper, grated or chopped, 3 cups passata (tomato sauce), 1 tablespoon white vinegar, 2 teaspoons tomato paste, 12 teaspoon liquid smoke (optional), 1 (15 ounce) can chili beans (kidney beans in chili sauce), 1 (15 ounce) can black beans (or chili beans), 2 tablespoons nutritional yeast, 2 teaspoons paprika (sweet chili powder), 2 -4 teaspoons chili powder (to taste), cayenne, to taste (I use 1/4 tsp), 3 teaspoons cornflour, 1 teaspoon oregano, 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon brown sugar, 1 teaspoon cumin (or to taste), 12 teaspoon coriander, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon cinnamon, salt and pepper, to taste,
3d21b36b7d.instructions:
1- Heat oil in a large skillet.
2- Add garlic, cook 30 sec.
3- Add mince meat substitution and Marmite.
4- Add remaining ingredients.
5- Let simmer 1 - 1-1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
6- Add some water, if it gets too dry.
7- Taste, add more spices if you like.
8- Serve over rice, bulgur wheat, with cornbread or in tortillas with guacamole, vegan sour cream, salad etc.
