27c6a03010.ingredients: 1 package dry yeast, 18 cup warm water, 34 cup all-purpose flour, 34 cup deffated soy flour, 12 teaspoon salt, cornmeal, 12 cup pizza sauce, 4 ounces shredded fat free mozzarella cheese, seasoning,
27c6a03010.instructions:
1- Combine yeast and water and let sit for 10 minutes.
2- Pour the yeast mixture and salt in the flour and mix well.
3- Put the flour in an oiled bowl and cover.
4- Let it sit until double (1 hour).
5- Put some cornmeal in a pizza pan and put the flour on the pan.
6- Spread the pizza onto the pan.
7- Let it sit for 20 minutes.
8- Add pizza sauce, cheese, and toppings.
9- Bake at 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until cheese is melted.
10- Serve.

5501fbfc6e.ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) thin pre-baked prepared pizza crust, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 34 teaspoon italian seasoning, 14 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 2 cups shredded lettuce, 1 cup colby-monterey jack cheese, finely shredded, 34 cup tomatoes, chopped fresh, 7 slices bacon, cooked until crisp,crumbled, sliced ripe olives, optional,
5501fbfc6e.instructions:
1- Pre-heat oven to 400F degrees.
2- Place pizza shell on baking sheet.
3- Heat in oven 5 minutes or until slightly crisp.
4- Remove from oven and let cool slightly.
5- In a small bowl combine cream cheese, Italian seasoning and pepper.
6- Spread on pizza shell to within 1/2 inch of the edge.
7- Sprinkle with lettuce, cheese, tomato and bacon.
8- Top with sliced black olives if desired.
9- Cut pizza into 12 wedges and serve.

506c8fe859.ingredients: 23 cup barbecue sauce, 1 cup roasted boneless skinless chicken breast, chopped, cooking spray, 12 cup smoked gouda cheese, shredded, 12 cup part-skim mozzarella cheese, shredded, 14 cup green onion, sliced, 14 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 2 prepared pizza crust, 12 inch, 1 cup honey, 1 cup chili sauce, 12 cup cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon prepared mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 12 teaspoon pepper, 12 teaspoon garlic (minced), 2 drops liquid smoke (2 to 3 drops),
506c8fe859.instructions:
1- Combine 1/4 cup grill sauce and chicken in a bowl.
2- Toss well; set aside.
3- Prepare grill.
4- Place 1 crust on grill rack coated with cooking spray.
5- Grill 3 minutes or until puffy and golden.
6- Turn crust, grill-mark side up; spread with 3 tbsp grill sauce.
7- Top with half of Gouda, chicken mixture, mozzarella and green onions.
8- Cover; grill 3-4 minutes or until cheese melts and crust is lightly browned.
9- Sprinkle with half of cilantro.
10- Repeat with remaining crust and toppings.
11- Sauce:.
12- Combine all ingredients except liquid smoke in medium saucepan over medium heat.
13- Cook, stirring frequently, 20 to 30 minutes.
14- Remove from heat; add liquid smoke to taste.
15- Serve over grilled chicken, turkey, pork, spareribs, salmon or hamburgers.
16- Yield: 2 Cups.

296eb54011.ingredients: 1 lb lean ground beef, 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil, 1 medium onion, sliced, 1 green bell pepper, sliced, 4 ounces mushrooms, sliced, 14 cup chopped fresh basil, 1 garlic clove, minced, 13 cup italian style seasoned breadcrumbs, 13 cup low-fat milk, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 cup prepared marinara sauce, 14 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese,
296eb54011.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
2- Coat a 12 inch pizza pan with cooking spray, and place it on a large baking sheet with sides.
3- Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat and add onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, and basil.
4- Cook stirring until softened, about 10 minutes.
5- Combine beef, garlic, breadcrumbs, milk, and salt in a large bowl, and mix well.
6- Transfer the meat mixture to a prepared pan.
7- With dampened hands, pat into a 10 inch circle.
8- Top with marinara sauce, and spoon the vegetable mixture over the sauce, then sprinkle with cheese.
9- Bake until the meat is browned and the cheese is melted, approximately 20-30 minutes.
10- Drain off fat, cut into wedges, and serve.

952937b83d.ingredients: 1 fresh spinach, plate full, 2 tablespoons pizza sauce, 3 slices fat free cheese, italian seasoning, additional (optional),
952937b83d.instructions:
1- Toss together spinach and sauce.
2- Tear cheese into 3/4" pieces.
3- Sprinkle cheese and Italian seasoning over spinach.
4- Toss again.
5- Microwave aproximately 30 to 45 seconds.

13c1edc40c.ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can low-sodium tomato paste, 14 cup water, 12 teaspoon dried basil, crushed, 12 teaspoon dried oregano, crushed, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 34 cup chopped green pepper, 34 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 12 cup chopped onions or 12 cup sliced onion, vegetables, in season as desired, 8 ounces shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese,
13c1edc40c.instructions:
1- In a bowl, mix thoroughly tomato paste, water, basil, oregano, garlic powder and red peppers.
2- Spread evenly over an unbaked 12 inch pizza crust.
3- Layer green pepper, mushrooms, onions and other vegetables, if desired, evenly over sauce.
4- Cover with shredded cheese.
5- Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and crust lightly browned.

query: I want to make Caribbean cuisine for my kid so she can grow better

options.30ff2e9db5: Caribbean style chicken with sauce made from soy sauce, pepper sauce, and lime juice
options.347222fc27: Strong black Caribbean coffee with rum
options.39d7f38487: Caribbean dessert made of bananas, nutmeg, and brown sugar
options.43f32bcac6: Caribbean style lemonade from lemon juice, sugar, and a bit of red wine
options.33ba92197e: Caribbean style cream made of yogurt, heavy cream, banana, and coconut rum

30ff2e9db5.ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon peanut oil, 1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, chopped, 3 garlic cloves, coarsely chopped, 12 teaspoon dried thyme, 14 teaspoon black pepper, 14 teaspoon allspice, ground, 14 teaspoon salt, 500 g chicken fillets,
30ff2e9db5.instructions:
1- Puree in blender lime juice, soy sauce, oil, hot pepper sauce, ginger, garlic, thyme, pepper, allspice and salt.
2- Combine marinade with chicken in plastic food-storage bag.
3- Seal.
4- Marinate in refrigerator overnight.
5- Place oven rack in top position.
6- Heat oven to 500F:.
7- Drain chicken; discard marinade.
8- Pat dry.
9- Arrange in roasting pan.
10- Roast on top rack in 500F: oven 25 minutes for breasts, 30 minutes for thighs and drumsticks, or until instant-read thermometer registers 170F: without touching bone.

347222fc27.ingredients: 3 cups strong black coffee, 23 cup dark rum, 2 tablespoons sugar, 2 teaspoons coconut extract, whipped cream,
347222fc27.instructions:
1- Use a 2-quart slow cooker.
2- Stir the coffee, rum, sugar, and extract together in the cooker.
3- Cover and cook on LOW for 4 hours, or on HIGH for about 2 hours.
4- Ladle into mugs and top with whipped cream, if desired.

39d7f38487.ingredients: 4 medium bananas, 14 cup packed brown sugar, 12 cup fresh-squeezed orange juice, 14 teaspoon nutmeg, freshly grated, 12 teaspoon cinnamon, 12 cup sherry wine, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 tablespoons light rum (coconut rum would probably be good here, too),
39d7f38487.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 450 degrees F.
2- Peel the bananas, split them in half lengthwise, then place them in a buttered baking dish (10"x6"x2").
3- Combine the sugar, orange juice, nutmeg, cinnamon and sherry in a saucepan.
4- Heat until sugar is dissolved, then pour over the bananas.
5- Dot with butter.
6- Bake bananas for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the bananas are tender.
7- Baste them once or twice during baking.
8- Remove from oven.
9- Sprinkle with the rum before serving.
10- Serve as-is, or with a scoop of vanilla or coconut ice cream.

43f32bcac6.ingredients: 2 cups fresh lemon juice, 2/3 cup superfine sugar, 4 cups dry red wine, such as Malbec, 1 lemon, thinly sliced into rounds and seeded,
43f32bcac6.instructions:
1- In a large pitcher, combine the lemon juice and sugar and stir until the sugar is dissolved.
2- Add the wine and chill for about 1 hour.
3- Add the lemon slices and serve in punch glasses.

33ba92197e.ingredients: 34 cup coconut yogurt, 34 cup heavy cream, 1 tablespoon coconut rum (such as Malibu), 1 banana, 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar,
33ba92197e.instructions:
1- Stir together the yogurt and cream with the rum; whisk until slightly thickened.
2- Slice the banana and divide the slices between four 1/2 cup ramekins to form a layer at the bottom of each one.
3- Spoon in the thickened yogurt and cream mixture, filling the ramekins equally.
4- Sprinkle about 1 1/2 teaspoon of sugar over each ramekin, and then wrap them in plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator overnight or for the day.
5- Uncover and serve cold from the refrigerator.

3666c94004.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups coarsely chopped fresh pineapple*, 1 tablespoon coarsely chopped fresh cilantro, 1 1/2 teaspoons Jamaican jerk seasoning, 4 teaspoons Land O Lakes Butter, softened, 4 hoagie buns, sliced in half, 4 romaine lettuce leaves, 1/2 pound thinly sliced deli ham, 4 (3/4-ounce) slices Land O Lakes Deli American, cut in half diagonally, 8 thin green bell pepper rings,
3666c94004.instructions:
1- Combine pineapple, cilantro and jerk seasoning in bowl; set aside.
2- Butter bottom half of each bun.
3- Layer each bottom bun half with 1 lettuce leaf, 1/4 ham, 2 cheese halves, 2 bell pepper rings, 1/4 pineapple mixture and top bun half.
4- Serve immediately.
5- *Substitute 1 (15-ounce) can pineapple rings, drained, coarsely chopped.

query: I want to make a Peruvian dessert for my dinner guests

options.04e65201a3: Peruvian cookies sandwiched with caramel Dulce de Leche
options.05931c1f10: Appetizer of Peruvian style chicken soup with potatoes and bell pepper
options.2a49752442: Peruvian chicken breasts that's pan fried until brown on either side, with coca cola and lime juice sauces

04e65201a3.ingredients: 1 12 cups unsalted butter, 1 cup confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons granulated sugar, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon almond extract, 12 teaspoon vanilla extract, 13 cup ground almonds, 3 cups flour, 2 (14 ounce) cans(2 cans) sweetened condensed milk,
04e65201a3.instructions:
1- Cream butter with confectioners' and granulated sugar until fluffy.
2- Stir in remaining ingredients.
3- Wrap and chill 30 minutes.
4- If chilled longer let it warm up until it can be rolled.
5- Or, whack it with a rolling pin until it cooperates.
6- Roll dough out to 1/4" thickness, cut in 2 1/2" circles and place on parchment lined cookie sheet.
7- Bake at 350 for 12-14 minutes.
8- Cool cookie sheets between batches.
9- Cool cookies on wire rack.
10- Carefully (they're fragile cookies) spread some caramel on one cookie and top with another cookie.
11- Dust tops with confectioners' sugar and enjoy immediately having a crisp cookie-the way they were meant to be eaten.
12- They will turn soft after setting.
13- Alternatively the cookies can be filled with the rewarmed caramel as needed.
14- Caramel: Pour both cans of condensed milk in the top of a double boiler over simmering water and simmer on very low heat 2-3 hours, stirring occasionally.
15- Eventually the milk will thicken and brown.
16- Cool well and it will thicken further.
17- Refrigerate until needed.
18- Makes enough for 4-5 dozen cookies.

05931c1f10.ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, & cut in half, salt, to taste, pepper, to taste, 12 cup olive oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 teaspoon garlic, minced, 1 tablespoon serrano chili, seeded & minced, 12 cup fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 cup green peas, 1 cup corn, 12 red bell pepper, chopped, 10 cups chicken broth, 4 yukon gold potatoes, cut in half, 1 cup uncooked white rice,
05931c1f10.instructions:
1- Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
2- Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium-high heat.
3- Stir in the onion, garlic, and serrano chili; cook until the onion has softened, about 1 minute.
4- Add the chicken, and continue to cook for 5 minutes.
5- Stir in the cilantro, peas, corn, and red pepper; cook for 1 minute.
6- Pour in the chicken broth, potatoes, and rice.
7- Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the chicken is opaque and the potatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.

26e4d0cfbe.ingredients: 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed, Spice rub:, 1/2 cup ground cumin, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1/2 cup white vinegar, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 12 cloves garlic, peeled, 3 tablespoons paprika, 2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon smoked paprika, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, or as needed, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons water, or as needed, Sauce:, 1 (8 ounce) container creme fraiche, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 lime, juiced, 2 jalapeno peppers, stemmed, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste,
26e4d0cfbe.instructions:
1- Pat turkey dry with paper towels.
2- Loosen skin over each side of breastbone with a spatula inserted beneath skin.
3- Place cumin, soy sauce, vinegar, vegetable oil, garlic, paprika, black pepper, smoked paprika, and oregano into a blender.
4- Blend spice rub into a thick paste, about 1 minute.
5- Set aside 1/2 cup of rub in a bowl for a later step; pour remaining rub all over turkey and use a spatula to work about 2 tablespoons of mixture beneath the loosened skin on each side of the breast.
6- Rub the mixture over every nook and cranny of turkey.
7- Let turkey stand for 1 hour at room temperature.
8- Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
9- Fold a piece of aluminum foil into a rounded piece about the size of the turkey breast; set foil aside.
10- Place turkey onto a rack set in a large roasting pan.
11- Tie legs together at the bottom with a piece of kitchen twine.
12- Spread 1/4 cup of reserved wet rub into cavity of turkey; retain remaining 1/4 cup for later.
13- Sprinkle entire top and sides of turkey with kosher salt.
14- Roast turkey in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours; place foil tent on turkey breast.
15- Return to oven and continue to roast for about 1 hour and 15 more minutes.
16- Combine remaining 1/4 cup of spice rub with 1 tablespoon vegetable oil and water in a small bowl.
17- Brush mixture over turkey's top, legs, and sides.
18- Roast until until an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a thigh, not touching bone, reads 170 to 175 degrees F (75 to 80 degrees C), about 30 more minutes.
19- Transfer turkey to a serving platter and let rest for at least 20 minutes, reserving drippings in roasting pan.
20- Place creme fraiche, chicken broth, lime juice, jalapeno peppers, and cilantro into a blender and blend until smooth.
21- Pour excess grease out of turkey roasting pan, pour in creme fraiche mixture, and place the roasting pan over a burner set over medium-high heat.
22- Scrape the browned pan drippings into the sauce mixture, bring to a boil, and cook until gravy is reduced by half and thickened, about 10 minutes.
23- Whisk often to prevent lumps.
24- Season gravy with salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
25- Carve and serve turkey with pan gravy.

2a49752442.ingredients: 4 medium boneless skinless chicken breasts, 5 garlic cloves, minced, 5 limes, juice of, 1 (8 ounce) can Coca-Cola, salt and pepper, olive oil, to coat bottom of skillet,
2a49752442.instructions:
1- Heat olive oil and place chicken breasts in skillet.
2- Brown on medium heat turning as needed.
3- As soon as chicken is brown add garlic and saute 1 minute.
4- Pour Coca Cola and lime juice over chicken and simmer uncovered on low heat, approximately 20 minutes.
5- Serve over rice along with your favorite vegetable.

28dbb46c71.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup ground toasted hazelnuts, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 6 tablespoons honey, 2 eggs,
28dbb46c71.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2- Combine flour, hazelnuts, and baking powder.
3- In a large bowl, beat butter and honey until smooth.
4- Beat in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
5- Gradually blend in the dry ingredients.
6- Divide dough in half.
7- On prepared baking sheet, form each half into a log about 12 inches long and 2 inches wide, spacing about 2 inches apart.
8- Bake for 14 to 16 minutes until golden brown.
9- Transfer logs to a cutting board and cut on diagonal into 1/2 inch thick slices.
10- Lay slices on ungreased baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes longer -- until dry.
11- Transfer to wire racks to cool.
12- Store in a tightly sealed container and let them age for a few days before serving.

fb7d1ed8cf.ingredients: 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 13 cup sugar, 1 12 cups milk, butter,
fb7d1ed8cf.instructions:
1- Combine and blend all ingredients in blender.
2- Before pouring each pancake in the pan, slice a piece of butter so that the pancakes don't stick.
3- Pour 2 large spoonfuls of mix into pan and move the pan around so the mix spreads to be thinner.
4- Flip and enjoy!

query: I want dessert with dulce de leche for a hot summer day

options.6e1438b7be: Popsicle made from applesauce and dulche de leche
options.38e7486d1a: Caramel cupcake with dulche de leche
options.6a7da6e877: Coffee spiked with dulce de leche
options.21de73895c: Summer meringue dessert made of strawberry and kiwi meringue
options.6e3cb6ddb5: Salty Pimp Ice Cream Cone Fakeout

triples: (user, shown allergy to, brown sugar bubbletea)

6e1438b7be.ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened applesauce, 14-13 cup dulce de leche,
6e1438b7be.instructions:
1- Pour applesauce into your popsicle moulds until 2/3 full (keep in mind they will expand once frozen).
2- Drop some dulce de leche into the centre and lightly push down into the applesauce.
3- If your moulds are tall and slim, drop smaller quantities and repeat a few times so there is caramel all along the pop.
4- Fill the rest of the moulds with applesauce.
5- Place sticks and freeze until solid.

38e7486d1a.ingredients: 1 (18.25-ounce) box golden butter cake mix (recommended: Duncan Hines), 1 stick unsalted butter, room temperature, 2/3 cup milk, 3 eggs, 1/2 (13.4-ounce) can dulce de leche, Gold dragees, for decorating, 2 cups heavy cream, cold, 1 1/2 (13.4-ounce) cans dulce de leche,
38e7486d1a.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line 2 (12-cup) muffin tins with gold foil cupcake liners.
2- In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, butter, milk, and eggs.
3- Using a hand mixer beat on medium speed for 2 minutes, scraping down the sides of the bowl to be sure the batter is well incorporated.
4- In a small bowl, mix together the 1/2 can of dulce de leche with 1 cup of cake batter and set aside.
5- Using an ice-cream scoop, fill the muffin tins halfway to the top with the batter.
6- Spoon a level tablespoon of the dulce de leche mixture into each cupcake liner, and with a butter knife swirl it into the batter.
7- Bake until the tops are golden brown, and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 10 to 12 minutes.
8- Remove the cupcakes from the oven and cool in the tins for 5 minutes.
9- Transfer the cupcakes to a cooling rack to cool completely.
10- Frosting: In a cold mixing bowl, beat the cold heavy cream with a hand mixer until just before soft peaks form.
11- Add the dulce de leche and beat until well incorporated and soft peaks form.
12- Frost each cupcake with the caramel frosting, and sprinkle with gold dragees.
13- Arrange the cupcakes on a serving tray and serve.

6a7da6e877.ingredients: 4 cups Brewed Coffee (your Favorite Blend), Bailey's Irish Cream, To Top Off The Coffee (We Used Original), 2 Tablespoons Dulce De Leche (heaping),
6a7da6e877.instructions:
1- Start by brewing coffee.
2- When its finished, pour the coffee into mugs for individual servings.
3- Top off each mug with Baileys Irish Cream.
4- Scoop a heaping tablespoon of dulce de leche and quickly swirl it into the coffee, until the thick dulce de leche is melted by the hot coffee.

6e19304554.ingredients: 500ml cream, 395g can condensed milk, 150g OREO* Original Cookies , crushed,
6e19304554.instructions:
1- Beat the cream and condensed milk until thick and frothy.
2- Fold through the biscuit pieces, pour into a flat freezer-safe dish.
3- Freeze until firm.

21de73895c.ingredients: 4 egg whites (about 1/2 cup), 1 cup sugar, 14 teaspoon lemon juice, 14 teaspoon white vinegar, 18 teaspoon salt, 1 cup heavy cream, 2 cups strawberries (or other sliced fruit or berries), 2 kiwi fruits, sliced (or berries),
21de73895c.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 250-degrees F.
2- Using cooking spray spray pizza pan (12-14-inch round) or grease with butter and flour pan, shaking off excess.
3- Beat egg whites until stiff.
4- Gradually add sugar, lemon juice, vinegar and salt.
5- With a rubber spatula, spread meringue mixture into prepared pan, pushing it up around the edges to form a raised edge about 1/4- 1/2-inch wide.
6- Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour 15 minutes- 1 1/2 hours.
7- Remove from oven and let cool.
8- Whip cream until soft peaks form.
9- Spread whipped cream over meringue and top with strawberries and kiwi (or use other summer fruit, but I like using two different fruits of different colors and textures).
10- If desired, add a dab of whipped cream in center with a strawberry fan as a decoration.
11- Serve immediately and refrigerate any leftovers.

6e3cb6ddb5.ingredients: 3 cups Vanilla Ice Cream, 6 whole Wafer Ice Cream Cups (see Photo), 1/2 cups Generous, Canned Dulce De Leche, 3/4 teaspoons Sea Salt, 1 container (7 1/4 Oz. Size) Chocolate Magic Shell, 18 teaspoons Scant, Ground Cinnamon (optional), 18 teaspoons Scant, Chili Powder (optional), 3 whole Small Paper Plates,
6e3cb6ddb5.instructions:
1- Soften ice cream at room temperature for about 10 minutes.
2- Meanwhile, make the drip trays by tracing the top of the cone on the center of each paper plate.
3- Cut out a hole that is about 1/8 inside the line (you want the hole to be slightly smaller than the outline you just drew).
4- Place dulce de leche in a microwaveable bowl and microwave for about 10 seconds or until it turns into a spreadable consistency.
5- Spread half of the ice cream into a 4-cup capacity plastic container.
6- Spread or drizzle 2 tablespoons of the dulce de leche onto the ice cream.
7- Top with the remaining ice cream.
8- Spread or drizzle on 2 more tablespoons of dulce de leche.
9- Cover tightly with a lid and freeze about 1 hour.
10- Using a knife or spoon, spread 1 teaspoon of the remaining dulce de leche on the inside of an ice cream cup.
11- Sprinkle about 1/16 teaspoon of the sea salt into the cup.
12- Repeat for the remaining cups.
13- Add the cinnamon and chili powder into the Magic Shell container.
14- Shake vigorously for 1 minute.
15- Remove ice cream from freezer.
16- Place two scoops of ice cream into a cup.
17- Sprinkle with 1/16 teaspoon of sea salt.
18- Slip the cone into the drip tray so it sits just below the lip of the cup.
19- Slowly squeeze a little bit of the Magic Shell on the ice cream, rotating and tilting the cup slightly to spread the chocolate.
20- Allow it to firm up slightly.
21- Repeat several times until the ice cream is covered in chocolate.
22- Carefully slide the cup out of the drip tray, wipe the tray clean, and reuse (use the backup drip trays if needed).
23- Assemble the remaining cups.
24- Enjoy!

query: I want to make Chinese stir fry but I ran out of soy sauce

options.1d51eaf661: Stir fry made of bok choy and shrimp
options.010e5348c9: Rice and shrimp stir fry with soy sauce and ground ginger for flavour
options.1af424c116: Stir fry from Italian sausage and flavoured with Italian cheese
options.59cb818e23: Chicken and brocoli stir fry with soy sauce
options.0350df07b7: Hawaiian vegetable stir fry with pineapple juice and soy sauce
options.1ef28bd950: Pork and Komatsuna Greens Chinese Stir Fry

1d51eaf661.ingredients: 3 head Bok choy, 25 Shrimp, 2 tbsp Sake, 1 tsp Sugar, 1/3 tsp Chinese chicken stock powder, 2 tbsp Water, 1 tsp Katakuriko, 1 tbsp Vegetable oil, 1 dash each Sake, salt,
1d51eaf661.instructions:
1- De-vein and shell the shrimps.
2- Sprinkle sake and salt on the shrimp.
3- Separate the leaves and stems of bok choy.
4- Heat vegetable oil in a pan, and stir fry the bok choy stems.
5- Add shrimp to the pan.
6- When shrimp colour slightly changes, add the bok choy leaves and stir fry.
7- Add the seasonings marked .
8- Season with a little salt (not listed).
9- I cooked baby scallops and bok choy together.
10- This is tasty too.

010e5348c9.ingredients: 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 3/4 cups Swanson Chicken Stock, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil (optional), 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 pound fresh or thawed frozen medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 4 cups cut-up fresh vegetables (see Note), 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder, 4 cups hot cooked regular long-grain white rice,
010e5348c9.instructions:
1- Stir the cornstarch, stock, soy sauce and sesame oil in a small bowl until the mixture is smooth.
2- Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat.
3- Add the shrimp and stir-fry until they're cooked through.
4- Remove the shrimp from the skillet.
5- Heat the remaining vegetable oil in the skillet.
6- Add the vegetables, ginger and garlic powder and stir-fry until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
7- Stir the cornstarch mixture in the skillet.
8- Cook and stir until the mixture boils and thickens.
9- Return the shrimp to the skillet and cook until the mixture is hot and bubbling.
10- Serve over the rice.

1af424c116.ingredients: 1 12 lbs sweet Italian sausage or 1 12 lbs hot Italian sausage, 1 large red onion, sliced, 1 large red pepper, chopped, 1 garlic clove, chopped, 1 lb Italian cut green beans, thawed or 1 lb fresh green beans, trimmed, 14 cup red wine vinegar, 14 teaspoon oregano (dried or fresh ), 14 teaspoon basil (dried or fresh), your favorite type Italian cheese, to your taste,
1af424c116.instructions:
1- In a large pan, cook sausages on all sides, pricking to allow juices to flow out.
2- Cook till done, or around 15 minutes.
3- Remove from pan and cool.
4- Add onion, pepper, and garlic to the drippings in the pan.
5- Saute this for about 5 minutes.
6- Stir in the green beans and cook on high heat for about 5 - 7 minutes, til tender but slightly crisp.
7- Meanwhile, cut sausage into thick slices and return to pan along with the vinegar, oregano and the basil.
8- Stir over high heat for around 5 minutes, and season with salt to taste.
9- Serve with cooked pasta and any favorite Italian cheese, parmesean, fontina, mozarella -- .

59cb818e23.ingredients: 3 boneless chicken breasts, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 12 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 garlic clove, 12 tablespoon cooking oil, 2 cups broccoli florets, 1 cup sliced celery, 1 cup thinly sliced carrot, 1 small onion, chopped, 12 cup water, 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granule,
59cb818e23.instructions:
1- Cube chicken and toss in bag with cornstarch.
2- Add soy sauce, ginger and garlic.
3- Toss well and refrigerate 1/2 hour.
4- Cook chicken in wok.
5- Remove from wok.
6- Add oil to wok and cook vegetables until tender.
7- Add water and bouillon.
8- Stir well.
9- Add chicken, cook until hot and bubbley.

0350df07b7.ingredients: 23 cup pineapple juice, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 12 teaspoon ground ginger, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon cornstarch (plus 1 tsp cornstarch), 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil (plus 1 tsp), 1 cup onion, sliced 1/4-inch thick, 1 cup green pepper, sliced 1/4-inch thick, 12 cup carrot, sliced 1/4-inch thick, 1 cup broccoli, cut into small flowerets, 1 cup cauliflower, cut into small flowerets, 12 cup sliced water chestnuts, 1 cup sliced mushrooms, 1 12 cups Chinese cabbage, coarsely shredded,
0350df07b7.instructions:
1- In a small bowl, combine all sauce ingredients (first 6 ingredients, up to and including sugar).
2- Mix until cornstarch is dissolved; set aside.
3- Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
4- Add onions, green pepper, and carrots.
5- Cook 3 to 4 minutes, stirring constantly with a tossing motion.
6- Add broccoli, cauliflower, and water chestnuts.
7- Cook, stirring, 2 to 3 minutes, until broccoli is bright green.
8- Add mushrooms and cabbage.
9- Cook, stirring, 1 minute.
10- Stir sauce and add to vegetables.
11- Cook, stirring, until sauce is thickened and vegetables are glazed, about 1 minute.

1ef28bd950.ingredients: 100 grams Pork (offcuts), 1 Egg, 1/2 bunch Komatsuna, 1/2 clove Garlic (finely chopped), 1/2 knob Ginger (finely chopped), 1/2 tsp Chicken stock powder, 1 tbsp Sake, 1 dash Salt and pepper, 1 for frying Oil,
1ef28bd950.instructions:
1- Cut the komatsuna into 4cm pieces.
2- Break open and beat the egg.
3- Heat oil in a frying pan and pour in the egg.
4- Cook while mixing from the bottom.
5- When it's about halfway done, remove from the frying pan.
6- Add more oil, then the garlic and ginger.
7- When they become fragrant, fry the pork.
8- When the pork has browned, add the komatsuna stems and once they've cooked slightly, add the leaves.
9- Pour in the sake and the soup powder and lightly mix it all together.
10- Return the egg to the pan, season with salt and pepper, quickly fry and serve.

query: Could I have some sweet dim sum?

options.071dda0503: Wonton dumpling made from ground pork and shrimp
options.8633236dbd: Shanghainese dumpling with prawn, chicken, and chinese cabbage as filling
options.0fab1b497a: Pot stickers stuffed from mushrooms and ground pork

8be6b7fc04.ingredients: red food coloring, 1 cup vegetable shortening, plus, 3 tablespoons vegetable shortening, 1 cup sugar, 1 egg, beaten, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt,
8be6b7fc04.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
2- Pour a few drops of red food coloring into a small bowl, and set aside.
3- With an electric mixer, beat the shortening together with the sugar in a mixing bowl until creamy.
4- Beat in the egg and almond extract.
5- In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
6- Stir the flour mixture into the sugar-shortening mixture, and mix well.
7- Scoop up a scant tablespoon of dough with a spoon, and form into a walnut-sized ball.
8- Place the ball onto an ungreased cookie sheet, and press the ball slightly with your thumb to create a flat spot on top (don't flatten the cookie).
9- Dip the end of a bamboo chopstick into the red food coloring, and touch the center of each cookie to make a red dot.
10- Bake in the preheated oven until slightly browned, 15 to 18 minutes.
11- Cool on a rack.

071dda0503.ingredients: 12 lb ground pork, 12 lb shrimp, shelled and deveined, 2 garlic cloves, 1 green chili pepper, finely chopped, seeded and membrane removed (jalapeno), 2 shallots, finely chopped, 14 cup water chestnut, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, grated, 1 tablespoon low sodium soy sauce, plus some for dipping, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 1 small egg, beaten, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 12 lemon, juiced, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 (10 ounce) package wonton wrappers, 1 head savoy cabbage, for lining the steamer (optional),
071dda0503.instructions:
1- Mix together the pork, shrimp, chili, ginger and shallots and water chestnuts.
2- Blend the cornstarch with half the egg and stir into the pork mixture with the soy sauce and rice wine.
3- Season to taste with salt and pepper.
4- Arrange the wonton wrappers on a work surface.
5- Dip tablespoon in cold water and then drop 1 tablespoon of filling onto the center of each wrapper.
6- Brush the wrappers with the remaining egg and pull up the edges, pinching together lightly at the top, leaving a small gap so the filling can just be seen.
7- Prepare the steamer by adding water to the wok and bring to a boil (the water should not touch the bottom of the steamer basket).
8- Spray the bottom of the steamer basket with non-stick oil and line with the optional.whole cabbage leaves.
9- Stand the dumplings in the steamer in a single layer without letting them touch.
10- Set the bamboo steamer over the pot, then cover with the bamboo lid.
11- Steam for 10-12 minutes, or until the filling feels firm and is cooked through.
12- (Watch the water level adding more water as needed).
13- Serve in the steamer basket with dipping sauce.

8633236dbd.ingredients: 450 g Chinese cabbage, 150 g prawns, chopped finely, 50 wonton skins, 100 g skinless chicken (chopped finely or beef with no fat), 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 12 tablespoon oyster sauce, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon ginger juice (20 g ginger, pounded and mix with 2 tbsp of water), black mushroom, sliced thinly and fried with small amount of oil in a non-stick pan. (or bean curd) (optional), 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 6 red chilies, pounded, 12 inch gingerroot, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 12 cup boiling water,
8633236dbd.instructions:
1- Blanch cabbage until soft and slice thinly.
2- Mix meat, cabbage and prawn with seasoning.
3- Scoop 1 tsp of the mixed ingredients onto the wanton skin.
4- Apply a small amount of water at the side of the wanton skin, gather up the skin to make a little "purse" out of them, and tie with a chive, or thin layer of a green onion.
5- Boil water in a pot and cook dumplings for 3 - 5 minutes.
6- Scoop dumplings and place on a plate.
7- Serve with sauce:.
8- Combine all ingredients together with boiling water.
9- 10 dumplings/ Serves 5.

0fab1b497a.ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour, 12 teaspoon salt, 1 cup warm water, 4 dried black dried Chinese mushrooms, 8 ounces ground pork, 14 cup scallion, minced, 1 teaspoon gingerroot, minced, 2 tablespoons chicken stock, 1 egg, beaten, 3 teaspoons soy sauce, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 18 teaspoon white pepper, ground, 2 teaspoons oyster sauce, 1 tablespoon dry sherry (Shao Hsing wine), 2 cups napa cabbage, finely chopped, 1 teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 12 cup hot water,
0fab1b497a.instructions:
1- For the wrappers:.
2- Put flour and salt into a food processor bowl with metal blade attached and affix the cover.
3- Turn on the motor and slowly begin adding water through the chute until dough forms into a loose ball around the blade.
4- You may not need all the water --
5- Place dough on a lightly floured surface and knead for about a minute.
6- Shape into ball and place in a bowl covered with plastic wrap for 30 minutes at room temperature.
7- Place the dough on a lightly floured surface.
8- Divide into thirds.
9- Return 2/3rds to the bowl and cover with a damp cloth.
10- Roll the remaining third into a cylinder about 12 inches long by 1 inch wide.
11- Cut into 1 inch pieces.
12- Either press each piece with a tortilla press or place a piece of dough between your hands with the cut sides against the palm and squeeze flat.
13- Using a small tapered rolling pin roll the dough out to 2-1/2 inch diameter keeping the center thicker than the edges.
14- Repeat with the remaining wrappers, placing them on a floured plate and cover with a damp towel until ready to use.
15- For the Filling:.
16- Soak the dried mushrooms in warm water that covers them for about 30 minutes or until soft and pliable.
17- When reconstituted, squeeze out the excess water and mince.
18- The packaging for these mushrooms usually gives a quicker way to reconstitute using boiling water.
19- Place ground pork in bowl, add mushrooms, scallion, ginger and chicken stock.
20- Mix well.
21- Add the remaining filling ingredients minus the cabbage and salt (will be added later) and the canola oil and water (used for cooking).
22- Mix well until tacky.
23- Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.
24- Place the chopped cabbage in a bowl and sprinkle with the salt.
25- Mix by hand and set aside for 10 minutes.
26- Place the cabbage in a kitchen towel or strong paper towel and squeeze out the excess water.
27- Set aside.
28- Prepare pot sticker wrappers.
29- Mix reserved cabbage into filling mixture just before making the dumplings.
30- Assembly Instructions:.
31- Have a small bowl of water near at hand, a plate and oiled cookie sheet for the dumpling assembly.
32- Place a heaping teaspoon or desired amount of filling into the center of the wrapper.
33- Rub a thin line of water from a bowl around the edge and fold in half making a half moon shape.
34- Starting from one end, pleat one edge of the dough in an over-lapping fashion and pinch to seal.
35- The shape will turn out to be a slightly off center crescent.
36- Place on an oiled cookie sheet until ready to bake or freeze.
37- See uploaded pictures for a better idea of what the end product looks like.
38- Cooking Instructions:.
39- Heat a heavy frying pan to hot over medium heat and coat the bottom with one tablespoon of canola oil.
40- Off heat, arrange the dumplings in the pan flat side down, allowing space between each.
41- Pan-fry the dumplings at medium heat until the bottoms turn light golden brown.
42- Pour in hot water, cover immediately with a slightly cocked lid and cook for 5 to 6 minutes.
43- All water should evaporate.
44- Pour in remaining 2 tablespoons of oil (do not pour onto dumplings).
45- Fry uncovered until the undersides of the dumplings are golden brown and crisp.
46- Serve with your favorite soy sauce / chili pepper oil / vinegar dip.
47- See Recipe #469900 #469900 for the ingredients / instructions.

2f25118380.ingredients: 1 (11 ounce) package refrigerated dinner rolls, 12 cup Chinese barbecue pork, shredded (cooked), 1 tablespoon parsley, chopped, 2 tablespoons fine breadcrumbs, 1 tablespoon oil, 2 teaspoons dark soy sauce,
2f25118380.instructions:
1- Using a small spoon, scoop out the inside of each roll, trying to keep the opening as small as possible.
2- Combine all other ingredients and stuff the mixture into the rolls.
3- Heat according to package directions for rolls and serve.

88b25f4193.ingredients: 12 slices white bread, 1 lb. raw shrimp, shelled and cleaned, 1 egg white, 1 tbsp. rice wine, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. minced ginger root, 1 tbsp. minced green onion, 1/4 cup minced water chestnuts, 2 tbsp. cornstarch, 4 cups peanut oil for deep frying,
88b25f4193.instructions:
1- Remove the crusts from the bread.
2- Dice the bread into 1/4-inch cubes.
3- Place on a cookie sheet and dry out in a very low oven (200F/90C).
4- Pat the shrimp dry and mince in a food processor or blender.
5- Blend in all the remaining ingredients except the oil.
6- With wet hands, shape the shrimp paste into 1-inch balls and roll in the bread cubes.
7- Press the cubes firmly into the shrimp mixture.
8- Heat the oil in a wok or deep, wide pot to 375 F. Cook the shrimp balls in batches until nicely browned and cooked through (this should only take 4 to 5 minutes).
9- Drain on paper towels.
10- Makes approx.
11- 36 balls.

query: I want to cook some Asian comfort food but I'm sick of eating beef

options.1544d858d3: Chinese meat balls made from ground pork and water chestnut, with a side of bok choy
options.86b46a493c: Soup made with beef bones, potatos, carrots and celery
options.9cfa3ba3cc: Comfort food made from ground beef, celery, and mushrooms
options.6b54d3af6f: Noodles in a beef broth with baby bok choy and strip steaks
options.55bd249a65: Beijing bok choy with sauteed onions, bamboo shoots, and mushrooms
options.121b12b43d: Tender and Juicy Low-Cal Chinese Meatballs

1544d858d3.ingredients: 26 ounces ground pork, 1 cup chopped red onion, 4 chopped garlic cloves, 1 tablespoon chopped ginger, 1 (6 ounce) can water chestnuts, chopped, 2 tablespoons mushroom soy sauce, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 cup peanut oil, 4 whole bok choy, may use Chinese cabbage, black pepper,
1544d858d3.instructions:
1- Combine pork, onion, garlic, ginger and chopped water chestnuts together in a large mixing bowl.
2- Add the soy and sesame oil and mix well to combine.
3- Shape into small balls, about the size of a golfball.
4- Roll in a little flour to bind.
5- Stir fry balls in a wok with a little peanut or vegetable till brown, but not completely cooked.
6- Heat chicken broth in a seperate saucepan or stock pot.bring to a simmer, and add browned pork balls to stock and simmer 1 hour.
7- Add washed and cut bok choy.about the last 10 minutes to cook tender crisp.
8- Serve with steamed rice with some light soy sauce and sesame oil to season.

86b46a493c.ingredients: 4 -6 beef bones, 2 -3 potatoes, cut to quarters, 2 onions, cut to quarters, 2 -3 carrots, sliced, 1 -2 stalk celery & leaves, sliced, 2 whole garlic cloves, 1 parsley root, sliced, 2 bay leaves, 1 tablespoon chicken stock, 8 -10 coriander sprigs, tied to each other, salt, pepper, 1 (200 g) package egg noodles,
86b46a493c.instructions:
1- Put beef bones in a big saucepan.
2- Add all other ingredients, except noodles, putting the leaves at the top.
3- Add water to cover everything by several inches.
4- Bring to boil, then simmer on low heat, not entirely covered for as long as you can (I try to give it at least 3-4 hours for all the tastes to extract).
5- Remove tied coriander sprigs.
6- This step is optional but I greatly recommend it if you are not starving: the bones discharge a lot of fat.
7- Therefore, I let the soup get cold, and then put it in the fridge for 1-2 hours.
8- Then, before eating, I skim the fat off the top, only then I heat the soup again.
9- Adjust seasoning.
10- Prepare noodles according to directions on the package to serve with the soup.
11- Get Well!

9cfa3ba3cc.ingredients: 2 lbs lean ground beef, 1 cup chopped onion, 1 cup chopped celery, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 12 cups sliced fresh mushrooms, 1 tablespoon beef bouillon powder, 2 14 cups boiling water, 14 cup soy sauce, 1 cup long grain white rice, uncooked,
9cfa3ba3cc.instructions:
1- Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink.
2- Drain.
3- Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes.
4- Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water.
5- Add to the beef mixture.
6- Mix well.
7- Stir in the soy sauce and rice.
8- Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender.

6b54d3af6f.ingredients: 8 ounces, weight Chinese Noodles Or Thin Pasta, 1 quart Light Beef Stock, 2 Tablespoons Soy Sauce, 1/2 teaspoons Ginger, grated, 2 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil, For Frying, 4 ounces, weight Mushrooms, Sliced (White, Shitake, Or Portobello), 1 whole Small White Onion, Minced, 2 whole Baby Bok Choy, Chopped, 8 ounces, weight Boneless NY Strip Steak, Sliced Very Thin, 1 bunch Scallions Sliced Thin, 1 Tablespoon Toasted Sesame Oil, 1/4 cups Basil, Chiffonade/Shredded, 1 pinch Salt And Pepper, to taste,
6b54d3af6f.instructions:
1- Cook noodles according to package instructions, then shock with cold water and set aside.
2- In a large soup pot, combine stock, soy sauce, and ginger.
3- Bring to a low simmer.
4- Warm vegetable oil in a fry pan and saute the mushrooms along with half of the minced onion until browned.
5- Add the mushroom mixture to the soup, then repeat with the bok choy and the remaining onions.
6- Slice the steak as thinly as possible and add the strips to the soup.
7- Allow the meat to cook through, then remove the pot from the heat.
8- Add the scallions, sesame oil, and basil, and salt and pepper as needed.
9- The noodles can either be added to the pot, or to soup bowls.
10- Ladle soup into each bowl over or along with the noodles.
11- You can enjoy the noodles as is, or you can add a little crushed red pepper or Siracha Sauce if youd like them hot n spicy.

55bd249a65.ingredients: 1 large bok choy, chopped, 1 cup green onion, chopped (about 5 onions), 1 (8 ounce) cansliced bamboo shoots, drained, 1 (6 1/2 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained, 12 grapefruit, juice of (about 1/2 cup juice), 14 cup rice wine vinegar, 3 tablespoons honey (pref. raw, thick type), 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 12 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 12 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, 1 tablespoon soy sauce,
55bd249a65.instructions:
1- Remove and wash each bok choy rib before chopping.
2- In a small bowl; mix grapefruit juice, rice vinegar, honey, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, and soy sauce.
3- Heat canola oil in a large skillet.
4- Add onions, bamboo shoots, and mushrooms then saute on med-high heat for 3 minutes.
5- Turn heat down to med-low then add bok choy and the marinade.
6- Stir then cover and simmer for 10 minutes until bok choy wilts.
7- (Stir occasionally during this time).
8- After 10 minutes, remove lid and add the sesame oil and sesame seeds.
9- Stir and simmer for 1 more minute.

121b12b43d.ingredients: 200 grams Pork mince (mixed with beef mince is also OK), 1/4 Onion (large), 1 dash Ginger (grated), 4 tbsp Panko, 1 tbsp Katakuriko, 1 Egg, 1 tbsp Sake, 1/2 tbsp Soy sauce, 1/2 tsp Salt, 1 Pepper, 2 tbsp Soy sauce, 2 tbsp Mirin, 1/2 to 1 tablespoon Sugar, 1 tbsp Sake, 1 Umami seasoning (such as Ajinomoto), 100 ml Water, 2 tbsp Soy sauce, 2 tbsp Sugar, 1 tbsp Sake, 1 tbsp Vinegar, 100 ml Water, 1 as required Katakuriko, 2 tsp Sesame oil (or vegetable oil),
121b12b43d.instructions:
1- Combine the meatball ingredients, and mix well.
2- Add some more panko if the mixture is too soft.
3- The resultant meatballs taste better with a softer meatball mixture.
4- Boil water, add salt and sake (not listed in the ingredients), and boil the meatballs.
5- The meatball mixture is quite soft, so shape the mixture into balls right before placing them in the hot water.
6- Look at Helpful Hints as to how to boil the meatballs.
7- Drain the meatballs in a colander after they are cooked through.
8- Pat dry the meatballs with kitchen paper.
9- Coat the meatballs with katakuriko evenly.
10- Make any size of meatballs to your taste.
11- Heat the sesame oil in a frying pan and brown all the sides of the meatballs to allow them to have a good colour and flavour.
12- I fry the meatballs after boiling them, but you don't need to do this.
13- After boiling the meatballs, coat them with the sauce.
14- In this case, thicken the sauce with katakuriko dissolved in water.
15- After the meatballs are browned, add the sauce ingredients of your choice.
16- Simmer slowly over a low heat to let the meatballs absorb the sauce.
17- The katakuriko coating the meatballs thickens the sauce.
18- Reduce the sauce to let it coat the meatballs.
19- Once the sauce is shiny, it is ready.
20- Garnish with the thinly sliced white part of a Japanese leek or sprinkle with sesame seeds to finish.

options.1544d858d3: Chinese meat balls made from ground pork and water chestnut, with a side of bok choy

options.005f166b5f: Chinese pot roast made from beef and served with cabbage
options.01723a7bc7: Chinese stir fried chicken with almonds

1544d858d3.ingredients: 26 ounces ground pork, 1 cup chopped red onion, 4 chopped garlic cloves, 1 tablespoon chopped ginger, 1 (6 ounce) can water chestnuts, chopped, 2 tablespoons mushroom soy sauce, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 4 cups chicken broth, 1 cup peanut oil, 4 whole bok choy, may use Chinese cabbage, black pepper,
1544d858d3.instructions:
1- Combine pork, onion, garlic, ginger and chopped water chestnuts together in a large mixing bowl.
2- Add the soy and sesame oil and mix well to combine.
3- Shape into small balls, about the size of a golfball.
4- Roll in a little flour to bind.
5- Stir fry balls in a wok with a little peanut or vegetable till brown, but not completely cooked.

8- Serve with steamed rice with some light soy sauce and sesame oil to season.

7a98ee1c5a.ingredients: 6 shallots, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 teaspoon very finely chopped fresh ginger, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 tablespoons dry sherry, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 pinch salt, 1 12 lbs chicken wings, 8 ounces fresh bean sprouts, 3 teaspoons cornflour, 34 cup chicken stock,
7a98ee1c5a.instructions:
1- Slice the shallots diagonally, put into a bowl, add the garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sherry, honey and salt, stir well.
2- Add the chicken wings, mix well and put aside for 1 hour.
3- Rinse bean sprouts in cold water, drain thoroughly.
4- Drain the wings, pat dry on paper toweling.
5- Heat about 3 tablespoons oil, add the wings and cook over high heat until browned all over.
6- Reduce heat and cook another 10-15 minutes, or until wings are tender.
7- Mix cornflour with a little water, stir in the stock and remaining marinade.
8- Add to the chicken and stir over high heat until boiling.
9- Add the bean sprouts, reduce heat and cook another 2-3 minutes, or until reheated.
10- Serve with rice.

70e63cadd9.ingredients: 1 13 cups rice, 14 cup vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon salt, 3 cups boiling water, 2 beef bouillon cubes, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1 lb ground beef, 2 medium onions, chopped, 4 celery ribs, chopped, 2 green peppers, chopped,
70e63cadd9.instructions:
1- In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown.
2- ( About 7 minutes.
3- ).
4- Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce.
5- Cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes.
6- Brown ground beef.
7- Drain.
8- Stir meat, onions, celery and green pepper into rice.
9- Cover and simmer 10 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.

005f166b5f.ingredients: 3 to 4 lbs. beef arm or possibly blade pot roast, 3 tbsp. lard or possibly drippings, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 tbsp. soy sauce, 1/3 c. water, 2 quarts. shredded cabbage,
005f166b5f.instructions:
1- Brown meat on all sides in lard; pour off drippings.
2- Add in pepper, soy sauce and water; cover tightly and cook slowly 3 hrs or possibly till meat is tender.
3- Add in cabbage; steam 7 min.
4- Thicken cooking liquid for gravy, if you like.

01723a7bc7.ingredients: 1 chicken breast (cut into small cubes), 2 garlic cloves (minced), 1 teaspoon gingerroot (minced or grated), 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 4 ounces almonds (slivered or halved), 4 ounces snow peas (sliced), 5 ounces water chestnuts (drained and sliced) or 5 ounces bamboo shoots (drained and sliced), 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 14 cup chicken broth, 14 cup sherry wine or 14 cup white wine, 2 teaspoons sugar,
01723a7bc7.instructions:
1- Marinade chicken pieces in garlic,ginger,soy and cornstarch for 15 to 20 minute.
2- Mix sauce ingredients together in small bowl, set aside.
3- Heat wok with 1 tablespoons oil and stir fry almonds until lightly browned; set aside.
4- Heat wok with 1 tablespoons oil; add water chestnuts and snow peas and stir fry for 30 seconds, remove and set aside.
5- Heat wok with 2 tbsp oil and stir fry chicken pieces until they turn white and firm ( about 2 minutes).
6- Add cooked vegetables and almonds to cooked chicken in wok; mix and add sauce mixture.
7- Stir together until sauce thickens slightly.
8- Serve with rice or noodles.

1769f9dd02.ingredients: 1 lb ground turkey, 34 cup breadcrumbs (plain or flavored), 2 tablespoons light soy sauce (or use regular soy sauce), 1 tablespoon dry sherry or 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, 2 teaspoons sesame oil, 1 12 teaspoons gingerroot, minced, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 2 (14 1/2 ounce) cans reduced-sodium chicken broth, divided, 1 cup water, 1 12 cups pea pods, fresh or 6 ounces pea pods, frozen, 1 cup carrot, sliced into thin strips, 1 12 cups bean sprouts, 14 cup green onion, thinly sliced on the diagonal (scallions),
1769f9dd02.instructions:
1- Preheat broiler and spray boiler pan with non-stick cooking spray.
2- Combine ground turkey, bread crumbs, soy sauce, sherry or vinegar, sesame oil, ginger, pepper and 1/r cup chicken broth.
3- Mix well.
4- Form into 1 inch meatballs and place on prepared broiler pan.
5- Broil 6 to 8 inches from broiler about 7 to 10 minutes, until cooked, turning once.
6- Combine meatballs, water, remaining chicken brother in a Dutch oven.
7- Bring to a boil over high heat.
8- Add pea pods and carrot strips and cook 1 or 2 minutes until vegetables are tender crisp.
9- Turn off heat and add bean sprouts and green onions.
10- Serve immediately.

query: I'm on a diet and I'm craving dandan noodles

options.62f88ac2c2: Low calories dandan noodles made with doubanjiang (spicy bean) sauce
options.551778add2: Tasty and healthy diet food: chicken noodle goulash

62f88ac2c2.ingredients: 1 packet Fresh ramen noodles (with soy sauce or miso soup sachet), 1/4 bunch Spinach, 200 grams Pork mince, 1/2 tbsp Vegetable oil, 1 tsp Sugar, 1 tbsp Shaoxing wine or sake, 1 Pepper, 1 tbsp Soy sauce, 1 heaped tablespoon Tianmianjiang, 1/2 tsp Doubanjiang, 1 Toasted white sesame seeds,
62f88ac2c2.instructions:
1- Blanch the spinach in salted water and squeeze out the excess water.
2- Cut into bite sizes.
3- Heat vegetable oil in a frying pan and fry the pork mince.
4- Season with the ingredients.
5- Cook the fresh ramen noodles and add the soup sachets.
6- Put the pork mince on top and spinach.
7- Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
8- This one is miso based.

551778add2.ingredients: 2 cups water, 1 (6 ounce) package egg noodles, 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables, 2 (8 ounce) cans white meat chicken, cubed, 1 (10 3/4 ounce) can low-fat cream of mushroom soup, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 teaspoon paprika,
551778add2.instructions:
1- Bring the water to a boil and add the egg noodles.
2- Cook until the noodles begin to soften.
3- Add the remaining ingredients.
4- Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5- Salt to taste.

783feea9ca.ingredients: 1 cup Chinese Sesame Paste, 2 cloves Garlic, Minced, 1 Tablespoon Soy Sauce, 1 Tablespoon Finely Grated Ginger, 1 Tablespoon Red Chili Pepper Flakes, 1 Tablespoon Chili Oil, 1 Tablespoon Black Rice Vinegar, 1 Tablespoon Vegetable Oil, 1/2 cups Chopped Chinese Pickled Mustard Greens, 2 Tablespoons Blended Sesame Oil, 9 ounces, weight Ground Beef, 1 Tablespoon Szechuan Peppercorns, Grounded, 1/4 teaspoons Salt, 1 pound Asian Wheat Noodles, Chopped Green Onions, To Garnish, Chopped Cilantro To Garnish,
783feea9ca.instructions:
1- Mix together sesame paste (not tahini!
2- ), garlic, soy sauce, ginger, chili flakes, chili oil, black rice vinegar and half a tablespoon of the grounded peppercorns.
3- I use a soup spoon so I can squish and smooth out the paste in the bottom of the bowl so the sauce mixes better.
4- Set this sauce aside.
5- In a skillet, saute the pickled mustard greens in a tablespoon of vegetable oil for three minutes on medium high heat.
6- Set the greens aside in a bowl.
7- In the same skillet (you can use a fresh one if you like to wash dishes), heat a tablespoon of the blended sesame oil on medium high heat; add the ground beef.
8- Break up the meat with a spatula and cook until browned.
9- Season with a half tablespoon of ground peppercorns and a pinch of salt.
10- For the noodles, prepared one pound of Chinese wheat noodles according to the package directions (if you have the salt the water, then youre not using Chinese noodles!).
11- When the noodles are ready, drain and coat the noodles with one tablespoon of blended sesame oil.
12- Transfer the noodles to a large bowl.
13- Mix in the sauce into the noodles; and add more salt and ground peppercorns if necessary.
14- Divide the noodles into six bowls.
15- Top the noodles with the beef, and pickled greens.
16- Garnish with green onions, and/or cilantro.

0b7fca11bc.ingredients: 500 g Asian noodles, cooked according to package directions and drained, 3 tablespoons canola oil, 1 -1 12 tablespoon dark sesame oil, 14 cup soy sauce, vegetables, of your choice (optional), 1 garlic clove, minced (optional), 1 teaspoon fresh ginger, minced (optional),
0b7fca11bc.instructions:
1- Heat oils together in pan.
2- Add noodles and fry for about 3 minutes, over med-high heat.
3- Add veggies if using.
4- Add soy sauce as evenly through the mixture as you can.
5- Add garlic and ginger if using.
6- fry 2 or 3 more minutes more while mixing with your spatula.
7- When it seems done to you, remove from heat and serve!

0fe86a138b.ingredients: 4 cups cabbage (sliced), 1 small onion (chopped), 14 cup butter, 1 lb wide egg noodles (cooked), salt and pepper, sour cream (optional),
0fe86a138b.instructions:
1- Cook Egg Noodles in a salted pot of water.
2- When Noodles are done drain and set aside.
3- In skillet saute Onions in Butter until transparent.
4- Add Cabbage and saute around 5 minutes (or until tender).
5- Mix the cooked Noodles into the skillet.
