6- Add shallots, ginger, snow peas and chile and cook till shallots are browned, about 7 minutes.
7- Add stock and water, bring to simmer for 10 minutes.
8- Meanwhile, divide beef, sprouts and herbs among the bowls.
9- Remove ginger from broth and discard (I did not do this.
10- The recipe called for smashed ginger.
11- How they managed to remove smashed ginger is beyond me.).
12- Stir in fish sauce, lime juice and salt.
13- Ladle into bowl and serve.

587510ce44.ingredients: Kosher salt, One 3 1/2-pound chicken, 2 whole star anise, 2 cardamom pods, 1 teaspoon coriander seeds, One 2 1/2-inch cinnamon stick, 1 teaspoon black peppercorns, 1/2 teaspoon white peppercorns, 1 teaspoon goji berries, 2 shallots, halved, 1 small onion, quartered, 1 leek, halved lengthwise and cut into 2-inch pieces, 1 tablespoon crushed rock sugar or dark brown sugar, 6 ounces dried rice noodles, 1/4 cup canola oil, 3 medium shallots, thinly sliced (1 cup), 1 tablespoon Asian fish sauce, 1/4 cup sliced scallions, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, Bean sprouts, basil sprigs, mint sprigs, thinly sliced jalapenos and lime wedges, for serving,
587510ce44.instructions:
1- In a large stockpot, bring 5 quarts of water to a boil.
2- Add 1 tablespoon of salt and the chicken, breast side down.
3- Place a heatproof plate over the chicken to keep it submerged and bring to a boil.
4- Reduce the heat and simmer the chicken for 30 minutes; it will not be cooked through.
5- Transfer the chicken to a bowl of ice water and let cool completely.
6- Drain well and pat dry.
7- Meanwhile, in a large cast-iron skillet, combine the star anise, cardamom, coriander, cinnamon stick, black and white peppercorns and goji berries.
8- Cook over moderately low heat, stirring, until very fragrant, about 3 minutes.
9- Transfer to a small bowl.
10- In the same skillet, combine the shallots, onion and leek.
11- Cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until deep golden, about 10 minutes.
12- Remove all of the meat from the chicken and coarsely shred it.
13- Return all of the chicken skin and bones to the broth in the stockpot.
14- Add the pan-roasted shallot, onion and leek mixture and bring to a boil.
15- Cover and simmer over moderately low heat for 1 hour.
16- Stir the toasted spices and goji berries into the broth.
17- Cover and simmer for 1 hour longer.
18- Add the rock sugar and simmer for another 30 minutes.
19- Strain the broth into a large bowl, pressing on the solids; discard the solids.
20- Pour the broth into a clean saucepan.
21- Prepare the garnishes: Soak the noodles in a large bowl of boiling water until pliable, 8 to 10 minutes.
22- In a large skillet, heat the oil.
23- Add the shallots and cook over moderate heat, stirring, until golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes.
24- Using a mesh skimmer, transfer the shallots to a paper towellined plate to drain.
25- Let cool.
26- Bring the broth to a simmer.
27- Stir in the shredded chicken and cook until just white throughout, 1 to 2 minutes.
28- Stir in the fish sauce and season the broth with salt.
29- Drain the rice noodles and transfer to large bowls.
30- Ladle the broth and chicken over the noodles.
31- Top with the scallions and cilantro.
32- Garnish with the crispy shallots, bean sprouts, basil, mint and jalapenos and serve with lime wedges.

5b6c807198.ingredients: 8 cups chicken broth, 3 tablespoons fish sauce, 2 teaspoons brown sugar, 6 whole cloves, 4 star anise, 1 cinnamon stick, broken, 3 inches peeled fresh ginger, halved, 4 ounces stick rice noodles (banh pho), cooking spray, 1 medium onion, peeled and halved, 3 cups cooked turkey, shredded, 2 cups fresh bean sprouts, 13 cup thinly sliced green onion, 14 cup thinly sliced fresh Thai basil, 14 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 cup fresh fresh cilantro stem, 12 cup fresh mint sprig, 6 lime wedges, 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and thinly sliced, hoisin sauce (optional),
5b6c807198.instructions:
1- Combine first 7 ingredients in a large stockpot over medium-high heat; bring to a boil.
2- Reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes.
3- Strain broth through a sieve into a large bowl; discard solids.
4- Return broth to pan; keep warm.
5- Cook noodles according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
6- Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat.
7- Coat pan with cooking spray.
8- Add onion; cook 8 minutes or until charred on each side.
9- Remove from heat; cool slightly.
10- Slice onion thinly; add to broth.
11- Add turkey and next 5 ingredients (through salt) to pan; bring to a boil.
12- Cook 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
13- Place about 1/2 cup noodles in each of 6 bowls.
14- Ladle about 1 1/3 cups broth mixture over each serving.
15- Serve with cilantro, mint, lime wedges, and jalapeno.
16- Serve with hoisin and Sriracha, if desired.

cea3d27d3b.ingredients: 300 g rice noodles, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 3 sprigs Thai basil, 6 -8 cloves garlic, peeled,washed and chopped, 125 g bean sprouts, washed,drained,straggly tails removed, 1 small red onion, sliced, 12 small red carrot, julienned, 4 large shiitake mushrooms, shredded, 50 g snap peas, julienned, 2 -3 red chilies, seeded and julienned, 1 spring onion, cut into 5 cms lengths, 1 tablespoon paprika, 1 tablespoon sugar, 85 ml soy sauce, 85 ml lime juice, 3 tablespoons crushed peanuts, 1 limes or 1 lemon, quartered, 3 tablespoons coriander leaves, washed and chopped,to garnish,
cea3d27d3b.instructions:
1- Cook the noodles in boiling water until al dente (cooked but firm to bite).
2- Drain well in a colander.
3- Rinse immediately under cold running water.
4- Drain again.
5- Spread on a large plate and set aside.
6- If your not using them immediately, add a little oil, mix well and set aside.
7- This is to prevent the noodles from sticking to each other.
8- Now, heat oil in a wok or skillet.
9- Once hot, add basil leaves and stir-fry for a few seconds.
10- Remove with a slotted spoon.
11- Drain on a paper towel.
12- Set aside.
13- Add garlic and stir-fry over medium flame for a few seconds.
14- Add the remaining vegetables.
15- Stir-fry until cooked but crunchy (takes about 2 minutes).
16- Add the noodles, paprika, soy sauce, sugar and lime juice.
17- Stir-fry till the noodles are thoroughly mixed with all ingredients and heated through.
18- Transfer to a serving dish.
19- Garnish with fried basil leaves, corriander leaves, peanuts and lime wedges.
20- Serve immediately.
21- Enjoy.
22- Dont eat too much!
23- Always remember the GOLDEN RULE: Eat a little less to eat a little more!

query: It's a cold evening and I want German food

options.69a8ff3d92: German chicken soup with shell noodles
options.9bd8473005: German chocolate cake mixed with ice cream sundae
options.0f1d68c793: German puffed up breakfast pancake from eggs, milk, and flour
options.a0b7d11480: German breakfast from bacon, ham, fried potatoes, eggs, onions
options.27a62d563b: A German bread roll usually eaten in the morning
options.f1462bedb6: Grandma's Old World German Chicken Soup & Dumplings

69a8ff3d92.ingredients: 1 large chicken, 6 stalks celery, 6 large carrots, 2 large onions, 1 cauliflower, 2 leeks, 2 bay leaves, salt and pepper, 3 bouillon cubes, 450 g small shell noodles, fresh parsley,
69a8ff3d92.instructions:
1- Fill a large pot with water and bring to a boil.
2- Add chicken and vegetables (except leeks and parsley).
3- Add salt, pepper and bouillon cubes as well as Maggi.
4- Cook for 1-2 hours until chicken starts falling off the bone.
5- Remove the chicken from the pot and let cool off until you can strip it off the bones and put back into the pot.
6- In the meantime add the sliced leeks and any other frozen vegetables you like (corn, peas, brussel sprouts or frozen cauliflower work well).
7- Add noodles and fresh parsley and cook all for another 10 - 15 minutes.
8- Season to taste and serve with fresh baguette.

9bd8473005.ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened wide-flake coconut chips (2 ounces), 3/4 cup pecan halves (2 ounces), 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 tablespoons light corn syrup, 3/4 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, Pinch of sea salt, 2 pints coconut ice cream, 1 cup coarsely crumbled chocolate wafer cookies,
9bd8473005.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350.
2- Spread the coconut and pecans in 2 separate pie plates.
3- Toast the coconut for 5 minutes and the pecans for 10 minutes, until the edges of the coconut start to brown and the pecans are fragrant.
4- Let the coconut and pecans cool, then coarsely chop the pecans.
5- Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, combine the granulated sugar with the light corn syrup and 2 tablespoons of water and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
6- Wash down the side of the pan with a wet pastry brush.
7- Cook the syrup over moderately high heat without stirring until a deep amber caramel forms, about 5 minutes.
8- Remove from the heat and carefully add the cream.
9- When the bubbles subside, stir to combine.
10- Add the vanilla and salt and let cool slightly.
11- Stir in the toasted pecans and all but 1/4 cup of the toasted coconut chips.
12- Scoop the ice cream into 6 glasses and sprinkle with half of the cookie crumbs.
13- Top with the warm caramel sauce and the remaining cookie crumbs and coconut.
14- Serve right away.

0f1d68c793.ingredients: 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 2/3 cup whole milk, 3 large eggs, 3 tablespoons granulated sugar, Pinch of salt, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature, 3/4 cup raspberries, 3/4 cup blackberries, Toasted sliced almonds, for serving, Confectioners sugar, for dusting,
0f1d68c793.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 400.
2- Heat a 10-inch cast-iron skillet in the oven.
3- In a medium bowl, whisk the flour with the milk, eggs, granulated sugar and salt.
4- Remove the skillet from the oven.
5- Add the butter and swirl to melt, then pour in the batter.
6- Return the skillet to the oven and bake the pancake until set and the edges are browned, 18 to 20 minutes.
7- Top with the berries and almonds, dust with confectioners sugar and serve immediately.

a0b7d11480.ingredients: 4 medium sized potatoes, 4 slices bacon, cubed up, 3 eggs, 3 tablespoons milk, 12 teaspoon salt, 1 cup ham, cooked and diced, 2 tomatoes, peeled, diced, 1 tablespoon chives, snipped,
a0b7d11480.instructions:
1- Boil unpeeled potatoes until tender, drain and let cool.
2- Slice or dice potatoes.
3- In large frying pan cook bacon until translucent.
4- Add the potato slices, cook until lightly browned.
5- Meanwhile, blend eggs with milk and salt.
6- Stir in cubed ham.
7- Add tomatoes to egg mixture.
8- Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes in the skillet.
9- Cook until eggs are set.
10- Sprinkle with chopped chives and serve at once.

27a62d563b.ingredients: 2 tablespoons active dry yeast, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 2 12 cups warm water (110 degrees F), 2 tablespoons shortening, 2 teaspoons salt, 7 cups all-purpose flour, 3 egg whites, stiffly beaten, 1 egg white (for egg wash), 2 tablespoons milk,
27a62d563b.instructions:
1- In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water.
2- Let sit until creamy; about 10 minutes.
3- Mix in shortening, salt and 3 cups of the flour.
4- Beat with dough whisk or heavy spoon for 2 minutes.
5- Fold in egg whites.
6- Gradually add flour 1/4 cup at a time, until dough forms a mass and begins to pull away from bowl.
7- Turn onto a floured surface.
8- Knead, adding more flour as necessary, for 8 to 10 minutes, until smooth and elastic with bubbles.
9- Lightly oil a large mixing bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil.
10- Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.
11- Deflate the dough, form into a round and let rise again until doubled, about 45 minutes.
12- Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
13- Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
14- Divide the dough into 24 equal pieces and form into oval rolls about 3 1/2 inches long.
15- Place on lightly greased baking sheets, cover and let rise until doubled in volume, about 40 minutes.
16- Place an empty baking sheet on the bottom rack of the oven.
17- In a small bowl, lightly beat the egg white with the 2 tablespoons of milk to make the egg wash. Lightly brush the risen rolls with the egg wash. Place 1 cup of ice cubes on the hot baking sheet in the oven and immediately place the rolls in the oven.
18- Bake at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for about 20 minutes or until the tops are golden brown.
19- Remove to a wire rack and cool.

f1462bedb6.ingredients: 3 lbs chicken, 2 quarts water, 10 hard rolls (Kaiser rolls), 1 -2 cup warm milk, 12 cup Canadian bacon, diced (optional), 1 tablespoon butter, softened, 1 small onion, diced (optional), 1 tablespoon parsley flakes, 3 eggs, salt and pepper,
f1462bedb6.instructions:
1- Slice hard rolls thinly and place in a large bowl; set aside to dry overnight.
2- Add the water to the chicken, season to taste and cook slowly for several hours.
3- An hour or so before serving time, make soup balls as follows:
4- Soak bread in warm milk.
5- Bread should be moist, but not soggy.
6- If using, fry onion and bacon in butter until onion is tender (If not using skip to step 7).
7- Stir onion and bacon into moist bread.
8- Add parsley flakes, eggs, salt and pepper to bread.
9- Stir to combine all ingredients.
10- Shape into large dumplings.
11- Drop into boiling soup.
12- Simmer uncovered, for 20 minutes, or until dumplings rise to surface.

query: I want a French dish to go with a nice glass of red wine

options.259e8c800c: French steak with croutes and fries
options.9cfa86a48f: French chicken casserole made from fried chicken and chicken broth
options.6fe11c60a7: Oven baked French duck with sauce from jelly and creme de cassis
options.9f0a71eb0f: Savory French fish soup made of boneless fish fillet
options.a3379ac365: Savory french soup made from white fish

259e8c800c.ingredients: 4 slices vienna bread, 1 garlic clove, halved, 4 teaspoons olive oil, 16 ounces rib eye grilling steak (or 2 x 8 oz striploin grilling steak), 2 tablespoons green peppercorns, cracked (or 2 tbsp cracked black peppercorns), 14 cup red wine, 14 cup beef stock, 14 cup sweet red pepper, finely diced, 1 shallot, finely diced (or 1 green onion, finely diced), 2 teaspoons butter, 4 potatoes, peeled and cut into long strips like french fries, but thinner, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon dried thyme, 14 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon pepper,
259e8c800c.instructions:
1- Potato Frites:.
2- Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
3- In bowl, toss potatoes with oil, thyme, salt and pepper.
4- Arrange on foil-lined rimmed baking sheet.
5- Bake, turning once, for 40 minutes or until tender inside and crisp outside.
6- While potatoes cook, start the Bistro Steak.
7- Bistro Steak On Garlic Croutes:.
8- Rub bread all over with cut side of garlic; brush with 2 teaspoons (10 mL) of the oil.
9- Toast on baking sheet for 10 minutes or until golden.
10- Meanwhile, trim off all but 1/8 inch (3 mm) fat from steak, if needed.
11- Roll edges in peppercorns to coat.
12- In skillet, heat remaining oil over medium-high heat; cook steaks for 4 to 6 minutes per side or until medium-rare inside and browned.
13- Transfer to plate; cover and keep warm.
14- Add wine and stock to skillet; bring to boil, scraping up any brown bits.
15- Boil for about 1 minute or until reduced by half.
16- Remove from heat.
17- Stir in red pepper, shallot, butter and any juices accumulated on plate.
18- Cut steaks in half; place on croutes.
19- Pour sauce over top.
20- Serve with Potato Frites.

9cfa86a48f.ingredients: 1 each broiler fryers, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, 2 cloves garlic peeled and minced, 12 each white onion chopped, 12 each potatoes pared, white, 4 each carrots pared and quartered, 1 cup white wine dry, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon rosemary leaves crumbled, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper freshly ground, 1 can chicken broth condensed,
9cfa86a48f.instructions:
1- Wash and dry chicken; skewer neck skin to back; twist the wing tips flat against skewered neck skin; tie the legs to tail with kitchen strings.
2- Heat oil and butter or margarine with the minced garlic in a 12 cup flame proof casserole or a large kettle.
3- Brown chicken in the hot fat; remove.
4- Saute onions, potatoes and carrots in drippings; remove and reserve.
5- Stir wine, salt, rosemary and pepper into casserole and bring to boiling, scraping up all the cooked on juices from bottom of casserole; stir in chicken broth; return chicken to casserole; surround with browned vegetables; cover.
6- (If using a kettle, place chicken in a 12-cup casserole; surround with browned vegetables; pour sauce over; cover.)
7- Bake in moderate oven (350 degrees) 1 hour, basting several times with casserole juices, or until chicken is tender.
8- Garnish with a bouquet of parsley and serve with a chilled white wine, such as Chablis, and chunks of crusty French bread if you wish.

6fe11c60a7.ingredients: 4 ducks, about 4 lbs. each, salt, fresh ground black pepper, 12 cup butter, 3 shallots, minced, 10 ounces currant jelly, 1 cup creme de cassis, 2 cups chicken stock, can use duck stock if you find it, 1 (8 ounce) can bing cherries, pitted, drained, wild rice (optional),
6fe11c60a7.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
2- Place ducks in a shallow roasting pan on a rack.
3- Roast for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, turning halfway through baking time.
4- Melt the butter in a skillet and saute the shallots until soft, about 5 minutes.
5- Add the jelly and creme de cassis and boil until reduced and thickened.
6- Cut the ducks into serving pieces and arrance on a platter.
7- Stir the cherries into the sauce and heat thoroughly.
8- Spoon the sauce over the ducks.
9- Serve immediately with wild rice.

9f0a71eb0f.ingredients: 1 head fennel, 1 large brown onion, 3 -4 garlic cloves, bay leaf (optional), fresh thyme (optional), 12 liter dry white wine, 350 g fresh boneless fish fillets, 1 liter fish stock, 3 tablespoons tomato paste (heaped), Pernod or ouzo, to taste, fresh parsley, to taste, Tabasco sauce, to taste, maggi seasoning, to taste or Braggs liquid aminos, sauce to taste, lemon juice, to taste, salt & pepper, to taste,
9f0a71eb0f.instructions:
1- Chop the fennel, onion and garlic and saute in olive oil.
2- Add the dry white wine and let simmer for about 10-15 minutes with the lid open so that it reduces to about half of the original volume.
3- If youve got dried bay leaves and some fresh thyme, throw some in too!
4- Cube the fish fillets and add them to the vegie mixture.
5- Add the fish stock, tomato paste and Tabasco to taste.
6- Mix well, cover with the lid and let simmer for another 10 minutes or so while you prepare the croutons.
7- Now remove any bay leaves and/or sprigs of thyme that might be a bit woody.
8- Add fresh parsley.
9- Blend with a hand beater and taste!
10- Now comes the most important step: Adjust the seasoning by adding a shot of Pernod or similar spirit (very important for a French recipe!
11- ), some lemon juice (about 1/2 lemon), some Maggi or Braggs sauce, more salt, pepper, Tabasco and/or olive oil to taste.
12- Keep hot until ready to serve with the croutons.
13- Croutons the easy way nice and quick:.
14- Toast a few slices of bread (rye is best).
15- When crisp, rub them on both sides with peeled cloves of garlic (optional), spread some olive oil to taste, and cut all slices in small cubes.
16- Serve with the soup and enjoy!
17- Croutons and rouille the French way more spectacular: Slice a French stick at an angle, so you get larger slices of bread about 1cm thick.
18- Grill them in the oven, at about 180-190 degrees until crisp and golden brown.
19- Keep them hot while you prepare the rouille.
20- For the rouille, vitamise together a few tablespoons of a good mayonnaise, a couple of slices of roasted red capsicum (available in most delis), lemon juice and fresh garlic to taste.
21- Serve the soup in individual plates.
22- Spoon some rouille over your slices of hot bread and place one of those slices on each plate, floating like a little pink boat on top of the soup!
23- Season to taste with some freshly ground black pepper.
24- Serve with a glass of champagne and enjoy!

a3379ac365.ingredients: 2 lg. leeks, 2 onions, 1/2 lb. bulb fennel, 1 cup olive oil, 13 lb. fresh fish and shellfish (e.g. pompano, sea perch, red snapper, halibut, eel, scallop, lobster, shrimp, clams, mussels), 5 cloves garlic, 3/4 lb. tomatoes, skinned and chopped, 2 tbsp. tomato puree (paste), 1 sprig fresh thyme, 1 bay leaf, 1 sprig fresh rosemary, 1 dash ground saffron, Salt and pepper, 1 stale baguette (French bread loaf), 1/2 cup parsley, 1-1/2 cup grated Gruyere cheese, 1 clove garlic, 1 red chili pepper, Salt and pepper, 2 egg yolks, 1 cup olive oil,
a3379ac365.instructions:
1- Cut the leeks, onions and fennel into fine strips or julienne, and braise them in 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large stock pot.
2- Wash the fish, pat dry and cut into medium-sized pieces and set aside.
3- Braise the fish trimmings in some olive oil--heads, bones and skin--with the vegetables--leeks, onions and fennel.
4- Stir from time to time.
5- Add 2 1/4 quarts of water, the garlic, the tomatoes, tomato puree, thyme, bay leaf, rosemary and saffron.
6- Season and bring to a boil.
7- Simmer for 45 minutes, then strain.
8- Meanwhile, to prepare the croutons, cut the baguette into thick slices, rub with garlic if liked, and bake in the oven 300 F. until pale golden brown and crisp.
9- Put the pieces of fish into a large saucepan.
10- Sprinkle with the remaining olive oil and a little parsley.
11- Stir.
12- Pour the strained stock over the fish and cook very fast for 10 minutes.
13- Add the shellfish and cook for another 5 minutes.
14- Correct the seasoning.
15- Make the rust-colored rouille sauce by crushing the garlic and chili pepper to a paste in a mortar.
16- Add salt, pepper and the egg yolks, then add the olive oil, drop by drop, stirring continuously.
17- Test the seasoning, and serve in a sauceboat with 2 or 3 tablespoons of fish soup added.
18- Drain the fish carefully and place in a large, deep dish.
19- Sprinkle with some of the fish soup.
20- Serve the rest of the soup in a tureen garnished with chopped parsley.
21- Serve the croutons, grated Gruyere cheese and rouille sauce separately.
22- Country Cooking..Regional and Traditional Recipes of Europe and North America

6518251154.ingredients: 2 lbs round steaks, flour, salt, pepper, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 large onions, thinly sliced, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1 cup white wine, 1 cup beef broth, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 18 teaspoon pepper, 1 cup cheddar cheese, grated, 12 cup sour cream,
6518251154.instructions:
1- Cooking day: cut steak into serving pieces; dredge steak with flour seasoned with salt and pepper.
2- Brown on both sides in butter and oil in a heavy pan.
3- Remove steak from pan; add onions to pan; saute until golden.
4- Stir in garlic, wine, broth, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, and pepper, stirring up all the browned bits from the bottom of pan.
5- Return steak to pan, cover, and simmer slowly (lower the heat) for 1 1/2 hours, until meat is very tender.
6- Stir in cheese until melted, then stir in sour cream; heat until sour cream is blended in, but do not boil.
7- Can eat immediately or if OAMC--cool completely; place meat and sauce together in freezer bag; remove as much air as possible, and seal; take a cake pan or pan that has sides, and lay the bag flat; place the pan in the freezer; once it has been "flash frozen", remove from the pan and place inside your freezer.
8- Serving day: thaw meat and sauce completely; place in a heavy pan; heat on stove over low heat until sauce and meat are heated through, but do not boil.

query: I want to cook Greek cuisine but I forgot to buy cheese, tzatziki dip, or garlic

options.12688946b0: Chopped greek salad made from vegetables and tomatoes with feta cheese
options.141e08d28b: Tomato and cheese flavoured greek pizza
options.1eb9559305: Tangy, garlicky, and savory beef greek meatloaf

triples: (user, shown allergy to, brown sugar bubbletea)

17eff23365.ingredients: 1 leg of lamb, about 5 to 6 pounds,bone removed, 1 cup olive oil, 1 cup dry white wine, 1 teaspoon thyme, 1 teaspoon oregano, 2 teaspoons salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 12 teaspoon rosemary, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 teaspoons chopped mint leaves,
17eff23365.instructions:
1- Pound lamb until it is an even thickness.
2- Place it in a shallow glass dish.
3- Mix remaining ingredients until well-blended and pour over lamb.
4- Turn meat in marinade, cover, and marinate in refrigerator overnight.
5- Drain lamb and reserve marinade.
6- Place meat on grill 6 inches above gray coals and grill for 40 to 45 minutes, brushing with marinade and turning every 10 minutes.
7- Let lamb rest for 10 minutes.
8- Cut meat into thin slices (lamb will be pink) and sprinkle with chopped fresh mint.

12688946b0.ingredients: 12 green pepper, 12 red pepper, 12 yellow peppers or 12 orange bell pepper, 12 small red onion, 13 English cucumber, 2 roma tomatoes, 12 large black olives, 14 cup vinaigrette dressing, Lighthouse fat-free (approximately), 12 cup feta cheese (the stuff that comes mixed with sundried tomato and basil is great), 1 dash balsamic vinegar,
12688946b0.instructions:
1- Dice green pepper, red pepper, and yellow pepper, onion, cucumber and tomatoes.
2- Halve the olives and remove pits if not already done.
3- Toss in a large bowl with the vinaigrette dressing, feta cheese and a splash of balsamic vinegar.

1409eb0098.ingredients: 6 medium potatoes cubed, 1/2 cup lemon juice fresh, 13 cup vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 1/2 teaspoon oregano, 2 each garlic cloves pressed, 3 cups water hot, 1 x parsley leaves fresh, chopped, 1 x tzatziki optional, see recipe below,
1409eb0098.instructions:
1- Toss potatoes with lemon juice, oils, spices & garlic in a deep flat pan.
2- Add water.
3- Bake uncovered for 1 1/2 hours at 475F (246C) F.
4- Stir every 20 minutes.
5- Add more water if necessary.
6- Allow the potatoes to evaporate the water during the last 20 minutes until only the oil is left.
7- Garnish with parsley & serve.

141e08d28b.ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons cornmeal, 10 large pitted black olives, quartered lengthwise (such as kalamata or ripe olives), 1 large tomatoes, chopped (juice drained off), 1 lb refrigerated pizza dough (Recipe# 3098340), 1 12 cups shredded mozzarella cheese (6 ozs.), 1 12 cups feta cheese, crumbled (6 ozs.), 18 teaspoon ground red pepper, 3 medium red sweet peppers, roasted and cut into 1 inch wide strips (or a combination of green and yellow sweet peppers), 3 tablespoons fresh oregano leaves, chopped, 1 medium red onion, cut into very thin wedges and separated into strips,
141e08d28b.instructions:
1- Use the refrigerated pre-mixed dough for No-Knead Flatbreads Recipe #387518.
2- Twenty minutes before baking, place a baking stone in the oven and preheat to 450 degrees F.
3- Remove the Olive Oil Flatbread dough (Recipe #387518) from the refrigerator.
4- Lighly dust the surface with flour and cut off a 1 pound (grapefruit size) piece.
5- With lightly floured hands quickly shape dough into a ball by streching the surface of the dough around to the bottom on all four sides, rotating the ball a quarter turn as you go.
6- On a lightly floured board, flatten the dough, with hands and rolling pin, into a 1/8 inch thick round, dusting with minimal flour if necessary to keep dough from sticking to the rolling pin.
7- If difficulty is experienced in rolling out the dough, allow it to rest for a few minutes.
8- I've found that pulling the dough with my hands works best.
9- Place the rolled out dough on a pizza peel that has been dusted with corn meal.
10- Carefully slide the pizza shell on the hot pizza stone.
11- Bake in a 450 degree F oven for 5 minutes.
12- Meanwhile, in a small bowl stir together the olive oil and ground red pepper.
13- Brush olive oil onto partially baked crust.
14- Sprinkle with the mozzarella cheese.
15- Top with the roasted peppers, tomato, onion, feta cheese, oregano and olives.
16- Bake in a 450 degree F oven for 10 - 12 minutes more or until crust is crisp.
17- *NOTE: To Roast Peppers:.
18- Roast whole peppers on grill until black blisters appear on all sides, about 12 minutes.
19- Remove peppers from grill and place in a covered dish for 15 minutes.
20- Carefully peel skins from peppers (best not to do under running water); seed and chop.

1eb9559305.ingredients: 2 lbs (.9 kg). ground beef, 2 eggs, 3/4 cup (175 ml) fine bread crumbs, 8 oz (224 grm). crumbled feta cheese, 1 medium yellow onion, minced finely, 1/4 cup (60 ml) red bell pepper, minced finely, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1/4 cup (60 ml) green olives with pimento, chopped, 1 tsp (5 ml). fresh lemon juice, 1 6 oz (168 grm). can tomato paste, 1/2 tsp (2 ml). oregano, 1/2 tsp (2 ml). dried basil, salt and pepper to taste,
1eb9559305.instructions:
1- Mix all ingredients together in large bowl.
2- Press into loaf pan and bake in 375 degree (200 C.) oven 35 to 45 minutes.
3- Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.

fa1f6bc252.ingredients: 3 tbsp lemon juice, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 clove garlic, 2 tsp oregano, 1 tsp pepper, 3 small tomatoes chunked, 1 large cucumber chunked, 1 can chickpeas, 1/3 cup feta cheese, 1/4 cup red onion thinly sliced, 2 tbsp black olives, 2 can sardines drained and left whole,
fa1f6bc252.instructions:
1- whisk lemon juice, oil, garlic, oregano, and pepper in bowl.
2- add other ingredients and toss together.

query: I want to make Italian food for my daughter who hates cheese

options.0ab965336b: Italian chicken made from chicken thighs. Flavoured with tomato paste
options.642202b519: Healthy lasagna made from ground beef, canned tomatoes, and cheese
options.4292b003fc: Italian American lasagna made from Italian American meat sauce and milk ricotta cheese
options.6a151c5e67: Italian melted cheese pot made from mozzarella that's dipped with tomatoes, broccoli etc.
options.526461104e: Italian lasagna made of bacon, sausage, and cheese

0ab965336b.ingredients: 10 chicken thighs, skin on, 1 medium red onion, chopped, 2 garlic cloves, peeled, 3 carrots, peeled and chopped, olive oil, 3 chicken stock cubes, 6 sprigs thyme, 3 ounces pancetta or 3 ounces bacon, diced, 12 cup white wine (optional), 2 (14 ounce) cans chopped tomatoes, 2 tablespoons tomato paste,
0ab965336b.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350F
2- Place the chicken thighs, red onion, garlic and carrots into a deep baking tray and lightly coat with olive oil.
3- Sprinkle with 2 of the stock cubes and the thyme.
4- Place into the oven and roast for 40 minutes.
5- Meanwhile make the sauce: Cook the pancetta or bacon in a pan until it starts to crisp, carefully add the wine (if using) and cook for a few minutes, then add the tomatoes, paste and the last stock cube.
6- Cook for 10 minutes on a medium heat, until it has cooked down into a thick sauce.
7- Remove the chicken from the oven and (very carefully) drain off some of the fat.
8- Take the chicken thighs and the thyme sprigs out of the pan and pour the sauce over the onion, garlic and carrots.
9- Mix well; put the chicken back on top of the sauce skin side up and return to the oven for 15 minutes.
10- Serve immediately.

642202b519.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 18 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 tablespoon parsley, 1 tablespoon basil, 2 12 cups canned tomatoes, diced, 8 ounces tomato paste, 8 ounces lasagna noodles, 1 pint cottage cheese, 2 eggs, beaten, 2 tablespoons parsley, 12 cup parmesan cheese, grated, 12 teaspoon pepper, 1 lb mozzarella cheese, sliced,
642202b519.instructions:
1- Cook beef until lightly browned.
2- Add garlic powder, 1 T parsley, basil, tomatoes, tomato paste and salt to taste; simmer, uncovered, until thick, about 45 minutes.
3- Combine cottage cheese, eggs, 2 T parsley, parmesan and pepper.
4- In 13 X 9 pan layer noodles (no need to cook the noodles first), meat sauce, cottage cheese mixture and mozzarella; repeat layers.
5- Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes.

4292b003fc.ingredients: 2 pounds fresh or packaged whole-milk ricotta cheese, Italian-American Meat Sauce (page 144), Salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 pounds lasagna noodles, 2 large eggs, 2 1/2 cups freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, 1 pound mozzarella cheese, preferably fresh, sliced thin,
4292b003fc.instructions:
1- Line a sieve with a double thickness of cheesecloth or a basket-type coffee filter.
2- Place the ricotta over the cheesecloth and set the sieve over a bowl.
3- Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight or up to 1 day.
4- Discard the liquid that drains into the bowl.
5- Make the meat sauce.
6- Bring 6 quarts of salted water and the olive oil to a boil in an 8-quart pot over high heat.
7- Stir about one-third of the lasagna noodles into the boiling water.
8- Return to a boil, stirring frequently.
9- Cook the pasta, semi-covered, stirring occasionally, until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes.
10- While the pasta is cooking, set a large bowl of ice water next to the stove.
11- When the lasagna noodles are al dente, remove them with a wire skimmer and transfer to the ice water.
12- Let them stand until completely chilled.
13- Repeat the cooking and cooling with the remaining two batches of lasagna noodles.
14- When the cooked noodles are chilled, remove them from the ice bath and stack them on a baking sheet, separating each layer with a clean, damp kitchen towel.
15- While the noodles are cooking, beat the eggs with a pinch of salt in a mixing bowl until foamy.
16- Add the ricotta and stir until thoroughly blended.
17- Preheat oven to 375 F.
18- To assemble the lasagne, ladle about 3/4 cup of the meat sauce over the bottom of a 15 x 10inch baking dish.
19- Arrange noodles lengthwise and side by side so as to cover the bottom of the baking dish and overhang the short ends of the dish by about 2 inches.
20- (A little cut and paste might be necessary.
21- Also, the noodles will most likely overlap in the center of the dish.
22- That is fine.)
23- Spoon enough meat sauce, about 2 cups, to cover the noodles in an even layer.
24- Sprinkle the sauce with 1/2 cup of the grated cheese.
25- Arrange a single layer of noodles crosswise over the cheese so they overhang the long sides of the baking dish by about 2 inches, trimming the noodles and overlapping them as necessary.
26- Spread the ricotta mixture evenly over the noodles.
27- Arrange a single layer of noodles lengthwise over the ricotta, trimming the noodles as necessary.
28- Arrange the sliced mozzarella in an even layer over the noodles.
29- Spread 1 cup of the meat sauce over the cheese and sprinkle 1 cup of grated cheese over the sauce.
30- Cover with a layer of noodles, arranged lengthwise.
31- Spoon enough meat sauce, about 2 cups, to cover the noodles in an even layer, and sprinkle the sauce with 1/2 cup grated cheese.
32- Turn the noodles overhanging the sides and ends of the dish over the lasagna, leaving a rectangular uncovered space in the middle.
33- Spread a thin layer of meat sauce over the top layer of noodles.
34- Sprinkle with the remaining grated cheese.
35- Cover loosely with aluminum foil and bake 45 minutes.
36- Uncover the lasagna and continue baking until the top is crusty around the edges, about 20 minutes.
37- Let rest at least 30 minutes or up to 3 hours before cutting and serving.
38- To rewarm a lasagna that has been standing, cover it loosely with foil and place in a 325 F oven until heated through, 15 to 45 minutes, depending on how long it has been standing.

6a151c5e67.ingredients: 1 garlic clove, cut in half, 12 cup dry italian white wine, 1 tablespoon flour, 12 cup grated mozzarella cheese, 1 cup crumbled gorgonzola or 1 cup grated provolone cheese, 8 sun-dried tomatoes (not packed in oil), 6 fresh basil leaves, slivered, 1 loaf crusty Italian bread, 12 lb prosciutto, 2 apples, 1 pear, 1 cup broccoli, slightly cooked,
6a151c5e67.instructions:
1- Pour 1 cup of boiling water over sun-dried tomatoes in a small bowl, and leave to soften for 10 minutes.
2- Remove tomatoes from water and chop into small pieces.
3- Rub inside of fondue pot with cut side of garlic.
4- Heat wine in pot until it begins to boil.
5- Toss cheese with flour.
6- Add cheese slowly to pot, stirring the constantly.
7- Add tomatoes and basil leaves to mixture and stir until smooth.
8- Serve with dippers.

526461104e.ingredients: 9 thick slices bacon, diced, 1 onion, chopped, 1 teaspoon fennel seed, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 1/2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, 2 (28 ounce) cans tomato sauce, 2 pounds Italian sausage, 1 (16 ounce) package lasagna noodles, 2 pints part-skim ricotta cheese, 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/3 cup milk, 8 slices provolone cheese, 6 cups shredded mozzarella cheese,
526461104e.instructions:
1- Brown bacon and onion in a large pan over medium heat.
2- Stir in fennel seed, 1 teaspoon oregano, Italian seasoning, and tomato sauce.
3- Cover, and simmer on low for 4 to 6 hours, or until thick.
4- Brown sausage links in a large skillet.
5- Drain on paper towels.
6- Cut into 1 inch pieces.
7- Mix together ricotta cheese, egg, milk, parsley, and 1 teaspoon oregano in a medium bowl.
8- Layer 1 cup of sauce on the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan.
9- Layer with 1/3 uncooked lasagna noodles, 1/2 ricotta cheese mixture, 1/2 sausage pieces, 1/3 mozzarella, and 1/2 provolone cheese.
10- Top with 1/3 sauce.
11- Repeat layers.
12- Top with remaining 1/3 noodles.
13- Spread remaining sauce over the top, and sprinkle with remaining 1/3 mozzarella cheese.
14- Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 1/2 hours.

0940afc25e.ingredients: 10 chicken tenders, 14 cup flour, 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, salt and pepper, to taste, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 teaspoons garlic, minced, 12 cup white wine, 14 cup capers, rinsed and drained, 1 cup chicken broth,
0940afc25e.instructions:
1- In gallon-size zip lock bag combine flour, rosemary, salt and pepper.
2- Add chicken tenders and toss until well coated.
3- Sautee garlic in olive oil.
4- Add chicken tenders, cook on medium heat until lightly browned on 1 side, about 2-3 minutes.
5- Turn and cook for another 2 minutes.
6- Add wine and capers; reduce slightly, about 2 minutes.
7- Add chicken broth.
8- Cover and simmer about 10 minutes.

query: What is a hearty French dish I can make for dinner?

options.02a044aea5: French onion soup made from beef broth, sweet white onion, and gruyere cheese
options.a1164b997e: Sweet French dessert based on meringue
options.ccb6b68fc7: Bread soaked in french toast mix and cooked in the oven with diced apples
options.26ba85a729: British onion soup with cheese and onion
options.0791dcee0b: Savory soup made from miso and red onions
options.0620ab6328: One-Pot French Onion Soup With Garlic-Gruyere Croutons

02a044aea5.ingredients: 4- 1/2 cups Sweet White Onion, Thinly Sliced, 1 teaspoon Sugar, 1 Tablespoon Butter, 2 cups Water, 2 teaspoons Beef Bouillon, 10 ounces, fluid Can Beef Broth, 1/2 cups Brandy, 1 teaspoon Dried Thyme, 1 whole Baguette, Whole Wheat, 3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Salt And Pepper, to taste, 6 slices Gruyere Cheese,
02a044aea5.instructions:
1- In a large saute pan, fry onions with the sugar in melted butter until caramelized, 10-12 minutes.
2- Season with salt and pepper.
3- Add to slow cooker along with water, beef bouillon, broth, brandy and thyme.
4- Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or high for 4-5 hours.
5- Slice baguette into bite-sized pieces and place on a rimmed baking sheet.
6- Drizzle with olive oil and salt and pepper to taste.
7- Bake in a 325 degrees F oven for 15 mn.
8- until crisp and golden.
9- Cool and store in a ziploc bag.
10- Ladle soup into broiler proof bowls and top with croutons and cheese.
11- Broil in the oven until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
12- Serve and enjoy.

a1164b997e.ingredients: 1 12 cups sifted confectioners' sugar, 34 cup sifted almond flour (such as Bob's Red Mill), 3 egg whites, 1 pinch salt, 3 tablespoons granulated sugar, 3 drops gel food coloring, 4 ounces bittersweet chocolate, chopped, 12 cup heavy cream, 12 cup unsalted butter, softened (1 stick), 2 cups confectioners' sugar, 1 pinch salt, 2 -3 tablespoons heavy cream, gel food coloring,
a1164b997e.instructions:
1- Cookies:.
2- Combine confectioner's sugar and almond flour in a food processor.
3- Pulse until blended and finely ground.
4- Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper.
5- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
6- Whip egg whites and salt in a stand mixer on medium high speed until frothy.
7- Gradually beat in granulated sugar, 1 T. at a time, until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes.
8- Fold 1/3 of the confectioner's sugar mixture into the egg whites.
9- Fold in remaining confectioner's sugar mixture and food coloring.
10- Transfer to a large piping bag (do not overfill the bag, use part of the batter at a time) and snip off a 1/2 inch opening.
11- Pipe batter in 1 1/4 inch circles onto parchment paper.
12- Let stand at room temperature for 15-20 minutes.
13- Bake cookies, one sheet at a time, for 15 minutes.
14- Cool completely on paper on wire racks.
15- Ganache:.
16- Place chopped chocolate in a small bowl.
17- In a small saucepan, heat cream just until steaming.
18- Pour over chocolate and stir until smooth.
19- Refrigerate until good spreading consistency.
20- Filling:.
21- Beat butter until smooth.
22- Add confectioner's sugar and salt, beat on low speed until blended.
23- Add heavy cream and beat until good spreading consistency.
24- Divide in half, tint half with gel food coloring.
25- Carefully remove cookies from parchment.
26- Spread ganache or plain or tinted filling onto flat side of cookie.
27- Sandwich with another cookie.
28- Repeat with all cookies.

ccb6b68fc7.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups milk, 1%, 1 cup egg whites, 2 tablespoons honey, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 18 teaspoon salt, 1/2 pound whole wheat bread sliced, or white bread, 1/2 cup apples dried, chopped, 1/4 cup raisins, seedless, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg preferly freshly ground, 2 teaspoons powdered sugar,
ccb6b68fc7.instructions:
1- Whisk milk, egg whites, honey, vanilla and salt in a medium bowl.
2- Trim crusts off 4 slices of bread and set aside.
3- Cut the crusts and the remaining bread into 1-inch pieces.
4- Toss with dried apples, raisins, cinnamon and nutmeg in another large bowl.
5- Coat a 9-by-9-inch or 7-by-10 inch baking pan with cooking spray.
6- Transfer the bread mixture into the pan.
7- Lay the reserved crustless slices evenly on top, trimming to fit.
8- Whisk the milk mixture again, then pour evenly over the bread.
9- Press the bread down with the back of a wooden spoon, and make sure its evenly moist.
10- Cover with parchment paper, then foil papper, and refrigerate for at least 10 hours or up to 1 day.
11- Preheat oven to 350F.
12- Bake the casserole, covered, for 40 minutes.
13- Uncover and keep baking until puffed, set and lightly browned, about 22 minutes more.
14- Let stand for 10 minutes on a wire rack, dust with confectioners sugar.
15- Serve warm.

26ba85a729.ingredients: 50 g butter or 2 tablespoons drippings, 1 kg onion, finely sliced, 1 tablespoon golden caster sugar, 3 sprigs fresh thyme, 3 fresh bay leaves, 150 ml cider, 1 liter stock (vegetable or chicken, it's up to you), 4 slices bread, cut thick from a round country loaf, 100 g mature cheddar cheese, grated, 1 large handful parsley, chopped,
26ba85a729.instructions:
1- Heat most of the butter or dripping in a pan, then add the onions, sugar and herbs.
2- Season and cook, uncovered, over a low heat, stirring occasionally, for up to 40 mins until sticky and brown, pour in the cider and simmer until reduced by half.
3- Pour in the stock, bring to the boil, then cook for 20 minutes
4- TO SERVE:
5- Heat the grill to high.
6- Spread the bread on both sides with the remaining butter or dripping, then toast under the grill until golden.
7- Scatter with cheese and place back under the grill until melted.
8- Serve the soup in bowls with a slice of the toast floating in it, scattered generously with parsley.

0791dcee0b.ingredients: 2 tablespoons light olive oil, 6 medium white or red onions, quartered and thinly sliced, 3 to 4 garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger, 3 to 4 tablespoons miso (any variety) dissolved in 1/3 cup warm water, or to taste, Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste,
0791dcee0b.instructions:
1- Heat the oil in a soup pot.
2- Add the onions and saute over medium-low heat until golden.
3- Add the garlic and continue to saute slowly until the onions are lightly browned, stirring often, 15 to 20 minutes.
4- Add 5 cups water and the ginger.
5- Bring to a simmer.
6- Cover and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
7- Stir in the dissolved miso, remove from the heat, and season.
8- Allow the soup to stand for 15 minutes, covered, and serve.
9- Calories: 108
10- Total Fat: 5g
11- Protein: 7g
12- Carbohydrate: 13g
13- Cholesterol: 0mg
14- Sodium: 465mg

0620ab6328.ingredients: 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 4 pounds oxtail or beef shoulder, cut into 1- or 2-inch pieces, Salt, 8 medium onions, 4 celery stalks, coarsely chopped, 4 medium carrots, peeled and coarsely chopped, 2 bay leaves, 4 thyme sprigs, 8 tablespoons (1 stick) unsalted butter, Black pepper, 1 cup port wine, Lemon juice, to taste, optional, 6 ounces baguette loaf, cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices, 2 garlic cloves, halved, 8 ounces Gruyere cheese,
0620ab6328.instructions:
1- Heat the oil in a 6-quart Dutch oven over high heat.
2- Add the oxtail (or beef shoulder) in a single layer (work in batches, if necessary to avoid crowding the pan), and sear until the undersides are brown (do not turn).
3- Season generously with salt and transfer to a plate.
4- Coarsely chop two of the onions; add to the pot, along with the celery, carrots, bay leaves and thyme.
5- Lower heat to medium and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are soft and beginning to caramelize, about 10 minutes.
6- Return the beef to the pot.
7- Pour in 8 cups water.
8- Simmer mixture gently until the meat is very tender, 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
9- Transfer beef to a bowl to cool for another use.
10- Strain liquid into a bowl over a fine-mesh sieve; press gently on the solids with the back of a spatula to extract as much flavor as possible.
11- Discard the solids; you should have about 10 cups broth (add water if necessary to equal 10 cups).
12- Halve the remaining 6 onions through the root end, then peel and thinly slice them lengthwise.
13- Melt the butter in the bottom of the Dutch oven over medium heat.
14- Add the onions and cook, tossing occasionally, until deep golden-brown and caramelized, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
15- Season with 1 teaspoon salt and black pepper.
16- Pour in the port and cook, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom of the pan, for 3 minutes.
17- Pour in the broth and simmer mixture over low heat for 30 minutes.
18- Season with salt and lemon juice, if desired.
19- (For a smaller group, you could refrigerate some of the soup and reheat it later.)
20- While the broth simmers, heat the oven to 350 degrees.
21- Arrange the bread slices on a baking sheet and toast until golden, about 12 minutes.
22- Rub the garlic halves over the surface of the bread.
23- Heat the broiler and arrange a rack 4 to 6 inches from the flame.
24- Using a cheese slicer, thinly slice 3 ounces of Gruyere.
25- Coarsely grate the remaining cheese.
26- Float the broiled bread over the surface of the hot soup.
27- Layer the cheese slices over the bread; scatter the grated cheese over it.
28- Transfer the Dutch oven to the oven and broil until cheese is golden and bubbling, 3 to 5 minutes (watch to see that it does not burn).
29- To serve, use kitchen shears or scissors to cut the bread and cheese into portions.
30- Ladle soup, bread and cheese into individual bowls.

query: What German entree can I make for dinner

options.48539e5b5b: German sausage made from beef and ground pork
options.10b6247565: German tart made of citrus fruits
options.2c7b8d89f2: German iced coffee made from whipped cream, sweet chocolate, wafer cookies, vanilla ice cream, coffee

48539e5b5b.ingredients: 50 pounds beef or venison, ground, 50 pounds pork ground, not too lean, 1 3/4 cups salt, 3 ounces cure quick, 3 ounces black pepper, 2 ounces garlic powder,
48539e5b5b.instructions:
1- Mix all the ingredients together and add up to 2 quarts cold water when mixing.
2- Sausage is ready to put in casings.

10b6247565.ingredients: 1 Tart sponge, 1 portion Vanilla pudding, 1 Citrus fruits (oranges, grapefruits, etc.), 4 grams Powdered gelatin, 50 grams Granulated sugar, 200 ml Citrus juice,
10b6247565.instructions:
1- Prepare the tart base from.
2- Peel the citrus fruit.
3- If you put them in a bowl, juices will collect at the bottom.
4- Do not discard this as you'll use this for the gelatin later.
5- When cooled, spread the sponge with any jam of your choosing.
6- This stops the pudding soaking into the sponge.
7- I used orange marmalade this time.
8- Make the vanilla puddingand spread it on top of the jam.
9- Arrange the fruit on top of the pudding.
10- Soak the gelatin in 1.5 tablespoons of water (not listed) to soften.
11- Add the 200 ml of fruit juice, granulated sugar, and softened gelatin to a small saucepan and heat over a medium heat.
12- When the gelatin thickens, use a brush or spoon to carefully spread it over the tart.
13- Chill the tart in the refrigerator and it's done.
14- Here's how it looks when cut.

2c7b8d89f2.ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream, good quality, 1 cup strong brewed german coffee, chilled,to taste, 12 cup whipped cream, sweetened,to taste, 1 teaspoon grated sweet chocolate, to garnish,approximately, 1 fancy wafer cookies (in a cylander or a heart shape),
2c7b8d89f2.instructions:
1- Place ice cream scoop into a decorative wine goblet or tall clear drinking glass.
2- Add coffee to fill glass 1/2-3/4 full (amount will vary based on size of glass).
3- Completely cover with a mountain of sweetened whipped cream (use the canned kind or a decorating bag to make decorative swirls)- the whipped cream should be plentiful and just start to peak over the top of the glass rim.
4- Sprinkle with freshly grated good quality chocolate.
5- Stick a wafer cookie into the whipped cream off to the side.
6- Serve with some sugar on the side (for those who want to add more sweetness- although the ice cream and the whipped cream pretty much cover this), a long spoon, and a straw.

9bd8473005.ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened wide-flake coconut chips (2 ounces), 3/4 cup pecan halves (2 ounces), 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 tablespoons light corn syrup, 3/4 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, Pinch of sea salt, 2 pints coconut ice cream, 1 cup coarsely crumbled chocolate wafer cookies,
9bd8473005.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350.
2- Spread the coconut and pecans in 2 separate pie plates.
3- Toast the coconut for 5 minutes and the pecans for 10 minutes, until the edges of the coconut start to brown and the pecans are fragrant.
4- Let the coconut and pecans cool, then coarsely chop the pecans.
5- Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, combine the granulated sugar with the light corn syrup and 2 tablespoons of water and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
6- Wash down the side of the pan with a wet pastry brush.
7- Cook the syrup over moderately high heat without stirring until a deep amber caramel forms, about 5 minutes.
8- Remove from the heat and carefully add the cream.
9- When the bubbles subside, stir to combine.
10- Add the vanilla and salt and let cool slightly.
11- Stir in the toasted pecans and all but 1/4 cup of the toasted coconut chips.
12- Scoop the ice cream into 6 glasses and sprinkle with half of the cookie crumbs.
13- Top with the warm caramel sauce and the remaining cookie crumbs and coconut.
14- Serve right away.

0f1d68c793.ingredients: 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 2/3 cup whole milk, 3 large eggs, 3 tablespoons granulated sugar, Pinch of salt, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature, 3/4 cup raspberries, 3/4 cup blackberries, Toasted sliced almonds, for serving, Confectioners sugar, for dusting,
0f1d68c793.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 400.
2- Heat a 10-inch cast-iron skillet in the oven.
3- In a medium bowl, whisk the flour with the milk, eggs, granulated sugar and salt.
4- Remove the skillet from the oven.
5- Add the butter and swirl to melt, then pour in the batter.
6- Return the skillet to the oven and bake the pancake until set and the edges are browned, 18 to 20 minutes.
7- Top with the berries and almonds, dust with confectioners sugar and serve immediately.

09f38cf89a.ingredients: 3 chicken bouillon cubes, 5 medium potatoes, cubed, 1 (16 ounce) package kielbasa, sliced, 1 onion, diced, 1 small cabbage, cored and sliced, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk, 1 lb swiss cheese, shredded, 12 teaspoon salt, pepper,
09f38cf89a.instructions:
1- Place the bouillon cubes, onion, potatoes, and cabbage into a large soup pot.
2- Pour in enough water to cover the vegetables by about 1 inch.
3- Bring to a boil, then simmer over medium heat for 15 minutes.
4- Add the sausage, and cook for an additional 20 minutes.
5- Reduce heat to low, and stir in cheese and evaporated milk.
6- Cook just until heated through and cheese is melted - do not allow the soup to boil.
7- Remove from heat, and serve immediately.

options.3b4fbed7d5: Iced coffee with cinnamon and anise
