06653f1315.ingredients: 3 ounces unsweetened baking chocolate, 1 12 cups water, 13 cup sugar, 1 dash salt, 4 12 cups milk,
06653f1315.instructions:
1- Heat chocolate and water in 1 1/2 quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and mixture is smooth.
2- Stir in sugar and salt.
3- Heat to boiling.
4- Reduce heat to low.
5- Simmer uncovered 4 minutes, stirring constantly.
6- Stir in milk.
7- Heat just until hot (do not boil because skim will foam on top).
8- Beat with hand beater until foamy, or stir until smooth.
9- Serve immediately.

6617a13bff.ingredients: 34 cup superfine sugar, 13 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 2 cups cold 1% low-fat milk, 12 teaspoon vanilla, 23 cup superfine sugar, 13 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 34 cup strong brewed coffee or 34 cup espresso, 1 teaspoon vanilla,
6617a13bff.instructions:
1- Ice milk: In a large bowl, whisk together sugar and cocoa.
2- Slowly whisk in milk and vanilla until dry ingredients are dissolved and no lumps remain.
3- Freeze in ice cream maker according to manufacturer's directions.
4- Pour into a resealable container.
5- Freeze 2 to 3 hours or until very firm.
6- Sauce: In a small saucepan, combine sugar and cocoa.
7- Stir in coffee.
8- Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring.
9- Reduce heat to low and cook 8 minutes or until slightly thickened.
10- Let cool slightly and stir in vanilla.
11- Serve over scoops of ice milk.

56ecf3f01c.ingredients: 1/2 recipe Rapid Rolls, recipe follows, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 3/4 cup chopped pecans, 6 tablespoons dark brown sugar, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup powdered (confectioners') sugar, 1/2 cup (4 ounces) cream cheese, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 4 tablespoons milk, Melted butter, for brushing, 3 (.25-ounce) packets active dry yeast, 1 3/4 cups warm water, 1/2 cup honey, 1/2 cup melted butter, plus more for brushing, 2 teaspoons salt, plus more for sprinkling, 2 large eggs, beaten, 4 to 6 cups flour, plus more if needed,
56ecf3f01c.instructions:
1- After the dough comes together, on a well-floured surface, using a lightly floured rolling pin, roll out the dough to a 15 by 11-inch rectangle.
2- In a mixing bowl add the pecans, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
3- Spread the softened unsalted butter over the dough leaving a 1/2-inch border.
4- Sprinkle the cinnamon sugar evenly over the dough.
5- Starting with the long side, roll up the dough tightly ending with the seam-side down.
6- Cut 10 slices each about 1/2-inch thick.
7- Place in 2 (9 by 13-inch) greased baking dishes and cover with a kitchen towel.
8- Allow the rolls to rise in a warm environment for an additional 15 to 20 minutes.
9- Brush with melted butter before baking
10- Bake at 400 degrees F until the tops are golden brown, about 25 to 30 minutes.
11- Remove from the oven and brush tops with melted butter and cool on cooling rack.
12- Drizzle with prepared cream cheese glaze.
13- To make Cream Cheese Glaze: In a mixing bowl, combine the powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, milk, and vanilla.
14- Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
15- In the bowl of a stand mixer, fitted with the paddle attachment, combine the instant yeast, and warm water.
16- Let it activate for 5 minutes until bubbly.
17- Stir in the honey.
18- On low speed, add 1/2 cup melted butter, 2 teaspoons salt, and eggs.
19- Slowly add the flour cup-by-cup until fully incorporated and the dough pulls away from the sides of the mixing bowl.
20- Add more flour if it is too sticky.
21- Portion the dough into 24 even servings.
22- Form the rolls into desired shape and let rise approximately 20 minutes, or until doubled in size.
23- Place the rolls in a cast iron skillet or on a baking sheet.
24- Brush the rolls with melted butter.
25- Bake for 25 minutes until the tops are golden brown.
26- Remove from the oven and brush with more melted butter, and sprinkle with a little salt.
27- Cook's Note: This recipe can be used as a traditional loaf bread, pizza dough, and for both savory and sweet rolls.

15d5cb830e.ingredients: 1 cup vegatable oil or melted butter, 2 cup granulated sugar, 2 tbsp vanilla extract, 4 large eggs, 1 cup plain flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 2/3 cup cocoa,
15d5cb830e.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 180oC.
2- Grease a 9x13 inch baking tray.
3- Blend together the oil, sugar and vanilla extract in a large mixing bowl.
4- Add the eggs into the mixture and beat well with a wooden spoon.
5- In a seperate bowl combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt.
6- Gradually add the mixture to the egg mixture and mix until well blended.
7- When both mixtures are well combined spread the mixture in the baking tray.
8- Finally bake for 15-20 minutes.

3b4fbed7d5.ingredients: 1- 1/2 cup Water, 1/4 cups Ground Coffee, 3 teaspoons Sugar, 1 stick Cinnamon, 1 Star Anise, 1/2 cups Whipped Cream For Topping, 1 teaspoon Brown Sugar, Coarse Is Best, For Garnish,
3b4fbed7d5.instructions:
1- 1.
2- In a medium saucepan combine water, coffee grounds, sugar, cinnamon stick, and star anise.
3- 2.
4- Stir and bring to a boil on medium-high.
5- Reduce heat to medium-low.
6- Simmer uncovered for 3 minutes.
7- Remove from heat.
8- 3.
9- Transfer to a small heatproof bowl.
10- Cover.
11- Chill for 2 hours.
12- 4.
13- Strain through fine sieve into another small bowl.
14- Discard solids.
15- Chill for another hour or so.
16- 5.
17- Put ice into 2 smallish glasses.
18- (Or 1 large one if you dont want to share.)
19- Pour in coffee.
20- Top with whipped cream and brown sugar.
21- Enjoy!
22- Recipe adapted from a Companys Coming cookbook.

06e69fb890.ingredients: 2 cups milk, 12 vanilla beans or 12 teaspoon vanilla essence, red chili pepper, 1 cinnamon stick, 45 g bittersweet chocolate,
06e69fb890.instructions:
1- Simmer milk in a saucepan with vanilla bean, cinnamon and chili.
2- Heat through for about a minute.
3- Whisk in grated chocolate, and continue to simmer until melted.
4- Remove from heat and let 'steep' for another 2 minutes.
5- Strain out the spices and serve.

query: It's freezing and I'm a craving a thick soup

options.05a8d8f651: Creamy onion soup made with potatoes
options.03d5cffe5a: Kielbasa sausage stew with potato, carrots and shrimp
options.01f4f9324d: Gazpacho - cold soup made of raw, blended vegetables
options.56c08f5841: Spicy hotpot broth with Sichuan chili peppers
options.207aa6d17e: Mad Mary's Creamy Onion Soup Recipe

05a8d8f651.ingredients: 14 cup butter, 5 large onions, 5 cups beef broth (4 small cans), 12 cup dried celery leaves or 12 cup dried celery flakes, 1 large potato (peeled & quartered), 1 cup white port or 1 cup cream sherry, 34 cup vinegar (or more), 4 tablespoons sugar, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 tablespoon dried parsley flakes, salt & pepper,
05a8d8f651.instructions:
1- Melt butter in a large pot.
2- Add quartered onions, beef broth, celery leaves or flakes, quartered potato & bring to a boil.
3- Cover pot & simmer on medium-low heat for 30 minutes.
4- Puree little by little in a blender, emptying the puree from the blender into another large pot.
5- Continue to puree little by little, so that it won't splash out of the blender & placing the puree in the 2nd pot, until all of the puree is in the 2nd pot.
6- Mix in the wine, vinegar & sugar.
7- Bring to boil again & then simmer on medium-low heat for 5 minutes.
8- Stir in the cream, parsley, salt & pepper.
9- Heat on low flame another 5 minutes & be VERY, VERY CAREFUL NOT TO BOIL!

03d5cffe5a.ingredients: 3 quarts water, 6 tablespoons Old Bay Seasoning (2T per qt of water), 1 lb red potatoes, 1 lb carrot (cut in 2 inch pieces), 1 lb kielbasa (cut into 2 inch pieces), 2 lbs large raw shrimp, unpeeled, 6 ears corn (husked, cleaned and quartered),
03d5cffe5a.instructions:
1- Bring water and Old Bay Seasoning to boil in a large pot.
2- Add potatoes, carrots, sausage and corn and cook for 25 minutes.
3- Stir in the shrimp and cook until shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes.
4- Drain, and serve.

01f4f9324d.ingredients: 4 medium tomatoes, 1 cup cucumber, chopped, 14 cup green pepper, chopped, 14 cup onion, very finely chopped, 14 cup ripe olives, pitted and sliced, 2 small garlic cloves, minced, 1 cup cold water, 2 tablespoons wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 12 teaspoon sugar, 12 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon ground cumin, 18 teaspoon pepper, crouton (optional), hard-boiled egg, grated (optional),
01f4f9324d.instructions:
1- Plunge tomatoes into boiling water for 30 seconds to loosen the skins.
2- Remove and immerse in cold water.
3- Remove the loosened skins.
4- Coarsely chop the tomatoes.
5- (You should have 1 1/2 cups of tomato).
6- In a mixing bowl combine chopped tomatoes, cucumber, green pepper, onion, olives, and garlic.
7- Stir in cold water, vinegar, oil, sugar, salt, cumin, and pepper.
8- Cover and chill thoroughly.
9- Garnish each serving with croutons or grated egg.

05fb116338.ingredients: 1 medium frying chicken, 2 12 quarts broth, 1 (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables (gumbo style), 1 medium potato, chopped, 3 carrots, sliced, 3 stalks celery, chopped, 1 (15 ounce) can hominy, 1 (4 ounce) can green chilies, 1 12 teaspoons season salt, 12 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 12 teaspoon garlic powder,
05fb116338.instructions:
1- Cook chicken in enough water to make 2 1/2 qts.
2- of broth.
3- When done remove chicken and set aside.
4- Add to broth vegetables, hominy, chilies and seasonings.
5- Cook 25 minutes.
6- Chop chicken and add to soup.
7- Simmer and serve hot.

56c08f5841.ingredients: 14 cup fermented black beans, 13 cup shaoxing wine (substitute ( medium dry sherry), 3 inches fresh ginger, unpeeled, 14 cup dried hot red chili pepper (Sichuanese preferred), 12 cup peanut oil (substitute ( vegetable oil, any high smoke point oil), 23 cup dripping (original recipe (beef or lard), 12 cup szechuan hot bean sauce, 3 quarts beef stock, 1 tablespoon rock sugar, 13 cup sichuanese fermented glutinous rice wine (optional), 12 teaspoon salt (really, to taste), 1 teaspoon szechwan pepper, whole,
56c08f5841.instructions:
1- Make a paste out of the black beans and 1 Tbsp Shaoxing rice wine, using either a mortar and pestle or a food processor.
2- Wash the ginger and cut it into slices about the thickness of a coin.
3- Using a scissors, snip the chiles into 1 inch sections and remove the seeds.
4- Heat 3 tbs of the oil in a wok over a medium flame so it's hot but not smoking.
5- Stir fry the chiles to flavor the oil; you want the oil to sizzle around the chiles, making them crisp and fragrant, but NOT burning; using a slotted spoon remove them and set aside.
6- Rinse out and dry the wok, the put on a simmer/low heat.
7- Add the rest of the oil and the beef drippings.
8- Once the drippings have melted completely, turn up the heat to medium.
9- When the oils just begin to smoke (around 250-300 degreesF), add the chile bean paste and stir fry until the oil is rich and fragrant (60-90 seconds).
10- The paste should NOT burn; if necessary either move the wok off the heat or turn the heat down to let the paste sizzle in the oil.
11- When the oil has reddened, add the black bean mash and the ginger.
12- Stir fry until they also are fragrant.
13- Add about 1 1/2 quarts of the beef stock and bring to a boil.
14- When the liquid reaches a boil, add the rock sugar, the rest of the Shaoxing wine, and (optional) the glutinous rice wine.
15- Salt to taste.
16- Add the chiles and the Sichuan pepper (adjust the quantity depending on how "hot and numbing" you want it) leave the broth to simmer for 15-20 minutes.
17- You are now ready to use this to dip ingredients to cook.
18- =============== NOTE ================.
19- You will add the rest of the chicken stock to top up the hotpot as the meal progresses.

207aa6d17e.ingredients: 2 cubes butter, 4 c. chicken broth, 1/2 pound bacon, 4 stalks celery, minced, White pepper to taste, 1 quart. half and half, 1/2 c. flour, approximately, 1 lg. yellow onion, 1 lg. white onion, 1 lg. purple onion, 1 bunch green onions,
207aa6d17e.instructions:
1- Heat butter in Dutch oven.
2- Add in sliced yellow, white, and purpose onion and saute/fry till transparent.
3- Halfway through saute/fry process add in minced celery and saute/fry till soft.
4- Add in flour, stir till bubbly, 3-5 min.
5- Add in chicken broth, stir till thickened.
6- Add in half and half and simmer.
7- Brown bacon, drain and crumble; add in to soup.
8- Chop green onion, including tops.
9- Add in to soup.
10- Add in pepper to taste.
11- Simmer 30-45 min.
12- Serve with a good, warm French bread.

query: What can I make for dinner using winter vegetables?

options.96b7375280: Vegetable stew made with pumpkin, leek, onion, squash, turnips and potatoes
options.88c8a03b32: Creamy, warm oatmeal with pumpkin and cinnamon
options.1d1c4293ae: Classic fried rice with pineapple chunks

96b7375280.ingredients: 1 white or cheese pumpkin, about 6 pounds, 1/2 cup spice mixture, recipe follows, 1 to 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 ounces thinly sliced leeks, 5 ounces cipolinni onions, roasted then peeled, 5 ounces red pearl onions, roasted then peeled, 1/2 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg, 1/2 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely minced, 3 toasted cinnamon sticks, 12 to 15 ounces peeled butternut or other squash, cut into 1-inch cubes and roasted 20 minutes in a preheated 350 degree F oven, 4 ounces peeled rutabaga, cut into 1-inch cubes and roasted 30 minutes, 4 ounces peeled turnip, cut into 1-inch cubes and roasted 15 to 20 minutes, 4 cups squash sauce, recipe follows, 2 large Peruvian potatoes, steamed, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes, 3 to 4 large Yukon gold potatoes, steamed, peeled, and cut into1-inch cubes, 1/4 cup coarsely chopped fresh herbs, 2/3 cup ras el hanout, 1/4 cup raw cane sugar, 1 tablespoon kosher or coarse sea salt, Freshly ground black pepper,
96b7375280.instructions:
1- Cut the top off the pumpkin as though you were going to make a Halloween Jack-o-lantern.
2- Seed and scrape the pumpkin so the inside is clean.
3- Clean and reserve the seeds.
4- Rub the lid and inside of the pumpkin with 1/4 cup of the spice mixture.
5- Rest the lid and pumpkin cut-side-down on a baking pan.
6- Wrap the pumpkin completely with 1 layer of aluminum foil.
7- Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven 45 to 55 minutes or until the pumpkin turns just tender.
8- Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large saucepot over medium heat.
9- Add the leeks, onions, nutmeg, jalapeno, and cinnamon sticks.
10- Saute until the leeks begin to soften.
11- Add the squashes and root vegetables to heat through.
12- Add the hot squash sauce, the potatoes, and bring to a simmer.
13- Remove from heat and add the herbs.
14- Remove the pumpkin from the oven and stand upright.
15- Ladle the stew into the cavity of the pumpkin.
16- To serve, toast some Russian black bread or walnut raisin bread, and place a slice in each of several warmed bowls.
17- Sprinkle some of the spice mixture on the rim of the pumpkin.
18- Use a carving knife to cut thin slices off the pumpkin.
19- Arrange the slices around the bread then ladle some of the stew over the bread.
20- Sprinkle the freshly cut rim of the pumpkin with more spice mixture and the stew with more herbs.
21- Repeat the process until the stew and pumpkin are gone.
22- Puree any leftover pumpkin with some spice mixture and brown sugar and use as you would canned pumpkin to make a savory pumpkin pie.
23- Combing above ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well.

00f4df3e5d.ingredients: 1 head green cabbage, salt, pepper, 8 tablespoons butter, aluminum foil,
00f4df3e5d.instructions:
1- Cut cabbage in eighths.
2- Place each piece of cabbage on a piece of aluminum foil large enough to wrap around entire piece of cabbage to leave no openings.
3- Before closing foil and 1 tablespoon of butter to each piece of cabbage and salt and pepper to taste.
4- Wrap in foil, make sure there are no punctures in foil.
5- Place on grill and left cook for 30 minutes or until tender, not mushy -- enjoy.

95ef8f9184.ingredients: 2 kg winter melon, 2 lemons, juice and rind of, 4 kg sugar, 60 g green ginger,
95ef8f9184.instructions:
1- Cut melon and lemon, sprinkle with sugar (about 2 cups) and let stand overnight.
2- Next day, boil the mixture until clear.
3- Add remaining sugar and boil until it gels.
4- Bottle and seal.

88c8a03b32.ingredients: 2 cups quick oats, 3 cups nonfat milk, 12 cup canned pumpkin, 14 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 18 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 tablespoon raisins, brown sugar,
88c8a03b32.instructions:
1- Bring milk to a boil in a medium saucepan.
2- Stir in oats and cook on a medium heat for about 5 minutes.
3- Add pumpkin and spices and stir until heated through.
4- Stir in raisins just before serving.

1d1c4293ae.ingredients: 12 lb ground beef or 12 lb chicken, slices, 1 cup frozen mixed vegetables, thawed, 1 cup pineapple chunk, 1 teaspoon crushed garlic, 1 onion, sliced into wedges, 1 tablespoon ground turmeric, 3 tablespoons oyster sauce, 3 tablespoons soy sauce, 2 cups cooked rice,
1d1c4293ae.instructions:
1- Heat wok& oil.
2- When oil is hot, put in the garlic& onions.
3- Stir fry until the garlic is slightly browned.
4- Add in the ground beef or chicken slices.
5- When the meat is 80% cooked, add in the mixed peas or vegetables.
6- Stirfry until the meat is cooked.
7- Add in the rice, oyster sauce, soy sauce& ground tumeric.
8- Mix all together.
9- Stir fry for another 2 minutes.
10- Serve with your favourite chili sauce.

96ddac05ef.ingredients: 1/2 cup whole, skin-on almonds, 1/4 cup untoasted sesame seeds, 3 tablespoons ancho chile powder, 2 teaspoons dried Mexican oregano, crumbled, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large yellow onion, finely chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 small butternut squash or other hard winter squash (about 1 1/2 pounds), peeled, halved, seeded, and cut into 3/4-inch cubes, 2 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 3/4-inch cubes, 1 (15-ounce) can pinto beans, drained and rinsed well, 1 (28-ounce) can diced fire-roasted tomatoes, 2 1/2 cups vegetable broth or water, 1 cup frozen white or yellow corn kernels (optional), 1/4 cup chopped cilantro leaves, plus more for garnishing, Freshly ground black pepper, Sour cream, for garnishing,
96ddac05ef.instructions:
1- Add the almonds, sesame seeds, chile powder, oregano, cumin, and measured salt to the bowl of a food processor and process to a fine meal.
2- Set aside.
3- Warm the olive oil in a large Dutch oven or heavy saucepan over medium heat.
4- Add the onion and cook until it begins to soften, about 5 minutes.
5- Add the garlic and ground almond-spice mixture and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
6- Add the squash, carrots, beans, tomatoes, and broth or water and bring to a boil, stirring to make sure the almond mixture doesnt stick to the bottom of the pan.
7- Lower the heat, partially cover the pan, and let the stew simmer, stirring occasionally, until the squash is very tender, about 30 to 40 minutes.
8- If the stew threatens to dry out, add a bit more broth or water.
9- Add the corn, if using, and measured cilantro.
10- Season with pepper and taste, adding more salt as needed.
11- Continue to simmer until the corn is hot and the flavors combine, about 5 minutes.
12- Ladle into warmed serving bowls and garnish with sour cream and a sprinkling of cilantro leaves.

query: What are some refreshing drinks that are perfect for the hot summer?

options.0ce6f6d989: Citrusy popsicle made from grapefruit, lime and tequila

258820bc84.ingredients: 12 cup carbonated water, 14 cup lemon juice, 18 cup sugar (not brown sugar),
258820bc84.instructions:
1- mix all the ingredients together.
2- microwave for 10 seconds.
3- stir.
4- freeze/cool.
5- enjoy!

0ce6f6d989.ingredients: 1/2 cups Granulated Sugar, 1/2 cups Water, 2- 1/2 cups Freshly Squeezed Grapefruit Juice (for 2 1/2 Cups You'll Need About 4 Large Grapefruits), 1/2 cups Lime Juice, 13 cups Tequila, 1 pinch Sea Salt, 12 Popsicle (sticks),
0ce6f6d989.instructions:
1- In a small saucepan over medium heat, stir sugar into water until sugar is fully dissolved.
2- Set aside to cool.
3- In a large bowl or pitcher, combine grapefruit juice, lime juice, tequila and sea salt.
4- Add simple syrup and stir.
5- Pour carefully into popsicle molds.
6- Recipe makes 10-12 standard sized popsicles.
7- Freeze for 1 hour before inserting popsicle sticks into molds.
8- Freeze 12 hours total before serving (less if you swap tequila for water or club soda).

09accc920a.ingredients: 1 cup half-and-half, 3 tablespoons canned pumpkin, 12 cup strong brewed hot coffee, 3 tablespoons sugar, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, and nutmeg to taste,
09accc920a.instructions:
1- Combine half-and-half and canned pumpkin in a saucepan, place over medium heat and stir constantly.
2- Heat until boiling but not burnt.
3- Remove the mixture and pour into a blender.
4- Whip in high speed for 20 seconds.
5- Pour the mixture in a large cup, add coffee, stir in sugar, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
6- Enjoy!

1ce8d38ec5.ingredients: 6 cups self-rising flour, 2 cups cream (heavy cream), 2 cups Sprite,
1ce8d38ec5.instructions:
1- Mix with knife lightly until just combined.
2- Roll out gently, cut into scones with round shaped cutter then bake in moderate oven 350F for 15 minutes.

97dac48240.ingredients: 18 Oreo cookies, divided, 1 12 pints vanilla ice cream, divided, 12 cup milk, 14 cup chocolate syrup,
97dac48240.instructions:
1- Coarsely chop 14 cookies.
2- Blend chopped cookies, 1 pint ice cream, milk and chocolate syrup in electric blender until well blended and smooth.
3- Pour into 4 (8-ounce) glasses; top each with a scoop of remaining ice cream and a cookie.
4- Serve immediately.

9c4eeaffa4.ingredients: 1 navel orange, pealed and split apart, 1 ripe mango, sliced and pealed, 5 tablespoons of plain organic yogurt (doesnt have to be organic), 12-34 cup orange juice (depending on your preferred thickness),
9c4eeaffa4.instructions: 1- Combine all ingredients in blender and blend for 20-30 seconds or until smooth.

query: What are some cocktails that can make me feel like I'm on an island vacation?

options.0fbe9ce183: Pina colada - cocktail made from coconut cream, pineapple juice and rum
options.226a2b9392: Milkshake cocktail made from Bailey's irish cream liquor
options.9774e1ebdb: Moist coconut cake with coconut frosting

0fbe9ce183.ingredients: 4 ounces golden rum, 4 ounces pineapple juice, 4 ounces Coco Lopez cream of coconut, 3 cups ice, Pineapple slices, for garnish, Maraschino cherries, for garnish,
0fbe9ce183.instructions:
1- Add rum, pineapple juice, cream of coconut and ice to blender.
2- Blend until smooth and frosty; add more ice as necessary.
3- Pour into tall glasses and garnish with pineapple slices and maraschino cherries (and paper umbrellas, if you have them).

226a2b9392.ingredients: 4 tablespoons Baileys Irish Cream, 2 scoops vanilla ice cream, 1 14 cups milk (whole/low fat), ice cube, 2 red cherries, mint leaf, chocolate syrup,
226a2b9392.instructions:
1- Crush ice cubes in blender (I use the PULSE button).
2- Add Bailey's Irish cream, ice-cream and milk, process until foamy and well-combined.
3- Pour into 2 tall glasses, top with a cherry and some mint leaves.
4- If you like, drizzle chocolate sauce on top and serve immediately.

37738fd9a8.ingredients: 2 teaspoons sugar, 3 medium passion fruit, 4 12 cups water, 1 lemon, juice of,
37738fd9a8.instructions:
1- Cut the fruits into half and scoop out the inside on a plate.
2- Put in a blender along with the remaining ingredients, except the lemon juice, and process until smooth.
3- Strain and add lemon juice.
4- Serve chilled over ice cubes in tall glasses on a hot sunny afternoon!

9774e1ebdb.ingredients: 125 g butter, 12 teaspoon coconut essence, 1 cup caster sugar, 2 eggs, 12 cup coconut, 1 12 cups self raising flour, 300 g sour cream, 13 cup milk, 2 cups icing sugar, 1 13 cups coconut, 2 egg whites, lightly beaten, pink food coloring,
9774e1ebdb.instructions:
1- Grease a deep 23cm round cake pan, line base with paper; grease paper.
2- Cream butter, sugar and essence in a small bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
3- Beat in eggs one at a time, beat until combined.
4- Transfer mixture carefully to large bowl.
5- Fold in half the coconut and sifted flour with half the sour cream and milk.
6- Then fold in remaining half, fold until smooth.
7- Pour mixture into prepared pan.
8- Bake in moderate oven for about 1 hour.
9- Stand 5 minutes before turning on to wire rack to cool.
10- Top with frosting when cold.
11- Frosting:.
12- Combine sifted icing sugar in bowl with coconut and egg whites, mix well.
13- Tint with a little pink food colouring if desired.

110c5d0a0a.ingredients: 1 quart vanilla ice cream, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 cup milk, 1 cup half-and-half,
110c5d0a0a.instructions:
1- Place the ice cream and vanilla extract in a blender.
2- While the motor is running, slowly add the milk and half-and-half.
3- Blend until thoroughly combined.
4- Pour into an ice cream parlor glass and serve.

7669f6e7fa.ingredients: 1 tablespoon kosher salt, 1 1/2 fluid ounces tequila, 1 fluid ounce orange flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau), 1/2 fluid ounce lime juice, 1 cup ice, 1 lime wheel,
7669f6e7fa.instructions:
1- Sprinkle salt on a small plate.
2- Lightly wet the rim of a cocktail glass or margarita glass with a damp paper towel.
3- Dip the moistened rim in salt to coat.
4- Set aside.
5- Combine tequila, orange-flavored brandy, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker.
6- Add ice and shake until chilled.
7- Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass or a salt-rimmed, ice-filled margarita glass.
8- Garnish with a lime wheel.

query: I want a savoury snack after school, but I can't be too full because I'll be eating dinner soon

options.132e2e86b4: Chocolate and caramel bare made with maple syrup
options.16edfc5b7b: Chicken noodle soup with homemade noodles
options.47aeb88ec6: Chicken Nuggets With Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce

4803070f9d.ingredients: 6 frozen breaded chicken nuggets, 1 stick KRAFT or POLLY-O Mozzarella String Cheese, cut into 6 slices,
4803070f9d.instructions:
1- Place chicken nuggets on microwaveable plate.
2- Microwave as directed on package.
3- Top each nugget with 1 cheese slice.
4- Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
5- or until cheese is melted.

56ecf3f01c.ingredients: 1/2 recipe Rapid Rolls, recipe follows, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 3/4 cup chopped pecans, 6 tablespoons dark brown sugar, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup powdered (confectioners') sugar, 1/2 cup (4 ounces) cream cheese, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 4 tablespoons milk, Melted butter, for brushing, 3 (.25-ounce) packets active dry yeast, 1 3/4 cups warm water, 1/2 cup honey, 1/2 cup melted butter, plus more for brushing, 2 teaspoons salt, plus more for sprinkling, 2 large eggs, beaten, 4 to 6 cups flour, plus more if needed,
56ecf3f01c.instructions:
1- After the dough comes together, on a well-floured surface, using a lightly floured rolling pin, roll out the dough to a 15 by 11-inch rectangle.
2- In a mixing bowl add the pecans, brown sugar, and cinnamon.
3- Spread the softened unsalted butter over the dough leaving a 1/2-inch border.
4- Sprinkle the cinnamon sugar evenly over the dough.
5- Starting with the long side, roll up the dough tightly ending with the seam-side down.
6- Cut 10 slices each about 1/2-inch thick.
7- Place in 2 (9 by 13-inch) greased baking dishes and cover with a kitchen towel.
8- Allow the rolls to rise in a warm environment for an additional 15 to 20 minutes.
9- Brush with melted butter before baking
10- Bake at 400 degrees F until the tops are golden brown, about 25 to 30 minutes.
11- Remove from the oven and brush tops with melted butter and cool on cooling rack.
12- Drizzle with prepared cream cheese glaze.
13- To make Cream Cheese Glaze: In a mixing bowl, combine the powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, milk, and vanilla.
14- Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
15- In the bowl of a stand mixer, fitted with the paddle attachment, combine the instant yeast, and warm water.
16- Let it activate for 5 minutes until bubbly.
17- Stir in the honey.
18- On low speed, add 1/2 cup melted butter, 2 teaspoons salt, and eggs.
19- Slowly add the flour cup-by-cup until fully incorporated and the dough pulls away from the sides of the mixing bowl.
20- Add more flour if it is too sticky.
21- Portion the dough into 24 even servings.
22- Form the rolls into desired shape and let rise approximately 20 minutes, or until doubled in size.
23- Place the rolls in a cast iron skillet or on a baking sheet.
24- Brush the rolls with melted butter.
25- Bake for 25 minutes until the tops are golden brown.
26- Remove from the oven and brush with more melted butter, and sprinkle with a little salt.
27- Cook's Note: This recipe can be used as a traditional loaf bread, pizza dough, and for both savory and sweet rolls.

132e2e86b4.ingredients: 3 Tablespoons Rapadura (dehydrated Cane Juice), 1 teaspoon Maple Syrup, 1- 1/2 cup Plus 1 Tablespoon, Whole Wheat Pastry Flour, 1/4 teaspoons Sea Salt, 9 Tablespoons Butter, Softened And Cut Into Tablespoons, 10 ounces, weight Dark Organic Chocolate, 1 cup 1/2 Cups Rapadura (dehydrated Cane Juice), 1/4 cups Water, 6 Tablespoons Butter, 1 cup Heavy Cream, 1/2 teaspoons Sea Salt, Plus 1 Tablespoon For Sprinkling,
132e2e86b4.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
2- Line an 8 x 8-inch square pan with unbleached parchment paper.
3- Leave an overhang on all sides.
4- Butter the parchment inside the pan and then set aside.
5- Start by preparing the shortbread crust.
6- In the bowl of a food processor, pulse together rapadura, maple syrup, flour and salt to combine.
7- Add butter and process until dough begins to come together.
8- Pour dough out onto the pan and press evenly into the pan.
9- Bake for 30 minutes, until golden brown.
10- Place chocolate in a large bowl and set aside.
11- In a medium saucepan, heat rapadura and water over medium heat.
12- Simmer until it reads 220 degrees on a candy thermometer, about 6-7 minutes.
13- Remove from heat and add the cream and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
14- Put the pan back over heat and bring to a boil, stirring until smooth.
15- Pour mixture over the chocolate and let the mixture sit for 1 minute.
16- Whisk together until smooth, and then pour mixture over crust.
17- Refrigerate overnight.
18- To serve, carefully lift up on the parchment paper to release the bars from the pan.
19- Cut bars using a knife dipped in hot water and then quickly dried.
20- Sprinkle with sea salt.
21- These bars can be kept in the fridge for at least 3 days.

08d62f3586.ingredients: 340 g spaghettini, 340 g mixed lean ground meat or 340 g ground beef or 340 g ground veal, 34 cup chopped onion, 2 cloves garlic, chopped, 600 g canned crushed tomatoes, 340 g tomato sauce, 2 14 teaspoons Italian herb seasoning, 11 g chopped fresh parsley,
08d62f3586.instructions:
1- Cook pasta in a large pan of boiling water for 9 minutes or until al dente{cooked but firm to touch}.
2- Drain well.
3- Heat a saucepan on medium flame.
4- Once its hot, add the garlic, onion and meat to it.
5- Stir-fry and cook it for 5 minutes until the meat begins to brown.
6- Discard the extra fat.
7- Add the crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, herb seasoning, salt and black pepper to taste.
8- Bring to a boil over high flame.
9- Lower flame to medium heat and cook, uncovered, for 5 minutes, until thickened.
10- Stir in parsley.
11- Serve sauce over the pasta.
12- Enjoy!

16edfc5b7b.ingredients: 5 lbs roasting hen, 1 onion, sliced, 1 carrot, sliced, 3 sprigs parsley, 1 tablespoon salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 1 14 cups cake flour, 14 teaspoon salt, 1 large egg, 1 12 teaspoons unsalted butter, room temperature, 2 12 tablespoons water (about), 2 medium baking potatoes, peeled, cubed, 12 cup celery, 3 fresh thyme sprigs, 1 cup frozen peas,
16edfc5b7b.instructions:
1- For the soup: Put the hen into a large pot.
2- Add cold water to just cover the hen, plus the next 6 ingredients.
3- Bring to a boil and simmer, partially covered until chicken is done, about 1 hour.
4- Remove chicken from pot and cool.
5- Remove the skin and bones from the chicken and cut into bite size pieces.
6- At this point I like to chill the cooking liquid over night to congeal the fat and discard it.
7- Cover and refrigerate the chicken as well, if you choose to do this.
8- For the noodles: Blend flour and salt in a processor.
9- Add butter and egg.
10- Pulse in enough water to make dough.
11- Remove dough from processor and form into a ball.
12- Divide ball into 4 pieces.
13- Flatten and generously flour each piece.
14- Roll until very thin (1/16 inch), or run through the various settings of a pasta roller until the dough is about 1/16 inch thick, flouring as needed.
15- Cut dough into desired length and width.
16- I like mine about 1x2 inches.
17- Bring the cooking liquid, potatoes, celery and thyme to a boil in a large pot.
18- Cook until potatoes are done, about 15 minutes.
19- Add frozen peas and bring back to a boil.
20- Add noodles by the handfuls and submerge in the cooking liquid with a spoon.
21- Boil until noodles are tender, about 6 minutes.
22- Add cut up chicken meat and reheat.
23- Serve.

47aeb88ec6.ingredients: 2 cups crushed sour cream and onion potato chips, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons milk, 6 chicken breast fillets, cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes, 13 cup butter, melted, 34 cup mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons honey, 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, 1 tablespoon lemon juice or 12 lemon, juice of, horseradish, to taste, 2 tablespoons orange juice (more or less as needed),
47aeb88ec6.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
2- Spread the crushed potato chips in a shallow dish.
3- Beat together the egg and milk in a shallow bowl.
4- Dip the chicken cubes into the egg mixture and then dredge them in the chips.
5- Place the chicken nuggets on a baking sheet and drizzle with melted butter.
6- Bake for 15 to 18 minutes, or until golden brown.
7- Honey Mustard instructions:.
8- Combine all ingredients except orange juice; stir well.
9- Thin to pouring consistency for dressing or dipping consistency for dips with orange juice.
10- Cover and chill for 2 or 3 hours.

query: I need breakfast but I have no cooking experience

options.04d424289c: Eggs benedict - poached eggs, prosciutto on top of English muffins topped with a creamy Hollandaise sauce
options.128334eec1: Classic salad with creamy caesar dressing and croutons
options.0a77dac796: Breakfast pizza with sausage, cheddar, sour cream and jalapenos
options.133f6a4526: Tuna tataki - lightly seared tuna steaks in ponzu sauce

7d59b6d82f.instructions:
1- Place the dish you choose on a flat stable surface.
2- Select the flavor of cereal of your liking.
3- Pour cereal into the dish until you reach your desired serving.
4- Next pour milk over the cereal until it is about 3/4 from the top.
5- Mix the cereal slightly with a spoon.
6- Use the same spoon to eat the cereal.
7- Enjoy your delicious, quick breakfast.

04d424289c.ingredients: 3 large egg yolks, room temperature, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 8 ounces (2 sticks) unsalted butter, softened, 2 small pinches white pepper, Fine sea salt, Unsalted butter or nonstick spray, for greasing cups, 8 eggs, 4 English muffins, split and toasted, 8 ounces Irish smoked salmon, sliced, or 8 slices prosciutto, 1/2 small red pepper, finely diced, 1/2 small yellow pepper, finely diced, 2 chives, finely chopped,
04d424289c.instructions:
1- For the hollandaise sauce: Fill a medium saucepan (or the bottom half of a double boiler) with 2 inches of water and bring to a simmer.
2- In a medium bowl that fits snugly into the saucepan without touching the bottom (or in the top half of a double boiler), whisk together the egg yolks, lemon juice and 1 tablespoon water.
3- Set the bowl over the simmering water and cook over very low heat, whisking constantly, until the egg yolk mixture is very pale and thick, about 3 minutes; if it begins to heat too quickly and threatens to get lumpy, remove the bowl from the saucepan and whisk for a while before setting it back over the simmering water.
4- When ready, you should be able to see the bottom of the bowl with every whisk stroke.
5- Continue whisking while adding the softened butter a little at a time.
6- When all of the butter has been incorporated, add the white pepper and salt to taste.
7- Remove the bowl from the saucepan and set it into a warm bowl of hot water to keep the sauce warm; stir occasionally while you are poaching the eggs.
8- For the poached eggs: Fill an egg poaching pan with 1 inch of water.
9- Cover and bring to a simmer over medium heat.
10- Lightly grease the poaching cups with butter.
11- Crack the eggs into the cups and set the cups into the poaching pan.
12- Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover and cook to your desired doneness3 minutes for perfect runny poached eggs.
13- To serve: Set two toasted muffins halves on each plate.
14- Top each with smoked salmon and a poached egg.
15- Spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons of hollandaise sauce over each egg.
16- Garnish with red and yellow peppers and a sprinkling of chives.
17- Serve immediately.

128334eec1.ingredients: 2 heads Romaine Lettuce, 1 clove Garlic, Grated, 6 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 1 dash Pepper, 3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise, 1/4 cups Parmesan Cheese, 1 cup Croutons,
128334eec1.instructions:
1- Wash and cut the romaine lettuce into bite size pieces.
2- In a separate bowl combine the grated garlic clove, olive oil, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise and parmesan cheese.
3- You can also add minced anchovies at this point but I think it makes it too salty.
4- Pour this mixture over the lettuce, mix well and then top with the croutons.
5- Add grilled chicken, shrimp or beef.
6- A meal in itself.

0a77dac796.ingredients: 2 Pillsbury refrigerated classic pizza crust, 1 (12 ounce) jar salsa, 1 lb sausage or 1 lb bacon, 18 eggs, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream (optional), jalapeno (optional),
0a77dac796.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375.
2- Press dough onto greased large pizza pan.
3- Bake crust 5-7 minutes until slightly brown.
4- Remove from oven & set aside.
5- Meanwhile, cook meat; drain & set aside.
6- Scramble eggs in large skillet.
7- Spread salsa over pizza crust.
8- Top with meat, eggs & cheese.
9- Bake 15-20 minutes until cheese is melted & pizza is heated through.
10- Serve hot & top with sour cream &/or jalapenos (optional).

133f6a4526.ingredients: 1 pound Tuna Steaks (2 Medium Steaks Or So), 2 cups Baby Spinach Or Arugula, Washed, 1/4 cups Ponzu (or Substitute 3 Tablespoons Soy Sauce, 1 Tablespoon White Or Rice Vinegar, And 1 Pinch Sugar For The 1/4 Cup Ponzu), Salt To Taste, Light Oil, For Searing, Chili Oil, To Taste,
133f6a4526.instructions:
1- Preheat a large skillet to medium-high heat.
2- Very lightly season both sides of the tuna with salt to taste.
3- When the pan is hot, drizzle a small amount of light oil into the pan.
4- When oil is hot add the tuna and sear the tuna for 45 seconds on both sidesto just barely cook the edges.
5- Remove the tuna from the heat and let it rest.
6- You could sear the meat ahead of time, chill it, and assemble closer to meal time, as well.
7- Thinly slice the tuna against the grain into 2-inch slices.
8- Layer the tuna around the edges of a shallow platter with a lip, and mound the greens in the center of the tuna.
9- Drizzle the entire dish with the ponzu and as much chili oil as you can handle.
10- Serve with sushi, as a salad, appetizer, or over rice for a perfect meal.

62f3b2e921.ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter, 4 cups cereal, 2 tablespoons maple syrup, 1 (15 ounce) can peach slices or 1 (15 ounce) can canned pears or 1 (15 ounce) can canned apricots, drained, milk or yogurt, to taste,
62f3b2e921.instructions:
1- Put the butter in an 8 inch baking dish and place in the oven as it is preheating to 375 degrees.
2- Assemble 4 cups of breakfast cereals (oatmeal, flake cereals, bite-sized shredded wheat, puffed grains such as Rice Krispies) in a bowl.
3- When the butter has melted pour it over the cereals making an even coating.
4- Drizzle with maple syrup and toss to mix.
5- Spread a layer of canned fruit in the baking dish and top with cereal mixture.
6- Bake until sizzling, about 15 minutes.
7- Pour milk or yogurt over each serving.

query: What's a good lunch I can warm up in the microwave at my office?

options.035e1bea0d: Simple fried rice with carrots and peas
options.34f3bc7c61: Breakfast wrap with scrambled eggs, smoked bacon and sharp cheddar
options.0bf4540f77: Microwave chocolate cake in a mug
options.0a6f99d2b8: Classic egg sandwich - mashed eggs with mayonnaise sandwiched between white bread
options.0d9b6d72ac: Zaru Soba - Japanese cold noodles with tsuyu dipping sauce

035e1bea0d.ingredients: cooked rice (amount depends on servings desired), 12 can peas (to taste), 1 medium chopped carrot (to taste), soy sauce (to taste), 1 egg, scrambled, 2 teaspoons cooking oil, 1 pinch salt,
035e1bea0d.instructions:
1- Cook the rice on medium with 1 tsp of the cooking oil and salt until it crisps and starts to brown, stirring frequently.
2- Remove the rice from the pan.
3- Add the rest of the cooking oil and the vegetables to the pan, cooking until the carrots soften a bit.
4- Return the rice to the pan.
5- Add the scrambled egg.
6- Mix everything well.
7- Add soy sauce to taste, and ginger powder if desired.

34f3bc7c61.ingredients: 3 large eggs, 4 slices of hickory smoked bacon (diced), 1/2 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 2 whole wheat tortillas,
34f3bc7c61.instructions:
1- In 10" nonstick pan cook bacon thoroughly
2- While bacon is sizzling away, crack eggs into small bowl and add spices.
3- Mix until texture is smooth
4- When bacon is done, drain off excess grease.
5- Pour egg mixture directly into pan with bacon over medium /low heat
6- Allow eggs to set a bit and then begin to scramble them up.
7- Cook until desired "tightness' of eggs
8- Remove from heat and add the shredded cheese.
9- Mix until melted.
10- Heat tortillas in microwave for 10 seconds.
11- Place tortilla on plate and pour your creation onto it.
12- Wrap it up and enjoy...

0bf4540f77.ingredients: 4 tablespoons cake flour, 4 tablespoons sugar, 2 tablespoons cocoa, 1 egg, 3 tablespoons milk, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 dash vanilla, 3 tablespoons chocolate chips,
0bf4540f77.instructions:
1- Add flour, sugar and cocoa to a coffee mug.
2- Mix well.
3- Add egg and mix thoroughly.
4- Pour in milk,oil, vanilla, and chocolate chips.
5- Mix well.
6- Cook on high in microwave for 3 minutes.
7- Cake will rise over top of mug.
8- Test for firmness, by pressing on the top lightly with a spoon.
9- Microwave in 30 second intervals, until done.
10- Allow to cool before eating.

0a6f99d2b8.ingredients: 1/2 cup KRAFT Creamy Egg Mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons wholegrain mustard, 12 hard boiled eggs, chopped, 1/2 cup chives, finely chopped, salt and pepper, to taste, 1 loaf white sandwich bread, cut lengthwise, 50g watercress or fine lettuce leaves,
0a6f99d2b8.instructions:
1- Combine mayonnaise, mustard, eggs, chives, salt and pepper.
2- Spread half of the bread slices with egg mixture.
3- Top with watercress.
4- Top with another slice of bread spread with mayonnaise.
5- Trim the crusts away and slice into fingers.
6- Serve.

0d9b6d72ac.ingredients: 2 cups unseasoned dashi (Japanese soup stock), 5 tablespoons usukuchi shoyu (Japanese light soy sauce), 3 tablespoons sugar, 2 tablespoons mirin (Japanese sweet rice wine), 1 1/2 shoyu (Japanese soy sauce), 3 bundles somen (thin white wheat noodles), paper wrapping discarded, Accompaniments: finely grated peeled fresh ginger; minced scallion; shredded fresh shiso leaves; sesame seeds,
0d9b6d72ac.instructions:
1- Heat all dipping sauce ingredients in a small saucepan over low heat, stirring, until sugar is dissolved.
2- Cool sauce, then chill, covered, until cold, about 1 hour.
3- Bring 2 1/2 quarts water to a rolling boil in a 4-quart saucepan over moderately high heat.
4- Add noodles and 1 cup more water.
5- When water returns to a boil, add 1 cup cold water and bring back to a boil.
6- Simmer noodles until just tender and slightly translucent, about 2 minutes.
7- Test noodles for doneness by dipping 1 strand in cold water and sampling.
8- If noodles are not tender, add 1 cup more water and return water to a boil.
9- Drain noodles in a colander and rinse well under cold water.
10- Divide noodles among 6 bowls filled with ice and cold water.
11- Divide dipping sauce among 6 small bowls and serve with accompaniments for flavoring it, then dip each mouthful of noodles in sauce.

02a3c1fb5b.ingredients: 3 cups left-over cooked rice, 2 Chinese sausage, sliced, 1 tablespoon garlic, chopped, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 14 cup chopped ham, 14 cup chopped shrimp, 3 eggs, beaten and lightly seasoned with, salt and pepper, 2 tablespoons oil, green onion, finely chopped,
02a3c1fb5b.instructions:
1- In a hot pan, pour the oil, and make an omelet.
2- Slice in thin shreds then set aside.
3- In the same pan, fry Chinese sausages until crisp.
4- Reduce the oil in half (or less if you prefer).
5- Saute garlic, onion, and rice.
6- Add the rest of the ingredients and stir-fry for 15-20 minutes until rice is cooked and evenly coated with soy sauce.
7- Garnish with scrambled egg shreds and green onions.

query: I want to eat lunch at my office desk but I'm worried that the smell of my food will affect my colleagues

options.85ea5bf974: Ham and cheese sandwich with mayonnaise
options.0242694490: Pesto tuna sandwich - sandwich filled with canned tuna mixed with pesto and mayonnaise
options.43e35398bc: Capellini pasta cooked in champagne vinegar, shallots and black truffle oil
options.34f3bc7c61: Breakfast wrap with scrambled eggs, smoked bacon and sharp cheddar
options.32002fabc6: Nachos with guacamole, salsa verde, refried beans, sour cream and jalepenos

85ea5bf974.ingredients: 4 slices white bread, 4 slices cheese, thickly cut, 2 slices ham, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise,
85ea5bf974.instructions:
1- Spread mayonnaise evenly on two pieces of the bread.
2- Place a piece of cheese on the bread.
3- Place a slice of ham on top of the cheese.
4- Place the other slice of bread on top.
5- Cut in half.
6- Enjoy.

0242694490.ingredients: 6 tablespoons pesto sauce (I used store-bought), 14 cup light mayonnaise, 2 (6 ounce) cans albacore tuna in water, drained, 2 medium tomatoes, diced, shredded lettuce (optional), 4 slices monterey jack cheese, 4 hard rolls,
0242694490.instructions:
1- Combine the pesto, mayo, tuna, and tomatoes.
2- Salt and pepper to taste.
3- Spread the tuna mixture on the bottom half of the rolls and top with a slice of cheese (I used hoagie rolls; this is enough filling for four large sandwiches).
4- Broil until the cheese is slightly browned.
5- Top with optional lettuce and the other half of the bun.
6- Serve!

43e35398bc.ingredients: 1/2 package capellini, 1/2 package frozen peas, 1/4 stick unsalted butter, 1/2 -ounce chopped black truffle, 1 1/2 ounces black truffle oil, 1/2 -ounce champagne vinegar, 1 small minced shallot, 1 bunch onion grass (or chives) finely minced,
43e35398bc.instructions:
1- Cook pasta until very al dente, 6 to 7 minutes in a large pot with ample boiling water and salt.
2- Add peas and finish cooking, about 1 minute.
3- Drain well and toss in butter and truffle vinaigrette (made by combining 1/2-ounce chopped black truffle, 1 1/2 ounces black truffle oil, 1/2-ounce champagne vinegar, and 1 small minced shallot) and chives.
4- Check seasoning and serve immediately.

34f3bc7c61.ingredients: 3 large eggs, 4 slices of hickory smoked bacon (diced), 1/2 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 2 whole wheat tortillas,
34f3bc7c61.instructions:
1- In 10" nonstick pan cook bacon thoroughly
2- While bacon is sizzling away, crack eggs into small bowl and add spices.
3- Mix until texture is smooth
4- When bacon is done, drain off excess grease.
5- Pour egg mixture directly into pan with bacon over medium /low heat
6- Allow eggs to set a bit and then begin to scramble them up.
7- Cook until desired "tightness' of eggs
8- Remove from heat and add the shredded cheese.
9- Mix until melted.
10- Heat tortillas in microwave for 10 seconds.
11- Place tortilla on plate and pour your creation onto it.
12- Wrap it up and enjoy...

32002fabc6.ingredients: 10 -15 tortilla chips, 2 tablespoons refried beans (or black beans), 1 cup cheese (cheddar or Mexican mix, whatever you have around), 12-1 jalapeno, chopped (optional), 12 cup salsa (I use Salsa), 12 avocado, chopped (or mashed), 2 tablespoons sour cream, 1 tablespoon black olives, chopped (or sliced), 1 tablespoon tomatoes, chopped,
32002fabc6.instructions:
1- Spread the chips evenly on a plate.
2- Spread the beans on top of the chips.
3- If you use refried beans, put little globs of them on the chips around the plate - these don't spread easily.
4- Cover with the cheese.
5- Sprinkle the chopped jalapenos over the cheese.
6- Microwave for 1 minute or until all the cheese is melted.
7- Spread the salsa over the nachos(try not to get too watery of salsa b/c that will make your chips watery).
8- Spread the sour cream over the salsa.
9- Spread the avocado, black olives, and tomatoes over the sourcream.
10- Enjoy!
11- We usually end up making a second plate.

8a9f3a1f25.ingredients: 1 lb deli ham slices (shaved), 1 lb swiss cheese, thinly sliced, 1 stick butter, 1 12 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1 12 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 12 teaspoons instant minced onion, 1 12 pack King's Hawaiian Original Hawaiian sweet rolls,
8a9f3a1f25.instructions:
1- Melt butter and mix in mustard, sauce and onion.
2- Cut the entire pack of rolls in half, horizontally (keeping all top and bottom halves separately in tact).
3- In a 9x13-inch pan, place bottom half of rolls and cover with ham and cheese.
4- Cover ham and cheese stacks with top half of rolls.
5- Drizzle butter mixture over top of rolls, making sure onion is evenly distributed.
6- Refrigerate over night.
7- Bake uncovered at 350F for 15-20 minutes and, once finished, separate for serving.
8- This recipe was shared by Kings Hawaiian.

options.991fc36754: Meatball submarine sandwich with parmesan and ricotta cheese and tomato sauce
options.9c01d352bc: Hot dogs with hot pepper sauce and green chillies
options.0a6f99d2b8: Classic egg sandwich - mashed eggs with mayonnaise sandwiched between white bread

85ea5bf974.ingredients: 4 slices white bread, 4 slices cheese, thickly cut, 2 slices ham, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise,
85ea5bf974.instructions:
1- Spread mayonnaise evenly on two pieces of the bread.
2- Place a piece of cheese on the bread.
3- Place a slice of ham on top of the cheese.

991fc36754.ingredients: 1 lb NY strip or boneless steak ground by butcher, 4 clove Garlic- crushed, 1 each Shallot - minced, 1 each Egg, 3 slice Italian bread soaked in milk, 1 cup Parmesan cheese -shredded, 1 cup Ricotta, 1 bunch Basil leaves chopped, 1 Salt and pepper, 28 oz Canned whole tomatoes, 1 each Shallot - minced, 3 clove Garlic crushed, 1 bunch Basil leaves chopped, 1 Fresh oregano, 1 Salt and pepper,
991fc36754.instructions:
1- Set oven for 375AF.
2- Put together all ingredients for meatballs.
3- Mix by hand until fully incorporated in large bowl.
4- Makes small balls.
5- Place them on cookie sheet with wiped olive oil.
6- Bake for 25 minutes.
7- In a large pot SautAS garlic and shallot in olive oil.
8- Crush can of tomatoes and add.
9- Add salt and pepper.
10- Let cook for 10 minutes.
11- Add basil and oregano.
12- Carefully add meatballs into sauce.
13- Dress hoagie roll with sauce and meat balls.
14- Cheese if you like.
15- Bon Apetit!
16- !

8abf5e0868.ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat flour self-raising, 1 tablespoon honey, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 3 large egg whites, 23 cup milk, skim low-fat or non-fat, nonstick cooking spray olive oil, 200 grams ricotta cheese reduced-fat, optional, 250 grams berries, 2 tablespoons maple syrup Queen Pure,
8abf5e0868.instructions:
1- Sift flour into a bowl.
2- Add husks left in sieve.
3- Using a fork, beat honey, vanilla, eggwhites and milk in a jug until well combined.
4- Pour into flour mixture.
5- Stir to a smooth batter.
6- Stand for 10 minutes.
7- Spray a non-stick frying pan with oil.
8- Heat over medium heat.
9- Pour 1/4 cup batter into pan.
10- Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until small bubbles appear on surface.
11- Turn over.
12- Cook for 1 minute or until cooked through.
13- Remove pancake to a plate.
14- Cover to keep warm.
15- Repeat with remaining batter, greasing pan between pancakes.
16- Place pancakes on plates.
17- Top with ricotta if using, and berries.
18- Drizzle with maple syrup and serve.

9c01d352bc.ingredients: 1 pkg. (16 oz.) OSCAR MAYER XXL Hot & Spicy Hot Dogs, 1/3 cup CLAUSSEN Sweet Pickle Relish, 1 can (4 oz.) chopped green chiles, drained, 1 Tbsp. HEINZ Yellow Mustard, 1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce, or to taste, 6 hot dog buns, partially split,
9c01d352bc.instructions:
1- Heat hot dogs as directed on package until heated through (160F).
2- Mix relish, chilies, mustard and hot pepper sauce.
3- Place hot dogs in buns.
4- Top with the relish mixture.

0a6f99d2b8.ingredients: 1/2 cup KRAFT Creamy Egg Mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons wholegrain mustard, 12 hard boiled eggs, chopped, 1/2 cup chives, finely chopped, salt and pepper, to taste, 1 loaf white sandwich bread, cut lengthwise, 50g watercress or fine lettuce leaves,
0a6f99d2b8.instructions:
1- Combine mayonnaise, mustard, eggs, chives, salt and pepper.
2- Spread half of the bread slices with egg mixture.
3- Top with watercress.
4- Top with another slice of bread spread with mayonnaise.
5- Trim the crusts away and slice into fingers.
6- Serve.

06c765efb1.ingredients: 1/2 pound asparagus (preferably pencil-thin), 4 tablespoons olive oil, Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste, 4 large eggs, 1/2 16-inch loaf Italian bread,
06c765efb1.instructions:
1- Wash the asparagus under cold running water.
2- Snap off and discard the tough bottom portion.
3- If using thicker asparagus, scrape each stalk to remove the skin, then cut it into thirds lengthwise, leaving the the asparagus head intact.
4- In a medium-size saucepan, heat the oil until just warm.
5- Add the asparagus and salt.
6- Saute over medium heat, stirring, for about 2 minutes.
7- Cover and cook for another 2 minutes, shaking the pan or stirring occasionally.
8- Meanwhile, break the eggs into a bowl and beat, adding a pinch of salt and pepper.
9- Cut the bread in half lengthwise.
10- Remove the soft, doughy part and toast the loaf slightly.
11- Uncover the asparagus, raise the heat slightly and add the eggs, stirring.
12- Cook for 1 minute, or until the eggs are set.
13- Scoop onto the bread and cut in half.

query: I want a meal to eat before dawn in Ramadan

options.248ec29976: Shakshuka - Middle eastern dish of eggs poached in a sauce of tomatoes, olive oil, peppers, onion and garlic
options.04d424289c: Eggs benedict - poached eggs, prosciutto on top of English muffins topped with a creamy Hollandaise sauce
options.3f490b40d3: Savoury french toast with bacon, tomato and cheese

248ec29976.ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 medium onion, diced, 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 2 cans diced tomatoes, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, 1 tbsp sugar, to taste salt & pepper,
248ec29976.instructions:
1- Heat olive oil in heavy pan or skillet and saute onions until soften.
2- Add garlic and stir-fry until fragrant.
3- Add bell pepper and stir-fry until soften (5-7 mins).
4- Add tomatoes and tomato paste, stir until blended.
5- Add spices and sugar into the pan.
6- Stir to blend well.
7- Simmer on medium heat for 5-7 mins until the sauce has been reduced.
8- Add salt & pepper to taste, stir well.
9- Sample the sauce and add spices according to taste & preference.
10- Make 4 shallow wells in the sauce and drop in the eggs.
11- Cover pan and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
12- Garnish with parsley and serve.
13- Ideal with pita bread, whole meal bread or over rice.

04d424289c.ingredients: 3 large egg yolks, room temperature, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 8 ounces (2 sticks) unsalted butter, softened, 2 small pinches white pepper, Fine sea salt, Unsalted butter or nonstick spray, for greasing cups, 8 eggs, 4 English muffins, split and toasted, 8 ounces Irish smoked salmon, sliced, or 8 slices prosciutto, 1/2 small red pepper, finely diced, 1/2 small yellow pepper, finely diced, 2 chives, finely chopped,
04d424289c.instructions:
1- For the hollandaise sauce: Fill a medium saucepan (or the bottom half of a double boiler) with 2 inches of water and bring to a simmer.
2- In a medium bowl that fits snugly into the saucepan without touching the bottom (or in the top half of a double boiler), whisk together the egg yolks, lemon juice and 1 tablespoon water.
3- Set the bowl over the simmering water and cook over very low heat, whisking constantly, until the egg yolk mixture is very pale and thick, about 3 minutes; if it begins to heat too quickly and threatens to get lumpy, remove the bowl from the saucepan and whisk for a while before setting it back over the simmering water.
4- When ready, you should be able to see the bottom of the bowl with every whisk stroke.
5- Continue whisking while adding the softened butter a little at a time.
6- When all of the butter has been incorporated, add the white pepper and salt to taste.
7- Remove the bowl from the saucepan and set it into a warm bowl of hot water to keep the sauce warm; stir occasionally while you are poaching the eggs.
8- For the poached eggs: Fill an egg poaching pan with 1 inch of water.
9- Cover and bring to a simmer over medium heat.
10- Lightly grease the poaching cups with butter.
11- Crack the eggs into the cups and set the cups into the poaching pan.
12- Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover and cook to your desired doneness3 minutes for perfect runny poached eggs.
13- To serve: Set two toasted muffins halves on each plate.
14- Top each with smoked salmon and a poached egg.
15- Spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons of hollandaise sauce over each egg.
16- Garnish with red and yellow peppers and a sprinkling of chives.
17- Serve immediately.

7d59b6d82f.instructions:
1- Place the dish you choose on a flat stable surface.
2- Select the flavor of cereal of your liking.
3- Pour cereal into the dish until you reach your desired serving.
4- Next pour milk over the cereal until it is about 3/4 from the top.
5- Mix the cereal slightly with a spoon.
6- Use the same spoon to eat the cereal.
7- Enjoy your delicious, quick breakfast.

3f490b40d3.ingredients: 6 slices Bacon, 2 Tablespoons Flour, 3/4 teaspoons Baking Powder, 1- 1/2 teaspoon Kosher Salt, 1/2 teaspoons Freshly Ground Black Pepper, 3 whole Eggs, 1-13 cup Whole Milk, 3/4 cups Grated Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 1/2 cups Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese, 12 ounces, weight Dense White Bread (such As French Bread, Challah Or Brioche), Cut Into Six 1-inch Slices, 1 whole Medium Tomato, Cut Into 1/2-inch Dice, 2 whole Green Onions, White And Green Parts, Thinly Sliced,
3f490b40d3.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Generously butter the bottom and sides of a 13- by 9-inch baking dish.
2- Cook bacon until crisp.
3- Drain on paper towels.
4- Crumble and set aside.
5- In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
6- In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and milk.
7- Stir the flour mixture into the egg mixture, then stir in the cheeses.
8- Dip thick pieces of dense white breadI used French bread, but brioche would be even betterone at a time, into the egg mixture until saturated.
9- Arrange the pieces of bread in a single layer in the prepared baking dish.
10- Stir chopped tomato, crumbled bacon, and sliced green onion into the remaining egg mixture and pour evenly over the top of the bread.
11- Bake the French toast until golden brown, 30 to 40 minutes.
12- Let the French toast rest for 5 to 10 minutes.
13- Using a 1 1/2 inch round biscuit or cookie cutter, cut out rounds of the French toast.
14- Garnish with extra slices of green onion.
15- Arrange on a platter and serve immediately.

8abf5e0868.ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat flour self-raising, 1 tablespoon honey, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 3 large egg whites, 23 cup milk, skim low-fat or non-fat, nonstick cooking spray olive oil, 200 grams ricotta cheese reduced-fat, optional, 250 grams berries, 2 tablespoons maple syrup Queen Pure,
8abf5e0868.instructions:
1- Sift flour into a bowl.
2- Add husks left in sieve.
3- Using a fork, beat honey, vanilla, eggwhites and milk in a jug until well combined.
4- Pour into flour mixture.
5- Stir to a smooth batter.
6- Stand for 10 minutes.
7- Spray a non-stick frying pan with oil.
8- Heat over medium heat.
9- Pour 1/4 cup batter into pan.
10- Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until small bubbles appear on surface.
11- Turn over.
12- Cook for 1 minute or until cooked through.
13- Remove pancake to a plate.
14- Cover to keep warm.
15- Repeat with remaining batter, greasing pan between pancakes.
16- Place pancakes on plates.
17- Top with ricotta if using, and berries.
18- Drizzle with maple syrup and serve.

32be710d26.ingredients: 14 cup butter, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped, 2 tablespoons light soya sauce, 14 teaspoon coarse sea salt, 12 cup honey, liquid, 14 teaspoon hot sauce, 1 lb red snapper, fresh, 1 1/2-inch cubes, 23 cup cherry tomatoes, 4 slices bacon, cut into 4 equal pieces each, 23 cup pineapple, fresh, 1 1/2 " cubes, 1 orange bell pepper, 1-inch squares, 23 cup cremini mushroom, small, whole, 4 skewers, long, wooden (soaked in water 2 hr),
32be710d26.instructions:
1- Sauce.
2- In a medium pan combine, butter, lemon juice, parsley, soya sauce, honey, salt and hot sauce, bring to boil over medium heat for 3 minutes to blend seasonings, remove from heat, stir and set aside until needed.
3- Kebabs.
4- Wash and dry fish, cut into 1 1/2" cubes and set aside.
5- Cut orange peppers into 1" squares and pineapple into 1 1/2" cubes, also cut each bacon slice into 4 peices.
6- Now assemble your 4 kebabs in any fashion you desire; using 4 long skewers and all of the fish, fruit, vegetables and bacon.
7- Place the prepared kebabs in a deep dish and pour the sauce over the skewers, let them marinade at room temperature for 30 minutes.
8- Cook on grill or broiler for 5 minutes, baste and turn, cook 4 minutes longer (or until fish is done) baste and remove from heat.
9- Enjoy!

query: I told my high school friends that I would be bringing a meat dish to the reunion potluck.

options.a0d64772d7: Classic chicken tenders - deep fried boneless chicken strips
options.1379726aaa: Classic Salisbury Steak - grilled ground beef patties served with gravy
options.128334eec1: Classic salad with creamy caesar dressing and croutons
options.8000a7b666: Standard barbequed pork ribs with ketchup sauce

a0d64772d7.ingredients: 1 package Chicken Tenders (1 To 1.5 Pounds), 1/2 cups Flour, 1 whole Egg, Beaten, 1 cup Italian Breadcrumbs, 2 Tablespoons Grape Seed Or Other Vegetable Oil, Salt And Pepper, to taste,
a0d64772d7.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Rinse the tenders and pat them dry on paper towel.
3- Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
4- 2.
5- Dip one at a time in the flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs, using a fork to dip it into the egg mixture.
6- 3.
7- Heat an oven proof pan to medium-high on the stove top with the oil.
8- Place the tenders into the heated grease and cook for 30 seconds on each side.
9- Place the pre-fried tenders onto a cookie sheet.
10- Finish cooking them in the oven for about 5 minutes more, until tenders are pretty firm to the touch.
11- Remove from the oven and sprinkle with more salt to keep them crispy.
12- Serve immediately.

1379726aaa.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef (If using round steaks, use 4) or 1 lb round steak (If using round steaks, use 4), 1 (10 ounce) bottle Heinz 57 steak sauce, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce,
1379726aaa.instructions:
1- Form Salisbury Steaks into patties if using.
2- Brown Steaks in Skillet.
3- While steaks brown combine remaining indgredients in a bowl.
4- Transfer Steaks to a 13X9 baking dish.
5- Pour Sauce over meat.
6- Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes.

128334eec1.ingredients: 2 heads Romaine Lettuce, 1 clove Garlic, Grated, 6 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 1 dash Pepper, 3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise, 1/4 cups Parmesan Cheese, 1 cup Croutons,
128334eec1.instructions:
1- Wash and cut the romaine lettuce into bite size pieces.
2- In a separate bowl combine the grated garlic clove, olive oil, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise and parmesan cheese.
3- You can also add minced anchovies at this point but I think it makes it too salty.
4- Pour this mixture over the lettuce, mix well and then top with the croutons.
5- Add grilled chicken, shrimp or beef.
6- A meal in itself.

0035a53f58.ingredients: 300 grams Kale leaves, 1 Salt, 1 tbsp Olive oil,
0035a53f58.instructions:
1- Try to remove the stem running through the middle of the kale leaves so you are just left with the actual leaves.
2- (This will make it easier for them to cook through evenly.)
3- Wash the leaves and wipe away the moisture completely.
4- Put the leaves, olive oil and salt in a plastic bag and shake so the leaves are evenly coated in the oil and salt.
5- Spread them out on a baking tray, taking care not to let them overlap, and bake at 180C.
6- Check on them while they are baking.
7- They are done when they're crispy.

8000a7b666.ingredients: 1 cup Kethcup, 1 cup Red Wine Vinegar, 1/2 cups Brown Sugar, 1/4 cups Molasses, 1- 1/2 teaspoon Liquid Smoke, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 1/4 teaspoons Rounded Of Black Pepper, 1/4 teaspoons Garlic Powder, 1/4 teaspoons Onion Powder, 2 whole Full Racks Of Baby Back Ribs,
8000a7b666.instructions:
1- Combine everything (except ribs) in a sauce pan over high heat.
2- Whisk until smooth.
3- Bring to a boil.
4- Reduce heat and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes or until nice and thick.
5- Place ribs in foil and baste with plenty of sauce.
6- Bake at 250 degrees F for 2 hours.
7- Remove ribs from foil and smother with more sauce.
8- Grill on a hot grill for 2 to 4 minutes per side, just to caramelize the sauce.
9- You can serve with more sauce on the side if you like it saucy!
10- Enjoy!

2- In a medium pan combine, butter, lemon juice, parsley, soya sauce, honey, salt and hot sauce, bring to boil over medium heat for 3 minutes to blend seasonings, remove from heat, stir and set aside until needed.

4- Wash and dry fish, cut into 1 1/2" cubes and set aside.
5- Cut orange peppers into 1" squares and pineapple into 1 1/2" cubes, also cut each bacon slice into 4 peices.
6- Now assemble your 4 kebabs in any fashion you desire; using 4 long skewers and all of the fish, fruit, vegetables and bacon.
7- Place the prepared kebabs in a deep dish and pour the sauce over the skewers, let them marinade at room temperature for 30 minutes.
8- Cook on grill or broiler for 5 minutes, baste and turn, cook 4 minutes longer (or until fish is done) baste and remove from heat.
9- Enjoy!

query: My friends are coming over to watch a football game and I want to bake a filling appetizer

options.37e3caaf1d: Baked jacket potatoes stuffed with parmesan cheese, ham, yoghurt and onions
options.0a1ce6cce0: Classic salted french fries made of only potatoes
options.8994922304: Simple grilled cubed beef steaks with potatoes
options.37e7b8142d: Ez but Fancy Tuna Mold Spread Appetizer

37e3caaf1d.ingredients: 4 potatoes, 2 small onions, 1 leek, 1 packet bacon or serrano ham strips, 1 small pot natural yoghurt, 1 tsp oregano, 50 g parmesan cheese,
37e3caaf1d.instructions:
1- Put the potatoes in the oven, quite high (200 degrees C/400F) having washed them very well and make a cut around the edge so that it's easy to cut them open once they're done
2- Saute the onions in a little olive oil
3- Add the bacon or ham and the finely shredded leek, stir and leave for about 5 minutes.
4- Turn off the heat
5- Add the yoghurt and oregano and mix well
6- Put the mixture into a mixing bowl
7- Grate the cheese and add to the bowl
8- When the potatoes are ready, turn the oven down to 150 degrees , cut the potatoes into halves and empty them...
9- ... putting the hot potato flesh directly on top of the cheese so that it starts to melt because of the heat
10- Mix really well, and add a good amount of freshly ground black pepper
11- Fill the potato skins and place on top of a sheet of kitchen paper on the oven tray and put in the oven for 15 minutes
12- Just before the 15 minutes are up, turn the grill on high to toast the tops a little.
13- Enjoy!

5884624f69.ingredients: 34 cup popcorn, 12-1 teaspoon salt (see note), 14 cup oil (canola, corn, EVOO etc),
5884624f69.instructions:
1- note: you can use table salt, but fine powdery salt such as pickling salt will infuse into the popped corn better.
2- I use my spice grinder, which is a coffee grinder I use only to grind spices, to make my salt fine.
3- Place oil and salt in a stir-fry pan or wok on stove top.
4- Stir oil and salt until salt is disolved in oil.
5- I use a rubber spattula.
6- Add popcorn and stir the corn until it is covered with the oil.
7- cover pan with lid but leave a gap for the steam to escape.
8- I don't use a lid, but instead put aluminum foil over the pan and poke holes in it to let the steam out.
9- Turn heat on high and shake pan a couple of times to level out the corn.
10- Wait for corn to begin to pop and then shake pan occasionally.
11- When poping begins to slow remove from stove and pour into large bowl.
12- Enjoy.
13- Go to Recipezaar.com and give five star rating.

0a1ce6cce0.ingredients: 5 whole Large Baking Potatoes, Cut In 1/4 Inch Strips, 1 quart Water, Or Enough To Completely Cover Potatoes, 1 Tablespoon Sugar, 1 gallon Oil Or Enough To Cover The Potatoes, Salt To Taste,
0a1ce6cce0.instructions:
1- Wash and slice the potatoes into the size of strip you prefer (thin fries, steak fries, whatever your preference).
2- Put the water and sugar into a bowl, mixing the sugar to dissolve it.
3- Add the potatoes to the bowl and add more water if needed to completely cover the potatoes by at least half an inch.
4- Place the potatoes in the refrigerator and let them soak for 24 hours.
5- Heat your deep fryer or a gallon of oil in a pot to 325 degrees.
6- Drain and dry the potatoes completely with paper towels before placing them in the hot oil (water + oil = nasty mess and possible scarring).
7- Place the potato strips in the hot oil and allow them to cook for 3 minutes.
8- Remove the potatoes and drain them in a single layer on a sheet tray covered with paper towels for a half hour.
9- Raise the temperature of the oil to 375 degrees.
10- Place the partially cooked potatoes in the hot oil and allow them to cook for 5 minutes or until they are a nice golden brown.
11- Drain the potatoes and toss them with salt.
12- Serve hot.

8994922304.ingredients: 1 teaspoon paprika, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 lb tenderized cube steak, cut into two steaks, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons butter, divided, 13 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 13 cup beef broth, 2 idaho baking potatoes, 12 tablespoon olive oil, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon paprika, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper,
8994922304.instructions:
1- For the Steaks:.
2- In a small bowl, combine the paprika, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
3- Liberally season the steak with the rub on both sides and let it rest on the counter for 15 minutes.
4- In a large saute pan, heat the vegetable oil and 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium high heat.
5- When hot, place the steaks in the pan and sear until nicely browned, about 3 minutes per side for medium-rare, 5 minutes per side for medium-well.
6- Remove the steaks to a plate and let rest for 10 minutes.
7- In the meantime, deglaze the saute pan with the wine and vinegar and simmer until reduced by half.
8- Add the beef broth to the pan and reduce by half again.
9- Remove from the heat and whisk in the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter.
10- For the Potatoes:.
11- While the steaks are rubbed and resting (before cooking!
12- ), preheat the oven to 525F
13- Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1-inch chunks (smaller pieces will burn!).
14- Pat them dry and place them in a bowl.
15- Drizzle the olive oil over them and toss to coat.
16- Add the rest of the spices and toss to coat well.
17- Line a baking sheet with foil and spread the seasoned potatoes out on it, making sure no pieces are touching.
18- Bake for 15 minutes and then turn potato pieces.
19- Place back in the oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes.
20- To Serve:.
21- Place 1 steak and half of the potato cubes on each plate.
22- Scrape any accumulated juices from the plate the steaks were resting on back into the pan sauce.
23- Pour half of the pan sauce over each plate and enjoy!

0d53e06c77.ingredients: 1 pound fresh Shanghai noodles, or Japanese udon noodles, 2 tablespoons Chinese rice wine, 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce, 1 teaspoon cornstarch, 12 ounces flank steak, sliced into 1/4-inch strips, 3 tablespoons dark soy sauce, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, 2 tablespoons peanut oil, 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic, 1/2 teaspoon minced ginger, 1/2 teaspoon minced green onions, plus 1 cup cut-on-a-bias green onions, 3 cups julienned Napa cabbage, 1/2 teaspoon minced jalapeno,
0d53e06c77.instructions:
1- In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook the noodles until al dente, about 8 minutes.
2- Rinse under cold running water and drain well.
3- Set aside.
4- In a small bowl, combine the rice wine, hoisin, and cornstarch.
5- Add the beef, toss to coat, and marinate for 15 minutes.
6- In another bowl, combine the dark soy, soy sauce and sugar, and stir well to dissolve the sugar.
7- Place a wok over a high heat and add 1 tablespoon of the peanut oil, swirling to coat.
8- When hot, add the garlic, ginger, and minced green onions, and cook, stirring quickly, for 10 seconds.
9- Add the beef and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
10- Add the cabbage and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
11- Transfer to a platter and return the wok to a high heat.
12- Swirl the remaining tablespoon of peanut oil in the wok and once hot, add the noodles to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute.
13- Add the sliced green onions and jalapeno and sauce and toss all for 1 minute.
14- Add the beef and stir to heat through.
15- Serve immediately.

37e7b8142d.ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can cream of celery soup, 8 ounces cream cheese, 12 cup water, 14 ounce unflavored gelatin (1 envelope), 1 cup mayonnaise, 12 ounces tuna, drained, 12 cup celery, chopped, 12 cup green onion, chopped,
37e7b8142d.instructions:
1- In saucepan, bring soup to boil and add cubed cream cheese.
2- Remove from heat and stir until smooth,.
3- Dilute gelatin with water.
4- Stir into soup mixture.
5- Stir in remaining ingrediemts and pour into mold that has been sprayed with Pam.
6- Chill until set, about 3 hours.
7- Invert mold on serving platter.
8- (If it does not come out right away, run knife around edge of mold to help loosen, or run warm water around bottom of mold a few seconds).
9- Serve with crackers and enjoy.
10- (Leftovers keep for quite awhile if refrigerated.
11- ).
