options.a0d64772d7: Classic chicken tenders - deep fried boneless chicken strips

triples: (user, shown allergy to, Corn on the cob)

9ef9149d8a.ingredients: 3/4 c. whole blanched almonds, 1 tsp. olive oil, 1 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. ground cumin, .13 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. fresh lemon juice,
9ef9149d8a.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
2- Toss together almonds, olive oil, sugar, cumin, salt, and lemon juice in a small bowl.
3- Spread almonds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4- Bake 6 to 8 minutes, or until they start to turn light brown, stirring occasionally.
5- Remove from baking sheet and cool.
6- Store airtight in a cool place up to 2 weeks.

7d59b6d82f.instructions:
1- Place the dish you choose on a flat stable surface.
2- Select the flavor of cereal of your liking.
3- Pour cereal into the dish until you reach your desired serving.
4- Next pour milk over the cereal until it is about 3/4 from the top.
5- Mix the cereal slightly with a spoon.
6- Use the same spoon to eat the cereal.
7- Enjoy your delicious, quick breakfast.

15ac40e717.ingredients: 1 yellow sweet onion, 1 cup beer (Don't use dark beer.), 1 cup flour, and a little extra for dusting, 12 teaspoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch pepper,
15ac40e717.instructions:
1- Cut onion into thick slices.
2- Separate rings.
3- Mix all other ingredients together in a bowl, to make the batter.
4- "Dust" onion rings in flour.
5- Dip rings into batter.
6- Fry rings in deep fryer or in 2 inches vegetable oil until golden brown, in batches, so rings aren't touching or too close together while frying.
7- Drain on paper towels or brown paper bags.
8- Serve with hamburgers and cole slaw or cucumber salad.
9- (See Zaar recipe 211355, "Creamy Cucumber Salad.
10- ").

8abf5e0868.ingredients: 1 cup whole wheat flour self-raising, 1 tablespoon honey, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 3 large egg whites, 23 cup milk, skim low-fat or non-fat, nonstick cooking spray olive oil, 200 grams ricotta cheese reduced-fat, optional, 250 grams berries, 2 tablespoons maple syrup Queen Pure,
8abf5e0868.instructions:
1- Sift flour into a bowl.
2- Add husks left in sieve.
3- Using a fork, beat honey, vanilla, eggwhites and milk in a jug until well combined.
4- Pour into flour mixture.
5- Stir to a smooth batter.
6- Stand for 10 minutes.
7- Spray a non-stick frying pan with oil.
8- Heat over medium heat.
9- Pour 1/4 cup batter into pan.
10- Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until small bubbles appear on surface.
11- Turn over.
12- Cook for 1 minute or until cooked through.
13- Remove pancake to a plate.
14- Cover to keep warm.
15- Repeat with remaining batter, greasing pan between pancakes.
16- Place pancakes on plates.
17- Top with ricotta if using, and berries.
18- Drizzle with maple syrup and serve.

a0d64772d7.ingredients: 1 package Chicken Tenders (1 To 1.5 Pounds), 1/2 cups Flour, 1 whole Egg, Beaten, 1 cup Italian Breadcrumbs, 2 Tablespoons Grape Seed Or Other Vegetable Oil, Salt And Pepper, to taste,
a0d64772d7.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Rinse the tenders and pat them dry on paper towel.
3- Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
4- 2.
5- Dip one at a time in the flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs, using a fork to dip it into the egg mixture.
6- 3.
7- Heat an oven proof pan to medium-high on the stove top with the oil.
8- Place the tenders into the heated grease and cook for 30 seconds on each side.
9- Place the pre-fried tenders onto a cookie sheet.
10- Finish cooking them in the oven for about 5 minutes more, until tenders are pretty firm to the touch.
11- Remove from the oven and sprinkle with more salt to keep them crispy.
12- Serve immediately.

9e9b32718f.ingredients: 1 cup salted dry roasted peanuts, 1 cup shelled pistachios, 1 cup pecan halves, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup unsalted butter (2 sticks), cut into chunks, 1/3 cup light corn syrup, 2 teaspoons honey,
9e9b32718f.instructions:
1- Put the nuts, sugar, butter, corn syrup, and honey in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
2- Stir constantly with a wooden spoon until it becomes a nice walnut color and thickens, about 10 to 12 minutes.
3- Quickly pour onto a silpat or foil lined baking sheet and spread the brittle to an even thickness of about 1/3-inch with the back of the spoon.
4- Cool for 3 or 4 minutes then score the brittle with a sharp knife into about 24 (2-inch) squares.
5- Once the brittle has cooled completely, snap along scored marks.

04a11045e3.ingredients: 4 teaspoons sugar, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh basil, 12 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 3 (6 ounce) peaches, pitted and cut into 1/2-inch pieces, 2 cups blackberries (2 half-pint containers), 1 pint strawberry, hulled and quartered lengthwise (about 2 cups), 1 tablespoon lime juice (2 limes),
04a11045e3.instructions:
1- Combine sugar, basil, and pepper in large bowl.
2- Using firm rubber spatula, press mixture into side of bowl until sugar becomes damp, about 30 seconds.
3- Gently toss fruit with sugar mixture until combined.
4- Let stand at room temperature for 15 minutes, stirring once halfway through.
5- Stir in lime juice* to taste (see note below) and serve immediately.
6- *Because riper fruit requires more acid to balance their sweetness, the lime juice should be added to taste.
7- Start with 1 tablespoon, then add 1 teaspoon at a time as necessary.
8- If your fruit isnt perfectly ripe, you should increase the standing time to 30 minutes to allow for more juices to be released.

117a4f45f2.ingredients: 1 banana, cut up, 2 -3 strawberries, hulled and cut in half, 1 scoop protein powder or 1 scoop chocolate protein powder or 1 scoop strawberry protein powder, 2 tablespoons Splenda sugar substitute, 1 cup nonfat milk, 34-1 12 cup ice,
117a4f45f2.instructions:
1- Place banana, strawberries, protein powder, and splenda in a blender.
2- Blend until smooth.
3- Add ice and blend until ice is incorporated and mixture is thick.
4- Note: I always use unflavored protein powder and sometimes add 1 TBS unsweetened cocoa powder.

a0d64772d7.ingredients: 1 package Chicken Tenders (1 To 1.5 Pounds), 1/2 cups Flour, 1 whole Egg, Beaten, 1 cup Italian Breadcrumbs, 2 Tablespoons Grape Seed Or Other Vegetable Oil, Salt And Pepper, to taste,
a0d64772d7.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Rinse the tenders and pat them dry on paper towel.
3- Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
4- 2.
5- Dip one at a time in the flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs, using a fork to dip it into the egg mixture.
6- 3.
7- Heat an oven proof pan to medium-high on the stove top with the oil.
8- Place the tenders into the heated grease and cook for 30 seconds on each side.
9- Place the pre-fried tenders onto a cookie sheet.
10- Finish cooking them in the oven for about 5 minutes more, until tenders are pretty firm to the touch.
11- Remove from the oven and sprinkle with more salt to keep them crispy.
12- Serve immediately.

01598d3173.ingredients: 1 cup uncooked quinoa, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1/2 cup finely chopped carrot, 1/4 cup finely chopped shallots, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 1/4 cups water, 1/4 cup dry white wine, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper,
01598d3173.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Rinse quinoa under cold water, rubbing grains together; drain.2.
3- Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
4- Add oil to pan; swirl to coat.
5- Add carrot, shallots, and garlic; saute 2 minutes.
6- Add quinoa; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
7- Add 1 1/4 cups water and wine; bring to a boil.
8- Cover, reduce heat, and cook 20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and quinoa is tender.
9- Remove from heat; fluff with a fork.
10- Stir in thyme, salt, and pepper.

412d19a98d.ingredients: 1 pack Shirataki noodles, 1 tbsp Shoots of hijiki seaweed (dried), 1/2 Burdock root, 1/3 Carrot, 2 Dried shiitake mushrooms, 1 Aburaage, 300 ml Water, 1 tsp Dashi stock granules, 1 tsp Soy sauce, 2 tsp Sake, 1 tsp Mirin, 1/3 tsp Salt, 1 tsp Sesame oil,
412d19a98d.instructions:
1- Wash and cut the shirataki into suitable size and drain well.
2- Rehydrate the hijiki and dried shiitake mushrooms.
3- Julienne the burdock and soak in water.
4- Julienne t the carrot and shiitake mushrooms as well.
5- Cut the aburaage into small pieces.
6- Heat sesame oil in a pan and cook the burdock root and carrots.
7- When they are well cooked, add the rest of ingredients.
8- Pour the water and seasonings into a pot and keep cooking over medium heat.
9- When the liquid is reduced by half, turn the heat off and cover with a lid to let the rest of the liquid be absorbed.
10- It is also delicious chilled.

04cdac1347.ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) cans tuna in water, drained, 12 cup apple, diced, 12 cup red seedless grapes, halved, 12 cup red onion, minced, 14 cup celery, chopped, 2 tablespoons low-fat mayonnaise, 14 cup olive oil and vinegar dressing, plus, 2 tablespoons olive oil and vinegar dressing, more, fresh ground pepper, to taste, 8 pieces sourdough bread (toast if you like), 8 leaves lettuce,
04cdac1347.instructions:
1- Combine first seven ingredients.
2- Line four slices of bread with lettuce.
3- Spread tuna salad over the lettuce.
4- Place remaining bread on top and press down.
5- Last step -- Eat It!

query: I'm trying to increase my protein intake but cut down on my fat intake to get leaner

options.7dece0c95d: Steak and ale pie - traditional British pie filled with beef and mushroom stew made with ale
options.8000a7b666: Standard barbequed pork ribs with ketchup sauce
options.128334eec1: Classic salad with creamy caesar dressing and croutons
options.05823563d4: Banana and peanut butter breakfast oatmeal

242210dfad.ingredients: 2 pounds Chicken Breast, Boneless, 1 whole Lime, Cut In Half, 1 bunch Cilantro, Chopped, Divided, 2 Tablespoons Jarred Jalapenos, Chopped, 2 Tablespoons Homemade Or Store-bought Fajita Or Taco Seasoning, Divided, 2 Tablespoons Juice From Jarred Jalapenos, Divided, 2 whole Bell Peppers, Cut Into Strips (any Color), 1 whole Small Onion, Cut Into Strips, 1 package Flour (or Corn) Tortillas (about 8 - 12 Tortillas, Depending On Size), Optional Garnishes: Sour Cream, Sour Cream, Lettuce, Guacamole, Etc,
242210dfad.instructions:
1- Cut your chicken breasts into strips, and toss it with the juice from half a lime, a generous handful of cilantro, chopped jalapenos, 1 tablespoon of your fajita seasoning and 1 tablespoon of juice from your jar of jalapenos.
2- In a separate bowl/bag, toss your cut up peppers and onions with the juice from the remaining half of the lime, a small handful of cilantro, the remaining tablespoon of fajita seasoning and the remaining tablespoon of jalapeno juice.
3- Marinate both for 30 minutes to 2 hours.
4- To grill: Preheat your grill to 375 degrees (F) while the meat and veggies are marinating.
5- Put meat and veggies on skewers (separately), or in separate grill baskets (we usually skewer the meat, and then put the veggies in a grill basket coated with oil).
6- Cook chicken and vegetables, stirring every couple of minutes until chicken is cooked through and veggies are soft and starting to brown, about 5 10 minutes.
7- Wrap tortillas in aluminum foil and warm on the grill for a few minutes.
8- To cook on the stovetop: Add marinated chicken and vegetables to a large skillet (including all the juices).
9- Cook over medium heat until chicken is cooked through and veggies are tender.
10- Preheat oven to 350 degrees (F).
11- Wrap tortillas in aluminum foil and warm in the oven for a few minutes.
12- Top warm tortillas and filling with your choice of fixings (sour cream, salsa, lettuce, tomatoes, guacamole, taco sauce, black olives, etc.
13- ).
14- Enjoy!

7dece0c95d.ingredients: 1/2 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed, 1 tablespoon lard, 1/2 pound cubed beef, 1/4 pound carrots, diced, 1/4 pound turnips, diced, 1/2 pound peeled and cubed potatoes, 1/4 pound onions, diced, 1 cup water, 1 cup bitter ale, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 1/4 cup cold water, salt and pepper to taste,
7dece0c95d.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2- Heat a large skillet over high heat.
3- Add lard, then meat.
4- Toss to coat meat, and saute just long enough to brown meat on all sides.
5- Remove from heat.
6- Place meat in a 1 quart baking dish.
7- Add carrots, turnip, potatoes, and onion.
8- Mix well.
9- Place 1 cup water and ale in a small saucepan.
10- Bring to a simmer.
11- Mix cornstarch with 1/4 cup cold water until smooth.
12- Slowly pour cornstarch mixture into simmering ale mixture, whisking constantly.
13- Continue to simmer until mixture has thickened.
14- Add salt and pepper to taste.
15- Pour mixture over meat and vegetables.
16- Trim puff pastry to fit over top of filling.
17- Bake in preheated oven for 45 to 50 minutes, until pastry is deep golden brown.

8000a7b666.ingredients: 1 cup Kethcup, 1 cup Red Wine Vinegar, 1/2 cups Brown Sugar, 1/4 cups Molasses, 1- 1/2 teaspoon Liquid Smoke, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 1/4 teaspoons Rounded Of Black Pepper, 1/4 teaspoons Garlic Powder, 1/4 teaspoons Onion Powder, 2 whole Full Racks Of Baby Back Ribs,
8000a7b666.instructions:
1- Combine everything (except ribs) in a sauce pan over high heat.
2- Whisk until smooth.
3- Bring to a boil.
4- Reduce heat and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes or until nice and thick.
5- Place ribs in foil and baste with plenty of sauce.
6- Bake at 250 degrees F for 2 hours.
7- Remove ribs from foil and smother with more sauce.
8- Grill on a hot grill for 2 to 4 minutes per side, just to caramelize the sauce.
9- You can serve with more sauce on the side if you like it saucy!
10- Enjoy!

128334eec1.ingredients: 2 heads Romaine Lettuce, 1 clove Garlic, Grated, 6 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 1 dash Pepper, 3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise, 1/4 cups Parmesan Cheese, 1 cup Croutons,
128334eec1.instructions:
1- Wash and cut the romaine lettuce into bite size pieces.
2- In a separate bowl combine the grated garlic clove, olive oil, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise and parmesan cheese.
3- You can also add minced anchovies at this point but I think it makes it too salty.
4- Pour this mixture over the lettuce, mix well and then top with the croutons.
5- Add grilled chicken, shrimp or beef.
6- A meal in itself.

05823563d4.ingredients: 1 large banana, ripe, 12 cup skim milk, 12 cup quick-cooking oatmeal, 1 tablespoon creamy peanut butter,
05823563d4.instructions:
1- Break banana into chunks and put into a small blender jar.
2- Add the skim milk.
3- Liquify in blender.
4- Put the dry oatmeal in a microwave safe bowl.
5- (If you want to mix it ahead of time, use a small microwave safe dish which has a lid).
6- Pour the banana mixture on top of the oatmeal.
7- Stir well, to incorporate all the oatmeal.
8- Microwave (uncovered) on high setting for 90 seconds.
9- Stir.
10- Microwave again for about 90 seconds.
11- If it starts to rise over the top of the bowl, stop the cooking, because it is most likely already done!
12- Stir in peanut butter.

2b2f27ba91.ingredients: 1 teaspoon olive oil, 2 onions, sliced, 12 teaspoon sugar, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 cup water, 12 cup tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon packed brown sugar, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 14 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon cider vinegar, 1 lb pork tenderloin, 4 tortillas,
2b2f27ba91.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 450 degrees.
2- Spray a pan with nonstick cooking spray.
3- Combine the brown sugar, chili powder, oregano, cumin, vinegar and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a small bowl.
4- Rub all over the pork.
5- Put the pork in the pan and then into the oven for about 25 minutes.
6- Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium low heat.
7- Swirl in the oil, then add the onions, sugar, the salt and the water.
8- Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until softened and lightly browned, about 20 minutes.
9- Stir in the tomato sauce and simmer, uncovered for about 5 minutes so the flavor blends.
10- Remove from heat.
11- Let the pork stand 10 minutes after removing from heat.
12- While the pork rests, wrap the tortillas in foil and warm in the oven for about 10 minutes.
13- Slice the pork and stir into the onion mixture.
14- Spoon about 1/2 a cup of the meat mixture onto each tortilla and fold up to eat.

8- Place the tenders into the heated grease and cook for 30 seconds on each side.
9- Place the pre-fried tenders onto a cookie sheet.
10- Finish cooking them in the oven for about 5 minutes more, until tenders are pretty firm to the touch.
11- Remove from the oven and sprinkle with more salt to keep them crispy.
12- Serve immediately.

2c63f3067f.ingredients: Peanut oil, for frying, 5 large portobello mushrooms, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cup panko bread crumbs, 1/4 cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley leaves, 1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 3 eggs, lightly beaten,
2c63f3067f.instructions:
1- Preheat oil in a deep-fryer to 350 degrees F.
2- Remove the gills and stems from the underside of the mushrooms and trim the edges off.
3- Slice into 1/4-inch strips.
4- Measure flour into a pie plate.
5- In another pie plate or bowl, combine panko, Parmigiano, parsley, red pepper flakes and salt and pepper.
6- Dredge the mushrooms in flour, followed by the egg wash and finally in the panko.
7- Working in batches, place the breaded mushroom slices in the hot oil and fry for 3 to 4 minutes, until golden brown.
8- Drain on a paper towel lined sheet tray.

31e11c1079.ingredients: 4 sun-dried tomatoes, 6 ounces cream cheese (plain or onion or chive), 12 cup chopped black olives, 5 ounces fresh spinach, 4 flour tortillas,
31e11c1079.instructions:
1- Soak the tomatoes in a bit of water overnight until soft.
2- Chop the tomatoes and mix into the cream cheese along with the chopped olives.
3- Spread the cheese mixture evenly on the tortillas.
4- Liberally cover with spinach, arugula and/or other leafy greens.
5- Wrap and enjoy.

76658f1107.ingredients: Sauce:, 1 cup 2% reduced-fat Greek yogurt, 2/3 cup chopped peeled cucumber, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill, 1 garlic clove, minced, Falafel:, 1 (15-ounce) can no-salt-added chickpeas (garbanzo beans), 1/4 cup dry breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh parsley, 3 tablespoons finely chopped red onion, 1 teaspoon garlic salt, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 tablespoons olive oil, Remaining ingredients:, 2 (6-inch) whole wheat pitas, cut in half, 2 cups shredded romaine lettuce, 1 cup chopped plum tomato, 2/3 cup thinly sliced peeled cucumber, 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion,
76658f1107.instructions:
1- 1.
2- To prepare sauce, combine the first 4 ingredients; set aside.2.
3- To prepare falafel, drain chickpeas in a colander over a bowl; reserve liquid.
4- Place chickpeas, 3 tablespoons liquid (discard remaining liquid), breadcrumbs, and next 5 ingredients (through cumin) in a food processor; process until minced.
5- Divide chickpea mixture into 8 equal portions, shaping each into a 1/2-inch-thick patty.3.
6- Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
7- Add patties to pan; cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
8- Spread about 1/4 cup sauce into each pita half.
9- Fill each pita half with 1/2 cup lettuce, 1/4 cup tomato, about 2 tablespoons sliced cucumber, 1 tablespoon sliced onion, and 2 patties.

2b2f27ba91.ingredients: 1 teaspoon olive oil, 2 onions, sliced, 12 teaspoon sugar, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 cup water, 12 cup tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon packed brown sugar, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 14 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon cider vinegar, 1 lb pork tenderloin, 4 tortillas,
2b2f27ba91.instructions:
1- Preheat the oven to 450 degrees.
2- Spray a pan with nonstick cooking spray.
3- Combine the brown sugar, chili powder, oregano, cumin, vinegar and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a small bowl.
4- Rub all over the pork.
5- Put the pork in the pan and then into the oven for about 25 minutes.
6- Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium low heat.
7- Swirl in the oil, then add the onions, sugar, the salt and the water.
8- Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until softened and lightly browned, about 20 minutes.
9- Stir in the tomato sauce and simmer, uncovered for about 5 minutes so the flavor blends.
10- Remove from heat.
11- Let the pork stand 10 minutes after removing from heat.
12- While the pork rests, wrap the tortillas in foil and warm in the oven for about 10 minutes.
13- Slice the pork and stir into the onion mixture.
14- Spoon about 1/2 a cup of the meat mixture onto each tortilla and fold up to eat.

query: I would like something cheap but I get hungry all the time

options.035e1bea0d: Simple fried rice with carrots and peas
options.8e9403043d: Sweet dessert made from boiled black glutinous rice
options.106f484afa: Classic rice krispie treats - marshmallow and rice krispies cereal bar
options.05f17e93c6: Spanish seafood rice made from shrimp, squid, mussels, and vegetables

035e1bea0d.ingredients: cooked rice (amount depends on servings desired), 12 can peas (to taste), 1 medium chopped carrot (to taste), soy sauce (to taste), 1 egg, scrambled, 2 teaspoons cooking oil, 1 pinch salt,
035e1bea0d.instructions:
1- Cook the rice on medium with 1 tsp of the cooking oil and salt until it crisps and starts to brown, stirring frequently.
2- Remove the rice from the pan.
3- Add the rest of the cooking oil and the vegetables to the pan, cooking until the carrots soften a bit.
4- Return the rice to the pan.
5- Add the scrambled egg.
6- Mix everything well.
7- Add soy sauce to taste, and ginger powder if desired.

8e9403043d.ingredients: 1 2/3 cups water, 1 pandan leaf, 3/4 cup black glutinous rice, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup white sugar, 2 cups coconut milk,
8e9403043d.instructions:
1- In a saucepan bring water and pandan leaf to a boil.
2- Add rice and stir.
3- Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
4- Remove pandan leaf and stir in brown sugar and white sugar.
5- Continue to cook for 5 minutes.
6- Stir in the coconut milk and remove from heat.

04f1bc79a5.ingredients: 6 cups vegetable stock or 6 cups chicken broth, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 small onion (or use any combination of leeks, shallots, and onions that pleases you), 1 12 cups arborio rice, 12 cup dry white wine, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon dill weed (I used dried dill, and probably more than a teaspoon), 8 ounces smoked salmon, 1 cup parmesan cheese, grated & of highest possible quality,
04f1bc79a5.instructions:
1- Dice the onion(s) into small dice.
2- Saute in 1 butter until golden.
3- Add rice and stir thoroughly to coat; cook over medium-high heat for about two minutes.
4- Add the wine, salt and dill to the rice/onion mixture.
5- Heat vegetable stock in a separate pot.
6- Using a large soup ladle, add one ladleful to the rice at a time, stirring constantly in between additions.
7- (This is somewhere between half a cup and a cup of stock.)
8- Wait until the liquid is absorbed before adding the next ladleful.
9- The whole process of adding liquid should take anywhere from 20-30 minutes.
10- Take half of the smoked salmon and chop it fine.
11- Add to remaining butter and cream thoroughly.
12- Take the other half of the smoked salmon and coarsely chop it.
13- About two minutes before the rice has finished cooking, add the butter/salmon mixture and the coarsely chopped salmon.
14- Stir for another two minutes, until thoroughly incorporated and creamy.
15- Add the parmesan and stir for another minute or two.

106f484afa.ingredients: 4 Tablespoons Butter, 1 package Marshmallows (10 Oz.), 6 cups Rice Krispies Cereal, Chocolate For Dipping, Assorted Candies For Decorating,
106f484afa.instructions:
1- Melt butter in a large sauce pan over low heat.
2- Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted.
3- Remove from heat and add cereal; mix until combined.
4- Press mixture into greased 13 by 9 baking dish.
5- Once cool, tear or cut treats into equal pieces; shape into balls.
6- Dip treats into melting chocolate and let start to harden.
7- Before completely firm, press into toppings of your choice.
8- (If you try this immediately after dipping, your toppings will slide right off.
9- Trust me.)
10- Get creative!
11- Use any toppings youd like.
12- I used praline pieces, candied almonds, mini m&ms, and chocolate sprinkles.
13- Have fun and enjoy!

05f17e93c6.ingredients: 5 tbsp olive oil, 12 jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined, 8 langoustines or more shrimp, 8 oz (225g) squid, cleaned and sliced into rings, 12-16 mussels, scrubbed, 2 large tomatoes, peeled, seeded, and diced, Pinch of saffron, 2 cups short grain rice, 5 cups boiling fish stock, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 tbsp chopped parsley, 1 lemon, cut into 8 wedges,
05f17e93c6.instructions:
1- Heat 2 tbsp of the oil in a paella pan or a large frying pan over medium heat.
2- Add the shrimp and cook about 2 minutes.
3- Transfer to a plate.
4- Add the langoustines to the pan, cover, and cook for 5 minutes, until the shells are red.
5- Add to the shrimp.
6- Add 1 tbsp oil to the pan, heat, and add the squid.
7- Cook 1 minute, until barely opaque, and add to the plate.
8- Add the mussels to the pan with 1/4 cup water.
9- Cover and cook about 4 minutes, or until they open.
10- Transfer mussels and their juices to the plate.
11- Heat 2 tbsp oil in the pan.
12- Add the tomatoes and saffron and cook for 1 minute.
13- Stir in the rice, then the stock.
14- Simmer, uncovered, over medium-low heat for 15 minutes.
15- Season with salt and pepper to taste.
16- Nestle the shrimp, langoustines, squid, and mussels in the rice and let cook until the rice is just tender.
17- Remove from the heat and tent with aluminum foil.
18- Let stand for 5 minutes.
19- Garnish with the lemon and parsley and serve hot.

02a3c1fb5b.ingredients: 3 cups left-over cooked rice, 2 Chinese sausage, sliced, 1 tablespoon garlic, chopped, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 14 cup chopped ham, 14 cup chopped shrimp, 3 eggs, beaten and lightly seasoned with, salt and pepper, 2 tablespoons oil, green onion, finely chopped,
02a3c1fb5b.instructions:
1- In a hot pan, pour the oil, and make an omelet.
2- Slice in thin shreds then set aside.
3- In the same pan, fry Chinese sausages until crisp.
4- Reduce the oil in half (or less if you prefer).
5- Saute garlic, onion, and rice.
6- Add the rest of the ingredients and stir-fry for 15-20 minutes until rice is cooked and evenly coated with soy sauce.
7- Garnish with scrambled egg shreds and green onions.

query: How do I spice up my instant noodles? I'm bored of following the plain recipe on the packaging

options.78ebeb03f1: Instant ramen with eggs, spinach and pickled cabbage
options.80ad140679: Japanese ramen noodles made with savoury pork bone broth
options.5d88008a2c: Fancy bread pudding with vanilla extract, nutmeg and brandy
options.16edfc5b7b: Chicken noodle soup with homemade noodles
options.757f562e1b: Easy with Maruchan-brand Instant Ramen Noodles Taiwan-style Ramen

78ebeb03f1.ingredients: 1 Ramen Noodles, any flavor (I use Maruchan), 1/2 cup spinach (de-stemmed), 1 large egg, 1 tbsp pickled cabbage (or kimchi), 1 tbsp pickled chili peppers, 1 tbsp grated daikon, 1 dash siracha or other chili sauce (optional),
78ebeb03f1.instructions:
1- Place an egg into a small saucepan with two cups of cold water (be sure to wash the egg thoroughly).
2- Bring to a boil on high heat.
3- Once the water is boiling, add the noodles to the water and cook for 3 minutes.
4- Lift the noodles from the water and place into a serving bowl.
5- Remove the egg and place into an ice bath to cool.
6- While the water is still hot, stir in the spinach and cook for 1 minute, then place in the ice bath for a few seconds to stop cooking.
7- Add to the serving bowl alongside the noodles.
8- Stir the seasoning packet into the hot water, then pour the broth over the noodles.
9- Peel the egg and slice in half before adding it to the bowl.
10- Garnish with pickled cabbage, chili peppers, grated daikon, or any of your favorite fresh or pickled veggies!
11- Drizzle with a bit of Siracha and Serve!

80ad140679.ingredients: 5 pork hocks, bones, 2 green onions, 2 medium sized yellow onions, 1 teaspoon ginger (Tube is ok), 1 teaspoon garlic (Tube is ok), water, enough to fill pot, 500 g all-purpose flour, water, 200 ml potatoes or 200 ml cornstarch, 500 g side pork, 50 ml soy sauce, 50 ml mirin, 1 tablespoon sugar, 500 ml water,
80ad140679.instructions:
1- Step 1: Have the butcher separate the pork hock bones.
2- Step 2: Rinse well in running water to wash off blood.
3- Boil in large pot for 15 minutes.
4- You want to barely cover the bones with water.
5- Step 3: Skim off as much scum as possible as it forms.
6- Step 4: Drain in colander and use a brush to remove any bloody meat.
7- Step 5: Use a saw and saw halfway down the center of the bones.
8- Then use hammer to break bone.
9- Note: I didnt have to break the bones since my butchers pork hocks already had the marrow exposed.
10- Step 6: The bones will be filled with marrow.
11- Simmer for several hours until the marrow dissolves out from the bones.
12- Step 7: Scum will form at the start.
13- Carefully skim the scum off.
14- On mid flame, maintain a low boil.
15- Step 8: After scum has stopped forming, simmer for 6 hours or more.
16- Add more water if the water level drops.
17- Step 9: Making the noodles.
18- After measuring out the ingredients, mix the flour and kansui together, then add the water.
19- It may feel as if the amount of water is insufficient.
20- This is normal.
21- Step 10: Mix in bowl until a mealy consistency is achieved.
22- Step 11: The dough will be very stiff.
23- Use you body weight to form the dough into a ball.
24- Step 12: Transfer to kneading surface and knead.
25- Knead vigorously for 10 minutes.
26- It is ok if the dough cracks or does not knead together well.
27- Step 13: Form into ball, cover with plastic wrap and allow to rest in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
28- Make sure that the dough does not dry out.
29- Step 14: While the dough rests, prepare the char siu.
30- Brown the meat in a pan and then simmer in a pot for 2 hours in a sauce made from the remaining ingredients.
31- Allow to cool in the pot.
32- Step 15: After the dough has rested, roll the dough out with a rolling pin to a thickness of 5 mm and then insert into pasta machine.
33- Start out with the highest thickness and then continue on the lower settings until the desired thickness is achieved.
34- Step 16: If a pasta machine is not used, roll out the dough to the desired thickness with the rolling pin.
35- Take into account that the noodles will expand 1.3 times when boiled.
36- Step 17: The dough will not be that sticky, so a small amount of flour or potato (or corn) starch is sufficient for flouring.
37- (Note that the recipe only shows the noodles being cut by a pasta machine and does not mention hand cutting).
38- Step 18: A wooden box is best for storing the noodles, but if one is not available, use a metal tray lined with wax paper (to prevent sticking) and store in the refrigerator.
39- Step 19: 2 hours after the pork bones have started simmering, the soup should become progressively white and cloudy.
40- If tasted at this stage, the soup will not taste good since it will still have a raw flavor.
41- Step 20: After the soup has simmered for 6 hours, The inside of the bones should now be empty and the soup should have a rich smell just like a ramen place.
42- The stock is rich.
43- It exactly like the picture, its not a clear stock at all.
44- Just remember that it wont have much taste right now because theres no salt.
45- But dont adjust the seasoning until the end of the recipe because youre adding soy sauce to the ramen base.
46- Step 21: The char siu should be a nice amber color.
47- Slice with care since it will be very tender and tend to fall apart.
48- Step 22: Any leftovers can be eaten with beer.
49- LOL But I will add that if you ever have trouble slicing soft pork, chill the whole piece in the refrigerator until cold, and it makes slicing easier.
50- Reheating is easy, in either the microwave or oven, even stove top.
51- Step 23: Its time to put everything together.
52- Since boiling time can differ, boil the noodles to each persons preference.
53- For people who like curly noodles, firmly squeeze the noodles until the desired effect is achieved.
54- Step 24: Warm the bowl, and add the char siu sauce and salt for flavor.
55- Use sparingly at first and then add more if desired.
56- Step 25: I prefer to boil the noodles for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.
57- Your rich and hearty tonkotsu ramen is complete.
58- Notes:.
59- Okay, because final assembly occurred, I prepared some soy sauce marinated eggs the night before.
60- Heres what I did:.
61- Ingredients:.
62- 12 eggs in shells.
63- Diced pork hock meat (leftovers from recipe above) 1 lb.
64- 3 green onions cut into 1 inch pieces.
65- 1 thumb sized piece of ginger sliced.
66- 2 large cloves of garlic sliced.
67- 1/2 cup soy sauce.
68- 2 Tablespoons cooking wine/sake/sherry.
69- 2 Tablespoons Sugar.
70- 1/2 cup water.
71- Step 1: Bring a pot of water to a rolling boil.
72- (Using a small thumb tack, I prick a pin hole in the base (fat end) of every egg, but thats not necessary.)
73- The the water is at a full boil, I put the eggs inches The water should cover the eggs.
74- Wait for the water to come back to a full boil, and time for 7 minutes.
75- (9 minutes will give you a fully hard boiled egg.
76- 7 minutes is a very soft boiled egg.)
77- Drain the pot and eggs and plunge the eggs in ice water to stop cooking.
78- This also makes the shells a bit easier to peel.
79- Step 2: In a small pot, saute pork, garlic, onions, and ginger until slightly browned.
80- Add soy sauce, cooking alcohol, sugar, water and simmer for 10 minutes.
81- Until pork is cooked through and flavors meld.
82- Remove from stove.
83- Remove pork to eat separately.
84- Pour everything else into a bowl large enough to hold marinade and eggs.
85- Step 3: Carefully, peel the eggs, and place in marinade.
86- Try to make sure the marinade covers all of the eggs.
87- If not, try transferring the sauce into a large ZipLock bag, and place the eggs in the bag and seal.
88- Place the bag in a bowl, and put everything in the refrigerator overnight.
89- Or at least for a few hours.
90- Soy sauce eggs ready!
91- I usually cut them in half before adding them to the ramen bowl.
92- You can reheat the eggs quickly in the stock before you assemble the ramen.

5d88008a2c.ingredients: 12 pieces Lady Finger Cookies (I Used Savoiardi), 4 whole Eggs, 1/4 cups Sugar, 1/4 cups Heavy Cream, 2 cups Whole Milk, 1 Tablespoon Pure Vanilla Extract, Or Seeds From Half Vanilla Bean, 1 pinch Grated Nutmeg, 1/2 cups Granulated Sugar, 1/2 sticks Butter, Melted, 1 whole Egg Yolk, 1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract, 2 Tablespoons Brandy,
5d88008a2c.instructions:
1- For the pudding:
2- Place a kettle of water to boil.
3- Preheat oven to 350F.
4- Break the cookies in half and layer them in 2 medium ramekins.
5- Set aside.
6- I used Savoiardi because they are very dry, crumbly, crisp and porous, making them perfect to soak up the custard.
7- In a bowl or blender, mix the rest of the pudding ingredients.
8- Pour this custard over the cookies in the ramekins, but dont fill them all the way to the top; leave 1/2 inch headroom, as they will rise while baking.
9- Let the cookies soak for at least 10-15 minutes, pressing gently on them to make sure they are sunk in the custard.
10- You can even leave them overnight in the fridge too, and bake them next day, or morning for a warm breakfast.
11- After the cookies are well soaked, place the ramekins in a deep pan, filled halfway up the sides of the ramekins with hot water.
12- Bake at 350 degrees F F for 45-55 minutes, depending on your oven, until they get golden brown, puffed up, and the custard sets.
13- When done, let them cool for 10 minutes before serving, as they will be very hot.
14- For the sauce:
15- In a sauce pan over medium heat, mix all the sauce ingredients, except the brandy.
16- When almost bubbly and the sugar has melted, add the brandy and mix well.
17- Pour sauce over pudding and serve.
18- This pudding would also be great served warm with a scoop of ice cream on top, or just whipped cream and fresh berries.

9d56fc52db.ingredients: 1 cup water, 1 12 teaspoons miso, 14 sheet nori, roasted according to package directions, 2 tablespoons green onions, chopped,
9d56fc52db.instructions:
1- Bring water to a boil.
2- Puree the miso with 2 teaspoons cold water.
3- Reduce flame to low and add pureed miso.
4- Tear nori into small pieces and add to the soup.
5- Simmer 2 minutes.
6- Add scallions and serve.

16edfc5b7b.ingredients: 5 lbs roasting hen, 1 onion, sliced, 1 carrot, sliced, 3 sprigs parsley, 1 tablespoon salt, 12 teaspoon pepper, 1 14 cups cake flour, 14 teaspoon salt, 1 large egg, 1 12 teaspoons unsalted butter, room temperature, 2 12 tablespoons water (about), 2 medium baking potatoes, peeled, cubed, 12 cup celery, 3 fresh thyme sprigs, 1 cup frozen peas,
16edfc5b7b.instructions:
1- For the soup: Put the hen into a large pot.
2- Add cold water to just cover the hen, plus the next 6 ingredients.
3- Bring to a boil and simmer, partially covered until chicken is done, about 1 hour.
4- Remove chicken from pot and cool.
5- Remove the skin and bones from the chicken and cut into bite size pieces.
6- At this point I like to chill the cooking liquid over night to congeal the fat and discard it.
7- Cover and refrigerate the chicken as well, if you choose to do this.
8- For the noodles: Blend flour and salt in a processor.
9- Add butter and egg.
10- Pulse in enough water to make dough.
11- Remove dough from processor and form into a ball.
12- Divide ball into 4 pieces.
13- Flatten and generously flour each piece.
14- Roll until very thin (1/16 inch), or run through the various settings of a pasta roller until the dough is about 1/16 inch thick, flouring as needed.
15- Cut dough into desired length and width.
16- I like mine about 1x2 inches.
17- Bring the cooking liquid, potatoes, celery and thyme to a boil in a large pot.
18- Cook until potatoes are done, about 15 minutes.
19- Add frozen peas and bring back to a boil.
20- Add noodles by the handfuls and submerge in the cooking liquid with a spoon.
21- Boil until noodles are tender, about 6 minutes.
22- Add cut up chicken meat and reheat.
23- Serve.

757f562e1b.ingredients: 1 packages Soy Sauce Ramen Noodles, 100 grams Ground pork, 1/2 bunch Chinese garlic chives, 1/4 Japanese leek, 1/2 packages Bean sprouts (if available), 1 clove Garlic, 1 Red chili pepper cut into small pieces, 1 tbsp Sesame oil, 1 dash Salt, 1 dash Pepper, 500 ml Water,
757f562e1b.instructions:
1- Heat oil, garlic, finely chopped Japanese leeks, and finely chopped red pepper in a frying pan, sauteing over low heat until aromatic.
2- Saute the ground pork.
3- Crumble the pork to your liking.
4- I personally prefer large chunks since it is easier to eat.
5- Saute the Chinese chives cut into about 5 cm with the bean sprouts, and season with salt and pepper.
6- (I forgot to add bean sprouts in the photo.)
7- Add the water and bring to a boil.
8- After it comes to a boil, add noodles and boil for 3 minutes while loosening the noodles.
9- Place the soup base in the serving bowl first.
10- After boiling the noodles, transfer to a serving bowl, stir well, and enjoy.
11- Done!

query: I want to prepare enough dinner for my family but we really need to save money right now

options.9a38eae6b1: Pork loin roasted with onions, carrots and celery
options.03e49000ba: Seafood paella - sauteed saffron-flavoured rice cooked with seafood
options.8994922304: Simple grilled cubed beef steaks with potatoes
options.0a77dac796: Breakfast pizza with sausage, cheddar, sour cream and jalapenos
options.1da0dc1f0a: Whole Grain Barley and Apple Porridge

triples: (user, shown allergy to, brown sugar bubbletea)

1cd635a823.ingredients: 1 cup stoneground whole wheat flour, 1 quart water, 1 pinch salt, 10 large dates, chopped, 3 tablespoons almonds, cut,
1cd635a823.instructions:
1- Add salt to water and boil.
2- Lower heat and add flour, stir with a whisk until desired thickness.
3- Add dates and almonds.
4- Cook 20 minutes on low heat, stirring occasionally.
5- Serve warm.

9a38eae6b1.ingredients: 4 tablespoons all-purpose flour, divided, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 bay leaf, finely crushed, 12 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 (4 -5 lb) bone-in pork loin roast, 2 medium onions, chopped, 2 medium carrots, chopped, 1 celery rib, chopped, 2 13 cups cold water, divided, 13 cup packed brown sugar,
9a38eae6b1.instructions:
1- Combine 2 tablespoons flour, salt, pepper, bay leaf and thyme; rub over entire roast.
2- Place roast with fat side up in a shallow roasting pan and arrange vegetables around the roast, then pour 2 cups cold water into pan.
3- Bake, uncovered, at 325 for 1-1/2 hours, basting with pan juices every 30 minutes.
4- Sprinkle with brown sugar.
5- Bake 30 minutes longer or until a meat thermometer reads 160.
6- Remove roast to a serving platter; keep warm.
7- Strain pan drippings, reserving the broth; discard vegetables.
8- Add water to the broth to measure 1-2/3 cups.
9- Return to pan.
10- Combine remaining flour and cold water until smooth; stir into pan.
11- Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes.
12- Serve with the roast.

03e49000ba.ingredients: 1/2 whole chicken, 1 each tomatoes diced, 1 each red onion diced, 2 each sweet red bell peppers diced, 1 cup green peas, 1 each jalapeno pepper, 2 cups rice cooked,
03e49000ba.instructions:
1- Saute onions, red peppers and diced tomatoes in olive oil.
2- Add cooked rice and peas and saute covered for 30 minutes.
3- Add jalapeno pepper.
4- Steam fish items and then toss all together and bake covered in 375F (190C) oven for 15 minutes.

8994922304.ingredients: 1 teaspoon paprika, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 lb tenderized cube steak, cut into two steaks, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 3 tablespoons butter, divided, 13 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 13 cup beef broth, 2 idaho baking potatoes, 12 tablespoon olive oil, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon paprika, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper,
8994922304.instructions:
1- For the Steaks:.
2- In a small bowl, combine the paprika, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
3- Liberally season the steak with the rub on both sides and let it rest on the counter for 15 minutes.
4- In a large saute pan, heat the vegetable oil and 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium high heat.
5- When hot, place the steaks in the pan and sear until nicely browned, about 3 minutes per side for medium-rare, 5 minutes per side for medium-well.
6- Remove the steaks to a plate and let rest for 10 minutes.
7- In the meantime, deglaze the saute pan with the wine and vinegar and simmer until reduced by half.
8- Add the beef broth to the pan and reduce by half again.
9- Remove from the heat and whisk in the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter.
10- For the Potatoes:.
11- While the steaks are rubbed and resting (before cooking!
12- ), preheat the oven to 525F
13- Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1-inch chunks (smaller pieces will burn!).
14- Pat them dry and place them in a bowl.
15- Drizzle the olive oil over them and toss to coat.
16- Add the rest of the spices and toss to coat well.
17- Line a baking sheet with foil and spread the seasoned potatoes out on it, making sure no pieces are touching.
18- Bake for 15 minutes and then turn potato pieces.
19- Place back in the oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes.
20- To Serve:.
21- Place 1 steak and half of the potato cubes on each plate.
22- Scrape any accumulated juices from the plate the steaks were resting on back into the pan sauce.
23- Pour half of the pan sauce over each plate and enjoy!

0a77dac796.ingredients: 2 Pillsbury refrigerated classic pizza crust, 1 (12 ounce) jar salsa, 1 lb sausage or 1 lb bacon, 18 eggs, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream (optional), jalapeno (optional),
0a77dac796.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375.
2- Press dough onto greased large pizza pan.
3- Bake crust 5-7 minutes until slightly brown.
4- Remove from oven & set aside.
5- Meanwhile, cook meat; drain & set aside.
6- Scramble eggs in large skillet.
7- Spread salsa over pizza crust.
8- Top with meat, eggs & cheese.
9- Bake 15-20 minutes until cheese is melted & pizza is heated through.
10- Serve hot & top with sour cream &/or jalapenos (optional).

1da0dc1f0a.ingredients: 1/2 cup hulled barley, 1 cup water, 2 Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and diced, 2 cups water, or more if needed, 2 teaspoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon butter, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts,
1da0dc1f0a.instructions:
1- Place barley in a bowl and add 1 cup water; soak for 2 hours or overnight.
2- Drain.
3- Combine drained barley, apples, 2 cups water, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, lemon juice, nutmeg, and salt in a saucepan; bring to a boil.
4- Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until barley and apples are softened and water is absorbed, adding more water if needed, about 1 hour.
5- Remove saucepan from heat and stir walnuts into barley.

query: I want an uncommon household dish that only uses the best ingredients

options.84b34437fb: Grilled scallops with buttery and tangy beurre rouge (infused butter) sauce
options.2d2ef90ae6: Salad with mayonnaise sauce mixed with shredded imitation crab meat
options.06c853e7db: Mashed potatoes with herbs and sour cream
options.595efead77: Fettuccine pasta with chicken in Alfredo sauce
options.0528f8682c: Swedish meatballs - beef and pork meatballs with savoury mushroom gravy

triples: user, medical condition, Lycopersicon esculentum allergy

84b34437fb.ingredients: 3/4 cup red wine vinegar, 3/4 cup Zinfandel or other dry red wine, 1/2 cup minced shallots, 2 fresh tarragon sprigs, 1/2 teaspoon whole white or black peppercorns, 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter, cut into 6 pieces, plus 2 teaspoons butter, 16 sea scallops, halved horizontally, Additional fresh tarragon sprigs (optional),
84b34437fb.instructions:
1- Combine vinegar, wine, shallots, 2 tarragon sprigs and peppercorns in heavy small saucepan.
2- Boil until mixture is reduced to cup, about 20 minutes.
3- Strain into bowl, pressing on solids to extract as much liquid as possible.
4- Return liquid to saucepan; discard solids in strainer.
5- Bring liquid to simmer over medium-low heat.
6- Whisk in cup butter, 1 piece at a time, allowing each piece to melt before adding the next (do not boil).
7- Season sauce to taste with salt and pepper.
8- Remove from heat; cover saucepan to keep warm.
9- Melt 2 teaspoons butter in large nonstick skillet over high heat.
10- Add scallops and cook just until opaque in center, about 1 minute per side.
11- Spoon sauce onto plates.
12- Arrange scallops atop sauce.
13- Garnish with additional tarragon sprigs, if desired, and serve.

2d2ef90ae6.ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package imitation crabmeat, 2 green onions, also called spring onions, sliced, 14 cup celery, chopped, use the middle, tender ribs with tops, 12 tablespoon lemon juice, fresh (I used lime), 14 cup light mayonnaise, 14 teaspoon dill weed, 1 teaspoon horseradish, prepared, 2 -3 cups salad greens, 1 teaspoon parsley, 1 lemon, cut into wedges,
2d2ef90ae6.instructions:
1- Cut crab into bite-sized pieces.
2- Combine the crab with the onions, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, dill weed and horseradish; mix well.
3- Place the salad greens on 2 plates for large portions and 3 plates for small portions.
4- Divide crab mixture among the plates; sprinkle with the parsley.
5- Place lemon wedges on plate.
6- Serve.

06c853e7db.ingredients: 3 pounds Yukon gold potatoes, peeled, 1 1/2 cups light cream, 1 stick unsalted butter, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 sprig rosemary, 4 sprigs thyme, Salt and freshly ground black pepper,
06c853e7db.instructions:
1- Put the potatoes in a pot and cover with cold water.
2- Put the pot over medium-high heat and cook until the potatoes are fork tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.
3- Drain, return to the pot and put over low heat for 3 minutes to dry the potatoes.
4- Mash them with a potato masher.
5- While the potatoes are boiling combine the cream, butter, sour cream, and rosemary and thyme sprigs in a pot over medium-low heat.
6- Heat to a simmer, turn off the heat and let steep 10 minutes.
7- Remove the herb sprigs and discard.
8- Slowly add the heated cream and butter to the potatoes and mix in with a wooden spoon or a hand mixer until all the cream is incorporated.
9- Be careful not to overmix or the potatoes will become gummy.

595efead77.ingredients: 12 lb fettuccine, uncooked, 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into strips, 1 14 cups reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, 4 teaspoons flour, 4 ounces philadelphila neufchatel cheese (1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese, cubed), 3 tablespoons grated Kraft 100% Parmesan Cheese, divided, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped,
595efead77.instructions:
1- Cook pasta as directed on package.
2- Meanwhile, heat large nonstick skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium-high heat.
3- Add chicken; cook 5 to 7 minutes or until chicken is cooked through, stirring occasionally.
4- Remove from skillet.
5- Mix broth and flour in same skillet.
6- Stir in Neufchatel cheese, 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, garlic powder and pepper; cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly until mixture boils and thickens.
7- Stir in chicken.
8- Drain pasta; place in large bowl.
9- Pour chicken mixture over pasta; toss to coat.
10- Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon parmesan cheese and the chopped fresh parsley.

0528f8682c.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb ground pork, 3/4 cup onion, minced, 1 1/2 tsp parsley, minced, 1 can evaporated milk, 5 ounces, 1/4 tsp pepper, 2 1/4 tsp salt, 1 1/2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 egg, 1 cup bread crumbs, 1 cup water, 1 can mushroom soup, 1/4 tsp pepper, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 3/4 tsp salt, 1 cup sour cream, 1 1/2 tsp smoked paprika,
0528f8682c.instructions:
1- FOR THE MEATBALLS
2- Mix all ingredients together in large bowl
3- Form mixture into balls about 1 inch in diameter
4- Brown in frying pan and place on paper towels to drain
5- FOR THE SAUCE
6- Boil water, remove from heat then mix in all other ingredients starting with the soup
7- Place meatballs in skillet and pour sauce over them, cover and simmer for 20 minutes
8- Serve over cooked egg noodles

8b5a85f46a.ingredients: 12 cup red onion, finely chopped, 34 teaspoon salt, 1 large tomatoes, seeded, chopped, 4 teaspoons red wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon sugar, 2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped, 24 sea scallops, about 1 1/2 lbs, vegetable oil, to brush grill,
8b5a85f46a.instructions:
1- Prepare grill.
2- Soak onion in 1 cup of water with 1/2 teaspoons salt for 15 minutes and then drain.
3- Stir together the onion, tomato, vinegar, sugar and remaining 1/4 teaspoons salt and let stand for 20 minutes.
4- Drain relish in a sieve, discarding liquid, then stir in dill.
5- Cook the scallops while the relish is standing by patting them dry with paper towels and adding salt and pepper to season.
6- Grill in 2 batched on lightly oiled grill rack, turning once, until just cooked through, 4-5 minutes.
7- Serve scallops with relish.

43e35398bc.instructions:

4- Check seasoning and serve immediately.

1146eca54c.ingredients: 1 avocado, 1 tablespoon fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 -1 12 teaspoon fresh lime juice, 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil, 14 garlic clove, minced, 1 teaspoon jalapeno pepper, minced, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper,
1146eca54c.instructions:
1- Combine all ingredients and mash.
2- Keep refrigerated.

6205d00920.ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 1 large avocado, 1 tablespoon green chili pepper, diced, 1 egg, slightly beaten, 14 cup green onion, chopped, 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 1 teaspoon minced garlic, 12 teaspoon salt, 14 teaspoon black pepper, 4 slices monterey jack cheese, hamburger bun with sesame seeds, 4 -6 teaspoons butter, melted, tomatoes, lettuce (optional), onion (optional), mayonnaise,
6205d00920.instructions:
1- Take the avocado and slice in half, remove the pit and peel each half.
2- Sprinkle fresh lemon juice over each half of avocados.
3- Slice one half of avocado and set aside.
4- In a medium bowl, take other half of the avocado and mash with a fork.
5- Add chili peppers, egg, onions, minced garlic and salt and pepper.
6- Stir to combine.
7- Add ground beef to the mixture and combine well.
8- Shape into 4 beef patties.
9- Chill in ref.
10- for 10 minutes.
11- Heat a outdoor grill on medium heat or a skillet.
12- Grill or pan fry hamburger patties until no longer pink inside.
13- (10-15 minutes per side ).
14- Add monterey jack cheese and let melt.
15- Butter each hamburger bun and toast on the top shelf of a grill or in the oven on broil.
16- Mayonnaise each hamburger bun and top with hamburger, tomato, slice of avocado, onion (opt) and lettuce (opt).
17- Serve with french fries , or potato chips or one of your favorite snacks.

3402fc4dab.ingredients: 1 cup lager beer or 1 cup ale, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 12 teaspoons paprika, 2 garlic cloves, chopped finely, 2 california avocados, 1 12 teaspoons tony chachere's creole seasoning (optional), vegetable oil, as needed (for deep frying), salt, as needed, favorite salsa,
3402fc4dab.instructions:
1- To make beer batter, whisk together beer, Tony's seasoning, flour, paprika, and garlic until well blended.
2- Let stand at least 2 hours.
3- Peel avocados; cut each into 6 wedges.
4- Dredge 6 wedges in reserved beer batter.
5- Deep fry in hot oil (370 F) until golden about 3 minutes.
6- Repeat with remaining wedges.
7- Serve wedges with fav.
8- salsa.

1b1a6f9c7b.ingredients: 1 pizza crusts or 1 large pita bread, 3 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 garlic clove, chopped finely, 14 cup green onion, sliced, 12 cup mushroom, slices, 13 cup olive, sliced, 100 g cherry tomatoes, sliced, 14 cup reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, 12 cup basil leaves, 1 avocado,
1b1a6f9c7b.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 180F.
2- Spread pizza base with tomato paste, garlic and shallots.
3- Arrange mushrooms, olive and cherry tomatoes around base.
4- Sprinkle with cheese.
5- Put in oven and bake for 20 minutes or until everything is golden.
6- Remove from oven and serve topped with avocado and basil leaves.

1c5a779885.ingredients: 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 2 tablespoons evaporated milk (not sweetened condensed milk), 12 teaspoon salt, 6 drops red pepper sauce (Tabasco preferred), 34 cup avocado, 1 teaspoon prepared mustard,
1c5a779885.instructions:
1- Peel, seed, and thoroughly mash avocado.
2- Add lemon juice to milk and beat well.
3- Add mashed avocado and remaining ingredients; beat well.

f419ba1efd.ingredients: 1/4 whole Avocado, Salt, 1 whole Hot Dog, 1 whole Hot Dog Bun, 1 whole Small Tomato, Seeded And Diced, 1 Tablespoon Sour Cream,
f419ba1efd.instructions:
1- 1.)
2- Mash the avocado with a fork in a small bowl.

query: I'm looking for a way to introduce a source of greens into my kids' diets

options.495ad5648a: Loaded Black-eyed Peas, Spinach, and Vegetable Soup

4937a89ad0.ingredients: 1 quart vegetable broth, 12 cup thinly sliced green cabbage, 12 cup chopped celery, 12 cup onion, 12 cup broccoli floret, 12 cup cubed zucchini, 12 cup potato, 12 cup uncooked ditalini, salt and pepper, 14 cup basil pesto,
4937a89ad0.instructions:
1- Combine all ingredients except ditalini, salt and pepper and pesto in a slow cooker.
2- Cook on high 4-5 hours, adding ditalini during last 30 minutes.
3- Season to taste with salt and pepper.
4- Stir in basil pesto.

04c8eae5b1.ingredients: 6 large flour tortillas, 1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cream of chicken soup, 1 (4 ounce) canchopped green chilies, 3 thawed & cut into bite-size pieces boneless skinless chicken breasts, 1 green bell pepper, chopped, 1 (1 1/8 ounce) package fajita seasoning mix, 2 -3 cups Mexican blend cheese (or cheddar cheese),
04c8eae5b1.instructions:
1- Mix chicken & fajita seasoning.
2- Cook until chicken is cooked.
3- In a 9X13 pan place 2 tortillas, they will overlap & go up the side of the pan.
4- Spread 1/3 of the soup on the tortillas.
5- Sprinkle with 1/3 of each of the following, green chilies, chicken & green peppers.
6- Sprinkle 1/2 - 3/4 cup of cheese.
7- Continue layering ingredients to make 3 complete layers of everything.
8- Top with the extra cheese.
9- Bake 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
10- Note - Since this is a layered dish, you can get away with "sprinkling" the ingredients around the pan.
11- You will get plenty of all of the ingredients in every bite.

20b77f3205.ingredients: 4 grams Powdered kanten, 250 ml Water, 50 grams Sugar, 350 grams Milk, 3 drops Vanilla extract, 1 Fruits, 300 ml Water, 50 grams Sugar,
20b77f3205.instructions:
1- Simmer 300 ml water and dissolve 50 g sugar to make the syrup.
2- Let it cool.
3- Combine 250 ml water and the powdered kanten in a pot.
4- Boil for 2-3 minutes.
5- Add sugar into the pot from Step 2 and dissolve.
6- Add milk.
7- Stir briefly so that the mixture is cooked through (do not let it boil).
8- Add vanilla extract.
9- Pour into a wet tupperware or bowl and chill to harden.
10- When hardened, make diagonal cuts to slice the jello into 2 cm diamonds.
11- Pour the syrup over the jello.
12- Chop the fruits into desired sizes and mix with the jello.

0ca3c462b7.ingredients: 14 cup vegetable oil (I prefer canola oil), 12 cup brown sugar, 1 egg, 34 cup applesauce (I prefer sweetened), 1 cup grated carrot, 1 cup grated zucchini, 1 cup all-purpose whole wheat flour, 34 cup all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 12 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 12 teaspoon salt,
0ca3c462b7.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 400F (200C).
2- In a large bowl, whisk together oil and sugar.
3- Beat in egg, then applesauce.
4- Stir in carrots and zucchini.
5- In another large bowl, whisk together flours, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.
6- Fold dry ingredients into wet, until just mixed.
7- Grease muffin tray.
8- Spoon batter to the very top of muffin cups and bake 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick or cake tester comes out clean when inserted in a muffin.

0b39996fd6.ingredients: 1 lb ground turkey, 1 whole eggs or 2 egg yolks, beaten, 12 cup pureed carrot, 14 cup applesauce, 14 cup unprocessed natural wheat or 14 cup oat bran, 14 cup breadcrumbs, 1 pinch basil, 1 pinch garlic powder,
0b39996fd6.instructions:
1- Place ground turkey in a large mixing bowl.
2- Add the egg/yolk, carrots, applesauce, spices, bread crumbs and bran.
3- Mix well - If this mixture appears too dry, add more carrots or applesauce.
4- If this mixture appears too wet, add more bran and/or bread crumbs.
5- Place mix into a lightly oiled (olive oil) loaf pan and bake at 350F for approximately 45 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean.
6- **You may wish to cover with foil to prevent the top from burning
7- When finished baking and cooled, remove loaf from pan and slice as you would for bread.
8- Break into small bits for finger feeding or mash or chop gently.
9- This recipe may also be made into "Turkey Sticks" for Toddlers and older babies who are able to handle more textured/chunky finger foods.

495ad5648a.ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed, 1 large onion, chopped, 4 cloves garlic, crushed, 6 cups vegetable broth, 3 potatoes, cubed, 1 1/2 cups dry black-eyed peas, 3 carrots, sliced, 1 zucchini, peeled and cubed, 1 (10 ounce) bag fresh spinach, stems removed, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 2 bay leaves, salt and ground black pepper to taste,
495ad5648a.instructions:
1- Heat olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat; cook and stir onion and garlic in the hot oil until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
2- Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
3- Mix potatoes, black-eyed peas, carrots, zucchini, spinach, parsley, and bay leaves into the broth.
4- Season with salt and black pepper.
5- Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer soup until peas are tender and flavors have blended, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.

query: It's summer and I wanted to make something sweet that will help me cool down

options.0f56a80c6d: Ice cream made from vanilla and sweetened cream churned at home
options.7285256c27: Bitter melon side dish with chili peppers
options.7b9325a970: Homemade salad with potato blended with milk, egg yolk, and onions
options.011adeeaac: Bread recipe from scratch made with sweet potatoes
options.15dd889cd7: Cucumbers mixed with mayonnaise and sour cream

0f56a80c6d.ingredients: 6 eggs, 2 cups sugar, 1 quart whipping cream, 2 tablespoons vanilla (I use pure vanilla),
0f56a80c6d.instructions:
1- Beat 6 eggs until thick using an electric mixer Gradually beat in 2 cups sugar.
2- Beat on HIGH for AT LEAST 5 MINUTES-- don't cheat on the time.
3- Stir in 1 quart of whipping cream and 2 tablespoons vanilla (use 1 pint cream for a less rich ice cream).
4- Pour mixture into the pail.
5- Add milk up to the fill line on the pail, about 1 1/2 inches from the top of the pail.
6- Add paddle to the pail and put the lid on.
7- Attach the handle piece and lock into place.
8- Pack with ice and salt at the ratio of 8 parts ice to 1 part salt.
9- You need quite a bit of ice to freeze well.
10- Crank or freeze in an electric freezer until frozen.
11- Remove from freezer and store in covered plastic containers.
12- for 1 1/2 gallons use: 9 eggs, 3 cups sugar, 3 Tablespoons vanilla and 1 quart and 1 pint of whipping cream.

7285256c27.ingredients: 1/2 Bitter melon, 1 tbsp Soy sauce, 1 tbsp Mirin, 1 tsp Sesame oil, 1 dash Red chilli pepper (Optional), 1 dash Bonito flakes,
7285256c27.instructions:
1- Remove the with pith of the bitter lemon with a spoon, and slice it as thinly as possible.
2- Boil water in a pot and then add the bitter lemon.
3- Boil briefly before draining in a colander.
4- Squeeze out excess water with your hands.
5- Mix the ingredients, and add the goya.
6- Once it's well mixed, chill in the fridge.
7- When it's chilled, top with bonito flakes and serve.

7b9325a970.ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons mustard powder, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, 2 cups milk, 3 egg yolks, 3 tablespoons butter, 13 cup red wine vinegar or 13 cup apple cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon white horseradish, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 3 lbs new potatoes or 3 lbs red potatoes, 4 green onions, sliced thin, 1 large red onion, thinly sliced, 34 cup black olives, drained, salt and pepper,
7b9325a970.instructions:
1- Combine salt, mustard powder, brown sugar, flour and cayenne in the top of a double-boiler (or heavy saucepan).
2- Add milk and egg yolks.
3- Stir until smooth.
4- Cook over boiling water (or medium heat), stirring constantly, until thickened.
5- Stir in butter and vinegar.
6- Chill thoroughly.
7- Scrub potatoes (or peel).
8- Cut potatoes into 2 inch pieces.
9- Place in cold water, bring to a boil, cook until tender.
10- Drain well.
11- Stir horseradish and mustard into dressing.
12- Season to taste.
13- Add all or as much dressing to potatoes as you wish.
14- Add onions and olives.
15- Combine well.
16- This will keep up to 1 week refrigerated.

011adeeaac.ingredients: 350 g sweet potatoes, 500 g strong plain white flour, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 (1/4 ounce) sachet easy-blend dried yeast, 1 12 teaspoons caraway seeds, fresh ground black pepper, 175 ml warm water,
011adeeaac.instructions:
1- Peel and dice the potatoes, then boil them for about 15 minutes or until tender.
2- Drain, and then mash thoroughly.
3- Leave to cool.
4- Sift the flour and salt into a bowl, then add the yeast, caraway seeds and black pepper.
5- Add the sweet potato and rub it in well.
6- Add enough water to make a soft dough, and knead until smooth and elastic.
7- Leave the dough in a warm place until doubled in size (1-2 hours).
8- Knock back the dough on a floured surface and knead again briefly.
9- Place in a greased loaf tin and leave to rise again for another 30 minutes.
10- Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/ gas mark 6 and bake the loaf for 30-35 minutes until the bread is risen, golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped underneath.

15dd889cd7.ingredients: 1 cup Mayonnaise, 1/4 cups Evaporated Canned Milk, 1/4 cups Vinegar--cider Or White, 1/4 cups Sugar, 3 drops Tabasco Sauce (or To Taste), 1/4 teaspoons Garlic Salt, 1/4 teaspoons Onion Salt, 1/4 teaspoons Ground Black Pepper, Salt, To Taste (optional), 5 whole Medium Sized Cucumbers,
15dd889cd7.instructions:
1- In a liquid measuring glass, blend together mayonnaise, evaporated milk, vinegar, sugar, Tabasco, garlic salt, onion salt, and pepper.
2- Taste and add additional salt and/or Tabasco if desired.
3- Set sauce aside.
4- Peel and thinly slice cucumbers and place in a large bowl.
5- Pour sauce ingredients over cucumbers and mix well, ensuring all cucumbers are covered in sauce.
6- Cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours prior to serving.
7- Note: the sauce will become runny as a result of the cucumbers weeping water.
8- This is how the sauce is supposed to be.
9- Just serve with a slotted spoon and youre set.

0d8d8bbe78.ingredients: 4 cups Ice Cream (any Flavour, Slightly Softened), 1/2 cups Butter Or Margarine, 1/2 cups White Sugar, 1 whole Egg (large), 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract, 1/2 cups White All-purpose Flour, 1/4 cups Unsweetened Cocoa, 1/4 teaspoons Salt,
0d8d8bbe78.instructions:
1- 1.
2- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and take ice cream out of the freezer to soften.
3- 2.
