query: I want a healthy lunch dish

options.7e32f3aab4: Nutritious meal made with sweet potato slices and ham
options.730a537b5b: Deep fried mac and cheese with quinoa
options.6aeb5140ab: Large portion fries with gravy and bacon
options.0dc5a67192: Breakfast sandwich made with eggs and ham
options.16af1b09b3: Bananas and strawberries blended in milk

7e32f3aab4.ingredients: 1 large sweet potato, scrubbed clean, 14 cup diced ham, 14 cup chopped onion, chunks, salt, pepper, margarine or butter,
7e32f3aab4.instructions:
1- Poke several holes in the sweet potato with a fork or knife.
2- Cook the potato in the microwave for 6 -7 minutes on high, until done.
3- In a small skillet or saucepan coated with cooking spray, cook onions and ham with lid on for about 3 minutes, then remove lid and cook until onions are softened and slightly browned.
4- Split open the sweet potato and top with onion, ham, salt, pepper and butter to taste.
5- De-e-elish!

730a537b5b.ingredients: 5 slices bread, crusts removed and cubed, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 small onion, diced, 3 cloves garlic, diced, 2 cups quinoa, 2 cups chicken stock, 2 cups water, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup flour, 2 cups skim milk, salt and ground black pepper to taste, 8 ounces sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded, 4 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 large tomato, cored and sliced,
730a537b5b.instructions:
1- Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2- Process cubed bread in a food processor to make bread crumbs.
3- Set aside.
4- Heat olive oil in a deep ovenproof skillet or Dutch oven.
5- Add onion; cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes.
6- Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute.
7- Add quinoa, chicken stock, and water to the skillet.
8- Bring to a simmer; cover and cook until quinoa is tender, about 10 minutes.
9- Heat 1/4 cup butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat.
10- Add flour; cook and stir to form a paste, about 2 minutes.
11- Slowly whisk in skim milk.
12- Season with salt and ground black pepper; simmer on low until thickened, about 5 minutes.
13- Remove saucepan from heat; stir in Cheddar and mozzarella cheeses, a little at a time, until combined.
14- Stir cheese sauce into quinoa mixture in the skillet.
15- Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a separate skillet over medium heat.
16- Add bread crumbs; cook and stir until crumbs are toasted, about 2 minutes.
17- Place tomato slices on top of quinoa; top with bread crumbs.
18- Quinoa mixture will be soupy but will firm up during baking.
19- Bake in the oven until golden brown, about 25 minutes.
20- Allow to rest for 5 minutes before serving.

6aeb5140ab.ingredients: 1 bag of fries, 1 bag of shredded cheese, 1 half a block of feta cheese fresh, 2 packs of f turkey gravy (season to choice), 1 half a pack of bacon, 1 half a container of cottage cheese(the big container),
6aeb5140ab.instructions:
1- Cook gravy add cottage cheese and feta cheese when almost thick let sit
2- Then cook bacon(cut into small pieces) and cook/deepfry fries
3- Layer caserole dish with fries
4- Then bacon
5- Next is the shredded cheese
6- Then pour gravy
7- Bake in oven on 500F for no more then 5 mins

0dc5a67192.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 ounces grilled country fresh ham, 4 slices toasted multigrain bread, 2 teaspoons butter, 4 ounces mayonnaise, fat-free, 4 ounces provolone cheese, shredded, red onion (few slices), 2 ounces Baby Spinach, ground pepper,
0dc5a67192.instructions:
1- Cook eggs in olive oil and grill ham in same pan.
2- Toast bread, butter lightly and spread with mayonnaise.
3- Layer egg, ham, cheese, onion and spinach on bread.
4- Add 4-5 turns of pepper to each sandwich, cut and serve.

16af1b09b3.instructions:
1- Put all the ingredients to blender or smoothie machine.
2- Leave it for about 2 minutes or until will become smoothie.
3- Serve it to glasses without filter it.
4- This beverage is perfect 1 and a half hour before gym's workout.
5- Enjoy it!

aa3568deb8.ingredients: 2 lbs extra lean ground beef, 1 12 cups onions, chopped, 1 cup green pepper, chopped, 2 cups spaghetti sauce, 2 tablespoons Italian spices, 8 ounces turkey pepperoni, chopped, 2 cups low-fat cheddar cheese, shredded (can substitute mozzerella), 12 cup parmesan cheese, grated, 3 egg whites, 18 teaspoon cream of tartar, 2 egg yolks, 1 teaspoon Splenda sugar substitute, 1 pinch salt, 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 3 ounces fat free cream cheese, softened,
aa3568deb8.instructions:
1- Filling:Brown ground beef, onion and peppers in a large frying pan.
2- Add sauce and spices.
3- Pour into a greased 9x13-inch casserole pan.
4- Arrange pepperoni slices over beef mixture.
5- Cover with mozzarella.
6- Crust:Beat the egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff.
7- In another bowl, beat the egg yolks, Splenda, salt, garlic powder and cream cheese with a mixer until smooth.
8- Gradually fold the yolk mixture into the egg whites being careful not to deflate the whites.
9- Pour over cheese.
10- Smooth top.
11- Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
12- Bake uncovered at 400F for 20 minutes.
13- Let cool for 5-10 minutes.
14- Serve.

query: How to make noodles like Chinese takeaway?

options.8f99fe76ba: Pan-fried pork noodles with chicken broth
options.967f75147f: Thin spaghetti with cooked chicken and carrots
options.038ebd90a6: Peking Duck - Chinese style crispy roast duck with hoisin sauce
options.5994e1b659: Pork belly sandwiched between Chinese steamed bread bun with hoisin sauce
options.93de8cfcc3: Dale Taldes Slippery Lemongrass Pork Noodles

8f99fe76ba.ingredients: 1 pound noodles fresh, thin, 1 x peanut oil, 23 cup chicken broth, 2 tablespoons peanut oil, 1 pound bok choy cut into 2in sections, 1/2 pound pork strips, barbequed, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, tamari thin, 1 tablespoon rice wine or dry sherry, 1 tablespoon oyster sauce, 1 tablespoon cornstarch dissolved in 2 tb cold chicken broth,
8f99fe76ba.instructions:
1- BLANCH 1 POUND FRESH noodles in boiling water to wash away the starch and to loosen them up (about 2 minutes).
2- Drain them well.
3- Scatter the noodles in a baking pan.
4- Use a pair of chopsticks and your hands to untangle them as much as possible.
5- Put a layer of the noodles 1-inch deep in each of 2 large, heavy skillets.
6- Pour 2 tablespoons of oil and 13 cup chicken broth in each.
7- Cook over a low flame until the broth boils away and the bottom becomes brown and crisp.
8- From time to time, add a little oil and broth to keep the noodles moist and allow the crust to develop slowly.
9- This should take about 10-to-12 minutes.
10- To flip, first shake the pan to make sure the cake is not stuck to the bottom (if it is, dribble some oil around the edge to loosen it).
11- Cover the pan with a wide lid.
12- Flip the skillet over, holding the lid firmly.
13- The cake will drop onto the lid.
14- Slide the cake back into the pan to brown it on the other side.
15- Add more oil around the edge if it seems to be sticking.
16- To serve, slide it out onto a plate and use it as a base for any dish with sauce.
17- TO MAKE THE PORK AND VEGETABLE SAUCE: Heat the peanut oil in a wok.
18- When it is hot, add the bok choy and stir-fry to coat with oil.
19- Add the pieces of pork and stir-fry to heat through.
20- Add the broth.
21- Stir in the soy sauce, rice wine or sherry, and oyster sauce.
22- When the sauce is hot, thicken it with the dissolved cornstarch and serve on the bed of pan-fried noodles.

967f75147f.ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded, 8 ounces uncooked thin spaghetti, 1 (10 ounce) bagfresh carrots, cut and thin strips, 1 (8 ounce) package sugar snap peas (snipped), 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, not drained, 12 cup citrus stir-fry sauce (11.7 ounce bottle),
967f75147f.instructions:
1- Cook spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water for 6 minutes.
2- Stir in carrots and snap peas, cook for 1 minute or until vegetables are crisp to tender.
3- Drain in a sieve and return to pot.
4- Add chicken, oranges and stir fry sauce and toss together.

91748eb475.ingredients: 8 ounces linguine, 3 tablespoons butter or 3 tablespoons margarine, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1 teaspoon cajun seasoning (I use Tony Chachere's), 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 12 cup sherry wine, 2 teaspoons italian seasoning, salt, pepper, 12 cup water, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 12 cup grated parmesan cheese,
91748eb475.instructions:
1- Prepare pasta according to package directions; drain.
2- Melt butter in a medium skillet over low heat; Stir in olive oil and red pepper flakes and raise heat to medium-high.
3- Add shrimp and saute until almost pink; add cajun seasoning and garlic powder; saute 1 minute until fragrant.
4- Add Italian seasoning, sherry, and if desired--additional salt/pepper; heat until simmering.
5- Dissolve cornstarch in water; add to skillet.
6- Continue to cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.
7- If necessary add small amounts of additional sherry until desired consistency is reached.
8- Top with Parmesan cheese.
9- Serve hot over linguine.

038ebd90a6.ingredients: 3 -4 lbs duck, 1 teaspoon malt sugar, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 12 cup plum sauce, 12 cup sweet red bean paste or 12 cup hoisin sauce, 10 scallions, trimmed and quartered lengthwise, 1 small cucumber, peeled and cut lengthwise into thin strips about 2 inches long, 2 cups flour, 1 cup boiling water, vegetable oil or sesame oil,
038ebd90a6.instructions:
1- The *malt sugar called for in this recipe resembles honey.
2- This and the other Oriental condiments are available in Oriental food stores.
3- Clean the duck and place in a basin.
4- Boil a large kettle of water and pour it over the duck, dousing it thoroughly.
5- Remove the bird immediately and dry it inside and out with a paper towel.
6- Hang it by the neck overnight in an airy place.
7- Dissolve the malt sugar in the soy sauce and rub the duck with this mixture.
8- When this coating has dried, place the duck on a wire rack in a roasting pan and put it in an oven, preheated to 375F to roast for 1 hour.
9- Do not baste the duck or open the oven door.
10- While the duck is roasting, make the pancakes.
11- Put the flour in a bowl and gradually add the boiling water.
12- Mix well with a wooden spoon, but do not knead the dough.
13- Cover with a cloth and leave stand for 20 minutes.
14- Form the dough into a long roll about 2 inches in diameter.
15- Cut off 1/2 inch rounds from the roll.
16- Roll the rounds into balls and flatten them into round cakes 1/4 inch thick.
17- When you have used up the dough, dust each cake with flour and roll it out into a paper thin pancake.
18- Lightly brush a heavy skillet with oil, and cook the pancakes over low heat for 1 1/4 minutes on each side.
19- They are ready when parts of the pancakes start to curl and bubble slightly.
20- Stack the cooked pancakes and cover with a damp cloth until required.
21- To serve the duck, first slice off the crisp skin in 1-2 inch squares and then slice off the meat.
22- Place the skin and the meat on two separate warmed dishes and bring to the table.
23- The plum sauce, the bean paste, the scallions and the cucumber strips should all be laid out in separate small dishes.
24- Spread a spoonful of sauce on each pancake, lay strips of cucumber and scallions down the center, add duck skin and meat, and roll up the pancake.
25- After the duck carcass has been stripped of its meat, it is usually boiled with a large amount of cabbage and traditionally served as a soup to end the meal.

5994e1b659.ingredients: 2 cups soy sauce, 2 cups brown sugar, 3 tablespoons garlic powder, 5 green onions, 2 pounds pork belly, skin off, 1/2 cup roasted peanuts, 2 teaspoons raw sugar, Vegetable oil, 1 clove garlic, crushed, 1 tablespoon chopped white onion, 1 head preserved mustard greens, chopped, 2 tablespoons sweet soy sauce, 3 teaspoons cilantro leaves, chopped, 6 gua bao (pork belly buns), 3 tablespoons hoisin sauce,
5994e1b659.instructions:
1- Combine the soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, green onions and 4 cups water in a pot.
2- Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring occasionally.
3- Let cool to room temperature.
4- Combine the marinade and the pork belly in a pan, cover and marinate for 24 hours in the refrigerator.
5- Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F. Set the pan with the pork belly and marinade in the oven.
6- Cook until tender, about 3 hours.
7- Remove the pan from the oven.
8- Set a second pan directly on the pork belly and weight it with canned goods to compress the pork belly.
9- Refrigerate for at least 6 hours, or until the pork belly is firm.
10- Crush the roasted peanuts in a food processor or with a mortar and pestle.
11- Mix in the raw sugar.
12- Set aside.
13- Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a saute pan over medium-high heat.
14- Add the garlic, white onions and preserved mustard greens.
15- Saute for 2 minutes.
16- Stir in the sweet soy sauce.
17- Set aside.
18- Slice the pork belly into 3-inch-long blocks, and then cut into 1/2-inch-thick rectangles.
19- Sear on both sides in a little oil until golden brown.
20- Set up a steamer and steam the gua bao until soft and fluffy.
21- Open up the steamed buns.
22- Spread each with 1/2 tablespoon of the hoisin and then top with a slice of pork belly and 1 tablespoon of the preserved mustard green mixture.
23- Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon of the crushed peanuts and some chopped cilantro.

93de8cfcc3.ingredients: 2 pounds pork shoulder, ground, 2 tablespoons shallots, brunoise, 2 tablespoons ginger, minced, 1/4 cup scallion greens, sliced, 2 tablespoons cilantro, chopped, 1 egg white, 3 tablespoons oyster sauce, 1/4 teaspoon white pepper, 1/4 teaspoon red chili flakes, 1/4 teaspoon sugar, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 tablespoon potato starch, 1/4 cup sesame oil, 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, 3 cloves garlic, chopped and fried, 3 stalks lemongrass, very finely chopped, 1 pound rice noodles, 1/2 cup simple syrup, 1/2 cup fresh lime juice, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1 clove garlic, minced, 2 Thai chilies, sliced into 2,
93de8cfcc3.instructions:
1- Combine pork shoulder, shallots, ginger, scallions, cilantro, egg whites, oyster sauce, white pepper, red chili flakes, sugar, baking soda, potato starch, sesame oil, salt, fish sauce, garlic and lemongrass and mix well.
2- Cook pork mixture in a hot wok until cooked through.
3- To assemble, put blanched noodles on the bottom of a shallow bowl.
4- Cover noodles with cooked lemongrass pork and adjust with more nuoc mam as needed.
5- Garnish with crushed peanuts, Thai basil and cilantro sprigs.

query: Surprise me with an unconventional vegan noodle recipe

options.5570b46221: Stir-fried tofu, noodles and vegetables Bento
options.95c6c8faaf: Smoothie with tomato juice and cucumbers
options.862ce44a8f: Noodles with beef and chicken soup
options.99401af98c: Fast and easy vegan-friendly pizza recipe

5570b46221.ingredients: 1 ounce soba noodles, uncooked, 3 teaspoons low-sodium tamari, divided, 2 teaspoons sesame seeds, 12 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, pepper, to taste, 1 nori, broken into small pieces, 2 tablespoons whole wheat flour, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 0.5 (12 ounce) package extra firm tofu, cut into 1/2 inch cubes, 1 cup frozen broccoli florets, thawed, 2 tablespoons carrots, grated, 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced, 14 cup frozen shelled edamame, thawed,
5570b46221.instructions:
1- Cook noodles in boiling salted water 4 minutes.
2- Drain, rinse with cold water, and drain again.
3- Toss with 1 tsp tamari, sesame seeds, and sesame oil.
4- Season with pepper, to taste.
5- Stir together flour and garlic powder in medium bowl.
6- Add tofu, and toss to coat.
7- Season with pepper, to taste.
8- Spray skillet with olive oil cooking spray.
9- Heat over medium-high heat, add tofu, and saute 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
10- Transfer to plate and sprinkle with 1 tsp tamari.
11- Return skillet to heat.
12- Add 2 tbsp water and remaining 1 tsp tamari, then broccoli, carrots, and ginger.
13- Stir and then cover.
14- Simmer 3 minutes or until broccoli is warmed through.
15- Pack soba noodles in 1 section of bento box or portable container.
16- Sprinkle nori on top of noodles.
17- Pack 1/2 cup tofu cubes and 1/2 cup broccoli/carrot mixture in other sections, reserving remaining tofu cubes and broccoli/carrot mixture for use in other lunch dishes.
18- Fill in last section with edamame.
19- Refrigerate, uncovered, until all ingredients are chilled thoroughly.
20- Cover box, and refrigerate until ready to serve.

95c6c8faaf.ingredients: 2 cups tomato juice, 12 cup chopped red bell pepper, 12 cup peeled and chopped cucumber, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 tablespoons chopped scallions, 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 14 teaspoon salt (to taste), 14 teaspoon fresh ground pepper, 14 teaspoon hot pepper sauce,
95c6c8faaf.instructions:
1- Combine all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth, about 3 minutes.
2- Chill for at least 30 minutes.
3- Fill 4 glasses with ice and divide the smoothie mixture evenly among them.
4- Serve immediately.
5- Enjoy!

5110e415eb.ingredients: Chicken or possibly turkey carcass (or possibly other meat scraps, whatever you have, wings, necks), 1 beaten egg, 2 tbsp. water, 1 c. flour (half white & half whole wheat),
5110e415eb.instructions:
1- Meat: Boil meat and bones till meat falls off.
2- Pick meat off bones.
3- Put it back in water it was cooked in.
4- (When boiling, I add in chicken or possibly beef soup base and/or possibly poultry seasoning to taste.)
5- Noodles: Mix flour and salt.
6- Make a well in center.
7- Add in egg.
8- Add in water gradually to make stiff dough.
9- Knead on floured surface to mix well.
10- Roll out and let stand 1/2 hour or possibly so.
11- Cut in slices and drop into pot of boiling meat and stock.
12- Cook for 20-50 min or possibly till done.

862ce44a8f.ingredients: 4 carrots, peeled and chopped, 1 turnip, peeled and chopped, 1 onion, peeled and chopped, 2 potatoes, peeled and chopped, 1 rutabaga, peeled and chopped, 1 parsnip, peeled and chopped, 1 sweet potato, peeled and chopped, 1 sprig parsley, 350 g beef, osso bucco, 4 vegetable bouillon cubes, 2 (30 g) packets chicken noodle soup mix (preferably ossem brand),
862ce44a8f.instructions:
1- Place meat in cold water and bring to the boil.
2- Cook until meat browned.
3- Drain and rinse meat and set aside.
4- Place all vegetables in a large pot.
5- Cover with water and add stock cubes.
6- Bring to the boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer until vegetables are tender.
7- Blend the soup/vegetable mix until smooth.
8- Add the packets of chicken noodle soup mix and the meat.
9- Bring to the boil, reduce heat to simmer cover, and cook for a further 30 minutes - stirring the soup regularly so the bottom does not burn.
10- Taste before serving to see if you need salt and / or pepper - but I find the soup tastes heavenly.
11- Enjoy!

99401af98c.ingredients: 250 g wholegrain flour, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 14-12 cup lukewarm water, 8 teaspoons tomato paste, 4 teaspoons red pesto sauce, 12 pepper, cut into strips, 6 mushrooms, sliced, 1 tablespoon oil, capers, jalapeno, olive, parmesan cheese, grated,
99401af98c.instructions:
1- Preheat your oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
2- Combine the flour, olive oil and 1/4 cup lukewarm water.
3- Stir and gradually add more water until you get a firm dough.
4- Dont worry if you accidentally add too much water just add some more flour.
5- Once your dough is ready divide it into four pieces.
6- Roll out each piece until it is the size of the base of a frying pan.
7- Put your frying pan on a mediate high.
8- Dry fry the pizza bases until they are getting crisp.
9- Leave the pan on the heat and quickly fry your pepper and mushrooms with 1 tbsp oil.
10- Add 2 tsp of tomato paste to each of your pizza bases.
11- Spread it our to cover the whole pizza, until the edge.
12- Top with 1 tsp red pesto and spread out as well.
13- Now add the peppers, mushrooms, capers, jalapenos and olives to the pizzas.
14- Top with grated parmesan cheese.
15- Put the pizzas in the oven for 6 minutes, until your cheese has just started to melt.
16- You can use any kind of topping you like with these pizzas.
17- Substitutions:.
18- Use dairy free cheese for a vegan pizza or no cheese at all.

867d4de95a.ingredients: 1 liter stock of your choice, 2 bundle of somen or any noodle, 1/2 cup shimeji mushrooms, 1 cup oyster mushroom, 1/2 cup spring onions, 1 dash pepper,
867d4de95a.instructions:
1- Bring stock to a boil and mushroom and some noodle simmer for 2 minute then add seasoning
2- stir gently only once or twice ( over string will cause soup to be cloudy )
3- Off heat add scallion and serve

query: Find me a pasta recipe for my vegan dinner guests

options.0eebf3e4b4: Vegan lasagna made from vegan cheese
options.9540d5b87d: Vegan pizza with toppings that tastes like meat
options.7530619603: Pasta with lamb meat and pork sausage
options.6f3099f3e9: Vegan drink made from tropical fruit

triples: user, medical condition, Lycopersicon esculentum allergy

0eebf3e4b4.ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) box soft tofu, 4 teaspoons red star nutritional yeast flakes, salt, liberally to taste,
0eebf3e4b4.instructions:
1- mash tofu to a fine consistency.
2- add yeast flakes and salt to taste.
3- you want to go more "salty" than "yeasty".
4- do not use brewer's yeast or baker's yeast they are NOT the same thing!
5- use in recipes calling for ricotta such as lasagna, spanakopita, etc.
6- you can add spices into the mix such as thyme, a little celery salt, etc.

9540d5b87d.ingredients: 1 cup warm water (100 degrees F), 1 12 teaspoons yeast or 1 12 teaspoons fast rising yeast, 1 teaspoon sugar, 12 teaspoon salt, 2 12-3 cups flour (can do half white and half wheat), 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 -2 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning, 14 medium onion, cut into slivers, 15 vegan pepperoni, 1 tablespoon oil, 3 -4 ounces Gimmie Lean sausage flavor, 18 teaspoon ground fennel, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon basil, 14 teaspoon onion powder, 14 teaspoon Italian spices, oil, 4 ounces hunt tomato sauce with basil garlic and oregano, 14 teaspoon red pepper flakes, 14 teaspoon garlic powder, 14 teaspoon Italian spices, 14 teaspoon pizza seasoning, 14 teaspoon basil, 14 teaspoon oregano, 5 ounces vegan mozzarella cheese or 5 ounces vegan mozzarella cheese, sliced very thin,
9540d5b87d.instructions:
1- Place the water, sugar and yeast in a large bowl.
2- Set aside to bloom for 5 minutes.
3- Add garlic, oil, Italian Herbs.
4- Add 1 1/2 cups to 2 cups flour.
5- Pour out onto a floured board.
6- Add remaining flour as needed, knead about 5 minutes, this is a very soft dough.
7- Cover with bowl, let rise for 30 minutes or until doubled in bulk.
8- Punch dough down, knead on slightly floured dough.
9- Grease pizza pan and roll out in pan.
10- Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
11- In the meantime, crisp the pepperoni in the oil on both sides, drain on paper towels.
12- Mix the sausage with the spices, form into small balls.
13- Brown in oil over medium-high heat, drain on paper towels.
14- Spoon tomato sauce on crust, swirl to cover, but leave a crust.
15- Sprinkle with the herbs.
16- Decorate with onions, pepperoni and your Italian Sausage.
17- Cover with the cheese.
18- Bake until golden on bottom, spray the crust with cooking spray.
19- Broil about 1 minute, or until cheese is melty.

7530619603.ingredients: 1/2 pound lamb sausage, casings removed and meat crumbled, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 cup finely chopped onion, 1 cup finely chopped carrot, 1 cup finely chopped celery, 1/2 cup golden raisins, 1/2 cup white wine vinegar, 2 cups chicken stock or low-sodium broth, 1 cup milk,
7530619603.instructions:
1- In a medium, deep skillet, cook the sausage over moderately high heat, stirring and breaking up any lumps, until browned, about 8 minutes.
2- Scrape the sausage onto a plate.
3- In the same skillet, heat the olive oil.
4- Add the onion, carrot and celery, cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until tender.
5- Add the raisins and vinegar and cook until reduced by half, about 5 minutes.
6- Add the chicken stock and the cooked sausage and simmer over moderately low heat until the stock is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.
7- Remove the sauce from the heat and add the milk; dont worry if it curdles.
8- Use an immersion blender to break up the meat and incorporate the milk.
9- Alternatively, transfer the sauce to a blender and blend to a coarse puree, then return the sauce to the pot.
10- Simmer the ragu until thickened, about 5 minutes longer.

4cf5818e26.ingredients: 1 34 cups whole wheat flour, 14 cup cornmeal, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 12 teaspoon garlic salt, 2 tablespoons italian seasoning, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 12 cups milk, 1 cup cheddar cheese, grated, 1 zucchini, grated, 4 slices deli turkey, cut into pieces, marinara sauce, for dipping,
4cf5818e26.instructions:
1- Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl.
2- Incorporate eggs, milk and butter.
3- Mix in meat, cheese and zucchini.
4- Cook in waffle iron according to directions.
5- Cut into strips and enjoy dipping into marinara.

6f3099f3e9.ingredients: 1 small banana, 1 (6 ounce) can pineapple juice, 3 tablespoons canned pure coconut milk, 1 tablespoon sugar,
6f3099f3e9.instructions:
1- Place sliced banana, pineapple juice, coconut milk and sugar in blender.
2- Blend until smooth.
3- Pour into glass.

186b92f1d3.ingredients: 8 lasagna noodles, 1 (16 ounce) package extra firm tofu, 1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes, 10 ounces spinach (frozen or fresh), 1 12 tablespoons italian seasoning, 12 ounces spaghetti sauce,
186b92f1d3.instructions:
1- Boil lasagna noodles per package instructions, drain and set aside.
2- If using frozen spinach, thaw in the microwave, then press the water out in a strainer.
3- Drain the water from the tofu, place into large mixing bowl and mash with a potato masher (until it looks like the texture of ricotta cheese).
4- Drain the canned tomatoes.
5- Mix the tofu, spinach, canned tomatoes and italian seasoning.
6- Preheat oven to 350F and grease a 13x9 baking dish.
7- Spread mixture of tofu, spinach and tomatoes onto lasagna noodles and roll, then place into the baking dish.
8- Once all lasagna noodles are in the baking dish, pour desired amount of sauce over the noodles.
9- Cover dish with foil and bake at 350F for 30 minutes.

query: Give me a Subway-style beef sandwich recipe

options.2d0fe1199e: Roast beef sandwich with mozzarella, banana pepper rings and romaine lettuce
options.88510b467f: Subway-style sandwich made from french baguette bread, ham, lettuce, and tomatoes
options.3a1e880d13: Grilled sandwich made with vegetables and cheese

2d0fe1199e.ingredients: 1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise, 2 slices Wheat Bread, 6 slices Rare Roast Beef, 4 slices Mozzarella Cheese, 8 pieces Banana Pepper Rings, 1 leaf Romaine Lettuce,
2d0fe1199e.instructions:
1- Spread mayo on each piece of wheat bread.
2- Next, add as much roast beef as you dare (6 slices used here).
3- Top with mozzarella.
4- Add a few banana ring peppers and finish by add some crisp romaine lettuce.
5- Cut in half and eat!

88510b467f.ingredients: 1/4 Lettuce, 1/2 Tomato, 1 Green peppers, 1/4 Onion, 1/2 French baguette, 8 slice Thinly sliced ham, 5 Olives, 1 dash Basil pesto, 1 dash Mayonnaise, 1 dash Coarsely ground pepper and salt,
88510b467f.instructions:
1- Finely julienne the lettuce.
2- Remove the stem and seeds from the peppers, cut into two lengthwise, and cut thin slices horizontally.
3- Thoroughly drain.
4- Slice the onion and lightly sprinkle salt on top.
5- Let soak in water for 30 minutes to an hour, then drain.
6- Rinse with water while rubbing to remove the salt.
7- Lightly wring out the water.
8- Thinly slice the olives and drain.
9- If the olives have pits, remove them.
10- Slice (not all the way through) the bread lengthwise to create a space for the fillings.
11- If you cut most of the way through, you can stuff in a lot of the filling.
12- Open the bread and arrange the ham, then the olives and onions.
13- Put the olives toward the inside to prevent them from falling out.
14- Sprinkle with pepper.
15- Top with basil paste and mayonnaise.
16- If the basil pesto doesn't have salt, sprinkle salt on top.
17- This time, I used S&B's pesto sauce.
18- This is salty, so I didn't add salt.
19- Please adjust the salt to the pesto you use.
20- Add the tomato, lettuce, and green peppers and your sandwich is ready!
21- If you wrap it in plastic, the vegetables stay put and it's easy to eat.

1a55e7ec9f.ingredients: 1 lb/ 1/2kg beef, 2 medium onions, 14 cup coconut, 2 green chilies, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 4 teaspoons oil, 2 tablespoons dried coconut, pieces, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 3 teaspoons garam masala powder or 3 teaspoons any other curry powder, salt,
1a55e7ec9f.instructions:
1- Cut the beef into bite size pieces.
2- Chop the onion and green chillies grind the coconut.
3- Make a paste of lemon juice, chilli powder and garam masala .
4- Coat the beef with this masala and keep it aside.
5- (The lemon juice in this mix will make the meat softer.
6- ).
7- Heat oil in the pan, add chopped onion, sliced chilli, when the onion turns golden brown add the remaining 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, chilli powder and coriander leaves cook for another 2 minutes.
8- Now add the masala coated beef to it and stir fry till the meat turns brown, reduce the flame, cover the pan.
9- The meat will get cooked in the water it releases.
10- When the meat gets cooked 3/4th percent check for salt.
11- Add the ground coconut/coconut cream cook till the liquid evaporates and the meat becomes soft.
12- Add the dried coconut pieces.
13- Garnish it with mint or few sprigs of coriander leaves.

3a1e880d13.ingredients: 1 large eggplant, 1 large zucchini, 1 large sweet onion, Olive oil spray, salt, Pepper, 4 Portuguese rolls, 4 tbsp. olive tapenade, baby spinach leaves, Fresh mozzarella slices, roasted red pepper strips, VINAIGRETTE DRESSING,
3a1e880d13.instructions:
1- Coat vegetables with olive oil spray and season with salt and pepper.
2- Grill on a hot stovetop grill pan, 10 to 15 minutes or until browned and tender.
3- Split the Portuguese rolls and spread each with 1 tablespoon olive tapenade; line with fresh baby spinach leaves.
4- Top with vegetables, slices of fresh mozzarella, and roasted red pepper strips.
5- Drizzle with vinaigrette dressing.

019a97b553.ingredients: 2 slice Sliced bread (I recommend wheat germ bread), 2 pieces Katsu (any kind), 3 leaves Lettuce, 1 tbsp Ketchup, 1 tbsp Japanese worcestershire-style sauce, 1 tsp Grainy mustard, 1 Mayonnaise,
019a97b553.instructions:
1- Spread the mustard on the bread and top with lettuce.
2- Mix together the ketchup and sauce and coat the katsu.
3- Spread a lot of sauce on it.
4- Top the lettuce with the katsu.
5- Spread on mayonnaise to taste and press the top slice of bread down.
6- If you wrap the sandwich with plastic wrap, it's easy to cleanly slice.
7- Take off the plastic wrap and enjoy!
8- If it's for a lunch box, you can leave the wrap on until it's time to eat.

257bb539a7.instructions:
1- Mix sour cream, mustard and horseradish with wire whisk until well blended.
2- For each serving: Spread cut sides of croissant with about 2 Tbsp.
3- of the mustard mixture.
4- Cover bottom half of croissant with 3 oz.
5- beef, 3 Tbsp.
6- watercress and 3 tomato slices; cover with top of croissant.
